Soul.Name: Purifying Sun
Soul.Comment: Return two random cards from your Cemetery to your Card File. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Protection of the Sun
Skill0.Comment: Change battle time to morning.

Skill1.Name: Solar Blade Claevolg
Skill1.Comment: One friendly unit gets [HP + 50% of target's MAX HP].

Skill2.Name: Revival
Skill2.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'We fight for the peace of the world!'
FlavorText.Text2: The most renowned leader in the history of the Solar Kingdom.  A pure boy who wished to bring peace to the world, he was said to radiate light and have the divine protection of the sun.  When fate turned against him, he became known as the Fallen Sun.

Soul.Name: Points of Light
Soul.Comment: You get SP equal to the number of disengaged enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Pursuit of Light
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What is light?  Is darkness evil?'
FlavorText.Text2: In this world, there are beings disconnected from the limitations of mundane living things. They are known as Mazoku.  Even amongst Mazoku, Advent is said to hold a special interest in humans.

Soul.Name: Eradicating Power of Sfida
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of level 2 or below to its Card File.

Skill0.Name: Sfida Takes Wing
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+10, RNG+1 and is healed 15 HP.

Skill1.Name: Assault Dragon's Breath
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to all enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Sorry to wake you, Sfida, but we have a mission.  Can you fly?'
FlavorText.Text2: Partnering with his best friend, the Assault Dragon Sfida, he became the world's first dragon knight. Together, they became legendary for their constant struggle against evil.

Soul.Name: Oracle of the True God
Soul.Comment: Revive one closed friendly unit. After that, you get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: Healing Light
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units except this unit get [HP+10]. Target friendly [subtype: true god church] unit gets [HP+15], except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Shield of the Heavens
Skill1.Comment: All units except Refess units get RNG=0 for this turn. This unit gets AGI-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I can hear the voice of God.  Come!  Let us pray!'
FlavorText.Text2: The founder of the first organized religion.  At its peak, his god was worshiped more than any other in the world.  No one could deny the reality of his miracles.  However, his theocracy could not hold true to his vision after he passed on.

Soul.Name: Lion's Claw
Soul.Comment: Give AT+20 to all friendly units.

Skill0.Name: Might of the Lion
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets [AT + number of enemy units x 10] and is healed 10HP.

Skill1.Name: Slash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My prince will lead the world to peace!  That's why I fight on!'
FlavorText.Text2: The military leader of the Solar Kingdom of Folrart.  Folrart is ruled by Solar Prince Verlaat, and opposes the armies of the Envoy of Chaos, Elgandi.  Lion Baron is not a royal rank, but a nickname earned by fighting ferociously from behind his signature mask.  He never lets up against the forces of chaos, believing Prince Verlaat will unify the world.

Soul.Name: Miracle of the Light Sword
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to one enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Lantylit
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+10] to a random row of enemies. For each enemy unit of HP 0 or below, you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My, my...  How unlucky you are to have come across me!'
FlavorText.Text2: The commander of the Solar Kingdom's cleric army.  She is known for calling herself the Saber Saint.  She fights with the sword Lantylit, which can only be wielded by the strongest warrior priest.  The blade is made of pure light, and changes shape according to its owner's will.

Skill0.Name: Holy Light
Skill0.Comment: Revive all closed friendly units. All friendly units are fully healed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Our wounds are healed by miracles, and again we sally forth to battle.'
FlavorText.Text2: A miraculous light said to radiate from heaven.  Those who bathe in it have their wounds healed instantly.

Skill0.Name: Dispel
Skill0.Comment: All enemy units get DF=0 and have their AT restored to base value.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Base magic can be driven away by a divine miracle.'
FlavorText.Text2: A miracle that nullifies spells and curses.  Its effectiveness depends on the power and faith of the practitioner.

Soul.Name: Knight's Intuition
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one unit, give it AT-20 and render it engaged.

Skill0.Name: Shield of Faith
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/DF 10 or lower] This unit is healed 5 HP and gets DF+5.

FlavorText.Text1: 'For king and country!'
FlavorText.Text2: A young knight of the Solar Kingdom of Folrart.  In addition, any soldier granted a holy blessing can be given the title of paladin.  Young men newly ordained as paladins quickly have their naivety challenged by the harsh realities of war.

Skill0.Name: Stand Firm
Skill0.Comment: When this unit uses Rest, it recovers 33% of MAX HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Can your attacks challenge my shield?'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight of the Solar Guard, one of Folrart's proud bands of knights.  They protect themselves from enemy attacks with towering shields as tall as they are.

Soul.Name: Divine Strike
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: Refess LV X20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Rapid Shot Archery
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Not only do I not need arrows, but would you believe I fire two shots at once?'
FlavorText.Text2: An archer of the Solar Kingdom's magician corps.  Through magic they can fire two arrows simultaneously.

Soul.Name: Enchanted Spear
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Refess level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Penetrating Light
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT+25 directly from the HP of one random enemy unit within range of HP 30 or higher.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You can't stop this spear.'
FlavorText.Text2: A special branch of the Solar Kingdom's magician corps.  Their spears, fashioned by magic, are said to penetrate any armor.

Skill0.Name: Imperial Order
Skill0.Comment: All units get RNG=1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That king's selfishness is beyond compare.'
FlavorText.Text2: Said to live far to the north.  All creatures that fly naturally lower their heads before him.

Soul.Name: The Guardian Falls
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get DF=0.

Skill0.Name: Repatriate
Skill0.Comment: Revive all closed friendly units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If I were protected by that, my sleep would never be disturbed.'
FlavorText.Text2: A magic stone statue used to protect the tombs of kings from an ancient, prosperous kingdom.  Any who intrude into these tombs are pursued mercilessly.

Skill0.Name: Defensive Maneuvers
Skill0.Comment: Choose one friendly unit of level 3 or lower. For this turn, target friendly unit's DF equals the HP of the originally chosen unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A knight protects the weak at all times.'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight's duty is to protect weak citizens.  They guard their people at the cost of their own lives.

Soul.Name: Enchanted Spear
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a column of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Magic Spear
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is in area[1-2-3]] This unit gets AT+15 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Lancer
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I wonder what kind of power this spear holds...'
FlavorText.Text2: A wandering knight who found a spear left by an ancient civilization.  Now that the spear has accepted him, what is his fate?

Soul.Name: Divine Word
Soul.Comment: You get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill0.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

Skill1.Name: Bound by Doctrine
Skill1.Comment: One friendly [subtype: True God Church] unit gets MAX HP+20 and HP+20.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Abominable thing!  Begone!'
FlavorText.Text2: Young military priests of the world's most widespread religion, the Church of the True God.  Bound by doctrine from birth, they become excellent and loyal soldiers.

Soul.Name: Divine Word
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to a random enemy unit. Give AT+10 to all friendly units.

Skill0.Name: Inquisition Council
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: True God Church] units are healed 10 HP, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Bash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to and render engaged a random enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Let us wipe away the evil in your heart.'
FlavorText.Text2: A priest of the world's most widespread religion, the Church of the True God.  Their duty is to execute penal regulations without fail.  The divine punishment they wield is driven by the doctrine they carry within themselves.

Skill0.Name: Shield Lv1
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets DF+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Bash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to and render engaged a random enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This war is the will of God!'
FlavorText.Text2: A foot soldier in the Solar Kingdom's cleric army.  His body is protected by a divine blessing and empowered by his faith.

Soul.Name: Crimson Radiance
Soul.Comment: Return two random cards from your Cemetery to your Card File. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Ruby Radiance
Skill0.Comment: This unit and the units to the left and the right get DF+5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm not hurt!  Could it be protecting me?'
FlavorText.Text2: A gem beast with a crimson stone in its forehead.  Legends say that when the stone shines, a mysterious protection is granted.

Soul.Name: Blessing of Light
Soul.Comment: Add Rival Iczer's present SP value to your SP.

Skill0.Name: Power Source
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly gets MAX HP+10 and HP+20.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This is the power of order.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the six great spirits.  It's the manifestation of the power of the light that makes up the world.

Soul.Name: Humble Gift
Soul.Comment: Target friendly unit fully recovers its HP.  You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Blessing Invocation
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+3.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Little monsters that bring good luck?  I don't think they exist.'
FlavorText.Text2: Fey creatures that bring good luck.  Said to multiply in number overnight.

Soul.Name: Immortality Disruption
Soul.Comment: All units get MAX HP+10.

Skill0.Name: Living Dead
Skill0.Comment: Fully restore HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Some things don't die even if you kill them.'
FlavorText.Text2: A type of bird monster that goes through many stages of development.  Legends say that even if it dies, it will rise again from its ashes.

Skill0.Name: Raise Shield
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get DF+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'How do you escape fear?'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic that generates a protective barrier.  Of all fears, the most basic is a fear of being hurt.

Skill0.Name: Cure
Skill0.Comment: Target unit fully recovers its HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Is not this the greatest miracle of all?'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell used by the cleric armies to mend wounds.  Any kind of wound can be treated instantly.

Soul.Name: Deeper than Hades
Soul.Comment: Set two random disengaged units to HP=0.

Skill0.Name: Final Choice
Skill0.Comment: Target unit cannot be targeted, affected or randomly selected by other cards' send to cemetery effects until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Guiding Hand of Death
Skill1.Comment: Send one random unit of level 5 or below to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'He'll teach you the true meaning of death.'
FlavorText.Text2: In this world, there are beings disconnected from the limitations of mundane living things.  They are known as Mazoku.  Proposition is feared for leading all those who approach him to the realm of death.

Soul.Name: The Noble Moon
Soul.Comment: Revive one closed friendly unit. After that, do [damage: 30] to two random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Night of the Beautiful Moon
Skill0.Comment: Change battletime to night.

Skill1.Name: Moon Sword Lunara
Skill1.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of any enemy unit.

Skill2.Name: Revival
Skill2.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'The world will be controlled by the Duchy of Crest!'
FlavorText.Text2: The princess of Crest.  She started the war for world unification, her armies leading the hosts of the Envoy of Chaos, Elgandi.  At the end of the war, she married the Solar Prince and became known as the Moonlight Princess.

Soul.Name: Dark Chivalry
Soul.Comment: Set target friendly unit to HP=0. Set target enemy unit to HP=0.

Skill0.Name: Demon of the Battlefield
Skill0.Comment: Subtract one from rival Iczer's LP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A warrior's battle is a warrior's joy.'
FlavorText.Text2: A close associate of the princess of the Duchy of Crest, Eskatia.  He is a remnant of the forgotten race of centaurs.  As he conceals his entire body in an armor and helm, no one knows what he looks like.  Only in battle does he feel alive.

Soul.Name: Orchestrated Withdrawal
Soul.Comment: Revive one closed friendly unit. After that, you get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: Allure of Darkness
Skill0.Comment: Engage one enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Dark Scheme
Skill1.Comment: All Lawtia units get AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Revival
Skill2.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now... shall we consider our next move?'
FlavorText.Text2: A mysterious woman in the good graces of the Duchy of Crest's royal family.  She's an agent of the Envoy of Chaos, Elgandi, and her goal is to sow the seeds of war and destruction.

Soul.Name: The Long Awaited End
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to one enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Living Dead
Skill0.Comment: healed

Skill1.Name: Wrath of the King of Death
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 666] to a random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I have no fear of death... or at least, of dying.'
FlavorText.Text2: The lord of a race of giants that were wiped out in times long past.  Through necromancy, he remains in this world even though his flesh has fallen apart.  He is the quintessential undead master, commanding the forces of the dead.

Soul.Name: Unforgivable Failure
Soul.Comment: Increase one friendly unit's DF by [the number of cards in your Cemetery x 5.]

Skill0.Name: Failsafe
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets HP-10.

Skill1.Name: Slash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

Skill2.Name: Mission Accomplished
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: '...Fifteen minutes until completion.  Three targets.'
FlavorText.Text2: The attendant of Annarose.  In actuality, he is her personal assassin.  Once he has his orders, he will not hesitate to slay any living being.

Skill0.Name: Soul Bind
Skill0.Comment: Engage target unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'These black chains are even heavier and stronger than you think.'
FlavorText.Text2: The chains of darkness.  They bind all people, great and small.

Skill0.Name: Merciless Death
Skill0.Comment: Send target unit to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'For birth, a ritual is necessary, but death requires nothing.'
FlavorText.Text2: Death is an inescapable fate.  Another life ends too soon.

Soul.Name: Stalking Death
Soul.Comment: Send one friendly unit to the Cemetery.  After that, send one disengaged enemy unit of your choice to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Kill
Skill0.Comment: Set one enemy unit within range to HP=0. Send one random unit card from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Her fee is exorbitant, but her skills are unquestionable.'
FlavorText.Text2: An assassin who lives in the world of shadows.  She hides her face with a mask, and never reveals her true identity.

Soul.Name: Moon of Madness
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Friendly units get AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Penetrate
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT from the HP of a random enemy in range.

Skill1.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill1.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Fight!  Destroy!  Show no mercy!'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the Knights Elite, composed only of Crest's top soldiers.  These knights carry out any order issued by the duchy without question.

Soul.Name: Advent of the Mad God
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one unit, give it AT-20 and render it engaged.

Skill0.Name: Blessing of Divine Insanity
Skill0.Comment: Rival Iczer gets SP-1.  This unit gets HP-10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come, now.  It is time for the ceremony.'
FlavorText.Text2: Countless religions exist in the world.  Among them are many that practice human sacrifice.

Soul.Name: Lycanthropy / Leonardo
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Lawtia level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Open Bloodlust
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  This unit gets AT+60 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Mother...where are you?'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world.  A boy was violated by these demons of disease, losing all it means to be human.

Soul.Name: Lycanthropy / Lilith
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Lawtia level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Rejection of Life
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  This unit gets AT+30 for this turn.  All enemy units get HP-10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What...am I?'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world.  A girl was violated by these demons of disease, and reborn as something neither man nor beast.

Skill0.Name: Child of the Night
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  This unit gets AT+20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Draining Touch
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. This unit gets MAX HP+10 and HP+20.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come, little girl.  Come this way...'
FlavorText.Text2: An evil spirit that lives in an old castle.  Long ago it was a noble of high rank.  It pursues human warmth, absorbing the life force of those who fall prey.

Skill0.Name: Counterattack
Skill0.Comment: Send one friendly unit to the Cemetery.  Do [damage: AT of the unit sent to the Cemetery] to all enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The enemy is more vicious with his back to the wall.'
FlavorText.Text2: On the battlefield, soldiers must never let down their guard when they have the enemy cornered.  Such negligence will likely mean death.

Soul.Name: Sword of Night
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a random row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Armor of Night
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Unit gets DF+20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill1.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Iron is not my only armor.'
FlavorText.Text2: A warrior who fights under the light of the moon.  Being highly skilled at blending into moonlight, he exhibits notable fighting prowess at night.

Soul.Name: Power Overload
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Penetrate
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT from the HP of a random enemy in range.

Skill1.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill1.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

Skill2.Name: Self-Destruct
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Rival iczer gets SP-1

FlavorText.Text1: 'Target detected.  Commencing attack...'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer.  However, instead of being animated by magic, it has been brought to life using human souls.

Soul.Name: Ancient Curse
Soul.Comment: One random unit card from your Card File is removed from the game.

Skill0.Name: Deep Reanimation
Skill0.Comment: Return the oldest card in your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill1.Name: Shallow Reanimation
Skill1.Comment: Return the newest card in your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Is the body merely the vessel of the soul, or is the soul merely energy for bodies?'
FlavorText.Text2: A practitioner of necromancy who considers human souls to simply be materials for his experiments.  These souls are only used for evil purposes.

Skill0.Name: Healing
Skill0.Comment: Recover 25% of MAX HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's useless.  I can't die if all you do is cut me.'
FlavorText.Text2: Knights who have unwillingly had their flesh rebuilt by order of the evil Annarose.  So long as they are not burned or completely crushed, they always regenerate.  This addition to the battlefield changed the face of warfare.

Soul.Name: Curse of Invisibility
Soul.Comment: Return one random engaged unit to the Card File.

Skill0.Name: Unseen Magic
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to one enemy unit within range.

Skill1.Name: Invisiblity
Skill1.Comment: Return this unit to its Card File.

Skill2.Name: Disorder
Skill2.Comment: The first time this skill activates, rival iczer gets SP-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You can't see me, can you?  I can't see me either.'
FlavorText.Text2: A druid who has used a forbidden incantation to become permanently invisible.  This incantation also warped his mind, leading him to commit acts of wickedness.

Soul.Name: Tragic Cry
Soul.Comment: Subtract 20 directly from the HP of one enemy unit, give it AT-20 and AGI-1.

Skill0.Name: Child of the Night
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit gets AT+20 this turn. One random enemy unit gets AGI-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You can see me?'
FlavorText.Text2: An evil spirit who wanders the streets in the guise of a young girl.  Despite its innocent appearance, this being is unimaginably evil and frivolously takes peoples' lives.

Skill0.Name: Living Dead
Skill0.Comment: healed

FlavorText.Text1: 'When you were little, didn't anyone tell you that graveyards were dangerous at night?'
FlavorText.Text2: These are dead human bodies inhabited by animal spirits and the like.  They burn with hatred and attack the living without provocation.

Soul.Name: Dark Corrosion
Soul.Comment: Rival Iczer gets [SP - number of enemy units].

Skill0.Name: Dark Temptation
Skill0.Comment: Rival gets SP-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Shades live in the shadows.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the six great spirits.  It's the manifestation of the power of the darkness that makes up the world.

Skill0.Name: Flesh Recycle
Skill0.Comment: Target unit gets [MAX HP-20], and its HP is fully restored.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Do what you have to, get me back on my feet.  All that matters is that I'll be able to fight.'
FlavorText.Text2: Forced, unnatural bodily regeneration.  Healing can cause as much agony as getting hurt in the first place.

Skill0.Name: Turn to Dust
Skill0.Comment: Send a random card from rival's file to the cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If you don't know the value of treasure, it might as well be dust.'
FlavorText.Text2: Before the eyes of one who cannot appreciate something truly valuable, the greatest treasures are nothing more than trash.

Soul.Name: Severing Stroke
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Thunder Slash
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemy units within range. If an enemy unit's HP is 0 or below, subtract 1 from rival Iczer's LP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Damn that old bum.  He's run off again.'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordsman from the east.  He's traveling the world, looking for powerful opponents.  A strike from his sword crashes like thunder and gleams like a flash of lightning.

Soul.Name: Hunter's Strike
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random enemies.

Skill0.Name: Bounty Hunt
Skill0.Comment: Set one random enemy unit within range and level 4 or above to HP=0.

Skill1.Name: In My Sights
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. Target enemy unit gets LV+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'There were a few more enemies than I'd planned on.  Oh, well...'
FlavorText.Text2: A remarkable bounty hunter.  She's never failed to catch her prey, and as a result, bounties from all over the world try to get her before she gets them.  The surprising thing is, she's a woman.

Soul.Name: A Battle Forgotten
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. You get SP+1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Predator Takes First Blood
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT 50%] to one enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The path I've trodden is marked only by the bodies of my foes.'
FlavorText.Text2: A mercenary wielding two giant swords.  He is known as the Roaming Predator, as he wanders from battle to battle, tearing into his enemies like a wild beast.

Soul.Name: Severing Stroke
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a random row of enemy units. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Power of the Veteran
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Hundred Sword Master
Skill1.Comment: Give [AT + this unit's AT] to one friendly [subtype: Warrior] for this turn, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My oh my, making an old man like me do this sort of work...'
FlavorText.Text2: An old man known far and wide as a great swordsman.  Still active, he possesses techniques for using every weapon ever made, and enough insight to win any battle.  Master swordsmen seek him out, looking for the glory of taking his place.

Soul.Name: Agenda of the Thief
Soul.Comment: Rival Iczer gets SP-2.

Skill0.Name: Cursed Treasure
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Rival Iczer gets SP-1. And then, you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You don't deserve to have a fine treasure like this.'
FlavorText.Text2: A mysterious phantom thief who travels the world.  All he seeks are the treasures of an ancient civilization from the age of the gods.  No one knows his true objectives.

Soul.Name: Dance of Verdant Flowers
Soul.Comment: Give AT+20 and DF+10 to target friendly.

Skill0.Name: The Dance of Destruction
Skill0.Comment: All friendlies get AT+10 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Revival
Skill1.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'I hope you're enjoying this as much as I am.'
FlavorText.Text2: A dancer who travels from kingdom to kingdom.  Her dance commands a mysterious magic.  The stories say she can unleash her powers simply by performing her graceful steps and moves.

Skill0.Name: Panther Soul
Skill0.Comment: Give one friendly Gowen unit (level 3 or below) a rank up, AT+10, and AGI+1.  (Effects may vary based on target's Rank Up skills.)

FlavorText.Text1: 'Animal spirits can unleash our instincts.'
FlavorText.Text2: A secret art used by sorcerers and the like for possessing people with animal spirits.  Those possessed are empowered by their instincts.

Skill0.Name: Fire Tornado
Skill0.Comment: Subtract your [Gowen level x5] directly from the HP of one random enemy unit.  This effect is repeated four times.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The roaring flames and the shrieking wind become a living being.'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic that creates a tornado of fire.  It burns everything around it to nothingness.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AT +20.

Skill0.Name: Ice Sword
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+10] and AGI-3 for this turn to a random enemy unit within range.

Skill1.Name: Fire Sword
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+10] and AT-20 for this turn to a random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I inherited my techniques from my father!'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman who is also learning the craft of the magician.  Her combined skills allow her to use the reciprocating powers of fire and ice.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 9 or higher, this unit gets HP +20, AT +30, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Slash
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll handle this.  Stand back, miss.'
FlavorText.Text2: A young swordsman.  He still lacks experience and is a little rough around the edges, but he has much potential.

Soul.Name: Verdant Treasure
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Excavation
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh?  Maybe this place will do.'
FlavorText.Text2: A treasure hunter, focused on ancient ruins.  She is still a novice, but she owns a magic talisman with mysterious powers.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +20.

Skill0.Name: Empty Chamber
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit in range. This effect is repeated twice.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I may not look it, but I'm a knight.'
FlavorText.Text2: A small kingdom can even the odds by employing gunmen.  Gunmen knights carry pistols instead of swords, and attack from afar.

Soul.Name: Unleash the Wildfires
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Flame Hand
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen level X 5] to one unit.

Skill1.Name: Burning Purge
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all enemy units in range.

Skill2.Name: Judgement of Hell's Fire
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen LV X20] to one enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I hail from the world of flame.'
FlavorText.Text2: A demon of fire.  Controlling flames at will, he reduces everything in his path to ash.

Soul.Name: Unleash the Wildfires
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all units.

Skill0.Name: Fire From the Sky
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 30 directly from the HP of a random enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Fire Storm Breath
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 10 directly from the HP of two random enemy units of RNG 2 or lower.

FlavorText.Text1: 'When they soar above, they burn everything to the ground.'
FlavorText.Text2: A winged dragon born from the flames of a volcano in which nothing else could survive.  With each flap of their wings, fire rains down on the countryside.

Skill0.Name: Assault
Skill0.Comment: Give [AT + number of enemy units x 10] to one friendly unit. All friendly [subtype: warrior] units get AT+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Assault without fear is what brings victory.'
FlavorText.Text2: Triggers a direct assault without any thought for defense.  The fighting charge of those who are prepared for death cannot be stopped.

Skill0.Name: Merciless Aggression
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot use Iczer Attack or Rest.

Skill1.Name: Trampling the Flora
Skill1.Comment: Decrease your Gowen level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'In battle, only the victors are righteous!'
FlavorText.Text2: A mercenary who makes his living through war.  Combat is his reason for living, so he has no interest in good or evil on the battlefield.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action and reduces an enemy unit to HP 0 or lower, heal this unit +15 HP.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Eat What You Kill
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action and reduces an enemy unit to HP 0 or lower, heal this unit +15 HP.

Skill1.Name: Charge
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: ATX2] to a random enemy in range.  Do [damage: 50% of MAX HP] to this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'After all, I can no longer test my strength against human opponents.'
FlavorText.Text2: A warrior with superhuman physical strength.  He doesn't need technique, because he can crush all enemies with brute strength alone.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Penetrating Fist
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a row of enemy units.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Triple Attack!
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+0->30] to a random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You should keep in mind where you are, and what you're up against.'
FlavorText.Text2: An unarmed fighter who is constantly working to build up his kung fu. Using his skills, he can overwhelm opponents with a flurry of fists.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 4 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Lancer
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Nothing is more terrifying than an accurate bow.'
FlavorText.Text2: A skilled archer.  Specializing in firing from unthinkable distances with a common bow, you'll likely be dead before you ever see him.

Soul.Name: Massive Detonation
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to a random enemy unit. Give AT+10 to all friendly units.

Skill0.Name: Explosion
Skill0.Comment: Subtract this unit's MAX HP directly from the HP of all enemy units.

Skill1.Name: Explode
Skill1.Comment: Set this unit to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Some living things have no instinct to preserve their own lives.'
FlavorText.Text2: An unidentified life form.  If one is struck, its body explodes and obliterates the attacker to preserve its fellows. The larger its body, the stronger the explosion.

Soul.Name: Wall of Trees
Soul.Comment: Give DF+10 to all friendly units.

Skill0.Name: Tree Barrier
Skill0.Comment: Target unit gets DF+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'They're here to protect the forest.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the six great spirits.  It's the manifestation of the power of the forests that make up the world.  Perhaps they often come in contact with humans, as they assume their shapes.

Soul.Name: Blazing Flames
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all units level 3 and below.

Skill0.Name: Emissary of Flame
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 10HP from target unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'These are the most ferocious of all spirits.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the six great spirits.  It's the manifestation of the power of the fire that makes up the world.  It takes the form of a dragon.

Soul.Name: Madness
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a random row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Berserk
Skill0.Comment: Send this unit to the Cemetery.  Set target enemy unit within range to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'He becomes a monster when he loses control.'
FlavorText.Text2: A warrior from a land that has been isolated from civilization.  He wouldn't think twice about giving up his life to win his take.

Skill0.Name: Magic Weapon
Skill0.Comment: Give AT+20 to one unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If the weapon is sharp enough, even a novice can kill.'
FlavorText.Text2: An incantation that enhances the abilities of weapons.  A weapon with this magic cast on it will be as sharp as a renown smith's masterwork.

Skill0.Name: Fire Arrow
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage:your Gowen level x 10] to one unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Burn it all down!'
FlavorText.Text2: An incantation that summons an arrow of flame.  Its might depends on the skill of the spell user.

Soul.Name: Sky Blade
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to target enemy. This effect is repeated a total of twice.

Skill0.Name: Speed of the Falcon
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two enemy units of your choice.

Skill1.Name: Flying Attack
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If I can't protect the world, I'll at least protect those around me without fail!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the six paladins who protect the Wizard Kingdom.  Known as the Guardian of the Sky, he has guarded the kingdom flawlessly since the day he took up his sword.

Soul.Name: Wonder Drug
Soul.Comment: Remove from the game 3 random cards from your Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Miracle Drug of Power
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly gets AT+10.

Skill1.Name: Miracle Drug of Vitality
Skill1.Comment: Target friendly with DF10 or lower gets DF+10, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Miracle Drug of Youth
Skill2.Comment: Target friendly gets AGI+1.

Skill3.Name: Blue Miracle Drug
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow level exactly 2] Increase your Falkow by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Big brother, why ever would you come to this mansion?'
FlavorText.Text2: A witch who lives in an old mansion that cannot be found on any map, even by one who's been there before.  Legends say she is able to make strange drugs with powers that can surpass magic potions, and even grant eternal life.

Soul.Name: Thunder Spear
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to a random enemy unit. Give AT+10 to all friendly units.

Skill0.Name: Divine Thunder
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 30 from the HP of all disengaged enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Thunder is the roar of the gods.'
FlavorText.Text2: A great wizardress who could control lightning.  All alone she developed a spell to bend lightning to her will, but the side effects made her unable to pass on this knowledge.

Soul.Name: Black Cat Crossing
Soul.Comment: Target unit gets MAX HP=30, HP=30, AT=30, DF=0, AGI=2, and RNG=2.

Skill0.Name: Bad Luck Woman
Skill0.Comment: Send a random Grimoire Card from your Card File to the Cemetery. And then, send one random Grimoire card from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill1.Name: Grimoire Bane
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit within range.  Select a random Grimoire Card from rival Iczer and send it to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Nothing good comes of getting close to me, you know.'
FlavorText.Text2: A woman who is known as an elite witch. Some say the title Black Cat was only given to her because of her appearance.  But she continues her research, convinced she has supernatural bad luck caused by a magic curse.

Soul.Name: Flash of the Heavens
Soul.Comment: Give AT+20 to all friendly units.

Skill0.Name: Strategist's Plan
Skill0.Comment: One enemy unit in [area: 7-8-9] gets RNG-1 for this turn. And then, this unit gets AGI+1.

Skill1.Name: The Azure Dragon's Tactic
Skill1.Comment: Give [AT + number of friendly units x 10] and DF+5 to all friendly units for this turn. This unit gets AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hmm... If things keep moving in this direction, then I have the perfect plan.'
FlavorText.Text2: Known as a genius strategist, he is the kind of man who can make the impossible possible.  He is known far and wide as the prodigy of the Wizard Kingdom.  The tactics and techniques he invents may change the face of warfare forever.

Soul.Name: Water Spirits' Messiah
Soul.Comment: Engage all units.

Skill0.Name: Currents of Purification
Skill0.Comment: Return one enemy unit within range and AGI 0 or below to its Card File.

Skill1.Name: Dragon Water Backlash
Skill1.Comment: Return one enemy unit within range and AGI 6 or higher to its Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Water is my friend.'
FlavorText.Text2: A great wizardress who controls water magic.  Her magic powers were innate from birth, so she never learned wizardry as a craft.

Skill0.Name: Spell Lock
Skill0.Comment: No Grimoire Card in rival Iczer's Card File may be set next turn or the turn after.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If a wizard is unable to chant spells?  Well then, he's useless.'
FlavorText.Text2: This arcane spell is a wizard's worst enemy.  Many magic users take great pains to protect themselves from losing the ability to speak incantations.

Skill0.Name: Tempest
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 30 directly from the HP of all units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Forget sea monsters.  If you meet this on the ocean, it's over.'
FlavorText.Text2: A gigantic storm that swallows everything it touches.  Should you get too close, even just for a moment, there is no way to escape.

Soul.Name: Flash of Death
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Falkow level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Pinpoint
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

Skill1.Name: Scythe Slash
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AGI 5 or higher] Subtract AT directly from the HP of a target row of enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Why a scythe, you ask?  Because it is the tool of Death.'
FlavorText.Text2: A magician soldier who answers only to the Wizard Kingdom.  He kills his enemy with a powerful blade forged by magic.  In an army created almost entirely for defense, he is one of the few charged with eradicating the enemy.

Soul.Name: Wind Swordsmanship
Soul.Comment: Give AT+10 and AGI+2 to one friendly unit.

Skill0.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill0.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

Skill1.Name: Spell: “Lightning Strike”
Skill1.Comment: Do [HP-20] to all units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, we must attack in unison!'
FlavorText.Text2: A magician warrior of the Wizard Kingdom.  She fights both with her magic skills and well-trained abilities as a fighter.  She controls a large swan that allows her to attack her enemies from above.

Soul.Name: Failed Flight Spell
Soul.Comment: Give AT+10 and AGI+2 to one friendly unit.

Skill0.Name: Return level 3
Skill0.Comment: Return one enemy unit within range and level 4 or below to its Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You have some business with me?'
FlavorText.Text2: An aged wizard who has long studied magic.  His knowledge truly is power, as he can use spells younger wizards find much too difficult.

Soul.Name: Runaway Storm
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Falkow level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Berserk Wind
Skill0.Comment: Do [HP-20] to all enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This demon's trouble.  His winds can blow anything apart.'
FlavorText.Text2: A demon who controls the wind.  Legends say that wherever he goes, the blast of a hurricane follows.

FlavorText.Text1: 'They're known as hunters of the sea, but now they're making dry land their hunting ground.'
FlavorText.Text2: Giant crabs said to be the predators of the ocean floor.  They catch prey by stabbing with their sharp claws.  Their right claw is a giant shield, big enough to deflect any attack.

Soul.Name: Pulled Under
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of AGI 6 or higher, or AGI 0 or lower to its card File. And then, you get SP-2 at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Pluck from the Surface
Skill0.Comment: If there are no friendly units, one random unit of level 4 or lower is moved to a random open area and engaged.

Skill1.Name: Tentacle Slap
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to target enemy unit. This skill is repeated a total of twice.

Skill2.Name: Triple Tentacle Attack
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to three random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That's quite the nasty monster, and twelve for the price of one.'
FlavorText.Text2: A monster from the deepest reaches of the sea, it looks like a squid, only much bigger. It has twelve long tentacles, which it uses to prey upon creatures as far up as the surface.

Skill0.Name: Cyclone
Skill0.Comment: Return all units level 2 and below to their Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The arrival of the cyclone changes everything.'
FlavorText.Text2: A cyclone born of nature, engulfing everything.  If it begins to move, it can change the balance of power as easily as it changes the weather.

Soul.Name: Eagle Wind
Soul.Comment: Engage one enemy unit. Two enemy units get AGI=0.

Skill0.Name: Flying Attack
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy.

Skill1.Name: Power of the Eagle
Skill1.Comment: One friendly [subtype: Wizard Kingdom] unit gets AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'In battle, you must know how to soar like the wind.'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordsman of the Wizard Kingdom.  He possesses the ability to command avians, and his specialty is to use them for surprise attacks from above.

Skill0.Name: Magic Shield
Skill0.Comment: Friendly units in [area: 1-2-3] get DF+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Shield!  Protect me!'
FlavorText.Text2: The magician guards of the Wizard Kingdom.  The magic shields they create are nearly impossible to sunder.

Soul.Name: Secrets of Speed
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a column of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'It won't be long now.'
FlavorText.Text2: A shock trooper of the Wizard Kingdom.  He uses magic to temporarily augment his physical strength and sprints up to his enemies before they can react.

Soul.Name: The Finale
Soul.Comment: Return one engaged unit of agility 3 or lower to the Card File.

Skill0.Name: Song of Magic
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets AGI+5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Her song is one of battle.  It instills in us bravery.'
FlavorText.Text2: A special enchantress who manipulates magic songs.  When she sings, soldiers push themselves past their limits and exhibit great force of arms on the battlefield.

Soul.Name: Miracle Magic
Soul.Comment: You get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: Return level 2
Skill0.Comment: Return one unit level 2 or below to its Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll be a great witch someday!'
FlavorText.Text2: A young witch.  She only just started learning at the magic academy, so she cannot use any powerful spells.  But, her enthusiasm can lead her to great achievements.

Soul.Name: Dying Shriek
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AGI-1.

Skill0.Name: Screech
Skill0.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit of your choice.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What?  The spell summoned...this?'
FlavorText.Text2: A savage half-human, half-bird monster.  It has a woman's face, but hardly any intelligence.

Soul.Name: Scattering to the Wind
Soul.Comment: Give AT+30 to one friendly unit.

Skill0.Name: Wind Talisman
Skill0.Comment: Target unit gets AGI+5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll bring forth the storm!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the six great spirits.  It's the manifestation of the power of the wind that makes up the world.  It takes the shape of a human surrounded by swirling winds.

Soul.Name: Allure of the Water Spirit
Soul.Comment: Subtract 20 directly from the HP of one enemy unit, give it AT-20 and AGI-1.

Skill0.Name: Water Pressure
Skill0.Comment: Target unit gets AGI-5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The spirit of water is serenity incarnate.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the six great spirits.  It's the manifestation of the power of the water that makes up the world.

Skill0.Name: Flying
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets RNG=3 and AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Yowie!  It worked!'
FlavorText.Text2: An elementary magic spell.  Mastering this spell is a necessary foundation for learning stronger magic.

Skill0.Name: Return
Skill0.Comment: Return target unit LV 3 or lower to its File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'With this spell, you'll be safe in times of peril, no matter how dire!'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell of retreat.  It is a handy, effective, and easily applied incantation.

Soul.Name: Lion's Claw
Soul.Comment: Give AT+20 to all friendly units.

Skill0.Name: Might of the Lion
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets [AT + number of enemy units x 10] and is healed 10HP.

Skill1.Name: Slash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My prince will lead the world to peace!  That's why I fight on!'
FlavorText.Text2: The military leader of the Solar Kingdom of Folrart.  Folrart is ruled by Solar Prince Verlaat, and opposes the armies of the Envoy of Chaos, Elgandi.  Lion Baron is not a royal rank, but a nickname earned by fighting ferociously from behind his signature mask.  He never lets up against the forces of chaos, believing Prince Verlaat will unify the world.

Skill0.Name: Holy Light
Skill0.Comment: Revive all closed friendly units. All friendly units are fully healed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Our wounds are healed by miracles, and again we sally forth to battle.'
FlavorText.Text2: A miraculous light said to radiate from heaven.  Those who bathe in it have their wounds healed instantly.

Soul.Name: Knight's Intuition
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one unit, give it AT-20 and render it engaged.

Skill0.Name: Shield of Faith
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/DF 10 or lower] This unit is healed 5 HP and gets DF+5.

FlavorText.Text1: 'For king and country!'
FlavorText.Text2: A young knight of the Solar Kingdom of Folrart.  In addition, any soldier granted a holy blessing can be given the title of paladin.  Young men newly ordained as paladins quickly have their naivety challenged by the harsh realities of war.

Skill0.Name: Stand Firm
Skill0.Comment: When this unit uses Rest, it recovers 33% of MAX HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Can your attacks challenge my shield?'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight of the Solar Guard, one of Folrart's proud bands of knights.  They protect themselves from enemy attacks with towering shields as tall as they are.

Soul.Name: Divine Strike
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: Refess LV X20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Rapid Shot Archery
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Not only do I not need arrows, but would you believe I fire two shots at once?'
FlavorText.Text2: An archer of the Solar Kingdom's magician corps.  Through magic they can fire two arrows simultaneously.

Soul.Name: Enchanted Spear
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Refess level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Penetrating Light
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT+25 directly from the HP of one random enemy unit within range of HP 30 or higher.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You can't stop this spear.'
FlavorText.Text2: A special branch of the Solar Kingdom's magician corps.  Their spears, fashioned by magic, are said to penetrate any armor.

Skill0.Name: Imperial Order
Skill0.Comment: All units get RNG=1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That king's selfishness is beyond compare.'
FlavorText.Text2: Said to live far to the north.  All creatures that fly naturally lower their heads before him.

Soul.Name: The Guardian Falls
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get DF=0.

Skill0.Name: Repatriate
Skill0.Comment: Revive all closed friendly units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If I were protected by that, my sleep would never be disturbed.'
FlavorText.Text2: A magic stone statue used to protect the tombs of kings from an ancient, prosperous kingdom.  Any who intrude into these tombs are pursued mercilessly.

Soul.Name: Enchanted Spear
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a column of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Magic Spear
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is in area[1-2-3]] This unit gets AT+15 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Lancer
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I wonder what kind of power this spear holds...'
FlavorText.Text2: A wandering knight who found a spear left by an ancient civilization.  Now that the spear has accepted him, what is his fate?

Soul.Name: Divine Word
Soul.Comment: You get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill0.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

Skill1.Name: Bound by Doctrine
Skill1.Comment: One friendly [subtype: True God Church] unit gets MAX HP+20 and HP+20.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Abominable thing!  Begone!'
FlavorText.Text2: Young military priests of the world's most widespread religion, the Church of the True God.  Bound by doctrine from birth, they become excellent and loyal soldiers.

Soul.Name: Divine Word
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to a random enemy unit. Give AT+10 to all friendly units.

Skill0.Name: Inquisition Council
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: True God Church] units are healed 10 HP, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Bash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to and render engaged a random enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Let us wipe away the evil in your heart.'
FlavorText.Text2: A priest of the world's most widespread religion, the Church of the True God.  Their duty is to execute penal regulations without fail.  The divine punishment they wield is driven by the doctrine they carry within themselves.

Skill0.Name: Shield Lv1
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets DF+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Bash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to and render engaged a random enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This war is the will of God!'
FlavorText.Text2: A foot soldier in the Solar Kingdom's cleric army.  His body is protected by a divine blessing and empowered by his faith.

Soul.Name: Crimson Radiance
Soul.Comment: Return two random cards from your Cemetery to your Card File. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Ruby Radiance
Skill0.Comment: This unit and the units to the left and the right get DF+5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm not hurt!  Could it be protecting me?'
FlavorText.Text2: A gem beast with a crimson stone in its forehead.  Legends say that when the stone shines, a mysterious protection is granted.

Soul.Name: Blessing of Light
Soul.Comment: Add Rival Iczer's present SP value to your SP.

Skill0.Name: Power Source
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly gets MAX HP+10 and HP+20.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This is the power of order.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the six great spirits.  It's the manifestation of the power of the light that makes up the world.

Skill0.Name: Blessing Invocation
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+3.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Little monsters that bring good luck?  I don't think they exist.'
FlavorText.Text2: Fey creatures that bring good luck.  Said to multiply in number overnight.

Skill0.Name: Raise Shield
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get DF+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'How do you escape fear?'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic that generates a protective barrier.  Of all fears, the most basic is a fear of being hurt.

Skill0.Name: Cure
Skill0.Comment: Target unit fully recovers its HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Is not this the greatest miracle of all?'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell used by the cleric armies to mend wounds.  Any kind of wound can be treated instantly.

Skill0.Name: Failsafe

Skill2.Name: Mission Accomplished
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: '...Fifteen minutes until completion.  Three targets.'
FlavorText.Text2: The attendant of Annarose.  In actuality, he is her personal assassin.  Once he has his orders, he will not hesitate to slay any living being.

Skill0.Name: Soul Bind
Skill0.Comment: Engage target unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'These black chains are even heavier and stronger than you think.'
FlavorText.Text2: The chains of darkness.  They bind all people, great and small.

Soul.Name: Stalking Death

Skill0.Name: Kill
Skill0.Comment: Set one enemy unit within range to HP=0. Send one random unit card from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Her fee is exorbitant, but her skills are unquestionable.'
FlavorText.Text2: An assassin who lives in the world of shadows.  She hides her face with a mask, and never reveals her true identity.

Soul.Name: Moon of Madness
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Friendly units get AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Penetrate
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT from the HP of a random enemy in range.

Skill1.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill1.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Fight!  Destroy!  Show no mercy!'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the Knights Elite, composed only of Crest's top soldiers.  These knights carry out any order issued by the duchy without question.

Soul.Name: Advent of the Mad God
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one unit, give it AT-20 and render it engaged.

Skill0.Name: Blessing of Divine Insanity
Skill0.Comment: Rival Iczer gets SP-1.  This unit gets HP-10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come, now.  It is time for the ceremony.'
FlavorText.Text2: Countless religions exist in the world.  Among them are many that practice human sacrifice.

Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Lawtia level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Open Bloodlust
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  This unit gets AT+60 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Mother...where are you?'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world.  A boy was violated by these demons of disease, losing all it means to be human.

Soul.Name: Lycanthropy / Lilith
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Lawtia level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Rejection of Life
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  This unit gets AT+30 for this turn.  All enemy units get HP-10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What...am I?'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world.  A girl was violated by these demons of disease, and reborn as something neither man nor beast.

Skill0.Name: Child of the Night
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  This unit gets AT+20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Draining Touch
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. This unit gets MAX HP+10 and HP+20.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come, little girl.  Come this way...'
FlavorText.Text2: An evil spirit that lives in an old castle.  Long ago it was a noble of high rank.  It pursues human warmth, absorbing the life force of those who fall prey.

Skill0.Name: Counterattack
Skill0.Comment: Send one friendly unit to the Cemetery.  Do [damage: AT of the unit sent to the Cemetery] to all enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The enemy is more vicious with his back to the wall.'
FlavorText.Text2: On the battlefield, soldiers must never let down their guard when they have the enemy cornered.  Such negligence will likely mean death.

Soul.Name: Sword of Night
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a random row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Armor of Night
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Unit gets DF+20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill1.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Iron is not my only armor.'
FlavorText.Text2: A warrior who fights under the light of the moon.  Being highly skilled at blending into moonlight, he exhibits notable fighting prowess at night.

Soul.Name: Power Overload
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Penetrate
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT from the HP of a random enemy in range.

Skill1.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill1.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

Skill2.Name: Self-Destruct
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Rival iczer gets SP-1

FlavorText.Text1: 'Target detected.  Commencing attack...'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer.  However, instead of being animated by magic, it has been brought to life using human souls.

Soul.Name: Ancient Curse
Soul.Comment: One random unit card from your Card File is removed from the game.

Skill0.Name: Deep Reanimation
Skill0.Comment: Return the oldest card in your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill1.Name: Shallow Reanimation
Skill1.Comment: Return the newest card in your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Is the body merely the vessel of the soul, or is the soul merely energy for bodies?'
FlavorText.Text2: A practitioner of necromancy who considers human souls to simply be materials for his experiments.  These souls are only used for evil purposes.

Skill0.Name: Healing
Skill0.Comment: Recover 25% of MAX HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's useless.  I can't die if all you do is cut me.'
FlavorText.Text2: Knights who have unwillingly had their flesh rebuilt by order of the evil Annarose.  So long as they are not burned or completely crushed, they always regenerate.  This addition to the battlefield changed the face of warfare.

Soul.Name: Curse of Invisibility
Soul.Comment: Return one random engaged unit to the Card File.

Skill0.Name: Unseen Magic
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to one enemy unit within range.

Skill1.Name: Invisiblity
Skill1.Comment: Return this unit to its Card File.

Skill2.Name: Disorder
Skill2.Comment: The first time this skill activates, rival iczer gets SP-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You can't see me, can you?  I can't see me either.'
FlavorText.Text2: A druid who has used a forbidden incantation to become permanently invisible.  This incantation also warped his mind, leading him to commit acts of wickedness.

Soul.Name: Tragic Cry
Soul.Comment: Subtract 20 directly from the HP of one enemy unit, give it AT-20 and AGI-1.

Skill0.Name: Child of the Night
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit gets AT+20 this turn. One random enemy unit gets AGI-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You can see me?'
FlavorText.Text2: An evil spirit who wanders the streets in the guise of a young girl.  Despite its innocent appearance, this being is unimaginably evil and frivolously takes peoples' lives.

Skill0.Name: Living Dead
Skill0.Comment: healed

FlavorText.Text1: 'When you were little, didn't anyone tell you that graveyards were dangerous at night?'
FlavorText.Text2: These are dead human bodies inhabited by animal spirits and the like.  They burn with hatred and attack the living without provocation.

Soul.Name: Dark Corrosion
Soul.Comment: Rival Iczer gets [SP - number of enemy units].

Skill0.Name: Dark Temptation
Skill0.Comment: Rival gets SP-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Shades live in the shadows.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the six great spirits.  It's the manifestation of the power of the darkness that makes up the world.

Skill0.Name: Flesh Recycle
Skill0.Comment: Target unit gets [MAX HP-20], and its HP is fully restored.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Do what you have to, get me back on my feet.  All that matters is that I'll be able to fight.'
FlavorText.Text2: Forced, unnatural bodily regeneration.  Healing can cause as much agony as getting hurt in the first place.

Skill0.Name: Turn to Dust
Skill0.Comment: Send a random card from rival's file to the cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If you don't know the value of treasure, it might as well be dust.'
FlavorText.Text2: Before the eyes of one who cannot appreciate something truly valuable, the greatest treasures are nothing more than trash.

Soul.Name: Dance of Verdant Flowers
Soul.Comment: Give AT+20 and DF+10 to target friendly.

Skill0.Name: The Dance of Destruction
Skill0.Comment: All friendlies get AT+10 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Revival
Skill1.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'I hope you're enjoying this as much as I am.'
FlavorText.Text2: A dancer who travels from kingdom to kingdom.  Her dance commands a mysterious magic.  The stories say she can unleash her powers simply by performing her graceful steps and moves.

Skill0.Name: Fire Tornado
Skill0.Comment: Subtract your [Gowen level x5] directly from the HP of one random enemy unit.  This effect is repeated four times.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The roaring flames and the shrieking wind become a living being.'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic that creates a tornado of fire.  It burns everything around it to nothingness.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I inherited my techniques from my father!'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman who is also learning the craft of the magician.  Her combined skills allow her to use the reciprocating powers of fire and ice.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up

Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll handle this.  Stand back, miss.'
FlavorText.Text2: A young swordsman.  He still lacks experience and is a little rough around the edges, but he has much potential.

Soul.Name: Verdant Treasure
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Excavation
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh?  Maybe this place will do.'

FlavorText.Text1: 'I may not look it, but I'm a knight.'
FlavorText.Text2: A small kingdom can even the odds by employing gunmen.  Gunmen knights carry pistols instead of swords, and attack from afar.

Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen level x 20] to one unit.

Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I hail from the world of flame.'
FlavorText.Text2: A demon of fire.  Controlling flames at will, he reduces everything in his path to ash.

Soul.Name: Unleash the Wildfires
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all units.

Skill0.Name: Fire From the Sky
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 30 directly from the HP of a random enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Fire Storm Breath
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 10 directly from the HP of two random enemy units of RNG 2 or lower.

FlavorText.Text1: 'When they soar above, they burn everything to the ground.'
FlavorText.Text2: A winged dragon born from the flames of a volcano in which nothing else could survive.  With each flap of their wings, fire rains down on the countryside.

Skill0.Name: Assault
Skill0.Comment: Give [AT + number of enemy units x 10] to one friendly unit. All friendly [subtype: warrior] units get AT+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Assault without fear is what brings victory.'
FlavorText.Text2: Triggers a direct assault without any thought for defense.  The fighting charge of those who are prepared for death cannot be stopped.

FlavorText.Text1: 'After all, I can no longer test my strength against human opponents.'
FlavorText.Text2: A warrior with superhuman physical strength.  He doesn't need technique, because he can crush all enemies with brute strength alone.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Penetrating Fist
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Triple Attack!
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+0->30] to a random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You should keep in mind where you are, and what you're up against.'
FlavorText.Text2: An unarmed fighter who is constantly working to build up his kung fu. Using his skills, he can overwhelm opponents with a flurry of fists.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 4 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Lancer
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Nothing is more terrifying than an accurate bow.'
FlavorText.Text2: A skilled archer.  Specializing in firing from unthinkable distances with a common bow, you'll likely be dead before you ever see him.

Skill1.Comment: Set this unit to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Some living things have no instinct to preserve their own lives.'
FlavorText.Text2: An unidentified life form.  If one is struck, its body explodes and obliterates the attacker to preserve its fellows. The larger its body, the stronger the explosion.

Soul.Name: Wall of Trees
Soul.Comment: Give DF+10 to all friendly units.

Skill0.Name: Tree Barrier
Skill0.Comment: Target unit gets DF+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'They're here to protect the forest.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the six great spirits.  It's the manifestation of the power of the forests that make up the world.  Perhaps they often come in contact with humans, as they assume their shapes.

Soul.Name: Blazing Flames
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all units level 3 and below.

Skill0.Name: Emissary of Flame
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 10HP from target unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'These are the most ferocious of all spirits.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the six great spirits.  It's the manifestation of the power of the fire that makes up the world.  It takes the form of a dragon.

Soul.Name: Madness
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a random row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Berserk
Skill0.Comment: Send this unit to the Cemetery.  Set target enemy unit within range to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'He becomes a monster when he loses control.'
FlavorText.Text2: A warrior from a land that has been isolated from civilization.  He wouldn't think twice about giving up his life to win his take.

Skill0.Name: Magic Weapon
Skill0.Comment: Give AT+20 to one unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If the weapon is sharp enough, even a novice can kill.'
FlavorText.Text2: An incantation that enhances the abilities of weapons.  A weapon with this magic cast on it will be as sharp as a renowned smith's masterwork.

Skill0.Name: Fire Arrow
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage:your Gowen level x 10] to one unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Burn it all down!'
FlavorText.Text2: An incantation that summons an arrow of flame.  Its might depends on the skill of the spell user.

Soul.Name: Flash of the Heavens
Soul.Comment: Give AT+20 to all friendly units.

Skill0.Name: Strategist's Plan
Skill0.Comment: One enemy unit in [area: 7-8-9] gets RNG-1 for this turn. And then, this unit gets AGI+1.

Skill1.Name: The Azure Dragon's Tactic
Skill1.Comment: Give [AT + number of friendly units x 10] and DF+5 to all friendly units for this turn. This unit gets AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hmm... If things keep moving in this direction, then I have the perfect plan.'
FlavorText.Text2: Known as a genius strategist, he is the kind of man who can make the impossible possible.  He is known far and wide as the prodigy of the Wizard Kingdom.  The tactics and techniques he invents may change the face of warfare forever.

Skill0.Name: Tempest
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 30 directly from the HP of all units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Forget sea monsters.  If you meet this on the ocean, it's over.'
FlavorText.Text2: A gigantic storm that swallows everything it touches.  Should you get too close, even just for a moment, there is no way to escape.

Soul.Name: Flash of Death
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Falkow level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Pinpoint
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

Skill1.Name: Scythe Slash
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AGI 5 or higher] Subtract AT directly from the HP of a target row of enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Why a scythe, you ask?  Because it is the tool of Death.'
FlavorText.Text2: A magician soldier who answers only to the Wizard Kingdom.  He kills his enemy with a powerful blade forged by magic.  In an army created almost entirely for defense, he is one of the few charged with eradicating the enemy.

Soul.Name: Wind Swordsmanship
Soul.Comment: Give AT+10 and AGI+2 to one friendly unit.

Skill0.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill0.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

Skill1.Name: Spell: “Lightning Strike”
Skill1.Comment: Do [HP-20] to all units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, we must attack in unison!'
FlavorText.Text2: A magician warrior of the Wizard Kingdom.  She fights both with her magic skills and well-trained abilities as a fighter.  She controls a large swan that allows her to attack her enemies from above.

Soul.Name: Failed Flight Spell
Soul.Comment: Give AT+10 and AGI+2 to one friendly unit.

Skill0.Name: Return level 3
Skill0.Comment: Return one enemy unit within range and level 4 or below to its Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You have some business with me?'
FlavorText.Text2: An aged wizard who has long studied magic.  His knowledge truly is power, as he can use spells younger wizards find much too difficult.

Soul.Name: Runaway Storm
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Falkow level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Berserk Wind
Skill0.Comment: Do [HP-20] to all enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This demon's trouble.  His winds can blow anything apart.'
FlavorText.Text2: A demon who controls the wind.  Legends say that wherever he goes, the blast of a hurricane follows.

FlavorText.Text1: 'They're known as hunters of the sea, but now they're making dry land their hunting ground.'
FlavorText.Text2: Giant crabs said to be the predators of the ocean floor.  They catch prey by stabbing with their sharp claws.  Their right claw is a giant shield, big enough to deflect any attack.

FlavorText.Text1: 'In battle, you must know how to soar like the wind.'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordsman of the Wizard Kingdom.  He possesses the ability to command avians, and his specialty is to use them for surprise attacks from above.

Skill0.Name: Magic Shield
Skill0.Comment: Friendly units in [area: 1-2-3] get DF+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Shield!  Protect me!'
FlavorText.Text2: The magician guards of the Wizard Kingdom.  The magic shields they create are nearly impossible to sunder.

Soul.Name: Secrets of Speed

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text2: A shock trooper of the Wizard Kingdom.  He uses magic to temporarily augment his physical strength and sprints up to his enemies before they can react.

Soul.Comment: Return one engaged unit of agility 3 or lower to the Card File.

Skill0.Name: Song of Magic
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets AGI+5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Her song is one of battle.  It instills in us bravery.'
FlavorText.Text2: A special enchantress who manipulates magic songs.  When she sings, soldiers push themselves past their limits and exhibit great force of arms on the battlefield.

Skill0.Comment: Return one unit level 2 or below to its Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll be a great witch someday!'
FlavorText.Text2: A young witch.  She only just started learning at the magic academy, so she cannot use any powerful spells.  But, her enthusiasm can lead her to great achievements.

Soul.Name: Dying Shriek
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AGI-1.

Skill0.Name: Screech
Skill0.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit of your choice.

FlavorText.Text2: A savage half-human, half-bird monster.  It has a woman's face, but hardly any intelligence.

FlavorText.Text2: One of the six great spirits.  It's the manifestation of the power of the wind that makes up the world.  It takes the shape of a human surrounded by swirling winds.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I am the emissary of Refess. My people, unite and fight together!'
FlavorText.Text2: The first angel created by Refess. Her original purpose was not to fight, but to guide people into the light of Refess.

Skill1.Comment: Set a random enemy unit within range to DF=0 and do [damage: AT] to that unit. And then, target friendly unit AT+10 and DF+5, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My prince will lead the world to peace!  That's why I fight on!'
FlavorText.Text2: The military leader of the Solar Kingdom of Folrart.  Folrart is ruled by Solar Prince Verlaat, and opposes the armies of the Envoy of Chaos, Elgandi.  Lion Baron is not a royal rank, but a nickname earned by fighting ferociously from behind his signature mask.  He never lets up against the forces of chaos, believing Prince Verlaat will unify the world.

Soul.Name: Moon's Rebellion
Soul.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the HP of target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Protection of the Moon
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit cannot be affected or selected by effects that include MAX HP change until end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Soul Release
Skill1.Comment: This unit fully recovers its HP. You get LP-1.

Skill2.Name: Lance of Souls
Skill2.Comment: This unit gets AT+10. Subtract 50% AT from the HP of a random enemy column in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Beloved servants, my purpose is to find offerings for Lawtia.'
FlavorText.Text2: The first angel created by Lawtia. Her original purpose was not to fight, but to find offerings and bring news of them to Lawtia.

Soul.Name: Overdrive XXXX
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to all units level 3 and below.

Skill0.Name: Explosive Burst XXXX
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 50 directly from the HP of all units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Once it starts, it won't stop.  No, it can't be stopped...'
FlavorText.Text2: A giant soldier made from a mysterious form of iron and recently excavated from ancient ruins.  Perhaps because it was immobile for so long, it often seizes up without warning.

Soul.Name: Wrath of Gaia
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get [LV+2/AT+20]/[fully recover HP]/[Rankup]

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, AGI +2.

Skill0.Name: Gaia Blinks
Skill0.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Gleam of Pure Flame
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: 50% of target's MAX HP] to target unit.

Skill2.Name: The Hero's Arrow
Skill2.Comment: All friendly units get [Rank up]

FlavorText.Text1: 'My duty is to find great warriors for Gowen.'
FlavorText.Text2: The first angel created by Gowen. Her original purpose was not to fight, but to find suitable heroes to serve Gowen and mark them.

Soul.Name: Agenda of the Thief
Soul.Comment: Rival Iczer gets SP-3

Skill0.Name: The Secret Treasure
Skill0.Comment: One enemy unit gets DF=0. One friendly unit's AT+ the DF of the originally chosen unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You don't deserve to have a fine treasure like this.'
FlavorText.Text2: A mysterious phantom thief who travels the world.  All he seeks are the treasures of an ancient civilization from the age of the gods.  No one knows his true objectives.

Soul.Name: Soul of the Sea
Soul.Comment: Remove from the game two random cards from your Cemetery. Return all cards in each Iczers' Cemetery to the Card File.

Skill0.Name: Whispering of the Wind
Skill0.Comment: One enemy unit within range gets AGI-2 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Wrath of the Sea
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 20 from the HP of target enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Um, who would make Falkow happy?'
FlavorText.Text2: The first angel created by Falkow. Her original purpose was not to fight, but to find people whom Falkow could rely on.

Soul.Name: Flash of the Heavens
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+10, DF+10, and AGI+1.

Skill0.Name: Best of my Knowledge
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get AT+ [10 X number of units with DF 1 or higher] for this turn. All units get DF=O for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hmm... If things keep moving in this direction, then I have the perfect plan.'
FlavorText.Text2: Known as a genius strategist, he is the kind of man who can make the impossible possible.  He is known far and wide as the prodigy of the Wizard Kingdom.  The tactics and techniques he invents may change the face of warfare forever.

Skill0.Name: Holy Battle Cry
Skill0.Comment: Revive one closed friendly unit.

Skill1.Name: Holy Roar
Skill1.Comment: All unit cards from the rival Iczer's Cemetery are removed from the game.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The smallest of the Dragon Emperors always causes the biggest problems, maybe because he's also the cleverest.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the Dragon Emperors told of in the Legend of Lavato; the mightiest of all beings created by the gods. Retear was born to supervise the other Emperors, and doesn't fight on his own. Living among humans, he's revered as a blessed creature. However, once he begins to move, the terrible might of the strongest Dragon Emperor will be revived.

Soul.Name: Illuminating White Light
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to three random disengaged enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Might of Luminance
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+15 and AGI+1. All friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] units get AT+15 for this turn, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Break through their defenses!  The true threat lies beyond!'
FlavorText.Text2: A leader of knights in the Solar Kingdom.  Clad in white armor, the sight of him charging through the enemy like a beam of light earned him the name â€œKnight of Luminance.â€  He's a close friend of Zagar.

Soul.Name: Execution of Countrymen
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get MAX HP+15 and HP+15.

Skill0.Name: Fanatical Conviction
Skill0.Comment: Send this unit to the Cemetery.  Then, send target enemy unit to the Cemetery.
