FlavorText.Text1: 'Fool who believeth not in our God!  This is Judgment Day.'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the world's most widespread religion, the Church of the True God.  He is the highest ranking judge of heretics.  His immovable faith allows him to oppress unbelievers and pass judgment without a second thought.  If you are brought before him, it is no better than being brought before Death himself.

Soul.Name: The Holy Realm Descends
Soul.Comment: Both Iczers get SP+4.

Skill0.Name: Sanctuary
Skill0.Comment: Target unit fully recovers its HP and gets AT=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You may not pass without my authorization.  Might you possess that qualification?'
FlavorText.Text2: A priestess who guards the hidden domain known as the Holy Realm.  Her family has protected it for generations, but even amongst them only those given the duty of guardian know its true nature.

Soul.Name: Time Return
Soul.Comment: Engage all units.

Skill0.Name: Time Distortion
Skill0.Comment: Change battletime to morning.

Skill1.Name: Time Torrent
Skill1.Comment: Return six random cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.  Remove this unit from the game.

Skill2.Name: Shackles of Time
Skill2.Comment: One unit gets LV+1 and AT+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I want to know the colors of the world...'
FlavorText.Text2: A blind soothsayer and attendant to the prince of Folrart.  She and her power were hidden away in a secret castle room.  Her divination is flawless, and it is clear that even into the coming age, future generations will look to her prophecies for guidance.

Soul.Name: Fountain of Courage
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to one enemy unit. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Protection of the Fountain
Skill0.Comment: This card gets DF=20 and AT+5 for this turn. All friendly units are healed 5 HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'With this sword I will protect the prince.'
FlavorText.Text2: A young female knight and attendant to the prince of the Solar Kingdom.  She was hand-picked for this honor from the kingdom's elite knights.  Her power was concentrated into an enchanted weapon known as the Fountain Sword.  When fortune turned against the prince she was unable to prevent his fall, so she took her own life.

Skill0.Name: Blessing
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets MAX HP+20, HP+20, AT+10, DF+5, and cannot be targeted or randomly selected by other cards' send to Cemetery effects until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Blessing of the Dragon
Skill1.Comment: If the unit targeted by Blessing is a [subtype: Dragon Knight] you get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The blessings of the gods come in many forms.'
FlavorText.Text2: A miraculous power that bestows a holy blessing.  One who receives this divine protection can stand toe to toe with the heroes of the battlefield.

Skill0.Name: Judgement Hammer
Skill0.Comment: Subtract [your Refess level x10] directly from the HP of two random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Even a god can lose its temper.'
FlavorText.Text2: Divine punishment from ages past when the acts of man were closely watched from the heavens, and gods would wield their power to smite individuals.  Any struck by this light from above will fall, be they weak or strong.

Soul.Name: Power of Providence
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Refess level x 10] to a column of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Shield Lv2
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets DF+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Shrine Knights, ready to move out!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the Shrine Knights, a military order made up of consecrated priestesses.  They advance to battle by order of their leader, Lapierre.

Soul.Name: Return from the Brink
Soul.Comment: Increase your Refess level by 3.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning]  Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Life Deprivation
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Send one enemy unit within range and level 5 or below to the Cemetery.

Skill2.Name: 3rd Stage: Contaminate Air
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Subtract 30 directly from the HP of target enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Angel Lycanthropes have stages.  In time they'll ascend and become seraphs.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world.  There are all manner of lycanthropes, and these â€œSeraphsâ€ and â€œAngelsâ€ are activated by exposure to sunlight.  There are countless cases of seraphs gestating in young children.

Soul.Name: Torrent of Power [Holy]
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to all Lawtia units.

Skill0.Name: Roar of Light
Skill0.Comment: All enemy units get AT-10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'These people worship a dragon of all things.  That can't be a good idea.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the legendary Dragon Kin, the most powerful type of creatures on Lavato.  This particular breed is gentle and dislikes conflict.  They even try to understand human life and coexist with the civilizations of man.

Skill0.Name: Shield Breaker
Skill0.Comment: Set a random enemy in range to DF=0 and do [damage: AT] to it.

Skill1.Name: Holy Weapon's Glow
Skill1.Comment: Target friendly unit heals 15 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'They left for the battlefield with blessed weapons in hand.'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the orders granted permission to fight while remaining wholly within the priesthood.  The weapons they hold are under a powerful blessing, and a layman could never wield them.

Soul.Name: Moonlight
Soul.Comment: Move units on enemy field from [area: 1-2-3] to [area: 7-8-9], and from [area: 7-8-9] to [area: 1-2-3].

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Amethyst Corrosion
Skill1.Comment: All enemy units in range get DF=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The Amethyst loves solitude.'
FlavorText.Text2: A gem beast with a violet stone in its brow.  Legends say when the stone shines, it brings down terrible curses.

Soul.Name: Spill Cursed Blood
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get DF=0.

Skill0.Name: Petrification Attack
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit within range and give it DF+10 and AGI-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This atrocious thing is the solar envoy? The sun god must not be very discriminating.'
FlavorText.Text2: A gigantic demon known to lore as a solar envoy.  Its body contains a mysterious toxin, and any poisoned by it become immobile, as solid as stone.

Skill0.Name: Burning Sun
Skill0.Comment: All units level 4 and below get MAX HP=10 and HP=10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The sun smote its anger upon the ground.'
FlavorText.Text2: In this world, it's a rare thing for the sun's power to increase enough to cause a drought.  Is it the wrath of heaven?  Or is it just the nature of the world?

Soul.Name: Words of Oracle
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to a random enemy unit. Give DF+5 to all friendly units.

Skill0.Name: Rune of Defense
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+10 for this turn.  One friendly unit gets DF+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Combat Blessing
Skill1.Comment: All friendlies get AT+5 this turn, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's a terrible thing to hearken their words.  They're not words of welcome.  They're curses.'
FlavorText.Text2: Priests who practice the secret art of the True Way.  This art imparts various powers through nothing more than a simple word.

Soul.Name: Return from the Brink
Soul.Comment: Return two random cards from your Cemetery to your Card File. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning]  Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Fill with Might
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning]  All friendly units get AT+10 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Pinpoint
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'An angel?  Hah!  Its reputation is the only decent thing about it.  It's an abomination.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world.  Some forms of this disease can reach more advanced stages after exposure to sunlight.  As with other forms of lycanthropy, it corrupts the consciousness of the victim without fail.

Soul.Name: Weapon of Smiting
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Shield Breaker
Skill0.Comment: Set a random enemy in range to DF=0 and do [damage: AT] to it.

Skill1.Name: Combat Blessing
Skill1.Comment: All friendlies get AT+5 this turn, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You people are traitors who defied the teachings of our doctrine!  You can run but you can't hide!'
FlavorText.Text2: Inquisitor priests of the world's most widespread religion, the Church of the True God.  Their duty is to execute penal regulations without fail.  They locate those who oppose their doctrine, and dispose of them in secret.

Soul.Name: Winged Poacher
Soul.Comment: Move units on enemy field from [area: 1-2-3] to [area: 7-8-9], and from [area: 7-8-9] to [area: 1-2-3].

Skill0.Name: Gift of Flight
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Flying Pounce
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AT 50 or higher] Do [damage: AT] to one enemy unit of your choice.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That creature is a mystery to me. I don't know how it came to be born... or made.'
FlavorText.Text2: A creature with a lion's torso, but an eagle's head and wings.  It possesses a level of intelligence that is alien to natural creatures, viciously attacking and feeding on settlements bordering its territory.

Soul.Name: Solar Spear
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a column of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Lancer
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Spear Knights are the very first to meet the enemy on the battlefield.'
FlavorText.Text2: Spear Knights serve as the Solar Kingdom's vanguard.  It's said that their grim black armor serves as warning of their conviction in battle.

Soul.Name: Berserker's Savior
Soul.Comment: Return target friendly unit to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Spiked Shield Attack
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: this unit's DF x 3] to any random enemy unit.  This unit gets DF=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now we know that even knights will resort to trick weapons.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the divisions of knights from the Solar Kingdom.  When they hurl the special shield they carry, it slashes the enemy to pieces.  Their power and training allows them to cut down targets even if they are laden with armor.

Skill0.Name: Solidarity
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets [AT+[number of friendly units] X5] for this turn and is healed HP+[number of friendly units] X5. If that unit's AT is 30 or lower, it becomes permanent.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Even the common people have the will to fight.'
FlavorText.Text2: There are countless regular citizens living in towns under the protection of the Solar Kingdom.  Caught up in the conflict with the Duchy of Crest, they have no choice but to take up the sword.

Soul.Name: The Weak Hate the Strong
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 100] to all units level 5 and above.

Skill0.Name: Feeling Threatened
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Rival Iczer has more units on the field] Subtract 30 directly from the HP of two random units, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Immortal Unicorn
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is disengaged] This unit is healed 20 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'They're savage and feel threatened by all who approach except the most serene of maidens.'
FlavorText.Text2: Demons who reside in remote forests.  They are easily identified by the huge horn on their foreheads. Their wild disposition makes them very aggressive, especially toward anything more powerful than themselves.

Skill0.Name: Magic Bolt
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: your Refess level x 5] to one enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The power of a Magic Bolt depends entirely on its wielder.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell that collects concentrated magical energy and strikes with it.  The more magic energy collected, the higher the destructive output of the spell.

Skill0.Name: Recovery Powder
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+4. All friendlies are healed 10HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This simple application could sway the course of the war.'
FlavorText.Text2: A specially mixed wound-healing medicine.  Even though it only heals simple wounds, its ease of use and availability to every soldier strengthens the morale of the entire army.

Soul.Name: Devouring Darkness
Soul.Comment: Engage all enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Shadow Attack
Skill0.Comment: Both Iczers get SP=0.

Skill1.Name: Shadow's Revenge
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT 50%] to all units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It reared up from the inky shadows, as if to celebrate the revival of all the Dragon Emperors.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the Dragon Emperors told of only in the Legend of Lavato.  As the strongest of the Dragons of the Mercurial Night, this Emperor is also known by the name Nightlord.

Soul.Name: Night of the Eclipse
Soul.Comment: Increase one friendly unit's DF by [the number of cards in your Cemetery x 5.]

Skill0.Name: Progura the Black Sun
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+ number of cards in your Cemetery x 5] to one enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'So Verlaat is the Solar Prince...  Why not?  He has his path, I have mine.'
FlavorText.Text2: Solar Prince Verlaat's older brother by a different mother.  He was raised in the shadow of Verlaat, but then suddenly vanished without a trace.  When they meet again it will be under the decree of fate, and they will be arch enemies.

Soul.Name: Chaos Dragon Eradication
Soul.Comment: Return one engaged unit of level 3 or lower to its Card File.

Skill0.Name: Chaos Dragon's Breath
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: this unit's MAX HP] to all enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Yes, let's go... into the sky you call home, Gladeel.'
FlavorText.Text2: The top pupil of the world's first dragon knight, Wasseir.  Her friend, the black dragon Gladeel, once lived to spread war and conflict across the world and was therefore known as the Chaos Dragon.

Soul.Name: Soul Reborn
Soul.Comment: Both Iczers get SP=3.

Skill0.Name: Price of Existence
Skill0.Comment: Set one friendly unit to HP=0, other than this unit.

Skill1.Name: Soul Bond
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets AT + [number of your remaining Soul Cards x 10] for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Double-edged Swords
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Souls can only be managed by a god whose virtues include a true understanding of right and wrong.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spirit who guards the Soul Catcher Tree, said to exist somewhere in Lavato.  The sole meaning of her existence is to protect this enormous tree.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: The Ogre's Obstinance
Soul.Comment: Revive one closed friendly unit, and then do [damage:40] to target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Triple Attack
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to three random enemy units.

Skill1.Name: Instincts of the Oni
Skill1.Comment: Choose one enemy unit.  For this turn, this unit gets AT + ten times the level of the chosen unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Humans are so fragile.  I wonder how much longer before they're completely wiped out?  Guh hya hya hya hya!'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the rare Oni race.  He tears apart humans casually, for his own amusement and nothing more.

Soul.Name: Overdrive XXXX
Soul.Comment: Both Iczers get SP=0.

Skill0.Name: Incompletion
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia level 3 or lower] Engage this unit.

Skill1.Name: XXXX Slash
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia level 4 or higher] Subtract AT directly from HP of random enemy row. Decrease Lawtia level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Once it starts, it won't stop.  No, it can't be stopped...'
FlavorText.Text2: A giant soldier made from a mysterious form of iron and recently excavated from ancient ruins.  Perhaps because it was immobile for so long, it often seizes up without warning.

Skill0.Name: Sacrifice
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 999 directly from the HP of one friendly unit.  Subtract 999 directly from the HP of any unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Life is a succession of fair exchanges, but it rarely seems that way.'
FlavorText.Text2: Something sacrificed, something gained.  This is a magic rite from ancient times.  Legends say the bigger the sacrifice offered, the grander the effect.

Skill0.Name: Pure Terror
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 999 directly from the HP of one unit level three or below.

FlavorText.Text1: 'All I see around me is madness.'
FlavorText.Text2: An enchantment that creates the illusion of what its victims most fear, from the depths of their souls.  The result is always death.

Soul.Name: Deadly Flash
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to a random enemy unit. Change battletime to night.

Skill0.Name: One on One
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/1 enemy unit is in Area[1-2-3]] This unit gets AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Strike Enhancer
Skill1.Comment: Subtract [AT+ unit hit's AT] from the HP of a random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'All invaders confirmed as silenced.  Rescinding warning protocols.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer.  Specializing in close quarters fighting, it excels at independent physical combat.

Soul.Name: Lycanthropy / Scylla
Soul.Comment: Engage one random enemy unit. Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Forced to Live
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Fully restore this unit's HP.  Subtract one from your LP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Open Bloodlust
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  This unit gets AT+50 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: 3rd Stage: Unbridled Will
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Do [damage: AT] to three random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Withstanding the pain is meaningless.  She'll lose herself to it sooner or later.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world.  Scylla is recognized as being an especially ferocious strain.

Soul.Name: Ancient Revival
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one unit, give it AT-20 and render it engaged.

Skill0.Name: Forbidden Practice
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+1.

Skill1.Name: Self-destruction
Skill1.Comment: Set this unit to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'How long can a king keep the souls of his subjects?'
FlavorText.Text2: The founder of an ancient and glorious kingdom, reduced to an evil spirit.  He demanded his subjects be bound to him forever, and he holds their souls even now.  His only goal is to be revived in the modern world.

Soul.Name: Torrent of Power [Night]
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to all Refess units.

Skill0.Name: Soul Eater
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit within range.  Rival Iczer gets SP-1.

Skill1.Name: Dark Miasma
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Do [damage: 10] to all enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's like a natural disaster.  You never know where it will strike.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the legendary Dragon Kin, the most powerful type of creatures on Lavato.  They have the most vicious instincts of any dragon.  They lurk in shadows, striking suddenly and then vanishing completely.  Because of this, many still consider them to be a myth.

Soul.Name: Recovery Circuit
Soul.Comment: Increase your Lawtia level by 3.

Skill0.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill0.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

Skill1.Name: Magic Enhancer
Skill1.Comment: One friendly unit gets [AT+20] for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Bash
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to and render engaged a random enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Magic chant program load.  Five seconds until execution.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer.  In pursuit of magical ability, it uses diverse spells in the form of programs.

Soul.Name: Lycanthropy / Fenrir
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Lawtia level X 10] to a column of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Ravenous
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  This unit gets AT+40 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: 3rd Stage: Live as a Beast
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Lycanthropy or not, he had a choice. He could've just gone on his way.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world.  Unlike other forms of lycanthropy, Fenrir completely assimilates with its host.  Maybe for this reason, victims are said to be uncommon.

Skill0.Name: Corruption
Skill0.Comment: Target unit gets MAX HP=30, HP=30, AT=30, DF=0, AGI=2, and RNG=2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'People fall so easily.  So very, very, easily.'
FlavorText.Text2: Even saints can lose their way due to one simple misstep.  That is the nature of humanity.

Soul.Name: Lycanthropy / Legion
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to all units AGI 2 and below.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Unstable Form
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  This unit gets AT+30 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's the most prolific of lycanthropes.  That's all there is to Legion, and that's enough.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world.  With Legion, the lycanthropy runs wild and infests a person instantly.  Then, it destroys that human just as fast.

Soul.Name: Silvery Cord
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Cutting the Cord
Skill0.Comment: Set target engaged enemy unit within range to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Giving the gift of death is too easy.'
FlavorText.Text2: Members of a clan known as the Death Lords.  It's said they're able to see the silvery cord connecting human souls to their vessels.

Soul.Name: Ocean of Skeletons
Soul.Comment: Revive one closed friendly unit and give AT+20 and AGI+1 to the unit.

Skill0.Name: Refresh
Skill0.Comment: Send [card: Skeleton Warrior] from your Card File to the Cemetery. After that, this unit fully recovers its HP.

FlavorText.Text1: It's quite convenient when your soldiers need nothing to sustain them but a little magic.'
FlavorText.Text2: A skeletal soldier created by magic power.  Quicker than a mundane walking corpse, it is more than suitable for combat.

Soul.Name: Mind Breaker
Soul.Comment: All enemy units get AT-10 and DF=0.

Skill0.Name: Psionic Attack
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+20] to one random enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Enemy Reinforcements
Skill1.Comment: Return one random card from Rival's cemetery to the file.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The armies of Crest have modified their soldiers again...  After seeing this, nothing they do will surprise me.'
FlavorText.Text2: An enhanced type of soldier created by Annarose.  With their amplified psychic powers, they can manipulate objects without even touching them.

Soul.Name: Profoundly Vile Curse
Soul.Comment: You get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: Sorcery
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets MAX HP=30, HP=30, AT=30, DF=0, AGI=2, and RNG=2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Maybe a long life is the greatest curse of all.'
FlavorText.Text2: One who has long made his living through sorcery.  He's dealt with all kinds of spells, and uses them only to bring pain and suffering to others.  But he does not know his own time of death, so he lives his days in fear.

Soul.Name: Chilling Aura
Soul.Comment: Set one enemy Character to HP=0.

Skill0.Name: Icy Hands of Death
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to one random enemy unit in range. And then, this unit heals 20 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The only thing I know for sure about ghosts is that I don't like them.'
FlavorText.Text2: These spirit beings roam old castles and other cursed places.  Their true nature is a mystery, but they are always aggressive towards the living.

Skill0.Name: Howling
Skill0.Comment: One random enemy unit gets AT-10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'They always travel in packs.'
FlavorText.Text2: Large dogs who possess uncanny intelligence and often attack human dwellings.  Their howls have been known to drive the weak-hearted to their knees.

Soul.Name: Life Suction
Soul.Comment: You get [SP - number of enemy units].

Skill0.Name: Nightmare
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Both Iczers get SP=0.

Skill1.Name: Night Summoner
Skill1.Comment: Change battletime to night.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, it's our time.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lost souls cut off from human life and entranced by evil.  Drinking up human vitality gives them sustenance and increases their power.  They descend on the streets when night falls, indiscriminately attacking the townspeople.

Skill0.Name: Life Conversion
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets HP+30.  One enemy unit gets HP-30.

FlavorText.Text1: 'So, shall we drink from some lively child?'
FlavorText.Text2: A forbidden spell for stealing life energy.  Because the procedure is simple and helpless sources of life energy are easy to come by, there are many who still use it.

Skill0.Name: Soul Pact
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+4.  Target friendly gets AT+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The sinful can be cast down to hell, regardless of age.'
FlavorText.Text2: This spell allows you to obtain sinister powers in exchange for your soul.  But, there is no guarantee that you alone will benefit.

Soul.Name: Intense Roar
Soul.Comment: Remove all friendly Closed units from the game.

Skill0.Name: Birth of Scorching Flame
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 50 directly from the HP of all units.

Skill1.Name: Tyrant of Scorching Flame
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 50 directly from the HP of target enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Flames roared like lions, the volcano shrieked and trembled, and the Emperor descended.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the Dragon Emperors told of only in the Legend of Lavato.  He is one of the mightiest of all beings created by the ancient gods.  As a Volcano Dragon, he is the strongest in battle.  However, the legends say his return is one of the signs of the end of days.

Soul.Name: The Great Absorber
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Insatiable Spirit of Inquiry
Skill0.Comment: Subtract [AT+10] from the HP of two random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, teacher.  Speak with me today.  Ahh, fear not.  There is plenty of time.'
FlavorText.Text2: In this world, there are beings disconnected from the limitations of mundane living things. They are known as Mazoku.  Extension is a Mazoku covetous of knowledge, so he appears before well versed scholars to engage them in conversation.  However, few of these scholars survive the ordeal.

Soul.Name: Ride of the Fire Storm
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to all units.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets HP +20, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Scorching Air
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 10 directly from the HP of all enemy units, and they begin Burning.

Skill1.Name: Ignited Air
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/after rank up]  Do [damage: 50% of target's MAX HP] to all enemy units. Decrease your Gowen LV by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Who said fire can't be cool?'
FlavorText.Text2: A mysterious boy with a long-standing grudge against Asuet and a talent for manipulating flames. He stays on the mercenary's trail, looking to satisfy the intense hatred smoldering in his heart.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 7 or higher, this unit gets AT +20.

Skill0.Name: Charge
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: ATX2] to a random enemy in range.  Do [damage: 50% of MAX HP] to this unit.

Skill1.Name: Bullet Storm
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/after rank up]  Do [damage: AT] to three random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You might need a few more people if you want to take me down.'
FlavorText.Text2: A girl owning two expertly smithed rapid-fire revolvers.  Later in life she founds Heierrat, known also as the Mercenary Nation.  Possessing a strong sense of justice, she holds a deep hatred for those who oppress the weak.

Skill0.Name: God Lance
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of a target column of enemy units in range.

Skill1.Name: Unleash the 'True Spear'
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets ATx2 and RNGx2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm interested to see how long you last against me.'
FlavorText.Text2: A man who seeks battle using the God Lance he's named for.  He does not wield this power for evil, but he is driven to find those mightier than himself.  Therefore, he often issues a challenge without considering the implications.

Soul.Name: Rugged Spirit
Soul.Comment: One friendly unit gets MAX HP+40, HP+40, DF=0 and AGI-1.

Skill0.Name: Great Cleave
Skill0.Comment: Subtract [ATx2] from the HP of a random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Even after talking with the man, it's hard to see him as a person.  He's more like a beast.'
FlavorText.Text2: A mercenary who wanders from place to place.  To him, weapons are just a vehicle to deliver the strength of his body to his enemies and pulverize them.  He fights like a beast, not a man.

Skill0.Name: Fairy Dance
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get MAX HP+15, HP+15.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come on, everyone!  A festival!'
FlavorText.Text2: An annual festival for fairies.  It's said when you join the ring, your body overflows with energy.

Skill0.Name: Ignition
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT + that unit's MAX HP, and HP=10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Your soul's power will explode!'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell to instantly send a person beyond the normal limitations of human ability.  However, few survive long after the use of this magic.

Soul.Name: Torrent of Power [Fire]
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to all Falkow units.

Skill0.Name: Burning Breath
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to a random row of enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'These are the ones everyone has heard tales of.  They're the reason people fear dragons.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the legendary Dragon Kin, the most powerful type of creatures on Lavato.  With enormous wings on their back they fly, and with raging breath from their mouths they bring fire.  They're ferocious and extremely territorial.

Soul.Name: Torrent of Power [Earth]
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen level X 10] to a column of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Crushing Fangs
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of a random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This particular dragon is ferocious, dangerous, and just plan nasty.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the legendary Dragon Kin, the most powerful type of creatures on Lavato.  They live in the forests as carnivores, devouring any creature they can fit in their mouths.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: The Golden Right Foot
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get DF=0.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Ultimate Strike
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT x 2] to a random enemy unit within range.  This unit gets AT=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The strength of my foot has long years of kung fu training behind it.'
FlavorText.Text2: A martial artist who strengthened just one part of his body, training it continuously.  Now he can easily kill in a single strike while unarmed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Unlucky fool, you're trapped up here, with no room to move!'
FlavorText.Text2: A giant made of rock.  His hard skin and huge body bring fear to adventurers.

Soul.Name: Blazing Flames
Soul.Comment: Send one friendly unit to the Cemetery.  After that, send one disengaged enemy unit of your choice to the Cemetery.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Employ: Salamander
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 10 directly from the HP of target unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hark, Salamanders.  Obey my command and purge everything with fire!'
FlavorText.Text2: Swordsmen excelling in the use of fire spirits.  They use the power of the Salamanders as if it was their own.  This is a path only for those with belligerent personalities.

Soul.Name: Wall of Trees
Soul.Comment: Increase your Gowen level by 3.

Skill0.Name: Employ: Dryad
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets DF+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Let me introduce my adorable servant.'
FlavorText.Text2: Swordsmen excelling in the use of wood spirits.  They use the power of the Dryads as if it was their own.  This is a path only for those with the drive to protect others.

Skill0.Name: Rapid Growth
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+4.  Target friendly gets AGI+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Helpful or hurtful, one can't distinguish between the marvels of nature.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell to instantly stimulate growth in the target.  This effect has no limit to its usefulness.

Soul.Name: Departing Shot
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your SP x 15] to one enemy unit.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Lancer
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemies in range.

Skill1.Name: Slaying Arrow
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/after rank up]  Set one random disengaged enemy unit to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Until the target appears, I will remain as still as a statue.'
FlavorText.Text2: An archer who falls into the assassin camp.  To be sure to kill the intended target, she never moves from her attack point once she's chosen it.  Not picky about the target, she'll take any job even if it means killing the elderly or children.

Soul.Name: Home Turf
Soul.Comment: Two friendly units get AT+20 and DF+10.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +20.

Skill0.Name: Penetrate
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT from the HP of a random enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I polished my skills in the mountains, and there I can outfight any man.'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of a clan that survives by hunting in mountainous areas.  They can move nimbly and engage their enemies even in areas with poor footing.

Soul.Name: Delusions of Grandeur
Soul.Comment: You get SP+2.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 9 or higher, this unit gets AT +20, DF +10, AGI +1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Pshaw, I can't do nothin' like this!'
FlavorText.Text2: A man who has been unable to become a hero.  Within him smolders a heart of strength, but he has no direction.

Soul.Name: Sword of the Dragon
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get [AT + their level x 5].

Skill0.Name: Dragonscale Slash
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of a random row of enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Huh?  You got business with me?'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordsman who wields a special Dragon Scale Sword.  Its cutting edge is very sharp, and ordinary armor won't withstand it.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Tenacious Flesh
Soul.Comment: Give DF+10 to all friendly units.

Skill0.Name: Grapple
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. If that unit is at 50% HP or below, give it AT-10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Fancy techniques can't stand up to pure strength.'
FlavorText.Text2: A man who aspired to be a martial artist, but tried to make up for his lack of skill by depending on strength.  Since his body is conditioned to the limit, he is just as effective as men equipped with weapons and armor.

Soul.Name: Overflowing Appetite
Soul.Comment: One random unit card from your Card File is removed from the game.

Skill0.Name: Uncontrollable Urge
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of a random enemy unit within range. This unit becomes engaged.

FlavorText.Text1: 'These things bring trouble wherever they go.'
FlavorText.Text2: A monster that looks like a humanoid pig.  It is not very intelligent, and its only instinct is to consume everything.

Soul.Name: Hawk Eyes
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+10 and RNG+1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AT +30.

Skill0.Name: Charge
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT x 2] to a random enemy unit within range. Do [damage: 50% of MAX HP] to this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'To incite chaos in the ranks, just attack the leader.'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight of the Mercenary Nation, she specializes in sniping with a unique gun.  She accurately downs key enemy figures, one after another.

Skill0.Name: Healing
Skill0.Comment: Recover 25% of MAX HP.

Skill1.Name: Gulping Jaws
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 30 directly from the HP of an engaged enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'No way around it, that's a big lizard.'
FlavorText.Text2: A giant lizard, many times the size of a man.  With its giant mouth it swallows everything whole, even humans.  Then it slowly digests them internally.

Skill0.Name: Petrification
Skill0.Comment: Engage one unit of your choice. That unit gets DF+30 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This special gas can stop anyone in their tracks.'
FlavorText.Text2: A mysterious magic smoke that makes living bodies as hard as stone.  According to rumor, it arose from forbidden alchemy experiments, but the truth is still unknown.

Skill0.Name: Gravitational Sphere
Skill0.Comment: All units get AGI=1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Gravity can restrain anything, even the heavens and the earth.'
FlavorText.Text2: A gravitational sphere born from ancient magic.  Those within range of the sphere's effects are pulled to the ground by its power.

Soul.Name: Ruler of the Sea
Soul.Comment: Remove from the game three random cards from your Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Ocean Emperor's Advent
Skill0.Comment: Return one random unit of LV 2 or higher to its Card File.

Skill1.Name: Ocean King
Skill1.Comment: Return all units level 2 and below to their Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Then the final Dragon Emperor rose from the lightless ocean depths.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the Dragon Emperors told of only in the Legend of Lavato.  It is one of the mightiest of all beings created by the ancient gods.  The stories say it remains dormant in the deep, and if it ever appears on the surface, it will wash the world away.

Soul.Name: Magic Seal
Soul.Comment: Revive all friendly Characters.

Skill0.Name: Winged Shield
Skill0.Comment: Friendly units in [area: 1-2-3] get DF+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Shield Blade
Skill1.Comment: Subtract DFx2 from the HP of one enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You poor soul, trying something like this on my watch.'
FlavorText.Text2: Leader of the Wizard Kingdom's royal guards.  Her mastery of shield spells gives her many more tricks up her sleeve than the standard magic shield.

Soul.Name: Magic Armor Disengage
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Enchanted Armor Rambar
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+20 and DF+20. Do [Damage: AT] to one random enemy unit within range.

Skill1.Name: Mage Paladin Commander
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets [AT + number of friendly [subtype: Wizard Kingdom] units x 20] for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Rambar Unleashed
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/DF=30 or higher] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'To me!  Rambaaaar!'
FlavorText.Text2: A leader of knights in the Wizard Kingdom.  Equipped with a unique enchanted armor named Rambar, he can activate it to unleash considerable battle power.

Soul.Name: Lost Spell: 'Storm Rage'
Soul.Comment: Do [damage:30] to target enemy unit.  Do [damage:50] to a random enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Swan Saber
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT + number of times you've invoked a Grimoire Card x 10] to an enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Even if the enemy has the advantage, when we show up it turns around.'
FlavorText.Text2: A leader of Wizard Kingdom troops.  Well versed in both the sword and magic, she possesses a high degree of combat prowess.

Soul.Name: Treasure Island
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your SP x 10] to one enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Whim of the Pirate King
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 0->50] to a random unit that is not [subtype: Pirate].

Skill1.Name: Call of the Pirate King
Skill1.Comment: Return a random card from each Iczer's Cemetery to their Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ahoy!  It be smooth sailing today, maties!'
FlavorText.Text2: The leader of the pirates who ravage the seas around the Wizard Kingdom.  He fears neither magic nor the authorities.  When the mood takes him, he pillages both ships and coastal towns.

Soul.Name: Receding Windstorm
Soul.Comment: A random row of enemy units gets RNG-1.

Skill0.Name: Charm of the Wind Spirits
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units except this one get AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Berserk Wind
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 20 directly from the HP of all enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The will of the wind is my will.'
FlavorText.Text2: A sorceress who has mastered wind magic, successful even to the point of employing Djinn.  She lives like the wind does, never staying in one place for long.

Skill0.Name: Wrath of the Constellations
Skill0.Comment: Both Iczers get SP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Sometimes the heavens themselves grow angry.'
FlavorText.Text2: The anger of the heavens.  The world is a divine creation and so are the cosmos, but for reasons unknown they rain their fury down on the land.

Skill0.Name: Shear Winds
Skill0.Comment: Engage all units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The sudden gust of wind caught even our quickest by surprise and blew them off their feet.'
FlavorText.Text2: The fury of the wind manifested as a sudden gale.  Not even the strongest or fastest creatures can resist being blown down.

Soul.Name: Wave of Invigoration
Soul.Comment: All friendly units level 2 and below get MAX HP+10, AT+20, and fully recover HP.

Skill0.Name: Azure Beastmastery
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [cardtype: Monster] units get AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Beast Attack
Skill1.Comment: Select one friendly [subtype: monster] unit. Do [damage: that unit's AGI X10] to one random engaged enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'All living creatures heed my will.'
FlavorText.Text2: The practitioner of a unique craft originally bequeathed to mankind by the goddess Falkow.  Falkow excelled in the invention of mysterious arts, and occasionally conveyed those arts to humans.  Practitioners now pass on the knowledge from one generation to the next.

Soul.Name: Magic Sword Summoning
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one unit, give it AT-20 and render it engaged.

Skill0.Name: Magic Sword
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+[number of times you've invoked a Grimoire Card X 10] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Regus guards have perfect defense; their swordsmen are masters of offense. Think that's fair? Wait till you see them move.'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordsman of the Wizard Kingdom, Regus.  He fights with weapons produced by the power of magic.

Soul.Name: Torrent of Power [Water]
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to all Gowen units.

Skill0.Name: Huge Tidal Wave
Skill0.Comment: Return all units level 1 and lower to their Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'So the depths of the seas are filled with dragons, too?  Great...'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the legendary Dragon Kin, the most powerful type of creatures on Lavato.  They lurk in the ocean, quietly seeking prey.  Despite their power, they care little for territory and rarely rampage.

Soul.Name: Scattering to the Wind
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AGI+2.

Skill0.Name: Employ: Sylph
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets AGI+2 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, wind of mine.  Dance!'
FlavorText.Text2: Swordswomen excelling in the use of wind spirits.  They use the power of the Sylphs as if it was their own.  This is a path only for those with freewheeling personalities.

Soul.Name: Allure of the Water Spirit
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Falkow level x 10] to a column of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Employ: Undine
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets RNG-2 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come forth, Undines.  I ask you to confine my enemies.'
FlavorText.Text2: Swordsmen excelling in the use of water spirits.  They use the power of the Undines as if it was their own.  This is a path only for those calm and collected enough to carefully assess situations.

Soul.Name: Wisdom of the Sage
Soul.Comment: Increase your Falkow level by 3.

Skill0.Name: Bookworm
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hoho, you seek something of me?'
FlavorText.Text2: A sage in charge of the study of writings in the Wizard Kingdom libraries.  It's said no document exists that he does not grasp.

Skill0.Name: Thunderheads
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 50 from the HP of three random units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Awful magic...  With this storm bearing down, we won't make any headway.'
FlavorText.Text2: A magic spell that forms clouds capable of emitting deadly lightning.  There isn't much that can be done to defend against its power.

Soul.Name: Mutilation on the Wing
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Silver Wings
Skill0.Comment: Send this unit to the Cemetery.  One friendly unit gets AGI=5.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I don't know when they appeared.  I'm just happy I'm still alive after seeing them.'
FlavorText.Text2: Demons with silvery glittering bodies.  Their slight form is not easy to spot.  Even if you do see them, living to tell about it is the hard part.

Soul.Name: Ultimate Magic Bow
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get [AT + their level x 5].

Skill0.Name: Pinpoint
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

Skill1.Name: Magic Bow
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit.  That unit gets AGI-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If we increase their attack power with magic, everyone will take notice of the results.'
FlavorText.Text2: Archers of the Wizard Kingdom.  They fire at their enemies with magically endowed bows.  These enchantments can pierce any target and bind its movements.

Soul.Name: Enormous Wingspan
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AGI-2.

Skill0.Name: Thunderous Flapping
Skill0.Comment: Three random enemy units are moved to random open areas.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Look at the size of it!  If it sees you, you're finished.'
FlavorText.Text2: The biggest monster bird in all of Lavato.  Its length exceeds 10 meters from tail to tip, and when it spreads its wings it blots out even the light of the sun.

Soul.Name: Spiral Squall
Soul.Comment: Do [damage:30] to all units with AGI 3 or higher.

Skill0.Name: Flying Attack
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy.

Skill1.Name: Take Flight
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AGI 6 or higher] This unit gets AT+10 and RNG+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'As long as the sky is here, I'll have a friend to keep me in good spirits!'
FlavorText.Text2: The flying scouts of the Wizard Kingdom.  Their quickness is unmatched throughout the lands.

Soul.Name: Counterspell Sword
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to a random enemy unit. Give AGI+1 to all friendly units.

Skill0.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill0.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's natural to be scared of your first battle.'
FlavorText.Text2: A newly recruited swordsman of the Wizard Kingdom.  A soldier who fights well in his first battle is likely to become elite someday.

Soul.Name: Weapon of Magic Power
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your SP x 15] to one enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Strength Enchantment
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+[this unit's AGI X 5] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Stealth Enchantment
Skill1.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+10 and RNG+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh weapon, bring forth your true power...'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic users who enhance weapons through enchantment spells.  Their magic provides a great advantage in battle.  Those who doubt that may not live to regret it.

Soul.Name: Uncontrollable Flying Magic
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of level 5 or above to its Card File. And then, you get one less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Confusion Spell
Skill0.Comment: Move units on enemy field from [area: 1-2-3] to [area: 7-8-9], and from [area: 7-8-9] to [area: 1-2-3].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Whoaaa, wait, waaait!'
FlavorText.Text2: Young flying soldiers of the Wizard Kingdom.  They can fight well if they remain calm and use their magic carefully, but that's not as easy as it looks.

Soul.Name: Strike from the Deep
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a random row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Pinpoint
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If you can see its claws, you're already too close.'
FlavorText.Text2: A demon lurking on the ocean floor.  Its giant claws can tear an entire ship to little pieces.

Skill0.Name: Invisibility Edge
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets AT+10 and RNG+1 and cannot be hit by attack actions for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If you trust your eyes, it will get you in trouble.  Be careful.'
FlavorText.Text2: A blade fashioned through magic.  It's not visible, but it retains all the power of one that is.

Skill0.Name: Meaning of Failure
Skill0.Comment: 5% chance: Increase your SP by 3. 75% chance: Increase your SP by 4. 20% chance: Increase your SP by 5.

FlavorText.Text1: 'These things happen.'
FlavorText.Text2: Magical failure, experimental failure...  Such things happen all the time, but through these failures great things can be achieved in the future.

FlavorText.Text1: Congratulations!
FlavorText.Text2: This is a Prize card, that can be exchanged for weekly prizes. Check out the main web page or the Event Calendar for more information. This card can also be recycled for 150 Gran.  Web address for details is: http://www.alteil.com/index.php/events/contests/57-contests/222-prize-card-contest

Soul.Name: Verdant Treasure
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Excavation
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ah, night in summertime...'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the many adventurers who wander the world of Lavato.  Among forgotten treasures she discovered a summer robe called a Yukata. Now she relaxes during the warm summer night, dreaming of the day when she finally uncovers the ancient secrets hidden under Lavato.

Skill0.Name: Magic Shield
Skill0.Comment: Friendly units in [area: 1-2-3] get DF+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hey there, what took you?'
FlavorText.Text2: The Wizard Kingdom is situated on an island, and is warm all year round. Its enchanted beaches are ideal for swimming.  This Sorcerer Guard is spending her day off relaxing on the beach. She attracts quite a bit of attention, but says 'I'm only interested in men who are stronger than I am.'

Soul.Name: Miracle of the Light Sword
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to one enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Lantylit
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+10] to a random row of enemies. For each enemy unit of HP 0 or below, you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Heh!  A girl could get used to this!'
FlavorText.Text2: The commander of the Solar Kingdom's cleric army. Swordsmen from the Far East, having enlisted in the armies of the Solar Kingdom, are holding a Summer Matsuri festival in honor of their hosts. Lapierre pushed for approval from the Royal Family, and one canâ€™t help but wonder if she had an ulterior motive up her sleeveâ€¦ or behind her back.

Soul.Name: Power Overload
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Penetrate
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT from the HP of a random enemy in range.

Skill1.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill1.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

Skill2.Name: Self-Destruct
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Rival iczer gets SP-1

FlavorText.Text1: 'Masterâ€¦ What is the meaning of this outfit?'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer. However, people who acquire Magic Dolls often treat them like human girls. This one is confused by the outfit she was given to wear. On the matter, Sumer says:  â€œMagic Dolls are completely waterproof. They can withstand long hours of labor partially submerged!â€

Soul.Name: Black Cat Crossing
Soul.Comment: Target unit gets MAX HP=30, HP=30, AT=30, DF=0, AGI=2, and RNG=2.

Skill0.Name: Bad Luck Woman
Skill0.Comment: Send a random Grimoire Card from your Card File to the Cemetery. And then, send one random Grimoire card from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill1.Name: Grimoire Bane
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit within range.  Select a random Grimoire Card from rival Iczer and send it to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh no... the experiment has failed? Why are my clothes so big!?'
FlavorText.Text2: Fellana is a master class wizard from the Wizard Kingdom. She's been experimenting with magic to fix (change) her unfortunate fate. Since she'd never participated the All Hallows' Eve celebration before, she decided to use magic to transform into a monster for the perfect costume. However, it did not turn out exactly as she had hoped...

Soul.Name: Return from the Brink
Soul.Comment: Increase your Refess level by 3.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning]  Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Life Deprivation
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Send one enemy unit within range and level 5 or below to the Cemetery.

Skill2.Name: 3rd Stage: Contaminate Air
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Subtract 30 directly from the HP of target enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hey, Miss! Trick or treat!'
FlavorText.Text2: Laura was once an ordinary citizen from the Solar Kingdom.  One All Hallows' Eve, she put on her special costume and strolled around the town, as is the custom.  She had no idea that she would begin a life of eternal fear on the very next day, when the morning sun washed over her.

Soul.Name: Devouring Darkness
Soul.Comment: Engage all enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Shadow Attack
Skill0.Comment: Both Iczers get SP=0.

Skill1.Name: Shadow's Revenge
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT 50%] to all units.

FlavorText.Text1:
'What should we do now?'
'Hmm.'
'Let's go have some fun!'
FlavorText.Text2: On the night most sacred to darkness, All Hallows' Eve, the power of the shadows became so great that it reacted within the Nightlord.  The resulting surge left Zu-jyuva transformed, each head into a beautiful girl.  Was it a coincidence, or did fate decree that even the mysterious Dragon Emperor should have a costume on this most sacred of nights?

Skill0.Name: Healing
Skill0.Comment: Recover 25% of MAX HP.

Skill1.Name: Gulping Jaws
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 30 directly from the HP of an engaged enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Please don't tease me. I beg you.'
FlavorText.Text2: Enormous lizards roam in the wild lands. They're carnivorous and eat whatever they can in one bite. Is this a young kid in a special Lizard costume?  Or has the Black Cat, Fellana been experimenting on All Hallows' Eve again?  Perhaps this specimen is just a Devouring Lizard in human form, transformed by her magic.

Soul.Name: Unyielding Drive to Purify
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+50 and DF+50 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Mighty Struggles Cut Deeper
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: ATx5] to a random enemy unit of level 6 or higher.

Skill1.Name: Snare of Cutting Wire
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AGIx20] to a random enemy unit of AGI 5 or higher.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I will cleanse you of your sins.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the high ranking Inquisitors of the Church of the True God.  He may be young, but he has prosecuted countless heretics.  His faith in the One True God is absolute, but many wonder if his faith is really true justice.

Skill0.Name: The Angel’s Trumpet
Skill0.Comment: One unit of level 4 or higher gets AT=0, DF=0 and AGI=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Sound the horns!'
FlavorText.Text2: This legendary magic trumpet is able to warn all the citizenry of danger, no matter where they are. Its magic sounding will be heard by the ones intended to heed it, even if they are in furthest regions of the world.

Soul.Name: Mercy of the Holy Mother
Soul.Comment: All units get MAX HP -20 and AT+20.

Skill0.Name: Wisdom of the Holy Mother
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get MAX HP -10, and also get AT+20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Truth of the World
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range for every Closed friendly unit on the field.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The truth is even deeper and darker then you believe.'
FlavorText.Text2: A mysterious lady who hides behind the long veil of Lavatoâ€™s ancient history. She has been mentioned several times in the records of the realm, sometimes hundreds of years apart. It is believed that she is waiting for one who will be known as a hero for ages to come. She will appear before him, and tell him the truth of the world.

Skill0.Name: Melody of Dischord
Skill0.Comment: Select one enemy unit. Subtract the chosen unit's AT directly from the HP of any target enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Melody of Darkness
Skill1.Comment: The unit directly in front of this unit gets HP=1, and also gets AT+30 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Please rest your head and listen for awhile.'
FlavorText.Text2: Annarose invited this mysterious musician to the court of Crest. Her melodies have the power to charm the hearts of all who hear them. However, her true identity is that of an assassin, and she is the direct subordinate of Annarose.

Skill0.Name: Might of the True Hero
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT + [number of engaged enemy units]x10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I have come to test your chivalry!'
FlavorText.Text2: In this world, there are beings disconnected from the limitations of mundane living things. They are known as Mazoku. Brave believes in courage and overcoming deadly challenges. He may appear in front of anyone who has claimed to be fearless, in order to test the strength of their will.

Soul.Name: The Blind Lash Out
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get AT-20 and AGI-2.

Skill0.Name: Turning a Blind Eye
Skill0.Comment: Decrease your Gowen level to 0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I have seen all I need.'
FlavorText.Text2: Wabell is one of the legendary Dragon Kin, the most powerful type of creatures on Lavato. He has lived in the dark, twisted corners of Lavato for so long that he can no longer see.  However, he has been gifted with keen magical senses.

Soul.Name: Dance of Destruction
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+50 and AGI+5 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Dance of the Azure God
Skill0.Comment: All [cardtype: Sorcerer] units get AT+20 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Dance of the Azure Blades
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 10] to all enemy units.  This effect counts as a Grimoire activation.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Everyone, letâ€™s dance!'
FlavorText.Text2: A famous dancer from the Wizard Kingdom. Her dancing possesses magical powers that strengthen all the wizards around her. She once saw a brave young mercenary named Dilate on the battlefield, and sheâ€™s had a crush on him ever since.

Skill0.Name: Slash
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

Skill1.Name: Azure Flash
Skill1.Comment: This unit can not be hit by an Attack action.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You want me to guard her again?'
FlavorText.Text2: One of six paladins who protect the Wizard Kingdom. The wide flashes of his long blades are said to be so fast that he can unleash a surprise attack on enemies standing face to face with him on the battlefield. Recently his sole duty has been to guard Chiruru, and itâ€™s been getting on his nerves.

Soul.Name: Diffusion Reaction
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Refess 6 or higher] Send one disengaged enemy to the Cemetery. Set your Refess to 0.

Skill0.Name: Attack of the Moonlight
Skill0.Comment: Set your Lawtia to 3.

Skill1.Name: Light of the Proxy
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets [AT+ your Refess X10] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The Proxy of Light is an emissary of judgment, born of the world's injustice.'
FlavorText.Text2: This is the entity of Refess that appeared when the world's balance of magical power collapsed. It is able to draw pure light even from the deepest darkness.

Soul.Name: Anger of the Divine Shield
Soul.Comment: Two enemy units get MAX HP=20, HP=20, AT=20, DF=0.

Skill0.Name: Unleash the Holy Shield
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units fully recover HP.

Skill1.Name: Divine Shield Roahn
Skill1.Comment: All friendly units get DF+5.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My other half must be stopped. That is my indiscretion.'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight endowed with Roahn, a shield said to be made by a god of old. He's on a journey to find the one he calls his other half, Kafhar the Left-hand Shield.

Soul.Name: Holy Armor
Soul.Comment: One friendly unit gets DF+10.

Skill0.Name: Blessing of Sunlight
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] All friendly units get [AT+ number of friendly units x5] for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Blessing of Moonlight
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] All friendly units get DF+10 for this turn, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Can you defeat me and my divine power?'
FlavorText.Text2: A young man who was granted divine protection at birth.  Because of the power radiating from him, any who stand before him in combat feel as if they are fighting a god in person.

Soul.Name: Fateful Decision
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/ Refess lvl 3 or higher] Do [damage: 50] to two random disengaged enemy units. Decrease Refess level by 3.

Skill0.Name: God of Swords, Nachtom
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: number of friendly units X 30] to one random enemy unit within range.

Skill1.Name: Unleash True Power
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: number of friendly units X 30] to all enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Boys grow up to menace the world.'
FlavorText.Text2: An ordinary boy born in a small village on the outskirts of the Solar Kingdom. One day, the divine sword Nachtom appeared at his bedside, changing his life forever.

Skill0.Name: Daybreak
Skill0.Comment: Change battle time to morning. All friendly units get DF+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Dawn arrived swiftly that day.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell to make the sun rise at night.  For the forces of darkness, this is truly a power to be feared.

Soul.Name: Free the Spirit of Light
Soul.Comment: Two random friendly units get AT+20 and DF+10.

Skill0.Name: Employ: Will o' the Wisp
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets MAX HP+20 and is healed 50% MAX HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My darling children...  Let us fight the evil, together.'
FlavorText.Text2: Sword priestesses excelling in the use of will o' the wisps. They use the power of the wisps as if it were their own. This is a path open to priestesses who are kind-hearted women.

Soul.Name: Star Dust
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get DF=0.

Skill0.Name: Breath of the Stars
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Refess Lv 3 or higher] Do [damage: your Refess X 5] to two random enemy units. Decrease your Refess level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That dragon comes from beyond the boundaries of Lavato's sky.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the legendary Dragon Kin, the most powerful type of creatures on Lavato.  They live so far beyond the clouds, it is believed they originally came from the stars.

Soul.Name: Assign Folrart Deputies
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get DF=999 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Captain's Orders
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] units get AT+10 and DF+5 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Shield Breaker
Skill1.Comment: Set a random enemy in range to DF=0 and do [damage: AT] to it.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Yes!  My army is superior!  Charge!'
FlavorText.Text2: A captain who leads a band of knights in the Solar Kingdom. His prowess in battle has earned him respect even from the Paladins, but his most important attribute is his mind.

Soul.Name: Green Darkness
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Refess lvl X 10] to one random enemy unit. Do [damage: your Lawtia lvl X 10] to target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Emerald Energy
Skill0.Comment: Decrease your Refess by 1. You get SP+1.

Skill1.Name: Combat Blessing
Skill1.Comment: All friendlies get AT+5 this turn, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The color green is naturally playful, don't you think?'
FlavorText.Text2: A gem beast with a green stone in its brow.  Legends say that when this stone shines, it enhances the strength of its master's mind.

Skill0.Name: Instant Revival
Skill0.Comment: Revive one closed unit of level 4 or below.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's a miracle from the heavens.'
FlavorText.Text2: The priests of the Solar Kingdom wield many miracles, but this is by far the least understood. It can return the soul to the body after death.

Soul.Name: Defend at All Costs
Soul.Comment: Increase your Refess level by 2. Increase your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Fight of the Bodyguard
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+DF] to one random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Identify yourself!'
FlavorText.Text2: Specially trained bodyguards who protect the royalty of the Solar Kingdom. Their power rivals that of the strongest assault knights, but their true potential only manifests when they are protecting others.

Soul.Name: Fire of Faith
Soul.Comment: Increase your Refess level by 2. Increase your Gowen level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Healing Spell
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly unit heals 30 HP.

Skill1.Name: Back From the Darkness
Skill1.Comment: Revive one friendly Lawtia unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The wounded receive the protection of the clergy.'
FlavorText.Text2: A corps of priests who wield the holy power of healing on the battlefield. Soldiers can continue fighting thanks to their willingness to stand by them in the terrible darkness of war.

Soul.Name: Dance of the Wind
Soul.Comment: Increase your Refess level by 2. Increase your Falkow level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Sword Dancer
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Strength is one thing, but it's technique that wins battles.'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman who fights in the regular armies of the Solar Kingdom. She equips swords in both hands, and fights as if dancing.

Soul.Name: Shadow of Wings
Soul.Comment: One friendly Refess unit gets HP+10, and then all friendly Lawtia units gets AT+30.

Skill0.Name: Winged Charge
Skill0.Comment: All friendly Falkow units get AT+20.

Skill1.Name: Mounted Combat
Skill1.Comment: The unit in front of this unit gets DF+10 for this turn. The unit behind this unit gets AT+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Why did the gods create magical animals?'
FlavorText.Text2: A white horse with huge wings on its back.  It uses its wings to fly in the sky, and has a natural affinity with avians and magic power.

Skill0.Name: Holy Shield
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets [DF+ your SP x5].

FlavorText.Text1: 'A shield spell is only as good as the power of the magic behind it.'
FlavorText.Text2: This creates an enormous magic shield. Its strength is proportional to the power of the spellcaster.

Soul.Name: Echo of the Soul
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia 6 or higher] Send target disengaged enemy to the Cemetery. Set your Lawtia to 0.

Skill0.Name: Purifying the Battlefield
Skill0.Comment: Set your Gowen to 3.

Skill1.Name: Soul of the Proxy
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets [AT+ your Lawtia X10] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'When the Proxy of Light appeared, the inherent balance of all things spontaneously summoned the Proxy of Soul in response.'
FlavorText.Text2: This is the entity of Lawtia that appeared after the world's balance of magical power collapsed. Legend has it that it exists only as as the opposite of the Proxy of Light. It is an incarnation of destruction.

Soul.Name: Might of the Divine Shield
Soul.Comment: Two friendly units get [AT+ number of cards in your Cemetery X 5].

Skill0.Name: Divine Shield Wock
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get [AT+ your SP X 5].

FlavorText.Text1: 'My shield is not to protect others. I live only to fight.'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight endowed with Wock, a shield said to be made by a god of old. He uses the great powers of his shield to spread conflict across the world. Also, he awaits the arrival of Garfath, the Right-hand Shield.

Soul.Name: The Reflection of a Soul
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia lvl 3 or higher] Do [damage: 50] to two  random disengaged enemy units. Decrease Lawtia level by 3.

Skill0.Name: Magic Mirror
Skill0.Comment: Select one enemy unit. Subtract 50% of target's MAX HP directly from the HP of the unit.

Skill1.Name: Image Reflection
Skill1.Comment: Select two units, except this unit. The second unit gets [AT= first unit's AT] and [AGI= first unit's AGI] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Only I can master Aegis, for it is an artifact of pure magic.'
FlavorText.Text2: A boy magician who has become bonded to the ancient magic mirror, Aegis. Guided by the machinations of Annarose, he appears in Crest.

Soul.Name: Nightwalker's Magic Sword
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia lvl 3 or higher] Do [damage: 50] to two random disengaged enemy units. Decrease Lawtia level by 3.

Skill0.Name: Shadow Slash
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Subtract AT directly from the HP from one random enemy unit within range.

Skill1.Name: Double Attack
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT 50%] to 2 random enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The nighttime is the right time, for me.'
FlavorText.Text2: It is said that if you've caught a glimpse of this man, it's already too late to get away. To gain the power to destroy the wicked beings of this world, he embraced the darkness.

Skill0.Name: Punishment Hole
Skill0.Comment: No card in either Iczers' Card File may be Set next turn or the turn after, except Gowen cards.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's a hole for your soul.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell that creates a pit deep into the earth of Lavato that can swallow up anything, even the minds of its victims. However, using this magic can warp the caster's mind and twist his thoughts.

Soul.Name: Free the Spirit of Darkness
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT=999 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Employ: Shade
Skill0.Comment: Rival Iczer gets SP-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Can you overcome my techniques? I can control the darkness in all things.'
FlavorText.Text2: Mage swordswomen excelling in the use of Shades. They wield the power of the Shades as if it were their own. This is a path for those with strong will who can look into the deepest darkness and not lose themselves.

Soul.Name: Duties of the Paladin
Soul.Comment: Two random friendly units get AT+20 and DF+10.

Skill0.Name: Unholy Sword
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Duchy of Crest] units get AT+20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Slash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Crest paladins obtain a power that comes with evil strings attached.'
FlavorText.Text2: The paladins of Crest. Even though these knights carry the official title of 'Holy Knight,' the power they wield is tainted with corruption.

Soul.Name: Pile of Rotting Meat
Soul.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT=1->99, AGI=1->5 and RNG=1->3.

Skill0.Name: Living Dead
Skill0.Comment: Fully restore HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'They say it was a Holy Dragon. If that was true... it's not anymore.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the legendary Dragon Kin, the most powerful type of creatures on Lavato. This is a Holy Dragon, its body distorted and consumed by an ancient curse, and now it's not even permitted to die.

Soul.Name: Lethal Contagion
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Lawtia lvl X 10] to one random enemy unit. Do [damage: your Gowen lvl X 10] to target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Dark Hunger
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit gets AT+40 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: 3rd Stage: Body of the Deep
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Do [damage: AT 50%] to a random enemy unit in range. Send a Grimoire from rival Iczer's card file to Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Once the disease takes hold, you'll be desperate to get back to the water.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world. Dagon is an aggressive condition associated with water. Once the victim is infected, he or she will flee to the ocean or the nearest river.  His presence will also twist and corrupt the natural flow of magic in the area, tempting local wizards to delve into forbidden magics.

Skill0.Name: Warning Knife
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets MAX HP=10, HP=10, AT+20, AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ahh, you mean THAT knife. I'd stay away from it if I were you.'
FlavorText.Text2: A dagger with the demonic power to siphon its user's hatred into its hilt and out through the blade like a poison. It's said this venom can even poison a soul.

Soul.Name: Dark Discipline
Soul.Comment: Increase your Lawtia level by 2. Increase your Refess level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Honor of a Dying Man
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Get them before they get you. That's the motto of our squad.'
FlavorText.Text2: Crest-employed soldiers who fight with specially designed halberds. Their pragmatic ideology allows them to ignore the so called rules of war and fight dirty when they have to. They are not the most feared division of the Crest army, but perhaps the most avoided.

Soul.Name: Power of the Swarm
Soul.Comment: Increase your Lawtia level by 2. Increase your Gowen level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Swarm
Skill0.Comment: All units of level 2 or below get AT+20 and AGI+2 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ain't much use to a dead man. But when they swarm, they'll get something out of him.'
FlavorText.Text2: Small, repulsive animals that eat corpses. Their appetites are so voracious, it only takes a moment before there's nothing left.

Soul.Name: Cursed Magic
Soul.Comment: Increase your Lawtia level by 2. Increase your Falkow  level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Ritual of Youth
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets HP=10, AT+20 and AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Heee... Heh, heh, heeee.'
FlavorText.Text2: A girl raised by druids. A life of vile curses has burned all manner of images into her mind, but she doesn't think of them as wicked. They are her life, and all she's ever known.

Soul.Name: Adequate Compensation
Soul.Comment: One friendly Lawtia unit gets AT+10, and then all friendly Gowen units get AT+20 and AGI+1.

Skill0.Name: Skillful Assassination
Skill0.Comment: Set target enemy character to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My skills are already good enough to do the job.'
FlavorText.Text2: A woman who aims to become an assassin in order to survive in the world of shadows. The techniques of her mentor are unrivaled, and she learned everything she could.

Skill0.Name: Criminal Edge
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: number cards in rival Iczer's Cemetery X 5] to target unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'People can never escape their own crimes.'
FlavorText.Text2: This spell amplifies a person's criminal mind, tearing him apart from the inside. The greater his crimes, the more terrifying the result.

Soul.Name: The Scorching
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen 6 or higher] Send target disengaged enemy to the cemetery. Set your Gowen to 0.

Skill0.Name: Submerge the Power
Skill0.Comment: Set your Falkow to 3.

Skill1.Name: Flame of the Proxy
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets [AT+ your Gowen X10] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'He appeared to burn away what was left behind from the battle between the Proxy of Light and the Proxy of Soul.'
FlavorText.Text2: This is the entity of Gowen that appeared after the world's balance of magical power collapsed. It only looked on as the Proxies of Light and Soul battled, and then cleaned up after them. It possesses the power to purify everything.

Soul.Name: Shield of Truth
Soul.Comment: Set all Sphere Levels of both Iczers to 0.

Skill0.Name: Fight to Protect
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: DF] to one random enemy unit within range. This unit gets DF-10.

Skill1.Name: The Bond With Yuni
Skill1.Comment: Friendly [card: Gunner Girl / Yuni] gets DF+20 for this turn and LV+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You'll have to cut through my cloak before you reach me. But I'll warn you, it's no easy task.'
FlavorText.Text2: A close friend of the Gun Princess, and she has sworn to protect her. She is wrapped in the protective cloth, Calkul, which defends against any and all attacks.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Brutal Pounding
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 3 or higher] Do [damage: 50] to two random disengaged enemy units. Decrease Gowen level by 3.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +10.

Skill0.Name: Violent Pounding
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: 30] to two random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What's the matter, huh?  Weren't you gonna get me?'
FlavorText.Text2: A natural prodigy at unarmed fighting who has earned the name 'the Mad Beast.' He doesn't so much practice martial arts, as he does unleash mayhem. He lives by his instincts, like a wild man.

Soul.Name: The Magician's Revenge
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to two enemy units. Two random enemy units get AGI-2.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Learning of the Magician
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get LV+2.

Skill1.Name: Magic Blast
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh?  Do you want something of me?'
FlavorText.Text2: A wandering mage. Her power is great, and she's considerably famous amongst magic users. However, her difficult personality makes her a hard woman to handle.

Skill0.Name: Falkow Pike
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: number of friendly Falkow units X 20] to target column of enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This magic was a big hit in the Wizard Kingdom.'
FlavorText.Text2: To find new magic spells that could be quickly and easily used in combat, wizards from the Mercenary Nation studied in Regus. What they brought back let them channel the destructive force of magic energy on the battlefield.

Soul.Name: Lightning Speed
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AGI=99 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Shoot-out
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The quick draw's faster than a sword, and the range advantage ain't bad, either.'
FlavorText.Text2: The gun is out in an instant, and the target is shot. They don't call it quick draw for nothing.

Soul.Name: Tribe of Hunters
