Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen lvl X 10] to one random enemy unit. Do [damage: your Falkow lvl X 10] to target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Tribe of Fighters
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: warrior] units get AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Lancer
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Nobody knows any details about them, but they're good in a fight. That's for sure.'
FlavorText.Text2: An all-female tribe that settled deep in the jungle. The stuff of rumors and tall tales, their combat prowess lets them cut down highly trained armies in no time.

Soul.Name: Casualties of the Hunt
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 10->60] to one random enemy unit. This effect is repeated three times.

Skill0.Name: Freikugel
Skill0.Comment: Target enemy unit of DF 1 or higher gets AT-20, DF=0 and AGI-2.

Skill1.Name: Dark Hunter's Freikugel
Skill1.Comment: Set one friendly Lawtia unit to HP=0. And then, set one enemy unit within range to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'No target can evade the power of my Freikugel!'
FlavorText.Text2: A user of special thrown weapons called the 'Freikugel.' It is said that to use them, one must make a deal with a dark power.

Soul.Name: Swallow Whole
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: Gowen X 10] to target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Burst From the Ground
Skill0.Comment: Decrease your Gowen level by 1. You get 2 SP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It just blasted up through the earth under my feet.'
FlavorText.Text2: A giant serpent that lurks underground. It can sense what is above through its connection to the magic of the world, then it appears directly below its prey and swallows it whole.

Skill0.Name: Sword of Mysteries
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: priest] units get AT+30.

FlavorText.Text1: 'When burning fire radiates a holy light, it becomes the flame of purification.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell that surrounds a weapon with a mysterious divine fire. Its destructive power is magnified by the piety of the one carrying it.

Soul.Name: History of Battle
Soul.Comment: Increase your Gowen level by 2. Increase your Refess level by 1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets DF +10.

Skill0.Name: The Higher the Fee
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets Lv+1, AT+20 and DF+5. Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I only do what I'm paid to. No more, no less, got it?'
FlavorText.Text2: True mercenaries only do exactly the work they're paid for. In fact, it is said that the higher the fee, the physically stronger the true mercenary gets.

Soul.Name: What it Takes to Succeed
Soul.Comment: Increase your Gowen level by 2. Increase your Lawtia level by 1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up

FlavorText.Text2: A young man who traveled to the royal city in the hopes of becoming a knight like his father. His power is still untested, but with enough experience he will become strong enough to handle anything.

Soul.Name: The Voice of the Wind
Soul.Comment: Increase your Gowen level by 2. Increase your Falkow level by 1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, RNG +1.

Skill0.Name: Slash
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Can you keep up with my Iaijutsu sword draw?'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman from a country far to the east.  Since the samurai Thunderbolt came to the Continent, the reputation of Eastern techniques has been spreading.

Soul.Name: Flying Charge
Soul.Comment: One friendly Gowen unit gets AT+10, and then all friendly Falkow units get AT+10 and AGI+2.

Skill0.Name: Suicide Bombardment
Skill0.Comment: Send this unit to the Cemetery.  Do [damage: this unit's MAX HP] to target column of enemy units.

FlavorText.Text2: Large insects that fly at high speeds, filling anything in their path with holes. Either nature or magic has refined their form for assault.

Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 5 or higher] Subtract 20 directly from the HP of all enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The ball of flame explodes and does widespread damage.'
FlavorText.Text2: An intermediate spell that creates a ball of flame. The initial damage is nothing impressive, but it's designed to quickly start fires. The spreading flames have been known to destroy entire towns.

Soul.Name: Wash into the Seas
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow lvl 6 or higher] Send one disengaged enemy unit to the Cemetery. Set your Falkow level to 0.

Skill0.Comment: Set your Refess to 3.

Skill1.Comment: This unit gets [AT+ your Falkow X10] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The last Proxy arrived to resuscitate the world.'
FlavorText.Text2: This is the entity of Falkow that appeared after the world's balance of magical power collapsed. It is the final Proxy, who appeared to submerge the intense power of the Proxies and restore the balance.

Soul.Name: Song of Another World
Soul.Comment: Set all your Sphere Levels to 2.

Skill0.Name: Pure Hymn
Skill0.Comment: Engage all enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My hymn will break you...'
FlavorText.Text2: In this world, there are beings disconnected from the limitations of mundane living things. They are known as Mazoku. Gospel is a Mazoku with an aptitude for what she calls 'the art called the hymn.'  She's investigating the art of human music, but when she sings, it drives terror into the hearts of all who hear.

FlavorText.Text2: A sorceress who controls flame spells, which are forbidden in the Wizard Kingdom. Her mastery of her craft is overwhelming, and even Efreets bow to her will.

Soul.Name: Unpredictable Trap
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow lvl 3 or higher] Do [damage: 50] to two random disengaged enemy units. Decrease Falkow level by 3.

Skill0.Name: Aurora
Skill0.Comment: Revive all units that are not Falkow units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It was an irregular surge of power, generated by equal magic forces crashing into each other.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell that brings forth a rift in space and time by intentionally colliding huge waves of magical power.

Soul.Name: Magic Arms and Armor

Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Wizard Kingdom] units get AGI+2 for this turn.

Soul.Name: Lance of Light
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Falkow lvl X 10] to one random enemy unit. Do [damage: your Refess lvl X 10] to target disengaged enemy unit.

Soul.Name: Creature of the Deep
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get DF=0.

FlavorText.Text2: A colossal monster that lives in the deepest oceans. It's so big, it is often mistaken for an island. Simply by moving, it can cause tremendous waves that swallow up local fishermen.

Soul.Name: Clipped Wings
Soul.Comment: All enemy units get RNG=0 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Carried Off
Skill0.Comment: Return one friendly unit to your Card File.

Skill0.Comment: Engage all units of AGI 3 or higher and give them AGI-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This magic is quite complicated and powerful. I just make it look easy.'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic that instantly freezes all the moisture in the air. It can quickly put on ice even the most nimble of enemies.

Soul.Name: Symphony No. 6
Soul.Comment: One friendly Falkow unit gets AGI+1, and then all friendly Refess units get AT+10 and DF+10.

Skill0.Name: Melody of the Pure Wind
Skill0.Comment: Two friendly Refess units get AT+20 and DF+10 for this turn.

Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: number of friendly Gowen units X 30] to two random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Using fire magic isn't considered good in the Wizard Kingdom. Because it's truly, truly, truly outrageous!'
FlavorText.Text2: On April 1, 2009, a licensing mishap left Alteil without the rights to all its artwork for one day. The GM's tapped their artistic skills and stayed up all night to redrew every card so the game could go on.

Soul.Name: Creature of the Deep
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get DF=0.

Skill0.Name: Living Island
Skill0.Comment: Return one random card of AGI 2 or lower to its Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Looking for the demon of the deep? I think it's that little orange fish.'
FlavorText.Text2: On April 1, 2009, a licensing mishap left Alteil without the rights to all its artwork for one day. The GM's tapped their artistic skills and stayed up all night to redrew every card so the game could go on.

FlavorText.Text1: 'At Level 10, you unlock all four starters and begin a new leg of your journey as an Iczer.'
FlavorText.Text2: You've unlocked all four starters! The next time you go to the Card File Editor, you'll see three additional starters added to your collection. Congratulations!

Soul.Name: Words of Oracle
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to a random enemy unit. Give DF+5 to all friendly units.

Skill0.Name: Rune of Defense
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+10 for this turn.  One friendly unit gets DF+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Combat Blessing
Skill1.Comment: All friendlies get AT+5 this turn, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's a terrible thing to hearken their words.  They're not words of welcome.  They're curses.'
FlavorText.Text2: Priests who practice the secret art of the True Way.  This art imparts various powers through nothing more than a simple word.

Skill0.Name: Blessing
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets MAX HP+20, HP+20, AT+10, DF+5, and cannot be targeted or randomly selected by other cards' send to Cemetery effects until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The blessings of the gods come in many forms.'
FlavorText.Text2: A miraculous power that bestows a holy blessing.  One who receives this divine protection can stand toe to toe with the heroes of the battlefield.

Soul.Name: Assign Folrart Deputies
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get DF=999 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Captain's Orders
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] units get AT+10 and DF+5 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Shield Breaker
Skill1.Comment: Set a random enemy in range to DF=0 and do [damage: AT] to it.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Yes!  My army is superior!  Charge!'
FlavorText.Text2: A captain who leads a band of knights in the Solar Kingdom. His prowess in battle has earned him respect even from the Paladins, but his most important attribute is his mind.

Soul.Name: Solar Spear
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a column of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Lancer
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Spear Knights are the very first to meet the enemy on the battlefield.'
FlavorText.Text2: Spear Knights serve as the Solar Kingdom's vanguard.  It's said that their grim black armor serves as warning of their conviction in battle.

Soul.Name: Dance of the Wind
Soul.Comment: Increase your Refess level by 2. Increase your Falkow level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Sword Dancer
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Strength is one thing, but it's technique that wins battles.'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman who fights in the regular armies of the Solar Kingdom. She equips swords in both hands, and fights as if dancing.

Skill0.Name: Recovery Powder
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+4. All friendlies are healed 10HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This simple application could sway the course of the war.'
FlavorText.Text2: A specially mixed wound-healing medicine.  Even though it only heals simple wounds, its ease of use and availability to every soldier strengthens the morale of the entire army.

Soul.Name: Profoundly Vile Curse
Soul.Comment: You get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: Sorcery
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets MAX HP=30, HP=30, AT=30, DF=0, AGI=2, and RNG=2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Maybe a long life is the greatest curse of all.'
FlavorText.Text2: One who has long made his living through sorcery.  He's dealt with all kinds of spells, and uses them only to bring pain and suffering to others.  But he does not know his own time of death, so he lives his days in fear.

Soul.Name: Silvery Cord
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Cutting the Cord
Skill0.Comment: Set target engaged enemy unit within range to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Giving the gift of death is too easy.'
FlavorText.Text2: Members of a clan known as the Death Lords.  It's said they're able to see the silvery cord connecting human souls to their vessels.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: The Ogre's Obstinance
Soul.Comment: Revive one closed friendly unit, and then do [damage:40] to target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Triple Attack
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to three random enemy units.

Skill1.Name: Instincts of the Oni
Skill1.Comment: Choose one enemy unit.  For this turn, this unit gets AT + ten times the level of the chosen unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Humans are so fragile.  I wonder how much longer before they're completely wiped out?  Guh hya hya hya hya!'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the rare Oni race.  He tears apart humans casually, for his own amusement and nothing more.

Soul.Name: Free the Spirit of Darkness
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT=999 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Employ: Shade
Skill0.Comment: Rival Iczer gets SP-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Can you overcome my techniques? I can control the darkness in all things.'
FlavorText.Text2: Mage swordswomen excelling in the use of Shades. They wield the power of the Shades as if it were their own. This is a path for those with strong will who can look into the deepest darkness and not lose themselves.

Skill0.Name: Warning Knife
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets MAX HP=10, HP=10, AT+20, AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ahh, you mean THAT knife. I'd stay away from it if I were you.'
FlavorText.Text2: A dagger with the demonic power to siphon its user's hatred into its hilt and out through the blade like a poison. It's said this venom can even poison a soul.

Soul.Name: Power of the Swarm
Soul.Comment: Increase your Lawtia level by 2. Increase your Gowen level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Swarm
Skill0.Comment: All units of level 2 or below get AT+20 and AGI+2 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ain't much use to a dead man. But when they swarm, they'll get something out of him.'
FlavorText.Text2: Small, repulsive animals that eat corpses. Their appetites are so voracious, it only takes a moment before there's nothing left.

Skill0.Name: Life Conversion
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets HP+30.  One enemy unit gets HP-30.

FlavorText.Text1: 'So, shall we drink from some lively child?'
FlavorText.Text2: A forbidden spell for stealing life energy.  Because the procedure is simple and helpless sources of life energy are easy to come by, there are many who still use it.

Soul.Name: Wall of Trees
Soul.Comment: Increase your Gowen level by 3.

Skill0.Name: Employ: Dryad
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets DF+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Let me introduce my adorable servant.'
FlavorText.Text2: Swordsmen excelling in the use of wood spirits.  They use the power of the Dryads as if it was their own.  This is a path only for those with the drive to protect others.

Soul.Name: Departing Shot
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your SP x 15] to one enemy unit.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Lancer
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemies in range.

Skill1.Name: Slaying Arrow
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/after rank up]  Set one random disengaged enemy unit to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Until the target appears, I will remain as still as a statue.'
FlavorText.Text2: An archer who falls into the assassin camp.  To be sure to kill the intended target, she never moves from her attack point once she's chosen it.  Not picky about the target, she'll take any job even if it means killing the elderly or children.

Soul.Name: Overflowing Appetite
Soul.Comment: One random unit card from your Card File is removed from the game.

Skill0.Name: Uncontrollable Urge
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of a random enemy unit within range. This unit becomes engaged.

FlavorText.Text1: 'These things bring trouble wherever they go.'
FlavorText.Text2: A monster that looks like a humanoid pig.  It is not very intelligent, and its only instinct is to consume everything.

Soul.Name: Home Turf
Soul.Comment: Two friendly units get AT+20 and DF+10.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +20.

Skill0.Name: Penetrate
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT from the HP of a random enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I polished my skills in the mountains, and there I can outfight any man.'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of a clan that survives by hunting in mountainous areas.  They can move nimbly and engage their enemies even in areas with poor footing.

Soul.Name: Swallow Whole
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: Gowen X 10] to target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Burst From the Ground
Skill0.Comment: Decrease your Gowen level by 1. You get 2 SP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It just blasted up through the earth under my feet.'
FlavorText.Text2: A giant serpent that lurks underground. It can sense what is above through its connection to the magic of the world, then it appears directly below its prey and swallows it whole.

Soul.Name: The Voice of the Wind
Soul.Comment: Increase your Gowen level by 2. Increase your Falkow level by 1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, RNG +1.

Skill0.Name: Slash
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Can you keep up with my Iaijutsu sword draw?'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman from a country far to the east.  Since the samurai Thunderbolt came to the Continent, the reputation of Eastern techniques has been spreading.

Skill0.Name: Healing
Skill0.Comment: Recover 25% of MAX HP.

Skill1.Name: Gulping Jaws
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 30 directly from the HP of an engaged enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'No way around it, that's a big lizard.'
FlavorText.Text2: A giant lizard, many times the size of a man.  With its giant mouth it swallows everything whole, even humans.  Then it slowly digests them internally.

Soul.Name: Weapon of Magic Power
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your SP x 15] to one enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Strength Enchantment
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+[this unit's AGI X 5] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Stealth Enchantment
Skill1.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+10 and RNG+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh weapon, bring forth your true power...'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic users who enhance weapons through enchantment spells.  Their magic provides a great advantage in battle.  Those who doubt that may not live to regret it.

Soul.Name: Allure of the Water Spirit
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Falkow level x 10] to a column of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Employ: Undine
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets RNG-2 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come forth, Undines.  I ask you to confine my enemies.'
FlavorText.Text2: Swordsmen excelling in the use of water spirits.  They use the power of the Undines as if it was their own.  This is a path only for those calm and collected enough to carefully assess situations.

Soul.Name: Purity of the Blade
Soul.Comment: Increase your Falkow level by 2. Increase your Refess level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Enchanted Rapier
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets [AT+ AGI X 10] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This is as far as you go.'
FlavorText.Text2: These are the pure sword masters of the Wizard Kingdom, among the most respected in Lavato. With a lightning-fast lunge, a fencer can impale the enemy before he gets the chance to move.

Soul.Name: Spiral Squall
Soul.Comment: Do [damage:30] to all units with AGI 3 or higher.

Skill0.Name: Flying Attack
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy.

Skill1.Name: Take Flight
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AGI 6 or higher] This unit gets AT+10 and RNG+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'As long as the sky is here, I'll have a friend to keep me in good spirits!'
FlavorText.Text2: The flying scouts of the Wizard Kingdom.  Their quickness is unmatched throughout the lands.

Skill0.Name: Refuge
Skill0.Comment: Return one closed friendly unit to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Let's just consider ourselves lucky if we manage to get away.'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic designed to help your comrades escape. Thanks to this power, the most difficult and dangerous places can be teleported out of.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Some things that are insignificant can gain unimaginable power in numbers...'
FlavorText.Text2:
10 Point Cards = Your choice Rarity 1 card
20 Point Cards = Your choice Rarity 2 card
30 Point Cards = Your choice Rarity 3 card
50 Point Cards = Your choice Rarity 4 card
60 Point Cards = Your choice Rarity 5 card

Soul.Name: Great Crimson Radiance
Soul.Comment: Revive all closed friendly [subtype: Carbuncle] units. All friendly [subtype: Carbuncle] units get MAX HP+10 and HP+10.

Skill0.Name: Might of the General
Skill0.Comment: Choose one friendly [subtype: Carbuncle] unit, except this unit. Do [damage: AT of this unit +HP of chosen unit] to random enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Great Ruby Radiance
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Carbuncle] units heal 15 HP and get DF+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Legends tell of a carbuncle that even dragons avoid.'
FlavorText.Text2: Many who see this gem beast believe he is the legendary carbuncle who, in the old stories, survived a great battle against dragons. He is known to be a servant of â€˜The One Gem.â€™ The scars on his body and ruby serve as a testament to all the battles he has fought.

Soul.Name: Anger of the Divine Shield
Soul.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+20, DF+20, and RNG-1.

Skill0.Name: Static Shield
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets DF+20 for one turn and RNG -1.

Skill1.Name: Shield Discharge
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one random enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My other half must be stopped. That is my indiscretion.'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight endowed with Roahn, a shield said to be made by a god of old. He's on a journey to find the one he calls his other half, Kafhar the Left-hand Shield.

Soul.Name: Mass Decapitation
Soul.Comment: Subtract 50 directly from the HP of three random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Maiden of Battle
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT=[AT-DF]x3 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Scythes: Fear and Despair
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AT 150 or higher] Subtract AT directly from the HP of two random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Here we go! Victory for Miss Eskatia!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the three commanders of the armies of the Duchy of Crest. Abyss Centaur Dical himself acknowledged her fighting strength and talent in battle. He promoted her to commander personally. She's proud to serve and fight for Eskatia.

Soul.Name: One Life, Two Deaths
Soul.Comment: Do [Damage: 40] to one random friendly unit. Do [Damage: 50] to two random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: The Dance Macabre
Skill0.Comment: Select one friendly [subtype: assassin]. Switch the current HP of that unit and target enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It wasn't easy to get this information, you know... Oh donâ€™t worry about the informant. Heâ€™s been taken good care of...'
FlavorText.Text2: A spy who answers only to Annarose. She poses as a dancer to get close to high-ranking officials in different principalities and collect information. It also helps her achieve her ultimate purpose, assassination.

Soul.Name: Contagious Hatred
Soul.Comment: All units get AT=999 and AGI=3 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Discharge of Pure Hate
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 9] Subtract this unit's MAX HP from the HP of all units, except this unit. Send this unit to the Cemetery.

Skill1.Name: Flame of True Hatred
Skill1.Comment: Subtract your Gowen level x 10 from this unit's MAX HP. This unit gets AT + your Gowen level x 10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I will... I must... kill... Kill him...'
FlavorText.Text2: A mysterious man who always appears wearing full armor. He's been spotted in several countries that border on a great wasteland known as the Grand Surface. Rumor has it that he was once a knight of the Solar Kingdom, who made a pact with an evil force from beyond Lavato to obtain the power to avenge his wife and child.

Soul.Name: Carpet of Flames
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to all disengaged units.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Ignorance of the Masses
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 6 or higher] All friendly units get LV=1 and all enemy units get LV -1.

Skill1.Name: Exploding Blast
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to all enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh?  Do you want something of me?'
FlavorText.Text2: A wandering mage. Her power is great, and she's considerably famous amongst magic users. However, her difficult personality makes her a hard woman to handle.

Soul.Name: Whoopsie!
Soul.Comment: Move all units on enemy field randomly.

Skill0.Name: Huh?
Skill0.Comment: Move all units on both sides of the field randomly.

Skill1.Name: Well, that's strange...
Skill1.Comment: Move all units on enemy field randomly.

Skill2.Name: Oops, I messed up again...
Skill2.Comment: Move units on both sides of the field from [area: 1-2-3] to [area: 7-8-9], and from [area: 7-8-9] to [area: 1-2-3].

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's working! There, all set... Wh-What!? Nooooooo!'
FlavorText.Text2: A master class wizardress from the Wizard Kingdom. She is the leading expert in manipulating space, flying and teleportation. However, anyone who has heard about her keeps to a safe distance. She is capable of wonderful magic, but because of her natural tendencies, she fails to use it correctly most of the time.

Soul.Name: Song of Rebirth
Soul.Comment: Return one closed friendly unit of your choice to your Card File and then, return one random enemy unit to its Card File.

Skill0.Name: Hymn of Divinity
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Change battletime to noon.

Skill1.Name: Hymn of Sorrow
Skill1.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My hymn will break you...'
FlavorText.Text2: In this world, there are beings disconnected from the limitations of mundane living things. They are known as Mazoku. Gospel is a Mazoku with an aptitude for what she calls 'the art called the hymn.'  She's investigating the art of human music, but when she sings, it drives terror into the hearts of all who hear.

Soul.Name: Imbalance of Light
Soul.Comment: Increase each Iczer's SP by the number of cards in each Iczer's Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Imbalance of Power
Skill0.Comment: Increase both Iczer's SP by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The duty of the Beasts is to protect me.'
FlavorText.Text2: She betrayed the Envoy of Chaos, Elgandi, who controls the Duchy of Crest from the shadows. Now, she's come to spread the truth about him along with three Beasts who protect her. After being taken into custody in Folrart, she was hidden in an ancient shrine called the Holy Realm.

Soul.Name: Pomp and Circumstance
Soul.Comment: Send one friendly unit to the Cemetery, and then increase your SP by 4.

Skill0.Name: Roar of the Sun
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Rival has 0 units in his Cemetery] All enemy units get AT returned to base value. Engage one random enemy of AGI 4 or higher.

Skill1.Name: May the Dead Rest
Skill1.Comment: Remove from the game three random cards from rival Iczer’s Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Great.  Even Orthos showed up...' -Belfyna
FlavorText.Text2: One of the three Beasts escorting and protecting the Fallen Moon Child, Miffyre. His roar alone can send the weak-hearted to their knees.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Death to the Heretics
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+60, DF+60 and AGI-5 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Hammer of Justice
Skill0.Comment: Do damage [AT + number of friendly units x 10] to one random enemy unit within range.

Skill1.Name: Revival
Skill1.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's to safeguard the Holy Realm? Of course I'll help you.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the inquisitors from the Church of the True God. During times of peace, she works to make life miserable for the Shrine Knights. She and their leader, Lapierre, are on the same level, but they fight like cats and dogs.

Soul.Name: Gleaming Blade Almira
Soul.Comment: Return three random Refess cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Ready... (Blinding Strike)
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT X 2 and AGI = 1.

Skill1.Name: Duel! (Blinding Strike)
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit's AGI=1] Do damage 40 to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Knights of the Second Shrine, prepare to move out. Your enemies are the Duchy of Crest and Lady Belfyna.'
FlavorText.Text2: The leader of the second unit of Folrart's most famous knights, the Shrine Knights. Her eyes stay cold in the heat of battle, earning her the nickname â€œIce Ladyâ€. She idolizes her superior, Lapierre, a source of endless gossip amongst her knights.

Skill0.Name: Mirror of Light
Skill0.Comment: Select 1 enemy. A friendly Refess unit gets [MAX HP=1st unit's MAX HP], [AT=1st unit's AT] [AGI=1st unit's AGI], and recovers HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This mirror reflects more than just what looks into it.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell that bends light and creates a copy of what it reflects. The created copy harbors a deep hatred for its original.

Soul.Name: Final Charge
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Refess level X 5] to three random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: The Cavalry Arrives
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+30] to one engaged enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Don't hold back just because the enemy's full of women! Let's go!'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight of Folrart. With lance in hand he assaults the enemy, his goal is to destroy the enemy's formation by charging through the front lines and eliminating captains and archers.

Soul.Name: Quality of Light
Soul.Comment: All units heal 20 HP.

Skill0.Name: The Grace of Light
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Refess lvl 3 or higher] All friendly units get DF+5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Follow us! We have the protection of Refess! Don't let the enemy close to the Holy Realm!'
FlavorText.Text2: A special division of Folrart knights assigned to protect the shrine called the Holy Realm. They don't follow the True God Church, but are part of an order that still worships Refess, the goddess who governs light and the stars.

Soul.Name: Solar Arrow
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 10] and engage a row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Healing Arrow
Skill1.Comment: One friendly unit heals 30 HP and becomes engaged.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Second wave of enemy troops in range. Fire!'
FlavorText.Text2: Elite magic archers fielded by the Kingdom of Folrart. Their magic arrows can wound the enemy or even heal allies.

Soul.Name: Diamond Sparkle
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Send one random Character from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Facet Refraction
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AGI+ AGI of target friendly [subtype: carbuncle] unit for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Diamond Clarity
Skill1.Comment: All enemy units of AT40 or higher get AT-10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A Carbuncle stands in our way? This should be cute.' - Belfyna
FlavorText.Text2: A gem beast with a clear jewel in its forehead. This creature's power has become the stuff of legends. It is said that when the gem releases a blinding light, the world itself will tremble.

Skill0.Name: Sunbeam Cage
Skill0.Comment: All units except Refess units get RNG=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You'll use rays of light to capture us? Good luck with that.'
FlavorText.Text2: To contain the enemy, a magic spell creates a cage of light. However, it has no effect against those who are protected by the Sun.

Soul.Name: Blessed Enhancement
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to one enemy unit. Increase your SP by 1.

Skill0.Name: Blessed Enforcement
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets DF+30 for this turn. Remove from the game one random card from rival Iczer’s Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Our armor has been blessed by the oracles!'
FlavorText.Text2: Soldiers fielded by the kingdom of Folrart. Their armor is blessed by the oracles to protect them and drive away evil spirits.

Soul.Name: Rising Soul
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Send one random unit card from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Strike and Withdraw
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit. Return this card to its Card File.

Skill1.Name: Cavalry Arrives
Skill1.Comment: The first time this skill activates, you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'We've got to find the enemy before they find us! Keep looking!'
FlavorText.Text2: Flying troops fielded by the kingdom of Folrart. Their main purpose is to spot enemy troops, but if they must fight they will. With their flying ability, they are masters of flying in, striking, and then escaping.

Soul.Name: The Shadows Withdraw
Soul.Comment: Send three random Refess cards from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Alone in the Light
Skill0.Comment: Subtract [number of enemy units X 5] directly from the HP of this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Light creates many things, including shadows!'
FlavorText.Text2: A side effect of experimenting with powerful light spells, magic shadows are cast that can trap evil souls inside. Officially, doing such a thing on purpose is forbidden, but shadow monsters are used to protect churches all over the Solar Kingdom.

Soul.Name: Solar Strike
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to one enemy unit. Increase your SP by 1.

Skill0.Name: Devoted Healing
Skill0.Comment: Target one friendly Refess unit with HP 0 or lower, except this unit.  Target unit is fully healed.

Skill1.Name: Slash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'We cannot afford to lose this battle!'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight of the Solar Kingdom of Folrart. They fight with blessed swords and can also use healing magic. They are well known for their willingness to sacrifice themselves to protect others.

Skill0.Name: Shield the Weak
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units of level 2 or below get DF+30 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, run! Run, my boy!'
FlavorText.Text2: A divine shield that protects the weak. It's created by the merciful love of the oracles.

Soul.Name: Soul Shaking Roar
Soul.Comment: Set rival Iczer's SP to 1.

Skill0.Name: Roar of the King
Skill0.Comment: Send three random cards from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I will serve you until the day I die. But, I welcome the chance to face the one who pursues me.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the three Beasts that protect Fallen Moon Child Miffyre. He is the leader of the three beasts, and people call him the Beast King. He is very loyal and would never betray his master. Strangely, he is looking forward to meeting Rivera, who's been pursuing him on a quest to avenge her family.

Soul.Name: The Beast's Fury
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one disengaged enemy unit. Rival gets SP-1.

Skill0.Name: Roar of the Shadows
Skill0.Comment: Engage one random enemy unit of level 4 or below.

Skill1.Name: Double Fang Strike
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The appearance of Belus can make the enemy lay down his arms.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the three Beasts that protect Fallen Moon Child Miffyre. Belus is the most calm and logical of the three, however his terrifying appearance can paralyze all but the most powerful enemy in fear.

Soul.Name: Wounding Hands
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all units.

Skill0.Name: The Last Dance Macabre
Skill0.Comment: Target enemy unit gets HP=0. Target friendly unit gets HP=0, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It wasn't easy to get this information, you know... Oh donâ€™t worry about the informant. Heâ€™s been taken good care of...'
FlavorText.Text2: A spy who answers only to Annarose. She poses as a dancer to get close to high-ranking officials in different principalities and collect information. It also helps her achieve her ultimate purpose, assassination.

Soul.Name: Black Flame
Soul.Comment: Return three random Lawtia cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: A Witch's Kiss
Skill0.Comment: Target unit gets AT+10 and AGI+5.

Skill1.Name: The Fires of Hell
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: target unit's AGI X 10] to all units of AGI 6 or higher.

Skill2.Name: March Dolls into Battle
Skill2.Comment: All friendly [subtype: magic doll] units get AGI+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Get ready, girls. It's a direct order from Mistress Annarose. Kill the traitors hiding in the so-called 'Holy Realm' in Folrart.'
FlavorText.Text2: A noblewoman who works for the one who has been scheming behind the scenes in the Duchy of Crest, Annarose. She has the title of Lady Belfyna, and often appears at social events. However, her true duty is to lead suppression troops made up of Magic Dolls.

Skill0.Name: Soul Return
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Refess lvl 3 or higher] Return all unit cards in your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A lost soul is a terrible thing, unless you know how to use it.'
FlavorText.Text2: A lost spell that can collect souls in exchange for others. It is said that some Crest troops prepare sacrifices to bring back fallen comrades.

Soul.Name: Cursed Edge
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] and engage a row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Kill Until Dawn
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Set one enemy unit to HP=0. Change battletime to morning.

FlavorText.Text1: 'We must be able to kill with one strike, that's what makes us assassins.'
FlavorText.Text2: Assassins who are protected by the goddess of souls and death herself, Lawtia. They leave to do their grisly work when the moon rises, and do not return until dawn.

Soul.Name: Quick Lunge
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Lawtia level X 5] to three random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Double Attack
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT 50%] to 2 random enemies in range.

Skill1.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill1.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Target confirmed. Permission to activate acceleration device.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer. The ribbon on her dress is enchanted, it can snap out into a straight blade and harden instantly, to be used as a deadly weapon.

Rest.Name: Rest
Rest.Comment: [for Magic Doll -Heavy Shield-]  not recover her HP.

Soul.Name: Army of Dolls
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: magic doll] units get DF+20.

Skill0.Name: Bombardier Support
Skill0.Comment: The unit directly behind this unit gets AT+30 and AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: My Life is Unimportant
Skill1.Comment: This unit recovers no HP when using Rest.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Please hide, Miss Belfyna. We will take care of this.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer. Her assault capability is much weaker than other magic dolls. However, her willingness to take any attack allows the archers behind her to fire with abandon.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of a random enemy unit within range.

Soul.Name: In a Split Second
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: magic doll] units get AT+20 and AGI+1.

Skill0.Name: Expert Grappler
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, subtract AT directly from the HP of one random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The damage is superficial. Continue to attack.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer. She uses no weapons and is highly skilled in hand-to-hand combat.

Soul.Name: Shattered Wings
Soul.Comment: All enemy units get AT=0 and AGI=0 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: The Shape of Corruption
Skill0.Comment: Select one enemy unit of level 4 or below. Rival Iczer gets SP - [level of target card -1].

Skill1.Name: Night Wings
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Subtract one from rival Iczer's LP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'H-How the heck did a wyvern get in here!?'
FlavorText.Text2: A nocturnal wyvern that hunts all night. It's strangely well-tempered, and can even be tamed by humans.

Soul.Name: In Exchange for Life
Soul.Comment: Do [damage:20] and AT-5 to all enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Art of the Soulblades
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT+10 directly from the HP of two random enemy units within range. Subtract one from your LP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I can't let those Magic Dolls show me up.'
FlavorText.Text2: Swordswomen who fight with cursed magic swords that only show their true power by draining the soul of the wielder. These swords can only be used by women worthy enough to sacrifice themselves.

Soul.Name: Bound to Evil Spirits
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Subtract one from your LP.

Skill0.Name: Regenerate
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets DF=0, and fully recovers its HP.

Skill1.Name: The Enchantment Breaks
Skill1.Comment: Rival gets SP-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The armor is just a diversion! The spirit is somewhere else.'
FlavorText.Text2: Armor that is controlled by magic. It can only complete simple tasks, but if its source of magic is not cut off, it's almost unstoppable.

Soul.Name: Blade of Madness
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to all enemy units of HP 40 or higher.

Skill0.Name: The Cursed Sword
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random units, except this unit. This unit gets HP-10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'He's even killing people on our side!'
FlavorText.Text2: Swordsmen are used by the Duchy of Crest in their major offensives. A normal man is given a cursed sword, and when he draws the weapon he becomes a tool of slaughter. There is no way to stop him, so when the operation is over one of his fellows is assigned to kill him.

Soul.Name: Try Again
Soul.Comment: Send three random Lawtia cards from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Dangerous Impulse
Skill0.Comment: You get LP-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That Sumer... She sold me a defective product.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer. These types of magic dolls have an incomplete thought system and can backfire on their owners. Generally they are created by mistake, and destroyed immediately.

Skill0.Name: Curse Spell
Skill0.Comment: Engage one friendly unit and then, engage three enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The Word will bring you curses.'
FlavorText.Text2: The Word exists only to curse others. It is said that nothing can seal the Word's power.

Soul.Name: Revenge Accomplished
Soul.Comment: Return one closed friendly unit to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: This power... It can't be!
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 8 or higher] Send all cards in both Iczers' file to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That evil beast... The beast that took my family isn't far now!'
FlavorText.Text2: Rivera lives to avenge her family, which was attacked and eaten by a beast. The object of her hate is none other than Beast King Scarrion, who protects Miffyre. Rivera has yet to learn her true potential, or the power of her destiny.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Do [damage: AT + your SP X 5] to a random enemy unit within range.

Soul.Name: Everything is a Weapon
Soul.Comment: Send four random friendly units to the Cemetery. Subtract one from rival Iczer's LP.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Soul Rapier
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT + your SP X 5] to a random enemy unit within range.

Skill1.Name: The Bond With Yuni
Skill1.Comment: Friendly [card: Gunner Girl / Yuni] gets AGI+1 and RNG+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ooh, looks like a big battle. Princess! Fierte! Aren't you coming?'
FlavorText.Text2: A close associate of Gunner Girl Yuni. He is a skilled fencer and serves as her sword in battle. He loves war, and eagerly requested to join the Battle for the Holy Realm.

Soul.Name: A Single Sweep
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Slash
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

Skill1.Name: Red is the Color of Bravery
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this units's HP is 30 or lower] Do [damage AT X 2] to a row of enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll fight, but I don't like hurting girls...'
FlavorText.Text2: When he was young, he was just an unknown soldier. But after countless battles, he's grown up to be brave and powerful. He still uses the same sword as before, and can always be seen fighting on the front lines.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: God-like Speed
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+20 and AGI+6 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Legendary Strike
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of a column of enemy units within range.

Skill1.Name: Teaching of the Master
Skill1.Comment: One friendly [subtype: martial artist] unit gets +10 AT and +1 RNG for this turn, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Defending against my fist with armor? You have much to learn of kung fu.'
FlavorText.Text2: He is a legendary martial artist. His fist can punch through a mountainside, but his true value is what he can teach others.

Soul.Name: Child of the Trees
Soul.Comment: Return three random Gowen cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Wrath of Nature
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen level exactly 3] Increase your Gowen level by one.

Skill1.Name: Nature Heals its Own
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: monster] units heal 15 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I see... Mother Nature herself must protect this child from the other world.'
FlavorText.Text2: It's a mystery where this boy came from. The locals say he was born in the forest and raised by trees. He can hear the voice of the wind through the leaves, and his behavior can be very puzzling. It's not clear why he's decided to join the Battle for the Holy Realm.

Soul.Name: Call to War
Soul.Comment: All units get AT+20.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets HP +20, AT +20.

Skill0.Name: Coordinated Ambush
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+10 and DF+10. Send this unit to the Cemetery.

Skill1.Name: Reinforcements
Skill1.Comment: The first time this skill activates, target friendly [subtype: Mercenary Nation] gets DF+10 for this turn. And then, increase your Gowen level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This new sword gives me a purpose to fight.'
FlavorText.Text2: Once a mercenary, but now a soldier for Heierrat, a nation founded by Gunner Girl Yuni. The soldiers of this nation are not knights who hide behind armor or castle walls, they only carry their swords... swords given to them by Yuni herself.

Soul.Name: Armor of Gaia
Soul.Comment: All units heal 20 HP.

Skill0.Name: Sword of Gaia
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+ Gowen level X 5 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Thin the Ranks
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit within range. Send one unit card from rival Iczer's card file to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Gowen will protect me.'
FlavorText.Text2: Soldiers blessed by the forces of Gowen, the god of earth and fire. Their special swords and armors are unique throughout Lavato.

Soul.Name: Tiny Barrage
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen lvl X 5] to three random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Tiny Strike
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit within range. Send one Character card from rival Iczer's card file to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'We can't sit by anymore... Guide that child to the shrine of the Holy Realm!'
FlavorText.Text2: Palm-sized fairies who fight as warriors. An old folk tale says if you judge them by their size, they will burn the tips of your fingers in your sleep. In reality, they are much more dangerous.

Soul.Name: Peace of the Forest
Soul.Comment: All enemy units get AT=0 and AGI=0 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: The Trees Arise
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to all enemy units in [area: 7-8-9].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Tree Giants have begun to move. The balance of nature must be under threat.'
FlavorText.Text2: Some trees that have lived for great amounts time possess the will and power to become a Tree Giant. They usually ignore human wars. However, they will spring to life when the world itself is in danger.

Skill0.Name: Miracle Fruit
Skill0.Comment: Two target units get LV+3.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This fruit is the ambrosia of the gods.'
FlavorText.Text2: If the food of the gods is eaten by mortals, it has a profound effect on them.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: The Monks' Rebellion
Soul.Comment: One enemy unit gets AT-30. Subtract 1 from your LP.

Skill0.Name: Fruits of Training
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets [AT + number of [cardtype: Martial Artist] cards in your Cemetery X 10] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This gem gives me the power of my ancestors.'
FlavorText.Text2: These martial artists train for years to sync with special gems that enhance their powers. These gems are found deep in the earth, and are said to hold a portion of the power of Gowen himself.

Soul.Name: Soul of the Mercenary
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Send one random unit card from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Paid in Advance
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+10 and AGI=4. Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hey, people like us are human too, you know.'
FlavorText.Text2: A female swordsman who wanders from battle to battle. In times of war she appears, ready to fight and be paid well for it.

Soul.Name: Return to the Garden
Soul.Comment: Send three random Gowen cards from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Suffocating Constriction
Skill0.Comment: Return all engaged units in [area: 4-5-6] on both sides of the field to their Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, no! It's enormous!'
FlavorText.Text2: A serpent that hides deep in the forest. Entire armies have been divided by its resting coils, unable to reach each other.

Soul.Name: Magma Eruption
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Send one random Grimoire card from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Magma Meltdown
Skill0.Comment: Send one random card from rival Iczer's card file to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I hope it doesn't eat humans.'
FlavorText.Text2: A gigantic rock soldier formed in nature when discarded and broken arcane instruments meet fire and rock. Formed by nature, it acts as a force of nature and can be helpful or harmful.

Skill0.Name: River of Fire
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to all units in [area: 1-2-3] on both sides of the field.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You can't aim a lava flow. It goes where it wants.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell that causes volcanoes to erupt, used to rout enemy armies and destroy siege equipment. Just make sure your soldiers are out of the way first.

Soul.Name: Captured Wing
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit to its Card File, and then rival Iczer gets SP equal to the level of the chosen unit.

Skill0.Name: Wing on the Run
Skill0.Comment: Send a random Character from both Iczer's Card Files to the Cemetery.

Skill1.Name: Wing on the Chase
Skill1.Comment: Return a random Character from either side of the field to its Card File, except this Character.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Rivera, my mission is to guide you. Even if it costs me my life.'
FlavorText.Text2: A mysterious dragon that aids Rivera's revenge from the shadows. He swore to lead Rivera to the Battle for the Holy Realm no matter the cost. If he knows Rivera's true destiny, he will not speak of it.

Soul.Name: Return to the Ocean
Soul.Comment: Return one random closed friendly unit to its card file.

Skill0.Name: Wave Storm
Skill0.Comment: Return one unit lvl 3 or lower to its Card File. Do [damage: times you've invoked a Grimoire X 10] to a random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Vonderam, I would be reassured if I could get your help.' - Volfied
FlavorText.Text2: Living in the lightless depths of the ocean, he is known as the 'God of Seas.' He is connected to Volfied, but the truth behind this is unknown. At the great Battle for the Holy Realm, he controls the mermaids in order to prolong the battle between the Kingdom of Folrart and the Duchy of Crest.

Soul.Name: Release the Seal
Soul.Comment: Return three random Falkow cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Open the Sealed Book
Skill0.Comment: Send all Grimoire cards in your Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill1.Name: Turn to Page 16
Skill1.Comment: Return all Grimoire cards in your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This book... It's leading me to her.'
FlavorText.Text2: A young librarian in charge of the Magic Library in the Wizard Kingdom. She has a book that is said to hold all the magic of the world, but it is not so easy to use.

Soul.Name: Power of Regrowth
Soul.Comment: Target friendly unit fully recovers its HP, or is Revived.

Skill0.Name: Grow in Forest Soil
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 3 or higher] You get 4 SP. Decrease your Gowen level by one.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The forest is unhappy. I'm counting on you, Athira.'
FlavorText.Text2: A master class wizard from the Wizard Kingdom. She uses her magic to control nature and bring out the potential of its power.

Skill0.Name: Disjunction
Skill0.Comment: Return one unit level 5 or below to its Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That's enough out of you. Back where you came from.'
FlavorText.Text2: This is an ancient spell for destroying magic bonds specifically for disrupting summoning magic.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Sure Death 'Heaven's Gate: Release!'
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Falkow lvl X 5] to three random enemy units.

Skill1.Name: One-Inch Punch
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+ your SP X 5] to one random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll show you the results of my training!'
FlavorText.Text2: A division of martial artists who fight for the Wizard Kingdom. With magic spells, she can increase her attack power and her speed in an instant.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Spell: 'Hurricane Dance'
Soul.Comment: Revive all units in [area: 1-2-3], engage all units in [area: 4-5-6], and do [damage:20] to all units in [area: 7-8-9] on both sides of the field.

Skill0.Name: Spell of the Ocean Gods
Skill0.Comment: Return one random unit of LV 4 or higher to its Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I don't approve of interfering in human affairs, however...'
FlavorText.Text2: Aquamancers are extremely powerful wizards protected by Vonderam, sent join the Battle for the Holy Realm. Her magic uses different principles than the magic of humans.

Soul.Name: Assault of the Waves
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Send one random Character card from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Into the Sea
Skill0.Comment: Select target enemy unit. That unit is moved to a random open area.

Skill1.Name: Trident of Capture
Skill1.Comment: Target enemy unit gets LV+1.

Skill2.Name: Spear Stab
Skill2.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action and hits a unit of LV 4 or higher, add 20 damage.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The humans can't move freely underwater, we'll finish them there.'
FlavorText.Text2: These soldiers of the sea are protected by Vonderam. They trap ships with their nets from underwater, and spear soldiers as they leap into the waves.

Skill0.Name: Absolute Wall
Skill0.Comment: All units get DF+50 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'At least we're safe for now.'
FlavorText.Text2: This spell creates a massive magic wall to repel attacks. Physical blows are useless against it.

Skill0.Name: Sweeping Tidalwave
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow lvl 3 or higher] Return one unit lvl 2 or below to its Card File. Send a Grimoire card from your Card File to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The waters can rise in an instant, washing anything away.'
FlavorText.Text2: A huge tidal wave created for use as a weapon. Its true advantage is from the speed of the waves.

Soul.Name: Spell: 'Extreme Turbulence'
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Send one random Grimoire card from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Power of the Sky Staff
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow lvl 2 or higher] Return one random enemy unit of RNG 1 to its Card File.

Skill1.Name: Consequences of Power
Skill1.Comment: Decrease your Falkow level by one.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The staff... it's too difficult to control!'
FlavorText.Text2: The Sky Staff is a very powerful type of magic item created by priests of Falkow for use by master wizards. However, sometimes an inexperienced apprentice will get her hands on one.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Spell: 'Net of Speed'
Soul.Comment: Engage one friendly disengaged unit, and then engage two enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Tidal Bounds
Skill0.Comment: Engage one random enemy unit of level 4 or higher.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Let's do this, and get out of here.'
FlavorText.Text2: They are sea sorceresses protected by Vonderam. Under the order of Vonderam, they bind the strongest enemies with their magic and fight to prolong the war between the humans.

Soul.Name: Sticky Tongue Capture
Soul.Comment: Send three random Falkow cards from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Long Tongue
Skill0.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit within range. Then, do [damage: AT of chosen unit] to this unit, and engage this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What on earth is that? Please have mercy!'
FlavorText.Text2: An overgrown frog, so large it can swallow anything whole. Many an adventurer has had to cut his way out of a giant frog's stomach.

Skill0.Name: Lost Tome
Skill0.Comment: Send one random Grimoire card from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery. You get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Arrrgh! Where is that page? It was here a minute ago!'
FlavorText.Text2: A magic book with a missing page. The missing page can never by recovered, not even by magic. The spell it held is considered to be lost forever.

Skill0.Name: Frozen Lance
Skill0.Comment: All enemy units get AGI-3 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This is bad. It's raining lances!'
FlavorText.Text2: Lances of water created by magic. Anyone struck by one will be paralyzed for a short time, giving their enemies a chance to get the jump on them.

Soul.Name: Delivery of Punishment
Soul.Comment: Two enemy units get MAX HP=20 and AT-10.

Skill0.Name: Wheel of Destiny
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia lvl 2 or higher] One enemy unit level 4 or lower, except a Refess unit, gets RNG=0.

Skill1.Name: Bash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to and render engaged a random enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Expunge!'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the world's most widespread religion, the Church of the True God. She disciplines people as she pleases, calling it divine punishment. This may sound similar to the way of heretics, but the inquisitors have their own, hidden reasons. Fortune especially is surrounded by mysteries, and is feared by many. What is her true purpose?

Soul.Name: Execution
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 80] to one disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Order of Faith
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: true god church] units get MAX HP+10 and HP+10.

Skill1.Name: Blades of Condemnation
Skill1.Comment: The unit directly in front of this unit gets [AT + your SP X 5] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Fool who believeth not in our God!  This is Judgment Day.'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the world's most widespread religion, the Church of the True God.  He is the highest ranking judge of heretics.  His immovable faith allows him to oppress unbelievers and pass judgment without a second thought.  If you are brought before him, it is no better than being brought before Death himself.

Soul.Name: Death Dragon's Breath
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit. Increase rival Iczer's SP by 3.

Skill0.Name: Living Dead
Skill0.Comment: Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: Dark Miasma
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 20 directly from the HP of all units except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Kill a dragon emperor, and you will be one of us.'
FlavorText.Text2: The Dragon Zangadylan was known as the scourge of Lavato in the far past. Recently, an unknown being has brought the terrifying creature back to life. Both its body and its powers have begun to rot, but the mere sight of it will drain the strength of any living thing.

Soul.Name: Chain Reaction of Sorrow
Soul.Comment: Send one friendly unit to the Cemetery. After that, two enemy units get HP=0.

Skill0.Name: Under the Tree of Souls
Skill0.Comment: Send one random [subtype: great spirit] card from your Card File to the Cemetery. And then, this unit fully recovers its HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Souls can only be managed by a god whose virtues include a true understanding of right and wrong.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spirit who guards the Soul Catcher Tree, said to exist somewhere in Lavato.  The sole meaning of her existence is to protect this enormous tree.

Soul.Name: Memories Left Behind
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get LV+1, AT+30 and AGI-1.

Skill0.Name: Lost Sister
Skill0.Comment: One friendly [subtype: magic doll] unit gets LV+2, AT+10 and AGI+1.

Skill1.Name: Soul System
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets AT + Lawtia level X 10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Why do I feel like I've been here before? What's happening? Who am I?'
FlavorText.Text2: A completely new type of magic doll. She seems to have been based on existing magic dolls, but her creator is unknown. After she was made, she was confined to a lab in the Duchy of Crest, but she escaped to search for the truth behind the memories deep within her heart. Heading for Heierrat, she encounters Dilate.

Soul.Name: A Brave Move
Soul.Comment: Engage all units of level 3 or lower. You get LP-1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Stand Your Ground
Skill0.Comment: All units of AGI 3 or higher get AGI=1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Cry of Red Death
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+10] to target enemy unit not within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll fight, but I don't like hurting girls...'
FlavorText.Text2: When he was young, he was just an unknown soldier. But after countless battles, he's grown up to be brave and powerful. He still uses the same sword as before, and can always be seen fighting on the front lines.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Deployment Orders
Soul.Comment: All friendlies LV 3 and lower get LV+1, AT-10 and AGI+3.

Skill0.Name: Give the Command
Skill0.Comment: One friendly [subtype: mermaid] unit gets AT+10 and AGI+2 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Tactical Diversion
Skill1.Comment: One enemy unit gets LV+1, AT+20, DF=0 and AGI-2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Princess Emana might not be here, but I will not let such filth do as they please!'
FlavorText.Text2: Princess Emana's most trusted commander. After the battle for the Holy Realm, a mysterious curse began spreading through the seas. Princess Emana believed that the cause was on dry land, and went to investigate. She asked Balzelda to protect the mermaids until she returned. But then Balzelda's best friend appeared before her, a victim of the curse!

Soul.Name: Anger of the Sea Lord
Soul.Comment: Target friendly unit gets LV-1. And then, two target enemy units get LV-2.

Skill0.Name: The Sea Lord's Protection
Skill0.Comment: Return the unit directly behind this unit to its card file. And then, this unit gets AT+10 and is healed 10 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Vonderam, I would be reassured if I could get your help.' - Volfied
FlavorText.Text2: Living in the lightless depths of the ocean, he is known as the 'God of Seas.' He is connected to Volfied, but the truth behind this is unknown. At the great Battle for the Holy Realm, he controls the mermaids in order to prolong the battle between the Kingdom of Folrart and the Duchy of Crest.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Burn, Fighting Spirit!
Soul.Comment: All enemy units get AT-20 for this turn. All friendly units get AT+20 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Fist of Fire
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit in range. Then, if that unit's HP is 0 or below, do [damage:AT] to a random enemy unit not in range.

FlavorText.Text1: Ignite! Fist of fire!
FlavorText.Text2: A chaotic martial artist who increases his destructive ability by setting his fist on fire.

Soul.Name: Team Assassination
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to all units of HP 30 or lower.

Skill0.Name: Death is not Enough
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit in range. Then, if that unit's HP is 0 or below, rival Iczer gets two less SP at the beginning of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Shrike, Nail, Cutter! Are you ready?'
FlavorText.Text2: An organized group of assassins. Unlike a lone assassin whose duty is to kill a target without being seen, their duty is to kill anyone who gets in their way.

Soul.Name: Aura of the Dragon
Soul.Comment: All units get MAX HP -10.

Skill0.Name: Strength of a True Hero
Skill0.Comment: Remove one [card: 2nd Dragonrider/Resource] in your Cemetery from the game, and then your units Iczer Attack for 2 LP.

Skill1.Name: For What You Believe In
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: HP X 2] to target enemy unit. This unit gets HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Master, Miss Millia...  I cannot look away from a crisis unfolding right before me.'
FlavorText.Text2: An apprentice of the Dragonriders Wasseir and Millia. After Millia went missing, he was taught to protect the peace of Lavato. However, he couldn't agree to sacrifice lives to preserve the peace. Finally, he ignored Wasseir's orders, and joined the battle for the Holy Realm.

Soul.Name: Evil Withers
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get MAX HP-40.

Skill0.Name: Blade of the Realm
Skill0.Comment: Set one random enemy unit within range and [HP = this unit's AT or below] to MAX HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Gate Guardian
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/LP 4 or lower] This unit gets MAX HP+10 and is healed 30 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'So he's the last guardian of the gate Mayleen was talking about...' --Lapierre
FlavorText.Text2: The true protector of the Holy Realm. Legends call him the secret weapon of Mayleen's family. Existing between Lavato and the world of the Old Gods, the Holy Realm is believed to have been created after the battle with Batora. Sergis appears when the Holy Realm is threatened.

IczerAttack.Name: Iczer Attack
IczerAttack.Comment: Subtract 1 LP from rival Iczer's LP, this unit gets AT+20, and the cost is 0 SP.

Soul.Name: Blessing of the Shrines
Soul.Comment: Revive one friendly [subtype: shrine knight] unit and give her MAX HP+30, AT+30, and AGI+1.

Skill0.Name: Strike the True Enemy
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer Attack action, subtract 1 LP from rival Iczer's LP, this unit gets AT+20, and the cost is 0 SP.

Skill1.Name: Double Attack
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT 50%] to 2 random enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Lapierre, Shathia, you two are so impatient!'
FlavorText.Text2: The leader of the third unit of Folrart's most famous knights, the Shrine Knights. She's very easygoing and is even pushed around by her subordinates. However, when a battle begins, she takes the field with the demeanor of a warlord. She keeps horrifying notes in a journal with 'My Secrets' on the cover.

Soul.Name: Light of the Sun
Soul.Comment: Remove one closed friendly unit from the game. And then, you get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: Decoy Tactics
Skill0.Comment: Engage one friendly disengaged [subtype: solar kingdom] unit, then engage one enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Deploy Resources
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] units heal 20 HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'No wonder we're always falling behind the other kingdoms... Look at this intelligence!'
FlavorText.Text2: An assistant to the Solar Prince, Verlaat. Her talent in political and military affairs has earned her the nickname: 'Verlaat's brain.' On behalf of Verlaat she's on a secret mission, beyond the scope of the War of the Sun and Moon.

Skill0.Name: Key to the Holy Realm
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get DF+50 for this turn. All friendly [subtype: captain] units get DF+10.

FlavorText.Text1:
'I shall grant this to you, Lapierre.' 
- Mayleen
FlavorText.Text2: An ancient magic artifact in the possession of Mayleen. It can be used to enter the Holy Realm, or seal it away.

Soul.Name: Hidden Power of Comrades
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Refess level X 10] to target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Attack Formation
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: shrine knight] units get AT+10.

Skill1.Name: Secret of Zero
Skill1.Comment: Set all enemy units within range and DF 1 or higher to DF=0 for this turn and do [damage: AT] to those units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Target confirmed. Commencing attack. Messages from the priests also said 'watch for the resurrection' but the meaning is unclear.'
FlavorText.Text2: Unlike the other shrines, Shrine Zero answers directly to the Church of the True God and its existence is kept hidden from the general populace. Their knights serve as a regular unit when they have no special orders.

Soul.Name: Bond of Comrades
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+20 and are disengaged.

Skill0.Name: Assault Formation
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: shrine knight] units get AT+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Slash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The commander herself is leading us! We can't lose!'
FlavorText.Text2: The Knights of the 1st Shrine are elite soldiers, led by Captain Lapierre herself. One of them alone may not be a threat but their true power is revealed when they're deployed in the proper formation.

Soul.Name: Protection of Comrades
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get MAX HP+50% and are fully healed.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Guard Formation
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: shrine knight] units get DF+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Don't let Captain Shathia down!'
FlavorText.Text2: The Knights of the 2nd Shrine are one regiment of the Shrine Knights. They're led by Shathia. They're famous for their devotion to their leader, and will follow her orders without hesitation.

Soul.Name: Support of Comrades
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. Change battletime to noon.

Skill0.Name: Mobility Formation
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: shrine knight] units get AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Lancer
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Third shrine knights, advance!'
FlavorText.Text2: The Knights of the 3rd Shrine are one regiment of the Shrine Knights. They're led by Ridrea, and are legendary for their mobility.

Skill0.Name: Hero's Strike
Skill0.Comment: Select one friendly unit. Do [damage: chosen unit's AT] to target enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1:
'I'd never thought you'd come save me, Cynthia'
'Whatever. Just go, I'll hold them here!'
FlavorText.Text2: When Lapierre was surrounded by the enemy, it was her old rival Cynthia who came to save her.

Soul.Name: Divine Justice
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get AT-20 for this turn. Do [damage: your Refess level X 5] to those units.

Skill0.Name: Shield Breaker
Skill0.Comment: Set a random enemy in range to DF=0 and do [damage: AT] to it.

Skill1.Name: Shield of Virtue
Skill1.Comment: This unit and the units on the left and the right get DF+5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Let's show them what we're made of!'
FlavorText.Text2: Warrior priests from the Kingdom of Folrart. Their virtuous hearts and dedication to training make them stand out among the other acolytes. Standing on the front lines with broad shoulders and even broader grins, their confidence puts fear in the hearts of the enemy.

Soul.Name: Challenge to Crest
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get AT-20 for this turn. Do [damage: your Refess level X 5] to those units.

Skill0.Name: Charge
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: ATX2] to a random enemy in range.  Do [damage: 50% of MAX HP] to this unit.

Skill1.Name: Draw the Second Sword
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets DF+5 and the Trait: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units in range. Remains after Revive.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll knock 'em down one after another... Here's another one!'
FlavorText.Text2: The most skilled of the dual-wielding Folrart soldiers are like a whirlwind on the battlefield.

Soul.Name: Wings of Rebirth
Soul.Comment: All units get LV, AT, DF, AGI and RNG restored to their base values.

Skill0.Name: Advanced Mounted Combat
Skill0.Comment: The unit in front of this unit gets DF+10 for this turn. The unit behind this unit gets AT+20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Lancer
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1:
'Let's go!' 
'Careful! Don't throw me off, okay?'
FlavorText.Text2: Knights of the flying cavalry of the Solar Kingdom. Each team of knights rides a special large Pegasus, called a Tenba. Because the knights always fight in pairs, they are very talented at coordinated attacks. The full force of Folrart's flying cavalry was dispatched for the battle of the Holy Realm.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Meditation
Soul.Comment: You get SP+1->3.

Skill0.Name: Positive Energy Strike
Skill0.Comment: Target enemy [subtype: undead] unit in range gets MAX HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill1.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Use the power within to defeat the enemy without touching them.'
FlavorText.Text2: A monk who has mastered serenity as a member of the Church of the True God, and became a martial artist. He doesn't use his fists, but the energy he releases from his body does great harm to the enemy.

Skill0.Name: Over Soul
Skill0.Comment: Return the newest unit card from your Cemetery to your Card File, if that card is lvl 6 or lower. Increase your Refess level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The souls are returning from where they came...'
FlavorText.Text2: A holy power that frees the souls of those who have been bound by evil forces. The path of these souls will lead the people on their way.

Soul.Name: Price of Hell
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to two random enemies. Rival gets SP-2.

Skill0.Name: Piece of Hell
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be affected, targeted, or randomly chosen by Grimoires or Soul Skills.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It doesn't look like Annarose can handle this alone. No matter, all I care for is an opportunity to fight.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the three servants of Envoy of Chaos Elgandi. He came to help Annarose when her plans began to unravel. On Lavato he is a totally unique being, brought from another world by the power of Batora in the distant past.

Soul.Name: No One Saw Anything
Soul.Comment: All units are engaged until the end of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Sword of Murder
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/your SP is 10 or lower] Set all enemy units to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Well, well. Mistress Annarose must be having a difficult time. Otherwise, she wouldn't have summoned me, right?'
FlavorText.Text2: A servant of Annarose who is known as LeBeau's big brother. Not a single one of his targets has ever survived. Now, he's received a new order from Annarose: eliminate Belfyna, who has failed in her mission.

Soul.Name: Power Drain
Soul.Comment: Return two random cards from your Cemetery to your Card File. Rival Iczer gets SP-1.

Skill0.Name: Assault System
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: magic doll] units get LV+1 and AT+10.

Skill1.Name: Dead Twice Over
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit's lvl 6 or higher] Set target enemy unit within range to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come on, let me have some fun!'
FlavorText.Text2: A custom Magic Doll able to think on her own. She's one of the three commanders of Belfyna's doll army. But when Belfyna is elsewhere, she reports to her true master.

Soul.Name: Path of Red
Soul.Comment: Send target closed unit directly to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Hate System
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: LV X 10] to a target column of enemy units in range.

Skill1.Name: Thorns of the Rose
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit's lvl 5 or higher] do [damage: LV X 10] to a random row of enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Shrine Knights spotted. Let's play.'
FlavorText.Text2: A custom Magic Doll able to think on her own. She's one of the three commanders of Belfyna's doll army. Belfyna herself named her three commanders after flowers.

Soul.Name: Doll Detonation
Soul.Comment: Set one friendly Magic Doll to HP=0, and then do [damage: 40] to all enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Guard System
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: command model] units get LV+2 and DF+20 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Lily Whip
Skill1.Comment: Set target friendly [subtype: magic doll] unit to HP=0, except this unit. And then, subtract AT directly from the HP of two random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I love the red color of blood. I wish I had Scarlet Rose's body.'
FlavorText.Text2: A custom Magic Doll able to think on her own. She's one of the three commanders of Belfyna's doll army. She speaks for all three commanders, and makes the final decisions.

Soul.Name: Outrace the Devil
Soul.Comment: Subtract targets' AGI X 10 directly from the HP of two enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Slash
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

Skill1.Name: Vampiric Strike
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random unit within range. This unit is healed HP = to the damage the enemy takes.

Skill2.Name: Revenge of the Devil
Skill2.Comment: Select one enemy unit. Subtract chosen unit's AT directly from the HP of that unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The time of bloodshed is upon us.'
FlavorText.Text2: When undergoing the ritual to gain dark powers and become a Crest Paladin, sometimes things go wrong. In this case, the subject gains even more twisted powers and a truly disturbed mind.

Soul.Name: Essence of Corruption
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Lawtia level X 10] to target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Refresh
