Skill0.Comment: Send [card: Death Knight] from your Card File to the Cemetery. After that, this unit fully recovers its HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's been some time since Master Zugateroza last released me. I shall enjoy this.'
FlavorText.Text2: When a paladin filled with true virtue dies, the body can become corrupted with an evil miasma. The Undead that arise from such corruption are among the strongest ever seen.

Soul.Name: Grip of Hell
Soul.Comment: All units get AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Refresh
Skill0.Comment: Send [card: Hell Smoke] from your Card File to the Cemetery and then, this unit fully recovers HP, and a friendly unit gets AT+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If I kill the dead, they only become stronger... Now what?'
FlavorText.Text2: The aggregate of negative energy born from evil souls. If struck it disappears into a cloud of smoke, but then simply reforms and attacks again.

Soul.Name: Erosion of Madness
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/your SP=1] You get SP+3.

Skill0.Name: Facing Madness
Skill0.Comment: Return one random [subtype: undead] unit card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hehehehe! This is it! I found it!'
FlavorText.Text2: A priestess who lost her mind when she came face to face with an evil force. Perhaps she was touched by the ultimate evil beyond Lavato itself. Now she desperately hunts through forbidden tomes, looking to learn about the evil god.

Skill0.Name: Parts Recycle
Skill0.Comment: Target [subtype: magic doll] unit is Revived and gets LV+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'With this spell, the parts of the fallen will reunite, stronger than before.'
FlavorText.Text2: Very young children are forced out onto the battlefield, collecting the parts of fallen Magic Dolls so they may be used again.

Soul.Name: Long Range Strike
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to units in [area: 7-8-9] on both sides of the field.

Skill0.Name: Tracers
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 10] to three random enemy units in range and Mark them.

Skill1.Name: Aimed Shot
Skill1.Comment: Subtract AT X 2 directly from the HP of target Marked enemy unit. Clear Mark if the unit is Closed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'From here, all I need is one shot.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer. Because of its complicated attack logic, it takes longer to create Snipers than regular magic dolls.

Soul.Name: Mad Prayer
Soul.Comment: You get SP+1->3.

Skill0.Name: Contagious Madness
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: undead] units get LV+1, AT+10 and AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Heh. Heh, hehee.  Bwahahahahahahahaha!  This is it! Gwe hehehehehehehe!'
FlavorText.Text2: A priest whose mind snapped after he came face to face with Envoy of Chaos Elgandi. Many who learn the truth behind the servants of chaos share this fate. Perhaps this is why no one has discovered Annarose's true identity.

Soul.Name: Sunder Attack
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get DF=0. Do [damage: your Lawtia level X 5] to those units.

Skill0.Name: Grimoire Bane
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy in range.  Select a random Grimoire from rival's file and send it to the Cemetery.

Skill1.Name: Bash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to and render engaged a random enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Is it time for our unit to attack yet?'
FlavorText.Text2: Not all of Crest's armies are made up of dark magicians and Magic Dolls. Their veteran troops are some of the strongest on Lavato, trained to disrupt enemy wizards before they can use their magic and disable larger opponents with a well-placed strike.

Soul.Name: Soul Eating
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get DF=0. Do [damage: your Lawtia level X 5] to those units.

Skill0.Name: Dissipate
Skill0.Comment: Change battletime to night.

Skill1.Name: Poison the Living
Skill1.Comment: Engage target enemy unit. This unit gets HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What the hell is that!?'
FlavorText.Text2: When souls cannot rest in peace, they collect evil energy and become semi-solid. In their envy, they attempt to suffocate living beings.

Skill0.Name: Exchange of Souls
Skill0.Comment: Send one friendly unit to the Cemetery. After that, rival Iczer gets SP-3.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Know the weight of your soul.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell to mutilate the many energies that a soul possesses, and use that power to decrease the magical resources of an enemy.

Soul.Name: Release the Beast King
Soul.Comment: From now on, when any of your units executes an Attack action add +10 damage. This effect is cumulative.

Skill0.Name: Roar of Orthos
Skill0.Comment: From now on, when any of your units executes an Attack action add +5 damage. This effect is cumulative.

Skill1.Name: Roar of Belus
Skill1.Comment: Engage one random enemy unit of level 2 or below.

FlavorText.Text1: 'So I'm the real Beast King. You knew about this all along, Volfied.'
FlavorText.Text2: This is the true identity of Rivera, who had been hunting down Beast King Scarrion to avenge her parents' death. But her past memories were false, planted by Scarrion. He did this so she'd slip through the fingers of the servants of Chaos. However, she's having a difficult time accepting the truth.

Soul.Name: Final Stand
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Both Iczers LP=1] All friendly units get AT+50 and AGI+5.

Skill0.Name: Gaia's Rage
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/this unit's lvl=8] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Unleash Gaia's Might
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets LV=8, MAX HP = 100, AT=80, DF=0, AGI=4, and is fully healed. Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The real Beast King has returned. I should be able to use my full power.'
FlavorText.Text2: A mysterious boy who appeared to help protect Miffyre... He was sent by the power of gaia within Lavato to fight alongside Rivera against the servants of Chaos. When he activates his true power, nothing can stand in his path.

Soul.Name: Death to the Hero
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 60] to two random enemy Characters.

Skill0.Name: Fall of the Hero
Skill0.Comment: Target enemy Character gets HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm here for the bounty on your head.'
FlavorText.Text2: A bounty hunter from the Far East. He's famous for only going after the highest bounties. However, his real purpose for traveling across the world is to find the one who killed his younger sister... his own brother.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Uncontrollable Temper
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: martial artist] units get MAX HP+20, DF+10 and are healed 20 HP.

Skill0.Name: Pound into Shape
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: martial artist] units get AT+10, MAX HP+20 and are healed 20 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come on, let me have some more fun!'
FlavorText.Text2: An unstable martial artist who is not always at the top of his game. He ended up working as a trainer in Heierrat, insisting that by pounding his pupils day in and day out, they'd toughen up. His former students are known for their endurance on the battlefield.

Skill0.Name: Reforestation
Skill0.Comment: All units get LV, AT and AGI restored to their base values.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The forest is restoring itself...'
FlavorText.Text2: The amazing power of nature can restore anything.

Soul.Name: Make the Flowers Grow
Soul.Comment: All units get AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Life Drain
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 50% of this unit's MAX HP from the HP of one random enemy unit. This unit gets MAX HP+10 and is healed 10 HP. Engage this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hello, Mister. You're pretty handsome.'
FlavorText.Text2: A plant monster that developed when a field of special flowers was trampled in a battle and bathed in human blood. Now she lures men to her so she may continue to feast.

Soul.Name: Cut Down the Amateurs
Soul.Comment: Target one friendly unit. Do [damage: 40] to all equal and lower level units.

Skill0.Name: Team Player
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+ the AT of target friendly [subtype: mercenary nation] unit for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Slash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hey, what are these things? Some kind of deadly marionettes?'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordsman of the Mercenary Nation. He and his team have been fighting side by side for a long time, and as long as he has them, he's unbeatable.

Soul.Name: Magma Ignition
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to two random enemy units. All friendly units get AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Lava Blast 1
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Do [damage: 40] to units in [area: 1-2-3] on both sides of the field, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Lava Blast 2
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime noon] Do [damage: 40] to units in [area: 4-5-6] on both sides of the field, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Lava Blast 3
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Do [damage: 40] to units in [area: 7-8-9] on both sides of the field, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'After you're dead it'll cremate you, too. Convenient, no?'
FlavorText.Text2: A wyvern that lives in the volcanic tropical region of Lavato. It excretes highly flammable bodily fluids through its pores, and then keeps them ignited with its high body temperature.

Soul.Name: Right Between the Eyes
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: Gowen X 10] to target disengaged enemy unit.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, AGI +1, RNG +1.

Skill0.Name: Charge
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT x 2] to a random enemy unit within range. Do [damage: 50% of MAX HP] to this unit.

Skill1.Name: Pinpoint
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: AT] to a target enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What is with this army of girls?'
FlavorText.Text2: Swordsmen of the Mercenary Nation. They use special weapons called Revolver Blades. Ready to challenge an experienced troop on the battlefield, they're surprised to see the enemy is an army of Magic Dolls.

Soul.Name: Anti Magic Zone
Soul.Comment: No Grimoire card in either Iczer's Card File may be set for 5 turns.

Skill0.Name: Lesser Hero Bind
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Mage Pixy is Open or Closed on the field] Rival Iczer cannot set a Character next turn.

Skill1.Name: Hero Bind
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Mage Pixy is not Open or Closed on the field] Rival Iczer cannot set a Character next turn or the turn after.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come on, you can't hit me.'
FlavorText.Text2: The magic of the faerie world is beyond human understanding. Faerie magicians have been known to appear before great heroes, binding them outside the fabric of Lavato as important events transpire without them.

Skill0.Name: Boulder Drop
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to all units in [area: 4-5-6] on both sides of the field.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, no! Falling rocks!'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic to teleport large boulders above your enemies. Sometimes the simplest ideas are the most effective.

Soul.Name: Magic Firestorm
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to units in [area: 4-5-6] on both sides of the field.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, RNG +1.

Skill0.Name: Flare Spell
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to a number of random enemy units equal to this unit's range. All units hit begin Burning.

Skill1.Name: Party Mage
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets RNG + number of friendly [subtype: mercenary nation] units for this turn. Do [damage: AT] to one random Burning unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'As soon as you're in position, I'll let 'em have it!'
FlavorText.Text2: Mages from the Mercenary Nation. Usually they are the apprentices of magicians who have left the Wizard Kingdom. Their spells are simple, but their experience in working in tandem with the rest of their mercenary company makes them formidable in battle.

Soul.Name: Double Boomerang
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get AGI-2. Do [damage: your Gowen level X 5] to those units.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +20.

Skill0.Name: Boomerang Strike
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in [area: 1-2-3], [area: 4-5-6], and [area: 7-8-9].

FlavorText.Text1: 'An unusual weapon, isn't it? Have you seen anything like it before?'
FlavorText.Text2: A warrior that fights with an unusual throwing weapon called a boomerang. It is extremely difficult to master a boomerang for use in actual battlefield conditions.

Soul.Name: Cat Fight
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to units in [area: 1-2-3] on both sides of the field.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Dance of War
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] This unit cannot be hit by an Attack action for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'There are so many enemies. This is gonna take all day.'
FlavorText.Text2: It's very rare, but some feline kin have the dedication to become trained fighters. Feline kin are very athletic and are excellent at physical combat.

Soul.Name: Enemy Swarm
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get AGI-2. Do [damage: your Gowen level X 5] to those units.

Skill0.Name: Messily Devour
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT from HP of random enemy in range of DF 1 or higher. This unit gets added AT, MAX HP, and HP equal to enemy's DF.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It found me! I'm done for...'
FlavorText.Text2: Possibly a long-lost relative of the Earth Dragon, these fast, ferocious carnivores hunt in packs. Armor does little to protect against their strong jaws and it's believed the glitter of the metal even attracts them.

Soul.Name: Spell Recall
Soul.Comment: Return two random Grimoire Cards that have been removed from the game to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Magic Sword Bandalt
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+ [times you've invoked a Grimoire X 10] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Unlock Bandalt
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to random enemy unit in range. Return one Grimoire that was removed from the game to your Card file.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I cannot let you go any further. If you insist, then I, Mirelia, will fight you.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of six paladins who protect the Wizard Kingdom. She fights with a magic sword named Bandalt. Its power is affected by the spells used around her. She may look young and cute, but her real age is unknown.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Tears of a Mermaid
Soul.Comment: Return target disengaged unit to the Card File.

Skill0.Name: Protection of the Princess
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: mermaid] in [area: 1-2-3] cannot be hit by Attack actions for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Underwater Battle
Skill1.Comment: [Conditional use/AGI 0 or lower] Two enemy units in range get AGI=0 for this turn. This unit gets AGI=1.

Skill2.Name: Aquamantic Barrier
Skill2.Comment: All units of LV 3 or lower cannot be affected or selected by other cards' effects that include engaging until end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's so much fun down here. I don't understand why there are wars on land.'
FlavorText.Text2: A royal mermaid princess. She is the only mermaid who is willing to argue with Vonderam. She can't help but distrust Vonderam since she learned that he's been working to restore the Beast King. She is destined to encounter Solar Prince Verlaat, a meeting that will change her path forever.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Vonderam's Orders
Soul.Comment: Target enemy unit is engaged until the end of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Magic Wave Storm
Skill0.Comment: Return one random unit of level 2 or lower to the Card File.

Skill1.Name: Forbidden Spell
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: number of friendly [subtype: mermaid] units X 20] to one enemy unit within range. Return this unit to the Card file.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Yes, sir. As you wish, Master Vonderam.'
FlavorText.Text2: As the most powerful of the mermaid sorceresses, she was given direct control of the mermaid armies by Vonderam himself. Without thinking twice, she heads out for the battle of the Holy Realm.

Soul.Name: Absolute Zero
Soul.Comment: Two disengaged enemies are engaged until the end of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Greater Freezing
Skill0.Comment: Engage two random enemy units within range until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Ice Storm
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the HP of all engaged units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Yes? What can I do for you? Hee hee...'
FlavorText.Text2: A master-class sorcerer of the Wizard Kingdom. She's known as the 'Icy Smile of Regus,' and is considered to be the most terrifying of all the master-class sorceresses. However, most of the time she acts like a completely average person.

Skill0.Name: Forbidden Book
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+1. This effect counts as two Grimoire activations.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A book used as part of a ritual to seal something away long ago...'
FlavorText.Text2: A book with immense magical powers, but no one has figured out how to use it. For now wizards use the magical energies radiating from it to power their own experiments.

Soul.Name: Black Magic Ice
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. This effect counts as two Grimoire activations.

Skill0.Name: Freezing Spell
Skill0.Comment: Engage one enemy unit until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Mmm... you're nice and cold.'
FlavorText.Text2: A sorceress enlisted in the army of the Wizard Kingdom. She uses ice magic to freeze the enemy. Some take particular pleasure in freezing attacking soldiers, but not all ice sorcerers are this heartless.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit not within range.

Soul.Name: Teleport Dodge
Soul.Comment: All friendly units cannot be hit by an Attack action for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Teleport Strike
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit not within range.

Skill1.Name: Blink
Skill1.Comment: Target friendly [subtype: sorcerer] unit cannot be hit by an Attack action for this turn and is moved to a random open area.

Skill2.Name: Teleport to Safety
Skill2.Comment: Revive one friendly [subtype: sorcerer] unit and move it to a random open area.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I sense magic! Is it behind me?'
FlavorText.Text2: A magician soldier who uses teleportation magic to fight on the battlefield. Not only can she transport herself behind the enemy, she can also take someone with her.

Soul.Name: Mass Haste Spell
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AGI+2 and are disengaged.

Skill0.Name: Magic Greatsword
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT + [your Falkow level X 10] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hmph! I'll finish this with one strike!'
FlavorText.Text2: Enchanted weapons are in heavy use throughout the armies of Regus. Because they are made entirely of magic, making them bigger is just a matter of spellcraft and focus. Even an experienced soldier would have trouble wielding one the size of a greatsword.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemies in range and five cards from your Card File may not be set for 10 turns.

Soul.Name: Poison Bog
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Falkow level X 10] to target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Magic Distortion
Skill0.Comment: If this unit Attacks, do [damage: AT] to two random enemies in range and five cards from your Card File may not be set for 10 turns.

Skill1.Name: Into the Swamp
Skill1.Comment: Five cards from your Card File may not be set for 10 turns.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I heard that the wyverns were twisted by the magical radiation of this place...'
FlavorText.Text2: A type of wyvern that lives in the Swamps of Death on the outskirts of the Wizard Kingdom. No one knows what kind of power it has, but it's believed that the failed magical experiments dumped in the swamps have distorted it in some way.

Skill0.Name: Time Stop
Skill0.Comment: Engage all units until the end of next turn, except [subtype: sorcerer or archmage] units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Tick tock...'
FlavorText.Text2: A space-distorting magic that creates a pocket dimension where only wizards can move. Black Cat Fellana came up with the theories this magic is based on.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Battlefield Conditions
Soul.Comment: Units in [area: 1-2-3] get DF+10 on both sides of the field. Units in [area: 4-5-6] get RNG+1 on both sides of the field.

Skill0.Name: Pinpoint
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'When will the war end?'
FlavorText.Text2: A soldier in the mermaid army that is under the protection of Vonderam. She was ordered by Vonderam to take the field and help prolong the war between the humans. However, she sees no good reason for fighting and is even starting to doubt Princess Emana's words.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Paralyzing Arrows
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get RNG-1 for this turn. Do [damage: your Falkow level X 5] to those units.

Skill0.Name: Deadly Shot
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT X2] to two random enemy units of AGI 0 or lower in range.

Skill1.Name: Pinpoint
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Those who live on land will never expect arrows coming from the water.'
FlavorText.Text2: An archer in the mermaid army under the protection of Vonderam. Her unit was ordered by Vonderam to take the field and prolong the battle between the humans. Now, she follows Faytis' commands without question.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Call For Help
Soul.Comment: Move three random [subtype: mermaid] cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: An Island in the Ocean
Skill0.Comment: The friendly [subtype: mermaid] unit in [area: 5] gets AT+10 and DF+5 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Mermaid Staff
Skill1.Comment: Engage one random engaged enemy unit in range until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What? It's not over yet?'
FlavorText.Text2: A young sorceress in the mermaid army under the protection of Vonderam. The sorceresses were ordered to use their magic to churn up the ocean and also defend Emana and Faytis. She looks up to Faytis, but she's starting to have doubts about the purpose of war.

Soul.Name: Numbing Arrows
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get RNG-1 for this turn. Do [damage: your Falkow level X 5] to those units.

Skill0.Name: Frost Bow Gale
Skill0.Comment: All enemy units get AT-10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Freezing Arrow
Skill1.Comment: Two random enemy units within range and of level 5 or higher get AT=0 and AGI=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll hold off the entire brigade!'
FlavorText.Text2: An archer of the Wizard Kingdom, she uses a special magic bow to freeze the enemy in their tracks rather than hurt them.

Skill0.Name: Waterspout
Skill0.Comment: Return one random unit to its Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, if it only hits the right one, it'll be quite a rush!'
FlavorText.Text2: This spell creates an enormous waterspout capable of knocking back any enemy. This is one of the strongest water magic powers ever seen in the Wizard Kingdom, and it was created by Mystere herself. However, without her to guide it, the waterspout can get out of control easily.

Soul.Name: Dance of Verdant Flowers
Soul.Comment: Give AT+20 and DF+10 to target friendly.

Skill0.Name: The Dance of Destruction
Skill0.Comment: All friendlies get AT+10 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Revival
Skill1.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hey Mister! No peeping! A lady's gotta have modesty.'
FlavorText.Text2: A feline kin dancer who travels from kingdom to kingdom, paying her way by dancing at local taverns. For fun, she likes to take a dip in cold water. She can often be seen relaxing by a river or lake after she finishes work for the night.

Soul.Name: Defend at All Costs
Soul.Comment: Increase your Refess level by 2. Increase your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Fight of the Bodyguard
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+DF] to one random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll do my best, just like you, Father!'
FlavorText.Text2: She wanted to follow in the footsteps of her father, who served the throne as a Folrart Guardian. After studying hard she was accepted at the academy, but on that day her father lost his life protecting the king. She didn't cry, because it was his honor to die in the line of duty. This is the day she officially becomes a Guardian, and she reports to her father with a smile.

Soul.Name: Tragic Cry
Soul.Comment: Subtract 20 directly from the HP of one enemy unit, give it AT-20 and AGI-1.

Skill0.Name: Child of the Night
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit gets AT+20 this turn. One random enemy unit gets AGI-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Cherry blossoms... I wonder if Iâ€™ll ever see them again...'
FlavorText.Text2: Born to a wealthy family, she lived her life in comfort. One day, she was reading alone during break at her boarding academy. The boys were entranced by her dream-like presence. They didn't know that earlier she had been butchered by an assassin, hired by people who had been wronged by her father. Her sorrow and anger keep her in this world.

Soul.Name: Magic Seal
Soul.Comment: Revive all friendly Characters.

Skill0.Name: Winged Shield
Skill0.Comment: Friendly units in [area: 1-2-3] get DF+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Shield Blade
Skill1.Comment: Subtract DFx2 from the HP of one enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'From today on, I'll fight for the kingdom!'
FlavorText.Text2: Since she was little, she wanted to help her kingdom, but she wasnâ€™t talented in magic. Sheâ€™d bite her tongue while chanting and break magic items, but she always stayed positive. Finally, she mastered the Shield Blade, and revealed her hidden power. Joining the Sorcerer Guards of Regus, she became their youngest leader in history. Now, sheâ€™s feared as the mightiest shield in Regus.

Soul.Name: The Holy Realm Descends
Soul.Comment: Both Iczers get SP+4.

Skill0.Name: Sanctuary
Skill0.Comment: Target unit fully recovers its HP and gets AT=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1:
Mayleen: 'L-Lapierre, this is embarrassing!'
Lapierre: 'Don't be shy! Let's party tonight!'
FlavorText.Text2: A priestess who guards the domain known as the Holy Realm. Her best friend Lapierre is taking her to the Solar Kingdom's 2nd annual Summer Matsuri festival. Lapierre forced her to wear a robe called a 'yukata,' which is from the Far East. But Mayleen is hesitant because a yukata isn't meant to be worn with anything under it...

Soul.Name: Chaos Dragon Eradication
Soul.Comment: Return one engaged unit of level 3 or lower to its Card File.

Skill0.Name: Chaos Dragon's Breath
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: this unit's MAX HP] to all enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ooh, it's cold.'
FlavorText.Text2: A dragonrider who travels alone with Chaos Dragon Gladeel. When visiting the Far East, she became involved in a local disaster. She was given a robe called a 'yukata' by an elderly couple she rescued. Their kind gesture touched Millia, and she found herself feeling at ease, at least for a while.

Skill0.Name: Meaning of Failure
Skill0.Comment: 5% chance: Increase your SP by 3. 75% chance: Increase your SP by 4. 20% chance: Increase your SP by 5.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What? To the right? Huh? More to the left? Where am I going?!'
FlavorText.Text2: This apprentice from Regus is known for failing at magical experiments. Today, she's visiting the beach with her friends. She's trying to hit a watermelon with a stick while blindfolded, but seems like she is going to fail again.

Soul.Name: Sign of Peace
Soul.Comment: One random unit fully recovers its HP.

Skill0.Name: Lapierre's Charge
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units of AGI 2 or below get AT+10 and DF+10 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Lantylit's Blessing
Skill1.Comment: All friendly Refess units of level 3 or below get AT+10, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Lantylit Unlocked
Skill2.Comment: Subtract AT+10 directly from the MAX HP of a random row of enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'To arms!'
FlavorText.Text2: Commander of the Solar Kingdom's Shrine Knights, she leads them to defend the sacred Holy Realm. Her enemies are Belfyna and an army of Magic Dolls from the Duchy of Crest. With the power of Mayleen's Key the holy sword Lantylit is unlocked and Lapierre charges into battle!

Soul.Name: Fragments of a Holy Blade
Soul.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the HP of target enemy unit. Increase your Refess level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Almira's Strike
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+20] to target enemy unit in range. Return one random Refess card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Knights of the Second Shrine, prepare to move out. Your enemies are the Duchy of Crest and Lady Belfyna.'
FlavorText.Text2: The leader of the second unit of Folrart's most famous knights, the Shrine Knights. Her eyes stay cold in the heat of battle, earning her the nickname â€œIce Lady.â€ She idolizes her superior, Lapierre, a source of endless gossip amongst her knights.

Soul.Name: No Escape
Soul.Comment: Engage all units of AGI 3 or higher until the end of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Link to the Underworld
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 2 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Death is Inevitable
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is in area[1-2-3]] This unit gets MAX HP-20 and fully restores its HP.

Skill2.Name: Hurry to Your Fate
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: number of Lawtia cards in your Cemetery X 5] to three random enemy units of AGI 3 or higher.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Riza, the time has come for you to fulfill your purpose.'
FlavorText.Text2: The infamous undead giant, Zugateroza tears into Folrart during the battle between the Solar Kingdom and the Duchy of Crest. He has come for the royal sword instructor of the Solar Kingdom, Nightwalker Riza, who owes him a favor from long ago.

Soul.Name: Creeping Strike
Soul.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the HP of target enemy unit. Increase your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Sword of Twilight
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. Change battletime to noon.

Skill1.Name: Power of Blood
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets MAX HP-10. Target friendly unit gets MAX HP+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The nighttime is the right time, for me.'
FlavorText.Text2: It is said that if you've caught a glimpse of this man, it's already too late to get away. To gain the power to destroy the wicked beings of this world, he embraced the darkness.

Soul.Name: Look to the Future
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+20, AGI+2, and become engaged.

Skill0.Name: Double Draw
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 10] to two random enemy units.

Skill1.Name: Prayer of a Princess
Skill1.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+30, DF=10 and AGI-2 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Ben MacLachlan's Bullet
Skill2.Comment: Subtract number of friendly units X 20 directly from the HP of target column of enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Please, Ben. Watch over us during this battle.'
FlavorText.Text2: The founder of Mercenary Nation Heierrat. She once was a legendary bounty hunter, but she founded her own country and is now wrapped up in government affairs. However, when Yuni receives a letter from Lapierre, commander of the Shrine Knights, she decides to join the battle of the Holy Realm.

Soul.Name: Loyalty to the Princess
Soul.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the HP of target enemy unit. Increase your Gowen level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Calkul's True Power
Skill0.Comment: Friendly [mercenary nation] units on the left and the right of this unit get DF=20 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You'll have to cut through my cloak before you reach me. But I'll warn you, it's no easy task.'
FlavorText.Text2: A close friend of the Gun Princess, and she has sworn to protect her. She is wrapped in the protective cloth, Calkul, which defends against any and all attacks.

Soul.Name: Never to Return
Soul.Comment: Return one random disengaged enemy unit of level 2 or below to its Card File.

Skill0.Name: Last Thought
Skill0.Comment: Return two engaged enemy units of level 2 or lower to their Card File. Send this unit to the Cemetery.

Skill1.Name: Last Breath
Skill1.Comment: Return one engaged enemy unit within range to its Card File. Send this unit to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Your life will always be filled with hardship, but that is not always a bad thing. Stay strong...'
FlavorText.Text2: A mysterious dragon who protects Rivera and brings her to the Holy Realm. Just as he completes his mission, his strength finally fails. As his life fades, he thinks of her and her future.

Soul.Name: Anger of the Forest
Soul.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the HP of target enemy unit. Increase your Falkow level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Cycle of Life
Skill0.Comment: All enemy units get AGI=[6-their AGI] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Wooden Cage
Skill1.Comment: One random level 3 enemy unit in range gets AT-30 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The forest is unhappy. I'm counting on you, Athira.'
FlavorText.Text2: A master class wizard from the Wizard Kingdom. She uses her magic to control nature and bring out the potential of its power.

Skill0.Name: Deferred Payment
Skill0.Comment: Return this unit to it's File. You get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hey, people like us are human too, you know.'
FlavorText.Text2: A female swordsman who wanders from battle to battle. In times of war she appears, ready to fight and be paid well for it.

Soul.Name: Advent of the Dragon Emperor
Soul.Comment: Two friendly units get AT+30, DF+30 and AGI+3 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: True Holy Light
Skill0.Comment: Revive all closed friendly units.

Skill1.Name: True Holy Roar
Skill1.Comment: Return 1 random card from your Cemetery to your Card File, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Emperor of Dragonkin
Skill2.Comment: Target friendly Refess unit with 40HP or lower gets MAX HP+10 and is healed 30HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The Holy Dragon Emperor has revealed his true form in Lavato's darkest hour.'
FlavorText.Text2: This white dragon is the true form of the king of the legendary Dragon Emperors. He has returned to his true glory to fight against the Envoy of Chaos and his three servants.

Soul.Name: Grand Cross
Soul.Comment: Revive all closed units.

Skill0.Name: Behind the Solar Curtain
Skill0.Comment: Target unit gets AT restored to base value.

Skill1.Name: True Secret of Zero
Skill1.Comment: Remove target enemy unit of AGI 4 or higher from the game. Return this unit to the Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The target has begun to move. Please report to the masters. ...Why do those greasy raccoons want me to monitor them at all?'
FlavorText.Text2: She fights as an elite member of the Zero Shrine Knights, but she's actually an undercover agent working for the True God Church. However, she's unsure about the plan of her masters, and her suspicions are making her second guess her loyalties.

Soul.Name: The Cosmic Flow
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of AGI 2 or lower to its Card File. You get two less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Above the Atmosphere
Skill0.Comment: This unit can not be hit by an Attack action for this turn and gets DF+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Meteor Breath
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: your Refess level X10] to target enemy unit.

Skill2.Name: Great Comet Breath
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: your Refess level X 10] to three random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1:
'Aren't they on our side?'
'The Dragon Emperors said they were just visitors.'
FlavorText.Text2: The king of mysterious 'Star Dragons' has flown in from above the heavens of Lavato. His appearance overhead is menacing, but he makes no move to strike. Instead, he offers to save the land of Lavato which he someday wants to claim as his own.

Soul.Name: Fade
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of AGI 2 or lower to its Card File. You get two less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Dispel Evil
Skill0.Comment: Set one enemy unit within range to MAX HP=0. All friendly units except this unit are healed HP = to that unit's MAX HP.

Skill1.Name: Holy Aura
Skill1.Comment: All [subtype: priest] friendly units gets MAX HP+20, other than this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Honest miracle of the gods, please save the people of Lavato.'
FlavorText.Text2: Once a high ranking priest of the True God Church, now he wanders the lands of Lavato. Why did he throw away his status and choose to become a wanderer? The truth is hidden deep within the secrets he knows of the True God Church.

Skill0.Name: Like the Hand of God
Skill0.Comment: Set one unit to MAX HP=0. Decrease your Refess level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'In this world, is the destiny of mankind controlled by some transcendental entity or law?'
FlavorText.Text2: The law of heaven is like the hand of god, hovering above. A high-ranking priest can call down this power to extinguish an evil creature instantly.

Soul.Name: Deep Azure Glow
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Return one random Refess card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Deep Azure Peace
Skill0.Comment: One random unit of level 2 or below gets RNG-1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The blue stone is a symbol of the hope for peace.'
FlavorText.Text2: A gem beast with blue stone in its forehead. It is believed that people's hopes for peace in this world reflect off the stone and make it shine.

Soul.Name: What Fool Gave him a Hammer?
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to a random column of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Suppressive Strike
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+[MAX HP-HP] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll crush anything with one strike!'
FlavorText.Text2: A division of soldiers in the Solar Kingdom's armies who fight with giant battle hammers. They aren't quick, but they only need to hit you once.

Skill0.Name: Unwanted Charity
Skill0.Comment: Engage all friendly units, and then you get SP+1->3.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Lady, hey lady! This will protect you from evil spirits!'
FlavorText.Text2: Sometimes money gets involved when people are trying to be charitable. It never ends well.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy in range. If that unit's HP is 0 or below, set its MAX HP=0.

Soul.Name: Holy Claymore
Soul.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the MAX HP of target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Refuge of the Paladins
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy in range. If that unit's HP is 0 or below, set its MAX HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Paladin's Promise
Skill1.Comment: All friendly units get LV+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What is going to happen now?'
FlavorText.Text2: Young female paladins of the Solar Kingdom. When they were blessed with the honor of becoming paladins, they believed that their power would be used only for justice. They have no idea of what future that awaits them.

Soul.Name: Back on the Brink
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Return one random Refess card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Instinct to Suffer
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] All friendly units get DF+10 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: 3rd Stage: Reincarnation
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Do [damage: AT] to random enemy unit in range. Return a random card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'First corruption, then pain... and then madness.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world. Brahma Lycanthropes transform when exposed to morning sunlight, and are known to appear in cities, causing total chaos.

Soul.Name: Power of Morale
Soul.Comment: One disengaged enemy unit gets AT=0 and AGI=0.

Skill0.Name: Emblem of the Solar Kingdom
Skill0.Comment: Change battletime to morning. All friendly units get AT+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'We'll let the whole kingdom know that peace is coming.'
FlavorText.Text2: To commemorate peace, the flag bearers of Folrart were sent throughout the kingdom in ceremonial armor. Many are civilians recruited to help show the power of Folrart.

Soul.Name: Rage on the Brink
Soul.Comment: Subtract 60 directly from the MAX HP of target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Instinct to Hurt
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] All friendly units get AT+20 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'And I thought he was on the heavy side before.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world. Hanuman Lycanthropy spreads very slowly through the body. Because of the extended period of pain, most die before becoming an ape.

Soul.Name: Grace of the True God
Soul.Comment: Subtract 60 from the MAX HP of target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Lesser Dispel Evil
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 30 from the MAX HP of a target enemy unit in range. All friendly units heal 30 HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Purify the corrupted ones!'
FlavorText.Text2: A young priestess of the world's most widespread religion, the Church of the True God. The faith of women is stronger than that of men, and that strengthens their holy powers.

Soul.Name: Smite Evil
Soul.Comment: All enemy units get MAX HP-20.

Skill0.Name: Blessed Strike
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+10] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If it is the will of the One True God, we will fight!'
FlavorText.Text2: Members of the Solar Kingdom's cleric army. They are priests who are trained to fight and serve as the first wave of an attack. However, because of their inexperience they sometimes forget to keep their heads down.

Skill0.Name: Disarmament
Skill0.Comment: Two enemy units get AT=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If the weapons crumble, no one can fight.'
FlavorText.Text2: Metal weapons are weak to rust, but holy magic can make all swords unbelievably dull.

Soul.Name: The Whim of Mother
Soul.Comment: All Characters get AT+50 for this turn. Engage all non-Characters.

Skill0.Name: A Gift From Mother
Skill0.Comment: Revive one closed friendly [subtype: magic doll] non-Character and give her MAX HP+20, AT+20, and AGI+1.

Skill1.Name: My Dolls are Crying...
Skill1.Comment: You get SP+number of closed friendly [subtype: magic doll] non-Characters.

Skill2.Name: I'm Bored of You
Skill2.Comment: Remove from game one closed or open friendly [subtype: magic doll] non-Character. And then, return two [subtype: magic doll] non-Character cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oooh, you wanna new master?'
FlavorText.Text2: Then infamous twisted witch who invented the Magic Dolls. She was friends with Black Cat Fellana. When they were studying for Fellana's theses, 'The Principles of Bad Luck,' together, she was inspired to create a golem in the shape of a girl. It's very hard to tell what she's really thinking, but it's clear she's as temperamental as she is brilliant.

Soul.Name: Aggression Takes Form
Soul.Comment: Rival Iczer gets SP-1. Rival Iczer gets SP-1 at the begining of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Sweet Prey
Skill0.Comment: Send one random unit within range and of 20 HP or lower to the Cemetery.

Skill1.Name: Dine on Nobility
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 20 directly from HP of one enemy unit. This unit heals 20 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My sweet delicious prey... I hope you'll let me have a taste of you again tonight.'
FlavorText.Text2: In this world, there are beings disconnected from the limitations of mundane living things. They are known as Mazoku. Inside is said to be an incarnation of the fear war causes in each and every citizen as they try to fall asleep at night. One night, he fell in love with a songstress and has appeared before her every night since.

Soul.Name: Feeling Between Sisters
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of AGI 3 to its Card File. You get one less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Soul System
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+ Lawtia level X 5.

Skill1.Name: Buster System
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AT 50 or higher] This unit gets MAX HP+50%, AGI-1 and is fully healed. Engage all enemy units.

Skill2.Name: Double Attack
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT 50%] to 2 random enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Sis, it seems I have to kill you now.'
FlavorText.Text2: A completely new model of Magic Doll created based on several older Magic Dolls. The data collected from Esria was used to improve this second generation prototype. However, she was ordered to kill Esria who escaped from her master.

Soul.Name: Witness the Envoy of Chaos
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of AGI 3 to its Card File. You get one less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Enchanting Note
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets AGI-2 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Night Song
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Disengage target friendly unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hey... I want to go outside too, Esria.'
FlavorText.Text2: A subject confined to a lab somewhere in the Duchy of Crest. She used to be a daughter of a noble family, but it was believed that her voice possessed mysterious powers. Her parents were deceived, and she was taken to the castle so they could do experiments on her.

Skill0.Name: Heartbreak
Skill0.Comment: Send one closed unit of level 5 or below to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My feelings remain in eternal darkness'
FlavorText.Text2: Her love was so strong that she lost control of herself. Her grace became something dark and corrupt, a bane to lovers throughout the ages.

Soul.Name: Soul Absorption
Soul.Comment: Return one card from your Cemetery to your Card File, Return two cards from Rival Iczer's Cemetery to his Card File.

Skill0.Name: Refresh
Skill0.Comment: Send [card: Lich] from your Card File to the Cemetery and then, this unit fully recovers its HP.

Skill1.Name: Arise, Undead Horde
Skill1.Comment: Return four random [cardtype: undead] cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's like the boss of all undead. If you happen to see one, you should just run.'
FlavorText.Text2: When a high-ranking priest or wizard turns evil after death, it becomes a high-ranking undead, a Lich. It can think more logically than other undead and possesses strong magic powers.

Soul.Name: Armor Crumbles
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Send one random card of level 3 or higher from Rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Refresh
Skill0.Comment: Send [card: Cursed Armor Knight] from Card File to Cemetery, this unit recovers HP and do [damage: AT] to random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I had no idea Zugateroza had created such effective soldiers.'
FlavorText.Text2: Armored dolls sewn together from the bodies of the undead, filled with the hate and grudges of fallen soldiers. They combine the skill of soldiers in war with the power and menace of undead.

Soul.Name: Lycanthropy / Echidna
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Return one random Lawtia card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Refuse to Die
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Fully restore HP. Rival Iczer gets SP-1.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Life of Torture
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit gets AT+50 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'She's already an enemy to all living things... That's the power of this disease.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world. Echidna is a very violent strain and needs to be exterminated with extreme prejudice immediately after detection.

Skill0.Name: Death's Embrace
Skill0.Comment: Rival Iczer gets SP-1. Rival Iczer gets two less SP at the beginning of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'She'll be embraced by him only once in her life.'
FlavorText.Text2: The life of a woman who is seduced by a devil will end the moment he embraces her. There is no way to bring her back.

Soul.Name: Messenger Returns
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Return one random Lawtia card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Crucial Intelligence
Skill0.Comment: Send this unit to the Cemetery. You get SP+5.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Princess Eskatia! An undead army approaches the capital!'
FlavorText.Text2: Messengers from the Duchy of Crest. They deliver reports from the battlefield, or intelligence delivered by spies. They don't use spells to deliver their information because other wizards might be able to intercept them.

Soul.Name: Surgical Strike
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a random number of enemy units between 1 and 4.

Skill0.Name: Quick Kill
Skill0.Comment: Send target unit within range and level 4 or below to the Cemetery. Send this unit to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Mission accomplished. I'm no longer needed.'
FlavorText.Text2: A specially trained assassin, as fast as the wind and able to take down the enemy with one strike. People call them by many names, but their assassination skills live up to all of them.

Skill0.Name: Consuming Grudge
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 50 directly from the HP of one random enemy unit. Subtract 1 from your LP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What? This is the power of their grudge? But it has a physical form!'
FlavorText.Text2: The grudges the dead hold against the living are gathered by necromantic power and became a creature with a shape. No one can survive its soul-shattering touch.

Soul.Name: Heavy Modifications
Soul.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+30, DF+30 and is engaged. You get 1 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Healing System
Skill0.Comment: The [subtype: magic doll] units on the left and right of this unit are healed 20 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Looks like she can still fight.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer. Magic Doll Healer's duty is to gather Magic Dolls that were damaged in battle and restore them to fighting condition.

IczerAttack.Name: Iczer Attack
IczerAttack.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer Attack action, reduce Rival Iczer's LP by 3.

Soul.Name: Sabotage Mission
Soul.Comment: One disengaged unit gets AT=0 and AGI=0.

Skill0.Name: Infiltrate and Destroy
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer Attack action, reduce Rival Iczer's LP by 3.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I must report this to Mistress Annarose...'
FlavorText.Text2: A special agent reporting directly to the spy master of the Duchy Crest, Annarose. They sneak into the Solar Kingdom to collect information and perform acts of sabotage.

Soul.Name: Return to Earth
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all enemy units. All enemy units get AGI-2 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Refresh
Skill0.Comment: Send [card: Revenant] from your Card File to the Cemetery and then, this unit fully recovers HP and a friendly unit gets AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'How can a zombie move so fast?!'
FlavorText.Text2: This rotten corpse can move and attack with great speed, powered by various dark energies. Any who expect undead to be slow and plodding will be slain before they can even react.

Soul.Name: Anything Goes
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one random unit.

Skill0.Name: Best at What I Do
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit. Decrease your Gowen level by 2.

Skill1.Name: Slaying Strike
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+ enemy unit's level X 15] to target enemy unit in range. If enemy unit's HP is 0 or below, this unit is fully healed and gets AGI-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You got a job for me? This better be good...'
FlavorText.Text2: A legendary mercenary, said to be the strongest single combatant in Lavato. Hired as a guard for his raw power, it's rumored that he possesses the strength to kill a dragon in one strike. His determination to fight can make anyone fear for their life.

Soul.Name: Crossfire
Soul.Comment: Engage two units. Decrease your LP by 1.

Skill0.Name: Shoot Everything
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 4 or higher] Do [damage: Gowen level X 20] to all units, except this unit. Decrease Gowen level to 0.

Skill1.Name: Ace Shooting
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen LV 4 or higher] Do [damage: Gowen LV X 10] to target enemy in range. Decrease Gowen LV by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Gunner knights, advance! We're coming, Princess Yuni!'
FlavorText.Text2: The brave king of a small kingdom. He leads his famous gunner knights into battle to support Heierrat. His flashy cape is meant to attract attention away from his riflemen and snipers.

Soul.Name: The Mind's Eye
Soul.Comment: Return one random disengaged non-Character of level 3 or below to its Card File. You get two less SP at the beginning of next turn.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets RNG +1.

Skill0.Name: Nodachi Draw
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+10 and RNG=1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'He drew his sword in a flash of light...'
FlavorText.Text2: A young swordsman from the Far East who's been trailing Yuni. He expertly wields a sword as tall as he is, and he always waits for the enemy to engage before striking out with his blade.

Soul.Name: From a Forgotten People
Soul.Comment: Return one random disengaged non-Character of level 3 or below to its Card File. You get two less SP at the beginning of next turn.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Holy Sword: Arken
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT+10 from the MAX HP of a target column of enemy units in range.

Skill1.Name: Soulblade: Difora
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+20] to two random enemy units in range. Subtract one from your LP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Have you heard anything about him? He's like a curse on this world.'
FlavorText.Text2: The only survivor of a proud tribe of hunters that lived on the far reaches of the Grand Surface wasteland. She's been seen carrying two swords, one a Holy Sword, one a cursed Soulblade, looking for the man who annihilated her tribe. She's been traveling with Dilate ever since she met him on the road.

Skill0.Name: Rain of Arrows
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one random enemy unit. If that unit's HP is 0 or below, Subtract one from Rival Iczer's LP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Burning magic arrows raining from the clouds? This is going to be a short battle.'
FlavorText.Text2: On the battlefield, the master archers are used to fire over the rank and file to take out enemy leaders. This especially dangerous magic is designed along the same principle.

Soul.Name: Forest Deity
Soul.Comment: Return one card from your Cemetery to your Card File, Return two cards from Rival Iczer's Cemetery to his Card File.

Skill0.Name: Limb From Limb
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two enemy units in range. This unit is engaged until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Circle of Life
Skill1.Comment: Target friendly [subtype: monster] unit fully recovers its HP or is Revived, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'He's considered to be a kind of guardian deity by the locals.'
FlavorText.Text2: It's said that this monster dwells in the dark depths of the forest. Local tribes worship it and bring food. It's believed that its power is as strong as that of a dragon.

Soul.Name: Mass Impale
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to a random column of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Brutal Goring
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT X 2] to a random enemy column in range. This unit is healed 40 HP and engaged until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Run if you have to, just not in a straight line.'
FlavorText.Text2: There are monsters that have been living deep in the eldritch forests since ancient times. They're very territorial, and attack anything that enters their domain.

Soul.Name: Fey Enchantment
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Send one random card of level 3 or higher from Rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Lost Magic of Faerie World
Skill0.Comment: Send one random Grimoire from Rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Finally, it's time for us to make our appearance.'
FlavorText.Text2: The fairy civilization has been around since long before humankind. And while they are small, the magic they have mastered throughout the ages is like nothing people have ever seen before.

IczerAttack.Name: Iczer Attack
IczerAttack.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer attack, it costs 0 SP.

Soul.Name: Tools for the Job
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Return one random Gowen card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Silent Infiltration
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer attack, it costs 0 SP.

Skill1.Name: Sabotage
Skill1.Comment: One random enemy unit with an AT of 50 or higher gets AT=20, DF=0, and AGI=1.

Skill2.Name: Disable
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit of level 5 or higher in range. And then, that unit gets AT-10, DF=0, and AGI-2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Seems like the security is pretty tight.'
FlavorText.Text2: Special agents from the Mercenary Nation. They sneak into many different countries to collect information. They can be used to insure the safety of Heierrat, or even check up on the good intentions of a prospective employer.

Soul.Name: Forest Walks
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Return one random Gowen card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: A Noise in the Darkness
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: monster] units are disengaged.

Skill1.Name: The Dead Feed the Plants
Skill1.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+[number of cards in Rival Iczer's Cemetery X 5]. Remove 3 cards in Rival Iczer's Cemetery from game.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Even nature can be evil if it grows in the wrong soil.'
FlavorText.Text2: When evil men, wizards or even undead are buried in the ground, the plants that grow up around them absorb their negative energy. When a whole forest grows like this, it can uproot itself and swarm local villages.

Soul.Name: Maul
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a random number of enemy units between 1 and 4.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Double Pounce
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+30] to two random enemy units in [area: 7-8-9].

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's a big one! It's huge!'
FlavorText.Text2: When a tiger grows large by feasting on humans, it becomes a real monster. Its appetite and ferocity are terrifying compared to regular tigers.

Soul.Name: Consecutive Strikes
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all enemy units. All enemy units get AGI-2 for this turn.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +30.

Skill0.Name: Double Axe Attack
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: AT 50%] to two random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hiiii-ya!'
FlavorText.Text2: These warriors have a very muscular body and can use an axe in each hand. Their power is so great that even accomplished swordsmen and armored knights are no match for them.

Soul.Name: Banner of Heierrat
Soul.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+30, DF+30 and is engaged. You get 1 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Commit to the Attack
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: mercenary nation] units get LV+1 and Rank Up.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's not over yet! Don't let your guard down!'
FlavorText.Text2: A highly mobile strike force from the Mercenary Nation. They rush from one end of the battlefield to another to lend their support to any division in danger of being wiped out.

Soul.Name: Enchanted Arrow Storm
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all enemy units. All enemy units get AGI-2 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Lesser Lock Arrow
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Archer Pixy is Open or Closed on the field] Rival Iczer cannot set a card of level 4 or higher next turn.

Skill1.Name: Lock Arrow
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Archer Pixy is not Open or Closed on the field] Rival Iczer cannot set a card of level 4 or higher next turn or the turn after.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Take aim... carefully!'
FlavorText.Text2: Archer pixies can appear in the most unexpected of places to fight any enemies that threaten nature.

Skill0.Name: Dragon Breath
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to one unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'By the time you notice the breath, you're already charred.'
FlavorText.Text2: The fiery breath of dragons has many different abilities. Wizards can channel the power for an extremely quick burst of fire.

Soul.Name: Sign of the Fall
Soul.Comment: Set your Sphere Levels to 3. Increase all of Rival Iczer's Sphere Levels by 2.

Skill0.Name: Burning Curse
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 3 or higher] One enemy unit gets AGI -3 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Corrupt Light
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Refess lvl 3 or higher] One enemy unit gets RNG -1 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Horrible Experiments
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia lvl 3 or higher] Two units get MAX HP=1->100, AT = 1->100, DF=0, AGI = 1->3, RNG = 1->3 and are healed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, now... just how far will the Mermaid Princess go?'
FlavorText.Text2: He is one of the three emissaries directly under the Envoy of Chaos and a master manipulator. His favorite methods involve corrupting his enemies and taking control of them. The specific mission given to him is to take over the Wizard Kingdom.

Soul.Name: Forbidden Arithmetic
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Move enemy units from [area: 1-2-3] to [area: 7-8-9], and from [area: 7-8-9] to [area: 1-2-3].

Skill0.Name: Solve the Equation
Skill0.Comment: Return one random engaged enemy unit within range to its Card File.

Skill1.Name: Formula of Sealing
Skill1.Comment: Return a friendly unit to its Card file, except this unit. And then, engage target enemy unit within range until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This formula... how dangerous!'
FlavorText.Text2: A wizard prodigy who can see everything about the world through her magical mathematical formulas. She calculates that a great danger is creeping toward the Wizard Kingdom, and decides to help Dilate.

Soul.Name: Song of Paradise
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of AGI 4 or higher to its Card File. You get two less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Song of Insanity
Skill0.Comment: Remove one [subtype: mermaid] unit in your Cemetery from the game, and then all friendly units get AT+20 and AGI +2 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Bal...zel...gaaahhh!'
FlavorText.Text2: The former captain of the guard for the Mermaid Kingdom. An evil manipulator put a curse on her and corrupted her mind. She now leads other corrupted mermaids to attack Vonderam.

Soul.Name: Misunderstood Strategy
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of AGI 4 or higher to its Card File. You get two less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Constellation Formation
Skill0.Comment: Move friendly units from [area: 1-2-3] to [area: 7-8-9] and they get AT+20 for this turn. Move friendly units from [area: 7-8-9] to [area: 1-2-3] and they get DF+20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Lightning Formation
Skill1.Comment: All friendly units in [area: 4-5-6] get AGI+2 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You don't understand my plan? This is why I don't like talking to imbeciles.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the four highest ranking strategists of the Wizard Kingdom. He's a genius and the youngest of them. He always sounds like he's looking down on others, but he just lacks good communication skills.

Skill0.Name: Flanking Attack
Skill0.Comment: Move enemy units from [area: 1-2-3] to [area: 7-8-9], and from [area: 7-8-9] to [area: 1-2-3].

FlavorText.Text1: 'We're being attacked... From behind!!'
FlavorText.Text2: Strong warriors in the front and wizards in the back. Even with a textbook formation, an ambush from behind can easily rout their lines.

Soul.Name: Magic Strike
Soul.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the MAX HP of target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Spell Gauntlet
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+1 at the beginning of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Magic Enhancer
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets RNG=3.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A good soldier must not only master defense and offense, but speed and ranged attacking as well.'
FlavorText.Text2: A special tactical team used by the Wizard Kingdom army. Not only do they have lightning fast attack capabilities, but their enchanted gauntlets let them attack with spells from a great distance.

Skill0.Name: Mermaid Transformation
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: mermaid] units get AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn. You get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I want you to understand that transforming into a human shape is humiliating for a mermaid.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell that mermaids use when they go up on dry land. Unfortunately, they have to lose their beautiful tail in exchange for getting a human body.

Soul.Name: Thunderclap Lunge
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Return one random Falkow card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Vortex Stance
Skill0.Comment: One enemy unit of AGI 4 or higher gets AGI-3. And then, this unit gets AT+10 and AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The power of my strike is so great, it'll form a vortex in the air and pull you in.'
FlavorText.Text2: The strongest Fencers of Regus have mixed magic into their sword fighting. With their magic strikes they can immobilize opponents or enchant their blades.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Power of the Undertow
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Return one random Falkow card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Inspirational Dance
Skill0.Comment: One friendly [subtype: Mermaid] unit gets RNG+2.

Skill1.Name: Dance of Clear Waters
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: mermaid] units get MAX HP+10 and are healed 10 HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'How about my dance? Did it make you feel better?'
FlavorText.Text2: Many ancient forms of magic are practiced in the Mermaid Kingdom, including this form of dancing. Its magic can fill nearby Mermaids with power.

Skill0.Name: Teleport
Skill0.Comment: Choose one open Area on the enemy field. Move target enemy unit into the chosen area.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Whoaaaaaa... make it stop make it stop make it stop!!!'
FlavorText.Text2: A convenient spell for traveling, but when it's used by an inexperienced wizard, the effect might be a bit different from what it's supposed to be.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Escape While You Can
Soul.Comment: All disengaged enemy units get AGI=0.

Skill0.Name: Holding Back Evil
Skill0.Comment: The [subtype: mermaid] unit directly behind this unit gets DF+10 and RNG+1 for this turn. And then, this unit gets AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Revival
Skill1.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'I can't hold them back much longer!'
FlavorText.Text2: The main unit of Mermaids assigned to defense. When the twisted Carrier Mermaids attacked, they were among the only ones to resist corruption and hold back the waves of evil to protect Vonderam and their sisters.

Skill0.Name: Deep Sleep
Skill0.Comment: Engage one friendly uni and heal it 20HP. Engage one enemy unit until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Zzzâ€¦ I can't...keep my eyes...open.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell that will put people into a deep sleep, and is known to give them good dreams. It's said it was developed by students at the Regus Academy for pulling pranks during finals.

Soul.Name: Hand in Friendship
Soul.Comment: All enemy units get MAX HP-20.

Skill0.Name: Song of Friendship
Skill0.Comment: Remove one [subtype: mermaid] in your cemetery from the game, and then two random enemy units in range get HP-20 and AGI-2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Gygaaaaah!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the types of corrupted Mermaids. An evil manipulator put a curse on her, turning her into a horrible monster and driving her to hunt down and slaughter all of her closest friends.

Soul.Name: Eternal Love
Soul.Comment: Send 5 random [subtype: mermaid] cards from Card File to Cemetery. Return 3 random [subtype: deep ones] from Cemetery to Card File.

Skill0.Name: Song of Love
Skill0.Comment: Remove one [subtype: mermaid] unit in your cemetery from the game, and then engage target enemy in range until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Gya va va va va va!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the types of corrupted Mermaids. An evil manipulator put a curse on her, turning her into a horrible monster and driving her to murder the ones she loves the most.

Soul.Name: Mass Submersion
Soul.Comment: All disengaged enemy units get AGI=0.

Skill0.Name: Lunge from Below
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 80] to two random engaged enemy units. This unit gets AGI-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Wha- What the heck!?'
FlavorText.Text2: An enormous sea monster with a long neck that can snatch a bird flying out of the air with one strike. However, it's cold blooded and begins to slow down after some time out of the warm waters in which it lives.

Soul.Name: Challenge to Crest
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get AT-20 for this turn. Do [damage: your Refess level X 5] to those units.

Skill0.Name: Charge
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: ATX2] to a random enemy in range.  Do [damage: 50% of MAX HP] to this unit.

Skill1.Name: Draw the Second Sword
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets DF+5 and the Trait: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units in range. Remains after Revive.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll knock 'em down one after another... Here's another one!'
FlavorText.Text2: The most skilled of the dual-wielding Folrart soldiers are like a whirlwind on the battlefield.

Soul.Name: Light of the Sun
Soul.Comment: Remove one closed friendly unit from the game. And then, you get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: Decoy Tactics
Skill0.Comment: Engage one friendly disengaged [subtype: solar kingdom] unit, then engage one enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Deploy Resources
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] units heal 20 HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'No wonder we're always falling behind the other kingdoms... Look at this intelligence!'
FlavorText.Text2: An assistant to the Solar Prince, Verlaat. Her talent in political and military affairs has earned her the nickname: 'Verlaat's brain.' On behalf of Verlaat she's on a secret mission, beyond the scope of the War of the Sun and Moon.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy in range. If that unit's HP is 0 or below, set its MAX HP=0.

Soul.Name: Holy Claymore
Soul.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the MAX HP of target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Refuge of the Paladins
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy in range. If that unit's HP is 0 or below, set its MAX HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Paladin's Promise
Skill1.Comment: All friendly units get LV+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What is going to happen now?'
FlavorText.Text2: Young female paladins of the Solar Kingdom. When they were blessed with the honor of becoming paladins, they believed that their power would be used only for justice. They have no idea of what future that awaits them.

Soul.Name: Winged Poacher
Soul.Comment: Move units on enemy field from [area: 1-2-3] to [area: 7-8-9], and from [area: 7-8-9] to [area: 1-2-3].

Skill0.Name: Gift of Flight
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Flying Pounce
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AT 50 or higher] Do [damage: AT] to one enemy unit of your choice.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That creature is a mystery to me. I don't know how it came to be born... or made.'
FlavorText.Text2: A creature with a lion's torso, but an eagle's head and wings.  It possesses a level of intelligence that is alien to natural creatures, viciously attacking and feeding on settlements bordering its territory.

Skill0.Name: Disarmament
Skill0.Comment: Two enemy units get AT=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If the weapons crumble, no one can fight.'
FlavorText.Text2: Metal weapons are weak to rust, but holy magic can make all swords unbelievably dull.

Soul.Name: Lycanthropy / Echidna
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Return one random Lawtia card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Refuse to Die
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Fully restore HP. Rival Iczer gets SP-1.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Life of Torture
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit gets AT+50 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'She's already an enemy to all living things... That's the power of this disease.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world. Echidna is a very violent strain and needs to be exterminated with extreme prejudice immediately after detection.

Soul.Name: Return to Earth
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all enemy units. All enemy units get AGI-2 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Refresh
Skill0.Comment: Send [card: Revenant] from your Card File to the Cemetery and then, this unit fully recovers HP and a friendly unit gets AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'How can a zombie move so fast?!'
FlavorText.Text2: This rotten corpse can move and attack with great speed, powered by various dark energies. Any who expect undead to be slow and plodding will be slain before they can even react.

Soul.Name: Surgical Strike
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a random number of enemy units between 1 and 4.

Skill0.Name: Quick Kill
Skill0.Comment: Send target unit within range and level 4 or below to the Cemetery. Send this unit to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Mission accomplished. I'm no longer needed.'
FlavorText.Text2: A specially trained assassin, as fast as the wind and able to take down the enemy with one strike. People call them by many names, but their assassination skills live up to all of them.

Soul.Name: Soul Eating
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get DF=0. Do [damage: your Lawtia level X 5] to those units.

Skill0.Name: Dissipate
Skill0.Comment: Change battletime to night.

Skill1.Name: Poison the Living
Skill1.Comment: Engage target enemy unit. This unit gets HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What the hell is that!?'
FlavorText.Text2: When souls cannot rest in peace, they collect evil energy and become semi-solid. In their envy, they attempt to suffocate living beings.

Soul.Name: Make the Flowers Grow
Soul.Comment: All units get AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Life Drain
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 50% of this unit's MAX HP from the HP of one random enemy unit. This unit gets MAX HP+10 and is healed 10 HP. Engage this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hello, Mister. You're pretty handsome.'
FlavorText.Text2: A plant monster that developed when a field of special flowers was trampled in a battle and bathed in human blood. Now she lures men to her so she may continue to feast.

Soul.Name: Double Boomerang
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get AGI-2. Do [damage: your Gowen level X 5] to those units.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +20.

Skill0.Name: Boomerang Strike
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in [area: 1-2-3], [area: 4-5-6], and [area: 7-8-9].

FlavorText.Text1: 'An unusual weapon, isn't it? Have you seen anything like it before?'
FlavorText.Text2: A warrior that fights with an unusual throwing weapon called a boomerang. It is extremely difficult to master a boomerang for use in actual battlefield conditions.

Soul.Name: Consecutive Strikes
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all enemy units. All enemy units get AGI-2 for this turn.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +30.

Skill0.Name: Double Axe Attack
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: AT 50%] to two random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hiiii-ya!'
FlavorText.Text2: These warriors have a very muscular body and can use an axe in each hand. Their power is so great that even accomplished swordsmen and armored knights are no match for them.

Soul.Name: Hand in Friendship
Soul.Comment: All enemy units get MAX HP-20.

Skill0.Name: Song of Friendship
Skill0.Comment: Remove one [subtype: mermaid] in your cemetery from the game, and then two random enemy units in range get HP-20 and AGI-2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Gygaaaaah!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the types of corrupted Mermaids. An evil manipulator put a curse on her, turning her into a horrible monster and driving her to hunt down and slaughter all of her closest friends.

Soul.Name: Receding Windstorm
Soul.Comment: A random row of enemy units gets RNG-1.

Skill0.Name: Charm of the Wind Spirits
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units except this one get AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Berserk Wind
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 20 directly from the HP of all enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The will of the wind is my will.'
FlavorText.Text2: A sorceress who has mastered wind magic, successful even to the point of employing Djinn.  She lives like the wind does, never staying in one place for long.

Skill0.Name: Flanking Attack
Skill0.Comment: Move enemy units from [area: 1-2-3] to [area: 7-8-9], and from [area: 7-8-9] to [area: 1-2-3].

FlavorText.Text1: 'We're being attacked... From behind!!'
FlavorText.Text2: Strong warriors in the front and wizards in the back. Even with a textbook formation, an ambush from behind can easily rout their lines.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Sure Death 'Heaven's Gate: Release!'
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Falkow lvl X 5] to three random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Double Strike, Double Kill
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: Falkow level X 15] to two random enemy units. Decrease your Falkow level by three.

Skill1.Name: One-Inch Punch
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+ your SP X 5] to one random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll show you the results of my training!'
FlavorText.Text2: A division of martial artists who fight for the Wizard Kingdom. With magic spells, she can increase her attack power and her speed in an instant.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Battlefield Conditions
Soul.Comment: Units in [area: 1-2-3] get DF+10 on both sides of the field. Units in [area: 4-5-6] get RNG+1 on both sides of the field.

Skill0.Name: Pinpoint
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'When will the war end?'
