FlavorText.Text2: A soldier in the mermaid army that is under the protection of Vonderam. She was ordered by Vonderam to take the field and help prolong the war between the humans. However, she sees no good reason for fighting and is even starting to doubt Princess Emana's words.

Soul.Name: Ultimate Magic Bow
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get [AT + their level x 5].

Skill0.Name: Pinpoint
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

Skill1.Name: Magic Bow
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit.  That unit gets AGI-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If we increase their attack power with magic, everyone will take notice of the results.'
FlavorText.Text2: Archers of the Wizard Kingdom.  They fire at their enemies with magically endowed bows.  These enchantments can pierce any target and bind its movements.

Skill0.Name: Frozen Lance
Skill0.Comment: All enemy units get AGI-3 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This is bad. It's raining lances!'
FlavorText.Text2: Lances of water created by magic. Anyone struck by one will be paralyzed for a short time, giving their enemies a chance to get the jump on them.

Soul.Name: Crimson Radiance
Soul.Comment: Return two random cards from your Cemetery to your Card File. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Ruby Radiance
Skill0.Comment: This unit and the units to the left and the right get DF+5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: â€˜We still wish them the best.'
FlavorText.Text2: A type of carbuncle with a red gem in its forehead. Legends say that carbuncles exist to protect people. However, in recent years, humans have been trying to stop them from running wild in the streets of towns. Terrified of getting caught, this family of carbuncles have been living unprotected in the forest.

Soul.Name: Stalking Death
Soul.Comment: Send one friendly unit to the Cemetery.  After that, send one disengaged enemy unit of your choice to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Kill
Skill0.Comment: Set one enemy unit within range to HP=0. Send one random unit card from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Happiness, huh...'
FlavorText.Text2: A female assassin who makes her living in the dark shadows of society. What does she think about as she looks down at the town filled with holiday festivities?

Soul.Name: A Battle Forgotten
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. You get SP+1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Predator Takes First Blood
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT 50%] to one enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'They are after me even now... What a waste.'
FlavorText.Text2: To ensure his survival he always slays enemy mercenaries ruthlessly. This has earned him a bad reputation, and the name 'Roaming Predator.' Because of his methods and his past jobs, one might think he is a vicious individual, but actually he is calm and sensible. This is true even when beset by assassins.

Soul.Name: Uncontrollable Flying Magic
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of level 5 or above to its Card File. And then, you get one less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Confusion Spell
Skill0.Comment: Move units on enemy field from [area: 1-2-3] to [area: 7-8-9], and from [area: 7-8-9] to [area: 1-2-3].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh gosh, if this keeps happening I'm gonna be late!'
FlavorText.Text2: It's the day she promised to meet the one special in her heart, but she's running late. Will she make it, or will he think she has forgotten and leave?

Soul.Name: Imbalance of Light
Soul.Comment: Increase each Iczer's SP by the number of cards in each Iczer's Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Imbalance of Power
Skill0.Comment: Increase both Iczer's SP by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Could this be... snow?'
FlavorText.Text2: When Miffyre was preparing to escape to the Solar Kingdom, she saw snow falling on Lavato for the first time in her life. Entranced by the beautiful white snow, she rushed outside despite Scarrion's advice.

Soul.Name: Wounding Hands
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all units.

Skill0.Name: The Last Dance Macabre
Skill0.Comment: Target enemy unit gets HP=0. Target friendly unit gets HP=0, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hey there, do you have a home to go back to?'
FlavorText.Text2: She never gets a day of rest, even on the holidays. Today, a man died by her hand in the white snow. She thinks 'today is a day for confessing and being cleansed of sin, but I have committed one instead.' Escaping down a dark street, a curious cat approaches her...

Soul.Name: Make the Flowers Grow
Soul.Comment: All units get AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Life Drain
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 50% of this unit's MAX HP from the HP of one random enemy unit. This unit gets MAX HP+10 and is healed 10 HP. Engage this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, it's a beautiful day, but you are so cold, mister!'
FlavorText.Text2: Alraune are flower women, plant monsters in human shape. They have no problem with the cold. They just try to lure men into their arms as they always do, for men are their prey.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Battlefield Conditions
Soul.Comment: Units in [area: 1-2-3] get DF+10 on both sides of the field. Units in [area: 4-5-6] get RNG+1 on both sides of the field.

Skill0.Name: Pinpoint
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: Oh my...it's...so cold...'
FlavorText.Text2: Mermaids live in freedom when they have no orders from Vonderam. This mermaid was playing near the land, and saw snow for the first time. She was enchanted by how cold and beautiful the snow was.

FlavorText.Text1: Includes Draft Tournament Entry and 5 Drafting Packs
FlavorText.Text2: Keep all the cards you draft, and earn even more prizes based on your record! Go to the Arena and click on the Gran Draft Tournament to begin. Draft your cards from the 5 included drafting packs, then build a deck and duel. You must complete 5 battles in 12 hours.

FlavorText.Text1: Includes Draft Tournament Entry and 5 Drafting Packs
FlavorText.Text2: Keep some of the cards you draft and earn additional prizes, all based on your record! Go to the Arena and click on the FM Draft Tournament to begin. Draft your cards from the 5 included drafting packs, then build a deck and duel. You must complete 5 battles in 12 hours.

FlavorText.Text1: Draft Tournament Reward
FlavorText.Text2: You get to keep a copy of every card you drafted during the drafting phase of this tournament. If you drafted one copy of a card but were allowed 3 during deck building, you only keep one copy. However, if you drafted multiple copies, you get to keep them.

FlavorText.Text1: Draft Tournament Reward
FlavorText.Text2: You get to keep a copy of every 1-star rarity card you drafted during the drafting phase of this tournament. If you drafted one copy of a card but were allowed 3 during deck building, you only keep one copy. However, if you drafted multiple copies, you get to keep them.

FlavorText.Text1: Draft Tournament Reward
FlavorText.Text2: You get to keep a copy of every 1-star and 2-star rarity card you drafted during the drafting phase of this tournament. If you drafted one copy of a card but were allowed 3 during deck building, you only keep one copy. However, if you drafted multiple copies, you get to keep them.

Soul.Name: Defend at All Costs
Soul.Comment: Increase your Refess level by 2. Increase your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Fight of the Bodyguard
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+DF] to one random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Identify yourself!'
FlavorText.Text2: Specially trained bodyguards who protect the royalty of the Solar Kingdom. Their power rivals that of the strongest assault knights, but their true potential only manifests when they are protecting others.

Soul.Name: Torrent of Power [Holy]
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to all Lawtia units.

Skill0.Name: Roar of Light
Skill0.Comment: All enemy units get AT-10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'These people worship a dragon of all things.  That can't be a good idea.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the legendary Dragon Kin, the most powerful type of creatures on Lavato.  This particular breed is gentle and dislikes conflict.  They even try to understand human life and coexist with the civilizations of man.

Soul.Name: Mad Prayer
Soul.Comment: You get SP+1->3.

Skill0.Name: Contagious Madness
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: undead] units get LV+1, AT+10 and AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Heh. Heh, hehee.  Bwahahahahahahahaha!  This is it! Gwe hehehehehehehe!'
FlavorText.Text2: A priest whose mind snapped after he came face to face with the poorly commented code of Envoy of Chaos Elgandi. Many who learn the truth behind the servants of chaos share this fate. Perhaps this is why no one has discovered Annarose's true identity.

Soul.Name: No One Saw Anything
Soul.Comment: All units are engaged until the end of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Sword of Murder
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/your SP is 10 or lower] Set all enemy units to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Well, well. Mistress Annarose must be having a difficult time. Otherwise, she wouldn't have summoned me, right?'
FlavorText.Text2: A servant of Annarose who is known as LeBeau's big brother. Not a single one of his targets has ever survived. Now, he's received a new order from Annarose: eliminate Belfyna, who has failed in her mission.

Soul.Name: Make the Flowers Grow
Soul.Comment: All units get AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Life Drain
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 50% of this unit's MAX HP from the HP of one random enemy unit. This unit gets MAX HP+10 and is healed 10 HP. Engage this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hello, Mister. You're pretty handsome.'
FlavorText.Text2: A plant monster that developed when a field of special flowers was trampled in a battle and bathed in human blood. Now she lures men to her so she may continue to feast.

Soul.Name: History of Battle
Soul.Comment: Increase your Gowen level by 2. Increase your Refess level by 1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets DF +10.

Skill0.Name: The Higher the Fee
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets Lv+1, AT+20 and DF+5. Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I only do what I'm paid to. No more, no less, got it?'
FlavorText.Text2: True mercenaries only do exactly the work they're paid for. In fact, it is said that the higher the fee, the physically stronger the true mercenary gets.

Soul.Name: Purity of the Blade
Soul.Comment: Increase your Falkow level by 2. Increase your Refess level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Enchanted Rapier
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets [AT+ AGI X 10] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This is as far as you go.'
FlavorText.Text2: These are the pure sword masters of the Wizard Kingdom, among the most respected in Lavato. With a lightning-fast lunge, a fencer can impale the enemy before he gets the chance to move.

Soul.Name: Power of Regrowth
Soul.Comment: Target friendly unit fully recovers its HP, or is Revived.

Skill0.Name: Grow in Forest Soil
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 3 or higher] You get 4 SP. Decrease your Gowen level by one.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The forest is unhappy. I'm counting on you, Athira.'
FlavorText.Text2: A master class wizard from the Wizard Kingdom. She uses her magic to control nature and bring out the potential of its power.

Soul.Name: Light of Dusk
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units of DF 1 or higher get MAX HP-DFx2.

Skill0.Name: For His Own Ends
Skill0.Comment: One friendly [subtype: true god church] unit gets AT=MAX HP and AGI+1 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Serve the Church Forever
Skill1.Comment: Revive one closed friendly [subtype: true god church] unit and give him MAX HP+20 and AGI=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Your curiosity has only brought you death.'
FlavorText.Text2: The most powerful Cardinal in the Church of the True God during the reign of Solar Prince Verlaat. He supports Verlaat and most consider him a great friend to the Solar Kingdom, but his true intention is to use the True God Church for his own ends.

Soul.Name: Arms and Armor of Faith
Soul.Comment: One random friendly unit gets AT+30 and DF+30. You get 1 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Touched by the Sun
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Refess level 6 or lower] Increase your Refess level by one.

Skill1.Name: Slash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

Skill2.Name: Shield Breaker
Skill2.Comment: Set a random enemy in range to DF=0 and do [damage: AT] to it.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Follow us! We have the protection of Refess! Don't let the enemy close to the Holy Realm!'
FlavorText.Text2: A special division of Folrart knights assigned to protect the shrine called the Holy Realm. They don't follow the True God Church, but are part of an order that still worships Refess, the goddess who governs light and the stars.

Soul.Name: Grief Comes Quickly
Soul.Comment: One random unit gets AGI+1.

Skill0.Name: Do You Want to Die?
Skill0.Comment: Mark one disengaged unit.

Skill1.Name: Mask of Lament
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT-10] to one random enemy unit in range. If enemy unit's HP is 0 or below, target friendly unit gets AT+20.

Skill2.Name: Black Tears
Skill2.Comment: One random Marked unit gets HP=0. And then, decrease your Lawtia LV by 2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Do you want to die? Do you want to suffer?'
FlavorText.Text2: Folfenac is a devil in stories that are used to scare children. He was a killer, but he did so many evil deeds that he was changed into a devil. The stories say that on moonless nights he steal human souls, and then tortures them over many years. Sometimes, he disguises himself as his victim, and visits their house to steal the souls of their family.

Soul.Name: Fangs of Night
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. No Grimoire card in either Iczer's Card File may be set for 2 turns.

Skill0.Name: Share the Darkness
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT + Rival Iczer's Lawtia level X 10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Shadow Fog
Skill1.Comment: Target enemy unit gets AT-30 for this turn. Increase Rival Iczer's Lawtia level by two.

FlavorText.Text1: 'H-How the heck did a wyvern get in here!?'
FlavorText.Text2: A nocturnal wyvern that hunts all night. It's strangely well-tempered, and can even be tamed by humans.

Soul.Name: Impulse
Soul.Comment: All enemy units of DF 1 or higher get DF=0. For each enemy affected, one random friendly unit with a DF of 0 gets AT+30 and AGI+2.

Skill0.Name: Anger
Skill0.Comment: Remove one unit card in your Cemetery from the game. And then, this unit gets AT+10 and AGI+3 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Violence
Skill1.Comment: Remove one [subtype: undead] card in your Cemetery from the game. And then, do [damage: ATx3] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Isn't anyone strong enough to put me to sleep forever? ...Please.'
FlavorText.Text2: An eminently skilled martial artist in life, he was killed by a bolt of lightning. When he returned from death, he had turned into a destructive monster that does nothing but walk the lands, brutally beating to death any who stand before him.

Soul.Name: Poison Spears
Soul.Comment: All enemy units get MAX HP-10 and AT-10.

Skill0.Name: Death to Nature's Enemy
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the MAX HP of one random enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Sisterhood
Skill1.Comment: One random friendly [card: EX: Amazon] unit gets AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Lancer
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Nobody knows any details about them, but they're good in a fight. That's for sure.'
FlavorText.Text2: An all-female tribe that settled deep in the jungle. The stuff of rumors and tall tales, their combat prowess lets them cut down highly trained armies in no time.

Soul.Name: A Violent End
Soul.Comment: Subtract 60 directly from the HP of one enemy unit with an AT of 50 or higher. Subtract 50 directly from the HP of one enemy unit with an AT of 40 or lower.

Skill0.Name: Path to Glory
Skill0.Comment: The units on the left and right of this unit get AT+10 and RNG+2 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Glory or Infamy
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets AT+ the AT of target friendly unit for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I finally have it... the power I've been looking for! The power I deserve!'
FlavorText.Text2: Adventurers and mercenaries who travel the world call it the Sword of Glory. It is believed that the sword will bring certain victory to whomever possesses it. However, the sword's true nature is pure evil, wandering from corpse to corpse. It doesn't take over its owner's mind, but the owner is guaranteed a violent death.

Soul.Name: Greater Magic Sword
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. One friendly unit gets AGI+1.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Force Blade
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets AT-50%. Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. That unit is moved to a random open area.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Regus guards have perfect defense; their swordsmen are masters of offense. Think that's fair? Wait till you see them move.'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordsman of the Wizard Kingdom, Regus.  He fights with weapons produced by the power of magic.

Soul.Name: Moonlight
Soul.Comment: Move units on enemy field from [area: 1-2-3] to [area: 7-8-9], and from [area: 7-8-9] to [area: 1-2-3].

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Amethyst Corrosion
Skill1.Comment: All enemy units in range get DF=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Humans sure like these festivals.'
FlavorText.Text2: A gem beast who has a violet stone on her brow. Most gem beasts live in packs, but amethyst carbuncles prefer solitude. This one has gained human form thanks to Black Cat Fellana's experiments. Showing up at the All Hallows' Eve festival, she's mistaken for a girl in a costume.

Soul.Name: Cursed Magic
Soul.Comment: Increase your Lawtia level by 2. Increase your Falkow  level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Ritual of Youth
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets HP=10, AT+20 and AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's a party! I'm having a party, see? Hehehe...'
FlavorText.Text2: She has learned nothing since birth but the rituals of her magic. Hearing about the fun everyone has at the All Hallow's Eve festivals, she used her magic to possess objects around her and make them dance. Talking to herself, she dances with them and thinks she's experiencing the festival.

Soul.Name: The Voice of the Wind
Soul.Comment: Increase your Gowen level by 2. Increase your Falkow level by 1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, RNG +1.

Skill0.Name: Slash
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hey, stop it!'
FlavorText.Text2: It is traditional in the Solar Kingdom to dress up in costume for All Hallows' Eve. This year, Lapierre convinced a visiting girl Samurai from the Far East to take part. However, her unique costume has attracted more attention than she's used to!

Soul.Name: Spell: Grand Explosion
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow lvl 3 or higher] Do [damage: 50] to two random disengaged enemy units. Decrease Falkow level by 3.

Skill0.Name: Chant of Flames
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: number of friendly Gowen units X 30] to two random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1:
'Heh, Addition, you are enjoying this, aren't you?'
 - Femiel
FlavorText.Text2: In the Wizard Kingdom, stories of horrors and scares are not part of their tradition. However, they do celebrate All Hallows' Eve to pay respects to their ancestors. Last year, Black Cat Fellana's costume was the hit of the festival, so the archmages decided to send a representative again this year. After plenty of arguments, Addition was selected to appear in costume

Soul.Name: Gleaming Blade Almira
Soul.Comment: Return three random Refess cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Ready... (Blinding Strike)
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT X 2 and AGI = 1.

Skill1.Name: Duel! (Blinding Strike)
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit's AGI=1] Do damage 40 to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I swear by this beautiful flower... that I will protect her.'
FlavorText.Text2: New captains of the Shrine Knights are appointed when the cherry blossoms bloom in the Solar Kingdom. This year, she was chosen to be the leader of the Knights of the Second Shrine because of her leadership and fighting strength. It is the moment she's been aspiring to all her life, to be accepted to serve as Lapierre's right hand.

Soul.Name: Path of Red
Soul.Comment: Send target closed unit directly to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Hate System
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: LV X 10] to a target column of enemy units in range.

Skill1.Name: Thorns of the Rose
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit's lvl 5 or higher] do [damage: LV X 10] to a random row of enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Three sisters named for flowers. But only the Rose is known for its thorns. I wonder why that makes me feel sad?'
FlavorText.Text2: In the springtime, Scarlet Rose often stops to examine the flowers. Perhaps she is looking for the flowers she and her sisters were named for. But since she was given the order to betray and kill her mistress Belfyna, a strange new expression crosses her face when she walks among the flowers. Is it possible for a Magic Doll to feel sadness?

Soul.Name: From a Forgotten People
Soul.Comment: Return one random disengaged non-Character of level 3 or below to its Card File. You get two less SP at the beginning of next turn.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Holy Sword: Arken
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT+10 from the MAX HP of a target column of enemy units in range.

Skill1.Name: Soulblade: Difora
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+20] to two random enemy units in range. Subtract one from your LP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Flowers... The flower gardens back home were beautiful too.'
FlavorText.Text2: Cassandra is hunting a man in her quest to avenge her family. She shows her true self inadvertently as she remembers the flower gardens by her home when her family still lived. Her life may be filled with bitterness and anger now, but deep inside beats a kind and beautiful heart. Will she ever be able to live as her true self again?

Soul.Name: Song of Paradise
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of AGI 4 or higher to its Card File. You get two less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Song of Insanity
Skill0.Comment: Remove one [subtype: mermaid] unit in your Cemetery from the game, and then all friendly units get AT+20 and AGI +2 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Where did this flower come from? It feels so warm and nice.'
FlavorText.Text2: Before she was corrupted by the curse of an evil manipulator, she served as the general of the elite Mermaid knights as well as the right hand of Mermaid Captain Balzelda. She helped keep Balzelda's combative personality under control, and her gentle character was well liked by everyone. She learned that Spring had come in the world above when she found a cherry blossom branch floating in the sea. She sang a song of its warmth and happiness to the royal family.

Skill0.Name: Protection Arrow
Skill0.Comment: Target unit gets +5 DF for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Light of Rebirth
Skill1.Comment: The first time this Skill is activated, this unit fully recovers its HP. The second time, send this unit directly to the cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Grant me power, magic that flows all around us...'
FlavorText.Text2: Members of the Sun Bow Archers, a division of the Solar Kingdom's Royal Knights. They're able to harness the magic energy that flows throughout Lavato, unaware that it's the remnants of the energy of the four sleeping gods of old.

Soul.Name: Glimpse of Sun
Soul.Comment: Send five random [subtype: undead] cards from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Grace of the Princess
Skill0.Comment: Revive one random friendly closed [subtype: solar kingdom] unit.

Skill1.Name: Warmth of the Princess
Skill1.Comment: All friendly units heal 10 HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Brother Verlaat, be careful...'
FlavorText.Text2: The princess of the Solar Kingdom and younger sister of Verlaat. Her smile shines warmly over the people of the Solar Kingdom, who all love her. Aliria has no training, but the sun has given her a gift of power that rivals a high priestess. She is like the bogeyman to sentient undead, who whisper of her as 'the other half of the sun.'

Skill0.Name: Aura of the Holy Emperor
Skill0.Comment: Revive one closed friendly Refess unit. If there is an enemy unit of level 4 or higher, send 2 cards from your cemetery to the card file with the same level as the revived unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That's the true radiance of the Holy Emperor... The aura of purification.'
FlavorText.Text2: The aura used by the True Holy Emperor, Retear, king among dragon kings. It was witnessed in the fight against the army of undead at the end of Battle for the Holy Realm. This aura has the power to save anyone from perishing.

Soul.Name: Brother and Sister United
Soul.Comment: All units are fully healed.

Skill0.Name: Bond of Golden Wings
Skill0.Comment: Friendly [card: Twin Wing Knight / Glosfiea] gets AT+10 and AGI+2. All friendly [subtype: solar kingdom] units are healed 10 HP.

Skill1.Name: Winged Rebirth
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Return one random level 2 unit card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Fiea, don't do anything dangerous. Returning in one piece is also part of our duty.'
FlavorText.Text2: An elite member of the royal guard of the Solar Kingdom. He always serves as the watchdog of his competitive tomboy of a sister, Glosfiea. They each wear magic armor that allows them to share and reinforce each other's power.

Soul.Name: Sister and Brother United
Soul.Comment: One random unit gets DF+10.

Skill0.Name: Bond of Silver Wings
Skill0.Comment: Friendly [card: Twin Wing Knight / Bistya] gets AT+10 and DF+10. All friendly [subtype: solar kingdom] units are healed 10 HP.

Skill1.Name: Winged Rebirth
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Return one random level 2 unit card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Bisty! Don't hide behind me, fight beside me!'
FlavorText.Text2: An elite member of the royal guard of the Solar Kingdom. She always tries to protect her timid brother, Bistya. They each wear magic armor that allows them to share and reinforce each other's power.

Skill0.Name: Peace Negotiations
Skill0.Comment: You get SP = Rival Iczer's SP.

FlavorText.Text1:
-'Let us make peace. To defeat our true enemy.'
-'I agree.'
FlavorText.Text2: After fighting through many hardships and piercing many veils of treachery, Verlaat and Eskatia finally make peace. However, the forces of chaos are not about to take this lying down and the war reaches a new level.

Soul.Name: Caught in the Battle
Soul.Comment: All units get AT+10 and DF+10.

Skill0.Name: Innocence and Experience
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+ Rival Iczer's SP X 5 for this turn and LV=4.

Skill1.Name: Driven into a Corner
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AT50 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Is this really it... is this going to be the place where we die?'
FlavorText.Text2: The Lady Paladins of the Solar Kingdom were sent on a reconnaissance mission under the direct order of The True God Church. However, they were ambushed by a mysterious army from Crest and driven into a battle that made the innocent into veterans in an instant. Fighting off absolute despair, they still hope to survive.

Soul.Name: Experience is Power
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Refess level X 5] to three random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Smite
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+30] to target enemy unit in range. Subtract 30 directly from this unit's HP.

Skill1.Name: Lay on Hands
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this units's HP is 20 or lower] This unit is fully healed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I wouldn't call this a crisis. You haven't seen anything yet.'
FlavorText.Text2: The most experienced unit of paladins from the Solar Kingdom. They know how to hit the enemy and hit hard, but the real reason they've survived this long is that they put their priority on healing themselves instead of others.

Soul.Name: Layers of Light
Soul.Comment: Return three random [subtype: carbuncle] cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Combat Blessing
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get AT+5 this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Agate Power
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets AT+ the AT of target friendly [subtype: carbuncle] for this turn, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You think that Carbuncles are peaceful and no good in a fight? You haven't seen one of these yet.'
FlavorText.Text2: A gem beast with an agate stone in its forehead. Legends say that when the stone begins to glow, it borrows the power from its fellows and uses it to defend them without hesitation.

Soul.Name: Blessing of the Fey World
Soul.Comment: If Refess is lvl is 4 or lower, send 4 Refess unit cards from your cemetery to the card file. Otherwise, you get SP+2 and Refess+1.

Skill0.Name: Luck of the Cat
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+0->1. If you get SP0, all friendlies are healed 10HP.

Skill1.Name: Magic Boots
Skill1.Comment: Send this unit to the cemetery. Increase your Refess level by 1 and you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Meow meow meow meow-meow. Meow meow meow-meowâ™ª'
FlavorText.Text2: A rare type of fairy that can walk on its own two feet. It uses a cat's body to travel around the world of mortals, and legends have it that seeing one on your travels will bring you good luck.

Skill0.Name: Light Flash
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 10->40 directly from the HP of target enemy column.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It happened so fast! There was a bright flash and the enemies were knocked flat!'
FlavorText.Text2: This spell produces a spear light that can penetrate the target with absolute accuracy and come out the other side.

Soul.Name: Soul of Compassion
Soul.Comment: Target friendly unit gets MAX HP+50 and is fully healed. One random enemy unit gets MAX HP+50 and is fully healed.

Skill0.Name: Sublime Sacrifice
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly unit gets MAX HP+ this unit's HP and is fully healed. And then, this unit gets HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh my, what's wrong dear ones?'
FlavorText.Text2: A beautiful priestess who runs an orphanage in a little town on the outskirts of the Solar Kingdom. She takes in and raises the children who have lost their parents in war.

Soul.Name: Stampede
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to all enemy units in [area: 1-3-5-7-9]. Engage all enemy units in [area: 2-4-6-8].

Skill0.Name: Mild Temperament
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot use the Attack action.

Skill1.Name: Brutal Trampling
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is in area [1-2-3]] Do [damage: AT] to all enemy units in range. Engage this unit.

Skill2.Name: Enrage
Skill2.Comment: This unit gets AT+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Once it starts running wild, nothing can stop it.'
FlavorText.Text2: A strange monster that appears to be a giant hairy elephant. They appeared in the northern areas of the land of Lavato and grew huge. Normally they're very well-tempered, but once one becomes upset, nothing can stand in its way.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Orders from the Church
Soul.Comment: Increase your Refess level by 1. Increase your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Perfect Calm
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: true god church] units get AT+10 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Disciplined Strike
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Let's take the the gloves off.'
FlavorText.Text2: A believer of the True God Church. From her unique training she's mastered fighting in hand-to-hand combat. Because of her unwavering faith in the True God Church, her focus is far superior to that of other martial artists.

Soul.Name: Blessed Kill
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. If that unit's HP is 0 or below, all friendly units get AT+10 and DF+10.

Skill0.Name: Ignore the Pain
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/10 or less cards in your file] This unit is fully healed.

Skill1.Name: Berserk Rage
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/5 or less cards in your file] Do [damage: AT X 2] to one random enemy row in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My sword's gone dull, I can't kill them in one strike...just break all their bones and leave them on the battlefield.'
FlavorText.Text2: A soldier of the Solar Kingdom who has been caught in a fierce battle. While his allies die all around him, he'll do whatever it takes to survive.

Skill0.Name: Cure Light
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly unit is healed 40 HP. You get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Stop complaining, I healed you enough. You can hold out for a while!'
FlavorText.Text2: A miracle power that can heal simple wounds in an instant. Folrart Priests rarely have the time to use their strongest healing spells in battle, but this one sees a lot of use because it's instantaneous.

Skill0.Name: Deathmaker
Skill0.Comment: Send target enemy unit directly to the cemetery. Target unit gets HP=0. You get Lawtia -1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Mistress Annarose will not see you now... No one ever gets past me.'
FlavorText.Text2: The vicious sword once used by Afel, servant to Chaos Lady Annarose. It controls the murderous intent of whoever wields it, and transforms them into a perfect killer who must obey Annarose.

Soul.Name: Anthem of Crest
Soul.Comment: Send target level 3 unit directly to the cemetery. And then, you get one less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Guard Captain's Formation
Skill0.Comment: Target [subtype: duchy of crest] non-character gets AT+20.

Skill1.Name: Be a Sword for the Duchy
Skill1.Comment: Select one friendly [subtype: duchy of crest] unit. Do [damage: chosen unit's AT] to target enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Very well. Give the messenger a polite response, but don't let any of Annarose's men see you go.'
FlavorText.Text2: The captain of the guards that protect Princess Eskatia and the castle in the Duchy of Crest. She also serves as one of Eskatia's most trusted advisers. When Verlaat approached Crest and tried to negotiate for peace, Afeemina is the one who made it happen.

Soul.Name: Demand the Attack
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. If that unit's HP is 0 or below, rival Iczer gets SP-2.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Lighthearted Smile
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Servant of Chaos / Gangadore is open or closed on the field] Do [damage: 50] to one random enemy unit.

Skill2.Name: Dark Summoning
Skill2.Comment: Return one random Lawtia [subtype: monster] card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What is this giant floating eyeball? Wah! It's... It's so... It's so... cuuuuuuuuute!!!'
FlavorText.Text2: Annarose's favorite court wizard. She may look little and cute on the outside, but she delights in the most horrible, disgusting of things. Her hobby is to summon and control monsters, or even create new ones from the depths of her imagination. Her closest servant is a monster called Gangandore.

Soul.Name: Ferocious Evil
Soul.Comment: Send all cards in your Card File to your Cemetery. Return two cards from your Cemetery to your Card File. Send all units cards from your Cemetery out of game.

Skill0.Name: Dark Evocation
Skill0.Comment: You get one less SP at the beginning of next turn. Decrease your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill1.Name: Uncontrollable Violence
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Dark Evocator / Domina is open or closed on the field] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy column in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Gan-chan! Kill them all!'
FlavorText.Text2: A man-made being created by Dark Evocator Domina. Its intelligence is low, but it's very obedient and has enough power to tear an armored knight in half. It obeys Domina's orders without fail. When Verlaat comes to the Duchy of Crest to negotiate peace, Gangadore is sent to hunt him down.

Skill0.Name: Deadly Scheme
Skill0.Comment: Set one random unit to HP=0, except [card: Chaoslady / Annarose].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Do you really think you can outsmart me?'
FlavorText.Text2: This woman is an agent of the Envoy of Chaos, Elgandi. She controls the Duchy of Crest from the shadows, and is the driving force behind the War of the Sun and Moon. But her cunning plans are not over yet...

Soul.Name: Lycanthropy / Taurus
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] One random enemy column gets HP=0.

Skill0.Name: 1st stage: Fury of Living
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night and Lawtia lvl 1 or higher] You get Lawtia-1. This unit gets LV+1 and is fully healed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This creature tears through humans like they were trash.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lyncanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world. Taurus is a very ferocious strain that even resists the purifying effects of sunlight. Just one person with this disease can destroy a whole town.

Soul.Name: Broken Dolls
Soul.Comment: Return three random [subtype: magic doll] cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Mana Cannon
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of all enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Intruders detected. Distance 100. All targets within range.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer. Her basic abilities are no better than the average magic doll, but she has a special magic cannon installed in her that can annihilate an entire army.

Soul.Name: Doll Invasion
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: magic doll] units get AT+20 and AGI+2.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Acceleration System
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/a friendly closed [subtype: magic doll] unit is on the field] This unit gets AT+20 and AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Analyzing enemy fighting strength. Releasing all combat locks.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer. This one is a mass-produced model, extremely popular all over the Duchy of Crest. Its efficiency and speed is among the best of all Magic Dolls.

Soul.Name: Sword of the Slayer
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Lawtia level X 5] to three random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Jagged Wound
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in range. That unit gets AT-10 and AGI-1.

Skill1.Name: And Stay Dead
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit's HP is 30 or higher] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. Remove from the game two random cards from rival Iczer’s Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'There's only one of me. Don't be afraid. Go on, stab me.'
FlavorText.Text2: Knights from the Duchy of Crest survive long enough to become veterans not because of their defensive abilities, but because they ignore their wounds and kill or cripple their enemies quickly and viciously.

Skill0.Name: Split Second Decision
Skill0.Comment: Engage one friendly unit. Do [damage: that unit's AT] to target enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Whoever makes the best decision in that instant wins.'
FlavorText.Text2: There are a lot of situations where a split second decision can result in your life or your death. One of the innate strengths of the knights and assassins of the Duchy of Crest is the talent to react instantly.

Soul.Name: Move by Night
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: duchy of crest] units get AGI+2.

Skill0.Name: Gale Formation
Skill0.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Gale Sword Awakened
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy row in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oops, I went past him.'
FlavorText.Text2: A specially-trained swordswoman from the Duchy of Crest. Annarose designed a special type of sword to be given to the troops that increases their speed. However, at midnight the sword's power can go out of control.

Soul.Name: Cut Down Horse and Rider
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 60] to target friendly unit. And then, do [damage: 60] to two target enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Full Swing
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT 50%] to one random enemy row in range.

Skill1.Name: More Like a Slab of Iron
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+20] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill2.Name: Enemy Reinforcements
Skill2.Comment: Return one random cards from Rival Iczer's Cemetery to the Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'All I know is how to swing my sword in battle.'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordsman from the Duchy of Crest who easily swings around a huge sword as big as he is. It's been said that it's too big to be called a sword, and is more like a slab of iron. When he swings it at cavalry, even the horses are cut in half.

Soul.Name: Sense of Adventure
Soul.Comment: Increase your Lawtia level by 1. Increase your Gowen level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Clever Diversion
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly [subtype: duchy of crest] unit gets DF+ its AT for this turn and is engaged.

Skill1.Name: Escape Artist
Skill1.Comment: Send this unit to the cemetery. Increase your Lawtia level by 1 and you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'No one would notice if I spent some time exploring before I head back...'
FlavorText.Text2: A scout from the Duchy of Crest, and one of the few who has been trained to survive in the wilderness. She's able to brew paralyzing poison from mushrooms, but she's likely to use it on her superior so she can sneak off and go exploring.

Soul.Name: Dance of the Deadly Blade
Soul.Comment: Send one friendly unit directly to the cemetery. And then, do [damage: 30] to all enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Wielding the Curse
Skill0.Comment: One random friendly unit gets AT+30 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Mind of its Own
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 20 directly from the HP of one random friendly unit and give it AT+20.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Many dangerous things look completely harmless. This is not one of those things.'
FlavorText.Text2: This sword gained consciousness by absorbing the evil energy of the graveyard it was buried in. It sees the value in its existence by killing people.

Skill0.Name: Creeping Hands
Skill0.Comment: Return two random unit cards of level 2 or lower from your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Those hands are the regrets of the dead given form.'
FlavorText.Text2: The hands of dead may try to drag living beings into the other world. The living often return, as they have no place there, but they are never the same again.

Soul.Name: Voice of the Dragon King
Soul.Comment: Return three random [subtype: dragon kin] cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Soul of the Dragon
Skill0.Comment: Send one random [subtype: dragon kin] card from your Card File to the Cemetery. And then, this unit fully recovers its HP.

Skill1.Name: Power of the Dragoneye
Skill1.Comment: Send two [subtype: dragon kin] cards from your Card File to the Cemetery. And then, this unit gets AT+10, AGI+1 and do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill2.Name: The Banner of Beltorat
Skill2.Comment: All friendly [subtype: beltorat kingdom] units get Rank Up.

FlavorText.Text1: 'There are plans within plans. The true enemy... is beyond even him.'
FlavorText.Text2: The king of a small nation near the Solar Kingdom. His eyes house an inhuman power to see the truth, earning him the name 'Dragoneye,' or 'the Dragon Eyed King.' He realizes the truth behind the war and believes that even defeating Elgandi is not enough. Then he sees the making of a civil war in the Wizard Kingdom, and decides to make his move.

Skill0.Name: Roar of the Flame Emperor
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: Gowen X 5] to all units of level 6 or lower. From now on, when you activate a [card: Roar of the Flame Emperor], add +10 damage.

FlavorText.Text1:
-'So, this is the power of justice that wiped out the Empire of Gabilab in a single night?'
-'No... this is only a small fraction of it.'
FlavorText.Text2: The battle cry of the Flame Emperor, Allind. The magic radiating just from his roar can cause the air to combust for miles around!

Soul.Name: Blind General's Barrage
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to three random units who are not [subtype: mercenary nation].

Skill0.Name: Lead From the Front Line
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT-10] to target enemy unit in range. If that unit's HP is 0 or below, all friendly [subtype: mercenary nation] units get AT+10, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Does it sound cool to say I've beaten all my enemies blindfolded?'
FlavorText.Text2: The commander of the standing army of the Mercenary Nation. In battle he lost vision in both his eyes, but he can still swing a sword more accurately than any normal fighter. Like many of his fellows, he began as an ordinary mercenary.

Soul.Name: Force of Nature
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your SP X 10] to two random disengaged enemy units.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, AT +10.

Skill0.Name: To Fight for a Cause
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: faerie] units get AT+20 and AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Inspired by Heroism
Skill1.Comment: Two friendly [subtype: faerie] units get AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Fey Blade
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. This effect is repeated a total of twice.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I will protect her!'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman pixy who's portrayed as a hero among fey folk. She carries a magic Fey Blade that can cut apart enemies like the wind. Despite her tiny size, she chooses to fight against humans.

Soul.Name: Damnation
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 60] to target enemy unit. Increase your SP by 4.

Skill0.Name: Indestructible Menace
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 6 or higher] This unit recovers 25% of its MAX HP. Decrease your Gowen level by 1.

Skill1.Name: Unstoppable Hunger
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 7 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to two random enemy units in range. Decrease your Gowen level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1:
-'Are we really supposed to fight this thing?'
-'Looks like it.'
Dilate and Cassandra, en route to Regus
FlavorText.Text2: A magical creature created by Galdirea, servant of the Envoy of Chaos, Elgandi. It is the horrific combination of every savage creature Galdirea could find, given powerful regenerative abilities just so it could keep from tearing itself apart.

Soul.Name: Love of Mother Nature
Soul.Comment: Return three random [subtype: faerie] cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Wrath of the Fey World
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: number of friendly subtype: faerie units X 10] to target enemy unit, max 30 damage.

Skill1.Name: Numbing Poison
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] and AGI-2 to one random enemy character in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It'll only sting for a second.'
FlavorText.Text2: An assassin who fits in the palm of a human, but can fight with deadly accuracy and numbing poisons. Even a full grown adult won't be able to survive their deadly strikes.

Soul.Name: Collateral Damage
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 80 divided by number of enemy units] to all enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Armor of the Arthropod
Skill0.Comment: If there are no friendly units, this unit gets AT+10 and DF+10.

Skill1.Name: Crushed By 1000 Legs
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to all enemy units in [area: 1-2-3].

FlavorText.Text1: 'W-What the heck is that!? I've never seen anything like it!'
FlavorText.Text2: An ancient insect and ancestor to both armored arthropods and many-legged millipedes. This one has been sleeping underground for thousands of years. It was awakened by a sudden earthquake and rose from the ground, destroying everything in its path.

Soul.Name: Wild Rush
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to two random enemy units. All friendly units get AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Broken Horns
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/AT 50 or higher] This unit gets AT=30.

Skill1.Name: Horned Charge
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AT 50 or higher] Do [damage: AT] to one enemy column in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Yep, she's a big one.'
FlavorText.Text2: A giant insect that grew large in the deep woods of Lavato where humans dare not venture. It uses the horns on its body to attack, which can be deadly. However, the monster is strong but brittle. A good attack can cripple it or break its horns.

Soul.Name: Mercenary Raid
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: mercenary nation] units get AGI+2.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Thrown Weapon
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit out of range. This unit gets AT=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Once you master a skill, gender doesn't matter.'
FlavorText.Text2: The Mercenary Nation relies on highly mobile light swordswomen in battle. Their power is average, but they are very agile so they're always one step ahead of the enemy.

Soul.Name: Savage Rampage
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen level X 5] to three random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Soulless Beast
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be affected, targeted, or randomly chosen by Soul Skills.

Skill1.Name: Ferocious Bite
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. Engage this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If you hear loud thumping that gets faster and faster, start running. As if your life depends on it!'
FlavorText.Text2: A large wyvern that lives in the same dense jungles where earth dragons live. It cannot fly, but it can run at high speed and devour anything. Because of its strange ferocity, tribal legends claim it is a soulless creature.

Soul.Name: Both Barrels
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one random enemy unit. Then, if that unit's HP is 0 or below, do [damage: 50] to one random enemy unit.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 7 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Rapid Fire
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'All right. Come on. Let's have a right honest duel.'
FlavorText.Text2: A skilled gunslinger from the Mercenary Nation who fights with two revolvers. He's so fast, his bullets hit the enemy before they even see him draw.

Soul.Name: Cleaving Swing
Soul.Comment: Engage one friendly unit. Do [damage: chosen unit's AT] to 3 random disengaged enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Disrupt Magic
Skill0.Comment: Neither Iczer can Set a Falkow grimoire card next turn or the turn after.

Skill1.Name: Seelie Sword
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in range. Then, if that unit's HP is 0 or below, all friendly [subtype: faerie] units get AT+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I may be small, but my sword isn't!'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman who fits in the palm of a human, but uses ancient faerie magic to make up for her small size. She defeats enemy spell casters by locking their magic, then attacking with a sword that gets stronger with each swing.

Soul.Name: Water of Life
Soul.Comment: Increase your Gowen level by 1. Increase your Falkow level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Secret Pixy Healing
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: faerie] units get LV+1, MAX HP+10 and are healed 10 HP.

Skill1.Name: Vanishing Glamour
Skill1.Comment: Send this unit to the cemetery. Increase your Gowen level by 1 and you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Let me heal your wound.'
FlavorText.Text2: A healer who fits in the palm of a human. They use their powers to heal the wounds of children and honest people. They may be small, but their ancient magic can heal injuries that no other spells can. Many healers wish to study them and learn their secret.

Soul.Name: Swarm Like Ants
Soul.Comment: All units of level 3 or lower get AGI+2 for this turn and AT+20 and DF+10.

Skill0.Name: Carrion Feeder
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to one random enemy unit in range. If that unit's HP is 0 or below, return one [card: Ant Swarm] from your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh no... get 'em off! Getemoffgetemoffgetemoff!!!!'
FlavorText.Text2: A large type of ant that lives in the deep woods. They're carnivorous and they have been known to swarm a human and take it home as their meal.

Skill0.Name: Gaia Fang
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to two random units of RNG 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The magic of the earth takes different shapes depending on who uses it.'
FlavorText.Text2: The magic of the earth. It sends a powerful attack through the ground, and will not fail to hit the target... as long as it can't fly, of course.

Soul.Name: Bored of Rabble
Soul.Comment: Return all level 2 units to their Card File. Rival Iczer gets SP+ number of returned units.

Skill0.Name: Regenerating Body
Skill0.Comment: This unit has its LV, AT, DF, AGI and RNG restored to their base values.

Skill1.Name: Perfect Immortality
Skill1.Comment: Return one [card: Paladin of Sin / Durendal] from your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm bored. Isn't that a good enough reason, Larut?'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the six paladins who protect the Wizard Kingdom. He is tempted by Abyssal Strategist Galdirea's offer and decides to betray the other paladins. However, to someone like him who has attained true immortality, both protecting the Wizard Kingdom and brutally betraying it are just ways to kill time.

Soul.Name: Dissection of the Will
Soul.Comment: All units cannot be hit by an Attack action for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Mimesis
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia lvl 1 or higher] This unit gets the LV, AT and DF of target enemy unit. Decrease your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill1.Name: Bladed Locks
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+ number of times you've invoked a Grimoire Card X 5] to a random enemy row in range. This counts as a Grimoire Activation.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, are those two sisters still going at it?'
FlavorText.Text2: A magic doll who was created by Abyssal Strategist Galdirea using the data of Esria, Astaforse and one other. Her purpose is to reach the Magic Archive in the center of the Wizard Kingdom.

Soul.Name: The Light of Love
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Increase your Refess level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Spell: Light of Justice
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Refess lvl 8 or lower] Increase your Refess level by 2.

Skill1.Name: Lance of Daybreak
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Refess lvl 6 or higher] Do [damage: your Refess level X 5] to target enemy unit in range. You get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It can't be true! He couldn't have betrayed us!?'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight of Regus who has the power to control light. Together with her partner, Urgrant, she's been assigned to investigate the mysterious enemy who has been trying to infiltrate the Wizard Kingdom. However, her spirit is broken when she learns that one of her close friends is the one who betrayed them.

Soul.Name: Darkness of Betrayal
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Increase your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Spell: Cutting Darkness
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia 8 or lower] Increase your Lawtia level by 2.

Skill1.Name: Rapier of Midnight
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia lvl 6 or higher] Do [damage: AT+ your Lawtia level X 5] to one random enemy unit in range. Rival Iczer gets SP-1, you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come back to me, Mar! He was your friend, but if we can't fight him together, he'll kill us both!'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight of Regus who can control darkness. Together with his partner, Marduk, he's been assigned to investigate the mysterious enemy who has been trying to infiltrate the Wizard Kingdom. He detests the betrayer for breaking Marduk's spirit.

Skill0.Name: Wrath of the Sea Lord
Skill0.Comment: Return one unit level 4 or below to its card file. Decrease your Falkow level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What power... so this is what the magicians of Regus based their spells on.'
FlavorText.Text2: The magic aura of the Sea Lord, Vonderam. Its power can banish even the most powerful of wizards.

Soul.Name: Spell Distruption
Soul.Comment: Send two random grimoire cards of level 3 or lower from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Spell Reflection
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be affected, targeted, or randomly chosen by Grimoires.

Skill1.Name: Grimoire Bane
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy in range.  Select a random Grimoire from rival's file and send it to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The shield deflects even the strongest spells.'
FlavorText.Text2: In a kingdom where magic is a way of life, no one understands better how important it is to defend against enemy spells. These specialized soldiers wield ancient magic shields and are trained in disrupting spell casters.

Soul.Name: Drive Away the Curse
Soul.Comment: Remove from the game up to 10 cards from rival Iczer’s Cemetery. If 10 cards are sent, increase your Falkow level by 3.

Skill0.Name: Activate the Rune Sword
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia lvl is 1 or higher] This unit gets AT+20 for this turn and AGI+1. Decrease your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill1.Name: Corruption of the Runes
Skill1.Comment: You get Lawtia level=1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My runes give my sword its power. But lately, it feels like they've gotten even stronger.'
FlavorText.Text2: A division of Regus soldiers who fight with rune-covered greatswords they create themselves. During Galdirea and Durendal's infiltration of the Regus army their magic swords were corrupted and filled with evil power.

Soul.Name: Deadly Swoop
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Falkow level X 5] to 3 random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Snatch from Above
Skill0.Comment: Engage one random enemy unit of RNG 1.

Skill1.Name: Powerdive
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+20] to target enemy unit of RNG 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'By the time you see it descending from above, it's already too late.'
FlavorText.Text2: A Wyvern that spots its prey from far above in the sky, and rapidly descends to catch it. Its flying speed, altitude, and diving power are much greater than any other wyvern's.

Skill0.Name: Forbidden Key
Skill0.Comment: Select one enemy unit. Set both Iczer's number of Grimoire activations equal to that unit's level.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's a very dangerous key. It'll eat away your mind just from holding it.'
FlavorText.Text2: A magic key which is overflowing with ominous power. No one has yet figured out how to handle it, but the wizards of Regus believe it could be a great benefit to their magic.

Skill0.Name: Frozen Cage
Skill0.Comment: Target enemy unit gets RNG=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You'll feel cold just for a second.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell that is simple in concept, but big in raw power. It traps the target accurately in a huge ice crystal.

Soul.Name: Scout at Dawn
Soul.Comment: Increase your Refess level by 1. Increase your Falkow level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Pinpoint
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

Skill1.Name: Intelligence Mission
Skill1.Comment: Send this unit to the cemetery. Increase your Falkow level by 1 and you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That's the enemy's line all right...'
FlavorText.Text2: The Wizard Kingdom employs dozens of kinds of scouts. This type specializes in long-distance missions and can cover more range accurately than any other.

Soul.Name: Path to Peace
Soul.Comment: Return three random [subtype: deep ones] cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Song of Peace
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+10. Remove one [subtype: mermaid] in your cemetery from the game, and then do [damage: AT] to two target enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ghvveah? Ghberaah!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the types of corrupted mermaids. Those who hoped only for peace were transformed into horrible monsters that get stronger and stronger as they keep fighting. If there is no enemy, they can always fight with themselves.

Soul.Name: Inhuman Swiftness
Soul.Comment: Engage one friendly unit. Do [damage: that unit's AGI X 10] to two random disengaged enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Dark Water Stealth
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be hit by an Attack action for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Poison Stinger
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one random enemy unit in range. That unit gets AT-10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'There's not much you can do about these things. They swim so silently you'll never notice one before it's too late.'
FlavorText.Text2: A giant ray that lives in the waters around the Wizard Kingdom. Its stealth is a perfect defense. And if you do manage to spear it, its barbed stinger will slash at you, delivering a poison strong enough to cripple a dragon.

Soul.Name: Ambush the Strong Ones
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/a lvl 6 or higher unit on the enemy field] 3 random friendly units get AT+20, DF+20 and AGI+1.

Skill0.Name: Early Warning
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Rival Iczer has more units on the field] All friendly units get AGI+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Huh? What ever could this be?'
FlavorText.Text2: A civilian volunteer that patrols the coasts near the Wizard Kingdom. Regus is threatened by attacks from the countries around it, and their vigilance could allow them to repel even a superior force. However, the kingdom is vulnerable to attacks from within.

Skill0.Name: Total Failure
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly unit is disengaged. Increase your Falkow level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hmm... That could have gone better.'
FlavorText.Text2: That's the funny thing about total failure, you get pretty good at cleaning up the mess.

Soul.Name: Divine Right
Soul.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT-10, MAX HP+30, HP+30 and DF+20.

Skill0.Name: Price of Ultimate Evil
Skill0.Comment: No unit card in your Card File may be set next turn.

Skill1.Name: Punishment of the Saint
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 10 directly from the HP of three random enemy units.

Skill2.Name: Golden Eyes
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Refess lvl 5 or higher] This unit gets LV=4 and DF=[number of enemy units X10].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hear me, people! We shall bring righteous judgment down upon evil!'
FlavorText.Text2: Pucera was one of the servants used by the saint of stone, Kathedra. She led the people as a divine agent on a world far from Lavato, and ended up burying them in an endless war.  Her gaze alone is enough to kill weaker men.

Soul.Name: Unleash Destruction
Soul.Comment: Send one random disengaged unit to the cemetery. Decrease your LP by 1.

Skill0.Name: Price of Ultimate Evil
Skill0.Comment: No unit card in your Card File may be set next turn.

Skill1.Name: Imperial Authority
Skill1.Comment: This unit cannot be affected, targeted, or randomly chosen by Grimoires.

Skill2.Name: Black Armor
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/this unit's HP is 40 or lower] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill3.Name: Black Sword
Skill3.Comment: Subtract AT from the HP of two random enemy units with HP 60 or higher. Engage this unit until the end of the game.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's so easy to destroy them when they're this weak.'
FlavorText.Text2: Joachim was one of the servants used by the saint of stone, Kathedra. He was a mad emperor on world far from Lavato who went to war with every other power on his planet. He collected countless mighty soldiers for the empire he built, but none could top Joachim's personal strength.

Soul.Name: Not in my Lexicon
Soul.Comment: Revive one friendly unit. And then, do [damage: 30] to two random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Price of Ultimate Evil
Skill0.Comment: No unit card in your Card File may be set next turn.

Skill1.Name: Definition of Unity
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 3 or higher] Target friendly unit of level 3 or lower gets LV+1, MAX HP+10, HP+10, AT+10, and RNG+1.

Skill2.Name: Find the Weak Link
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range and [HP = this unit's AT or below].

FlavorText.Text1: 'There's nothing my lexicon cannot fathom.'
FlavorText.Text2: Leopold was one of the servants used by the saint of stone, Kathedra. He was a soldier from a world far from Lavato who acquired a book containing absolute truth and decided to unify his world. He succeeded in founding a nation, but after learning via the lexicon of its downfall, he went crazy, bringing about that downfall himself.

Soul.Name: Think Three Moves Ahead
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. Rival Iczer gets one less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Price of Ultimate Evil
Skill0.Comment: No unit card in your Card File may be set next turn.

Skill1.Name: Destroy the Path
Skill1.Comment: This unit cannot be hit by an Attack action for this turn. Send one Grimoire Card from your Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill2.Name: Chaotic Winds
Skill2.Comment: All enemy units get AT-10 for this turn. This effect counts as a Grimoire activation.

Skill3.Name: Chaotic Storms
Skill3.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of one random enemy unit and give it LV-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My techniques are infallible.'
FlavorText.Text2: Gafc was a servant used by the saint of stone, Kathedra. He was the master of a method of analysis known as the Dragon Path from a world far from Lavato, where he served his lord faithfully. However, his great mental skill made him feared. He retired to the mountains, spending his last days watching the fall of the ruler in which he'd believed.

Soul.Name: Spell: 'Extreme Turbulence'
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Send one random Grimoire card from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Power of the Sky Staff
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow lvl 2 or higher] Return one random enemy unit of RNG 1 to its Card File.

Skill1.Name: Consequences of Power
Skill1.Comment: Decrease your Falkow level by one.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh no! Not again!'
FlavorText.Text2: A sorceress from the Wizard Kingdom. She's always having trouble using magic items, but today she's having a very hard time helping her friends make chocolate. She regrets not having taken any cooking classes at the academy.

Soul.Name: Power Drain
Soul.Comment: Return two random cards from your Cemetery to your Card File. Rival Iczer gets SP-1.

Skill0.Name: Assault System
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: magic doll] units get LV+1 and AT+10.

Skill1.Name: Dead Twice Over
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit's lvl 6 or higher] Set target enemy unit within range to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Chocolate... I want to eat it too.'
FlavorText.Text2: A custom Magic Doll with a huge sweet tooth. She was ordered by Belfyna to collect as much chocolate as she could. She didn't know the reason but she was very disappointed when she found out that she couldn't eat any of it.

Soul.Name: Magic Firestorm
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to units in [area: 4-5-6] on both sides of the field.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, RNG +1.

Skill0.Name: Flare Spell
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to a number of random enemy units equal to this unit's range. All units hit begin Burning.

Skill1.Name: Party Mage
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets RNG + number of friendly [subtype: mercenary nation] units for this turn. Do [damage: AT] to one random Burning unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I already have that, so all I need to buy is this one...'
FlavorText.Text2: The custom of giving chocolate to someone you like has also been catching on in the Mercenary Nation. Using their skills at alchemy, Heierrat Mages often make sweets and they have grown increasingly popular.

Soul.Name: Grace of the True God
Soul.Comment: Subtract 60 from the MAX HP of target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Lesser Dispel Evil
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 30 from the MAX HP of a target enemy unit in range. All friendly units heal 30 HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come on, you can do this!'
FlavorText.Text2: A young priestess of the world's most widespread religion, the Church of the True God. The custom of giving chocolate to someone you like began in the Wizard Kingdom, and has been catching on in other areas of Lavato. This girl bought chocolate hoping to give it to someone she has a crush on. Will she be able to tell him her feelings?

Soul.Name: Lycanthropy / Echidna
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Return one random Lawtia card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Refuse to Die
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Fully restore HP. Rival Iczer gets SP-1.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Life of Torture
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit gets AT+50 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The ocean water feels so nice, why don't you join me?'
FlavorText.Text2: It was a simpler time, and a happy couple went together to the ocean. They thought their peaceful life could continue forever, but this wish would not end up coming true. The woman, who became an enemy to all life, cannot even remember it.

Soul.Name: Power of the Swarm
Soul.Comment: Increase your Lawtia level by 2. Increase your Gowen level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Swarm
Skill0.Comment: All units of level 2 or below get AT+20 and AGI+2 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The sunrise... It's so beautiful.'
FlavorText.Text2: Townspeople hate rats, but on All Hallow's Eve it is traditional to respect creatures of darkness. This year, a young woman was discovered living with a swarm of rats in the Arban Mountains. They wished happiness on she who was abandoned unwillingly to the wilds.

Soul.Name: Dissection of the Will
Soul.Comment: All units cannot be hit by an Attack action for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Mimesis
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia lvl 1 or higher] This unit gets the LV, AT and DF of target enemy unit. Decrease your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill1.Name: Bladed Locks
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+ number of times you've invoked a Grimoire Card X 5] to a random enemy row in range. This counts as a Grimoire Activation.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, I can eat as much as I like?  Then I shall... If there is this much, It would be fine even if my bothersome sisters were here'
FlavorText.Text2: A magic doll made by the Abyssal Strategist, Galdirea. She was interested in All Hallow's Eve, so she dressed up and prepared snacks. Galdirea lent her what appeared to be his servants so she could hold a celebration. But the servants were so reserved she was unable to enjoy herself. The party she had seen in town was fun and full of laughter.

Soul.Name: Save the King
Soul.Comment: All characters fully recover their HP, or are Revived.

Skill0.Name: Red Dragon's Light
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/a friendly [subtype: beltorat kingdom] unit is on the field] The first time this skill is activated, you get SP+2.

Skill1.Name: For a King's Love
Skill1.Comment: One friendly [subtype: beltorat kingdom] unit gets MAX HP+10, AT+10 and is healed 10 HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I fight for big brother Ainhazard!'
FlavorText.Text2: A lovely priestess who adores the king Dragoneye Ainhazard and has known him since they were little. He gave her the title 'Red Dragon Priestess' because her powers heal and support his men in battle.

Soul.Name: White Light
Soul.Comment: Subtract 10 directly from the HP of all units.

Skill0.Name: Tome of the Sage
Skill0.Comment: One friendly Refess unit gets MAX HP+10, is healed 20 HP and is engaged.

Skill1.Name: Learning of the Sage
Skill1.Comment: Send one random Grimoire card from your Card File to the Cemetery. And then, you get SP+1->2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I battle ultimate evil to save the future? What a silly story! Do you really think I'm the type?'
FlavorText.Text2: A legendary tactician from ancient times said to have taken part in the first great war against Batora and eventually died to save the world. He's credited with creating the first school and the tradition of teaching, but the writings he left behind were harsh and condescending, so he's not a popular figure.

Soul.Name: Black Dragon's Revenge
Soul.Comment: Send one friendly unit to the Cemetery. Do [damage: that unit's MAX HP] to all enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Assassin Turned Rogue
Skill0.Comment: One friendly [subtype: assassin] unit gets AT+AT of this unit for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Misercorde
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit. If that unit is HP 0 or below, send one random closed enemy unit to the cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Don't make trouble, just leave everything to big sister Mulna.'
FlavorText.Text2: A companion of Dragoneye Ainhazard from when he was an adventurer. She was an ambitious member of the Assassin's guild at the time, but now she lives as a free rogue and spends her time watching over Ainhazard.

Soul.Name: Advocate of Death
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to two random enemy units. Send one random card from rival Iczer's card file to the cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Art of Calm
Skill0.Comment: One random unit gets AGI-1 and LV-1 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: The Bell Tolls
Skill1.Comment: Send one random unit of level 3 or below directly to the cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Cursed one who lives in the darkness... be reborn and fight for me!'
FlavorText.Text2: An ancient witch who appeared just after the first war against Batora. She manipulated kings to start wars all over Lavato and has created some of the most evil and powerful magic spells in history. Legend says because she was born unable to see or speak, she was alienated and wanted to share her pain.

Soul.Name: Silver Scale Sword Boudou
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to two random units.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 7 or higher, this unit gets AT +20, DF +5.

Skill0.Name: Warrior's Insight
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+5 and is healed 10 HP.

Skill1.Name: Rivals United
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit's HP 30 or lower] Return one random [subtype: dragon kin] card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill2.Name: Slash
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ainhazard, when the end comes and enemies are rushing in from all sides, I will be at your right hand.'
FlavorText.Text2: A skilled warrior knew Dragoneye Ainhazard during the days when he was an adventurer. They were bitter rivals, and fought each other many times. Even though they tried to take each other's lives back then, now they are best friends and Dyson serves as Ainhazard's personal guard.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: このユニットの[攻撃]は以下の効果である。■[RNG内]の敵軍ユニットからランダムで2体選び[HP-：AT+：自分の[影響力：ゴウエン]×5]する。

Soul.Name: Stunning Shot
Soul.Comment: Engage one random disengaged enemy unit. And then, do [damage: 50] to target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Silver Bullet Shooting
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, subtract AT+ Gowen level X 5 directly from the HP of two random enemy units in range.

Skill1.Name: Ricochet
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 5 or lower] Subtract 20 directly from the HP of a random enemy unit. If enemy unit's HP is 0 or below, you get Gowen +1.

Skill2.Name: Bullet Explosion
Skill2.Comment: Subtract your Gowen level X 5 from the MAX HP of target enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This is the gun that brings death to all things, man, beast, or demon.'
FlavorText.Text2: In ancient times, he was a bounty hunter who fought monsters and demons. He used a type of gun called the Winston Zero, possibly the first guns ever made. They were invented by M Winston, his grandfather, to exterminate the evil demons who cursed the Winston family for generations.

Soul.Name: Wind of the Wyverns
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of RNG 3 or higher to its Card File.

Skill0.Name: Magic Maelstrom
Skill0.Comment: Subtract [number of enemy units X 5] directly from the HP of all units of level 3 or lower.

Skill1.Name: Glass Blooms
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: their AGI X 10] to all units. And then, return one random unit of HP 0 or lower and level 3 or lower to their Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now that you've brought us all together in victory under the stars, have you thought of the future? What comes next?'
FlavorText.Text2: The court magician and adviser at Ainhazard's castle, he was originally one of Ainhazard's companions during the days when he was an adventurer. He is troubled by the courtiers and envoys that now surround his king, but harbors a power as great as the archmages of Regus

Soul.Name: Tome of Missions
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: number of grimoires in rival Iczer's Card File X 15] to target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Magic Seal Barrier
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be affected, targeted, or randomly chosen by Grimoires.

Skill1.Name: Magic Seal Power
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets AT+ [number of grimoires in your File X 10] for this turn. If this unit has AT 30 or higher, send one random grimoire from your Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill2.Name: Double Shock Strike
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If you give me that magic, I will let you live.'
FlavorText.Text2: An ancient warrior who created the Magic Library that Regus was built around. She traveled the world, draining the magic spells from wizards and turning them into pages of magic books. She completed her mission by any means necessary, taking the lives of almost all the master mages of her time.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Long Night of Penance
Soul.Comment: Target friendly unit gets MAX HP=0. Target enemy unit gets MAX HP=0.

Skill0.Name: Demon Turned Nun
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+[50% of MAX HP] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Inquisition Strike
Skill1.Comment: Heal one friendly [subtype: priest] HP+20. And then, do [damage: 50% of that unit's MAX HP] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill2.Name: Only My Fist
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT X2] to one random enemy unit in range of AT=0 or RNG=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You know my nickname, and you still want to throw down!?'
FlavorText.Text2: A woman who's famous in the True God Church, and the former teacher of Lapierre and Cynthia. She was a powerful martial artist known as The Demon, but meeting them made her realize her time had come to an end, so she became an instructor instead. An instructor to this day, she's still as strong as she was during her 'Demon' years. Her most destructive technique is a punch she calls 'Only My Fist.'

Soul.Name: On Your Feet Soldier
Soul.Comment: Revive one closed friendly unit and give AT+10 and DF+10 to the unit.

Skill0.Name: Captain's Honor
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Refess LV 0] You get Refess LV=1.

Skill1.Name: Leader of Knights
