Skill1.Comment: One [subtype: Duchy of Crest] unit gets AT+10 and DF+5 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Burn the Body or He'll Rise
Skill2.Comment: Send a card from your Cemetery out of game. And then, send two cards from Rival's Cemetery out of game.

Skill3.Name: Clear the Way
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/AT 50 or lower] This unit gets AT+20. Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range of 30 HP or lower.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That she-devil...  I swear I'll catch her red-handed.'
FlavorText.Text2: Leader of the Crest Paladins, he's a self-made soldier and a man who thinks on his feet. General Dical held him in high esteem, and he was popular with his subordinates, but Annarose's schemes led to him stationed on the frontier holding back the undead armies. He returned to the capital alive and attempted to expose Annarose's true nature, but her assassins took his life before he could achieve his goal.

Soul.Name: Red Wing Butterflies
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 1->8 X5] to one random enemy unit. This effect is repeated three times. Send all units at exactly 0 HP to the Cemetery.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +20, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Ignite Fairy Dust
Skill0.Comment: All Burning units get HP-20.

Skill1.Name: Fairy Dust
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. Two random enemy units get HP-10 and are Burning.

Skill2.Name: Fairy's Fire
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Send one Gowen Grimoire from your File to your Cemetery. And then, do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Burn to a crisp, devils! I'm the embodiment of faerie rage!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the great faeries chosen by the Seven Sages, the highest of faerie authorities. Faeries typically control the powers of wind and earth, but Erica is the only one of them who can control the power of flame. She uses the dust from her wings and from those of other faeries to create large explosions.

Soul.Name: Wrath of the Ocean King
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: number of times you've invoked a Grimoire X 10] to target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Might of Deep Waters
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/11 or less grimoire uses] Do [damage: your grim activations X10] to one random enemy unit in range. This counts as 2 grimoire activations.

Skill1.Name: True Might of Deep Waters
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/12 or more grimoire uses] Do [damage: your grim activations X10] to two random enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hmph...  You're a fool of a dragon to defy me, young one.'
FlavorText.Text2: Another form of Sea Lord Vonderam, ruler of Lavato's oceans. He takes this form when appearing before humans or non-royal mermaids. He appears to be a child, but he's still just as powerful as in his Sea normal form, so to judge his power based on his appearance is to court death.

Soul.Name: Reinforcement Barrage
Soul.Comment: Revive one friendly unit. Do [damage: that unit's HP] to two disengaged enemy units.

Skill0.Name: The Lion's March
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/your SP is 2 or lower] You get SP+1.

Skill1.Name: Never Give Up
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/LP 3 or lower] This unit gets AT+10, DF+5 and is healed 20 HP.

Skill2.Name: Charge to the Rescue
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT X 2] to a random enemy unit in range. Do [damage AT X 2] to a random enemy unit not in range. If either unit is lvl 5 or higher, you get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I hope I'm wrong about this, but just in case... Mobilize the armies of the Solar Kingdom... all of them!'
FlavorText.Text2: The high commander of the regular armies of Folrart and the Royal Guard, the Folrart Guardians, and the Shrine Knights. He works to protect the Solar Prince both from foreign enemies, and also from dangerous members of the True God Church. When Verlaat set out to negotiate with Crest, Zagar waited in the royal capital, but his intuition warned him something was wrong...

Attack.Name: Attaｃｋ
Attack.Comment: このユニットの[攻撃]は以下のスキルである。■[RNG内]の敵軍ユニットからランダムで1体選び[ダメージ：プレイヤーの[影響力：リフェス]×5]する。

Soul.Name: Speed of the Light Bow
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AGI+5 for this turn. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: The Wings of Olivia
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: your Refess level X 5] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill1.Name: Ultimate Aim
Skill1.Comment: This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Olivia Takes Flight
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Focus] Do [damage: AT+ your Refess level X 5] to two enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Uh oh...these guys are trouble!  Everybody protect the prince.'
FlavorText.Text2: An assistant captain of the Royal Knights of Folrart. She's one of Lavato's feline kin and an expert archer. She's also in command of the Light Magic Archers, and can nail an enemy with one shot even from a great distance. Her magic bow in particular, the Wings of Olivia, inspires considerable fear. She acted as Verlaat's guard by order of Zagar.

Soul.Name: Anger of a Guardian Spirit
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one random disengaged enemy unit. Revive one friendly unit.

Skill0.Name: Spirit Blade Ophelean
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+HP] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill1.Name: Living Dead
Skill1.Comment: Fully restore HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I am Ashbars, protector of Folrart.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the great generals of the Solar Kingdom when it was founded. With his spirit blade Ophelean he cut down those who opposed Folrart, instilling fear in neighboring countries. Ultimately he lost his life, betrayed by comrades in the midst of battle. Lawtia noticed his martial exploits and made him the kingdom's guardian spirit. He appears when Verlaat is in trouble.

Soul.Name: Do it my Way
Soul.Comment: One friendly unit gets MAX HP+30 and HP+30. Select an enemy unit. Do [damage: chosen unit's level X 10] to that unit.

Skill0.Name: Kick 'em Into Gear
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: acolyte] units get AT+10 and AGI+2 for this turn. All friendly [subtype: priest] units get DF+5 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Weapon Breaker
Skill1.Comment: Set a random enemy unit within range to DF=0, do [damage: AT] to that unit and give it AT=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Heh! Looks like it's my turn to move out!'
FlavorText.Text2: Leader of the acolytes in the Solar Kingdom's Royal Knights. At a glance, anybody would say he looks like a brigand or a hooligan, but he's a genuine high cleric.  However, as his appearance suggests, he's indeed rowdy and tries to settle everything his way.

Skill0.Name: Prayer for Safety
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly unit is Focused until the end of this turn. You get Refess-1 and SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Please be safe, Verlaat...'
FlavorText.Text2: Aliria prays for Verlaat's safety as he journeys through enemy territory. But this prayer tragically goes unanswered, as sad news is delivered to Folrart...

Soul.Name: Order from the Cardinal
Soul.Comment: Target friendly [subtype: true god church] unit gets MAX HP+20, HP+20 and AT+20. Engage target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Support of the Church
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units of AT 25 or below get DF+30 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Combat Heal
Skill1.Comment: Heal one friendly unit 50% of MAX HP, except this unit. Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Forward! Rescue Prince Verlaat!'
FlavorText.Text2: Paladin knights who were ordained by the Church of the True God, and thus are not under direct Solar Kingdom authority. Unlike Folrart's knights, they freely wield the power of miracles as they fight. Cardinal Gilensa dispatched them when he heard about the predicament facing Verlaat's party.

Soul.Name: Prayer to the Sun
Soul.Comment: Do [Damage: 20] to all Refess [subtype: monster] units. And then, do [Damage: 40] to three random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Burning Sunlight
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 10] to target friendly [subtype: monster] unit. And then, do [damage: 20] to target enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Sun Goad
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 10] to all [subtype: monster] units. And then, all enemy units get DF=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Appear before me, solar envoy!'
FlavorText.Text2: There are sparsely populated regions of Lavato, remote by even its standards, where some groups worship monsters as gods. They revere coatls as divine envoys. There are reportedly cases where they offer sacrifices and give them even greater power.

Soul.Name: Symbol of Military Might
Soul.Comment: All units get MAX HP+10.

Skill0.Name: Momentum
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AGI+1.

Skill1.Name: Crushing Stomp
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit in area[1-2-3]] Subtract this unit's AT directly from the HP of one random enemy unit in range and render it engaged. This unit gets AGI=2 and is engaged.

Skill2.Name: Trained Beast
Skill2.Comment: This unit cannot use Rest.

FlavorText.Text1: 'There aren't that many soldiers who can stand up to a mammoth... or under one.'
FlavorText.Text2: A unit made up of mammoths trained as soldiers. Weaponizing the overwhelming power of mammoths makes them a force to be reckoned with. But because they must be trained, they are a bit docile and lacking in attack power compared to their wild cousins.

Soul.Name: The Folrart Inquisition
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Refess level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Night Raid
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Target enemy unit,except a Refess unit, gets RNG-1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: False Accusations
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range and give it RNG-1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Punish them! This is a house of evil.'
FlavorText.Text2: A priest who executes penal regulations according to the doctrine of the world's most widespread religion, the True God Church. By day he serves as a priest, but as the dark of night is the time of evil, that's when he begins his punishment of the wicked.

Skill0.Name: Miracle Bind
Skill0.Comment: No Character or Grimoire card in rival Iczer's Card File may be set next turn. You get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Curses can be made of light, just as they are made from darkness.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the miracles wielded by priests in battle, it traps the enemy with holy power.

Soul.Name: Bolt Swarm
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to target friendly unit. And then, do [damage: 30] to three target disengaged enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Gather Energy
Skill0.Comment: From now on, when you activate a [card: Magic Bolt], add +5 damage.

Skill1.Name: Magic Recharge
Skill1.Comment: Return one [card: Magic Bolt] that was removed from the game to your Card file. And then, you get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I will fight for the prince! But there are so many enemies...'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the Solar Kingdom's mage corps. They convert the energy of their own soul into magic power, and specialize in attack magic. They also carry with them special items that boost the power of such spells.

Soul.Name: Separated from the Prince
Soul.Comment: Set Rival Iczer's Lawtia level to 0.

Skill0.Name: Greater Protection Spell
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly unit cannot be hit by an Attack action for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Power of the Patron
Skill1.Comment: Target friendly [subtype: royalty] unit gets DF+15 for this turn. And then, all friendly units get [AT+ their DF] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Keep the youngest of the royal family out of harm's way!'
FlavorText.Text2: Priests who accompany Solar Kingdom royalty. A group accompanied Verlaat on his visit to Crest, but were attacked by the Augments. The priests are duty-bound to protect Verlaat, but get separated from him thanks to Annarose's tactics.

Soul.Name: Little Miracle
Soul.Comment: Revive one friendly unit and give it AT+10 and DF+10.

Skill0.Name: Pure Sacrifice
Skill0.Comment: Target unit fully recovers its HP. This unit gets HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Protection of the Light
Skill1.Comment: Send this unit directly to the cemetery. Revive one friendly closed unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Princess Aliria...I will pray with you.'
FlavorText.Text2: A pious lady who Aliria often visits. Because of her natural goodness, her prayers for peace and safety for the children are purer and stronger than those of any priest.

Soul.Name: The Power of Grief
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. Decrease Rival Iczer's Refess level by 2.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Tragic Sacrifice
Skill1.Comment: Select a random Grimoire Card from rival Iczer and send it to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come on, this way...'
FlavorText.Text2: Citizens trying to escape the irrational wars and conflicts happening around all them. Conflict engulfs the powerless as it spreads destruction all over Lavato.

Skill0.Name: Awakening
Skill0.Comment: Target unit gets AT, DF, AGI, RNG and LV returned to their base values and is fully healed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Uh, what...?  How did I get here?'
FlavorText.Text2: A miracle that returns a person's consciousness to its original state when it's been lost to magic or some wicked curse.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: このユニットの[攻撃]は以下のスキルである。■[RNG内]の敵軍ユニットからランダムで2体選び[ダメージ：AT]する。

Soul.Name: Into the Ravine
Soul.Comment: Send target friendly unit directly to the Cemetery. You get SP+ [that unit's base level X 2].

Skill0.Name: Savage Violence
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units in range.

Skill1.Name: Lord of Gluttony
Skill1.Comment: Set one friendly unit to MAX HP=0. This unit gets [AT+ that unit's AT]. And then, do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm sorry, you two, but you're going to have to die for me.'
FlavorText.Text2: The leader of the Augments. He was formed from restructured humans and created by Annarose, servant of the Envoy of Chaos, Elgandi. His strength is unlimited because he is able to eat people to gain their powers.  Under Annarose's orders, he attacks Verlaat's party and casts Verlaat down into a ravine.

Soul.Name: The Soul of a Fighter
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+50 for this turn. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Black Wind Rears
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AGI=5. This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Black Wind's Charge
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focus] Do [damage: 30] to two enemy units in range. Do [damage AT+AGI X10] to target enemy column in range. This unit gets AGI=3 and is engaged.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Damn you, Annarose...  I had no idea you'd assembled a force like this one.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the three commanders of the armies of the Duchy of Crest under Dical's command. Yug is a veteran soldier who excels at horsemanship. Dical ordered him to keep an eye on Annarose's activities, and while doing so he witnesses the sudden attack of the Augments on Verlaat.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: このユニットの[攻撃]は以下のスキルである。■[RNG内]の敵軍ユニットからランダムで1体選び[ダメージ：AT]する。このスキルを3回繰り返す。

Soul.Name: The Bleeding Won't Stop
Soul.Comment: Rival Iczer gets SP-2. Rival Iczer gets 1 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Three Armed Strike
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. This effect is repeated three times.

Skill1.Name: Six Hidden Arms Revealed
Skill1.Comment: You get LP-1.

Skill2.Name: Six Armed Strike
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. This effect is repeated six times.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You sure are a rough lady...  But I like it that way.'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the Augments, a force of restructured humans assembled by Annarose, servant of the Envoy of Chaos, Elgandi. Usually he looks like a regular young man, but six arms can grow out of his back. The arms also vary in length, allowing him to attack his victims from all sides.

Soul.Name: Fog of Pain
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to two random enemy units. Rival Iczer gets 1 less SP at the beginning of next turn for each unit of HP 0 or below.

Skill0.Name: Made of Assassins
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get [AT+ number of [cardtype: assassin] cards in your Cemetery X 5] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Death Without Form
Skill1.Comment: Remove two [subtype: assassin] units in your cemetery from the game. Then, engage one enemy non-Character and do [damage: that unit's AT] to target enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I am...a fog. No shape or form, just fog...'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the Augments, a force of restructured humans assembled by Annarose, servant of the Envoy of Chaos, Elgandi. Her face looks like a young girl's, but her body is completely artificial like a mannequin's. Seria was originally made from a famous assassin.

Skill0.Name: Triad of Chaos Meets
Skill0.Comment: Increase your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill1.Name: The Chaoslady's Smile
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Chaos Lady / Annarose is Open or Closed on the field] Revive one friendly unit and give it AT+10 and AGI+1.

Skill2.Name: The Hellspawn's Strike
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Hellspawn / Zalzagul is Open or Closed on the field.] Send one random unit directly to the cemetery.

Skill3.Name: The Strategist's Song
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/Abyssal Strategist / Galderia is Open or Closed on the field] Subtract 30 directly from the HP of all units except [card: Abyssal Strategist / Galderia].

FlavorText.Text1: 'How shall we proceed from here?'  'Hmph...don't waste our time.'  'Please, you two. My plans are already in motion.'
FlavorText.Text2: The three servants of Elgandi, the Envoy of Chaos. They work in secret to change Lavato into the world of war Elgandi desires.

Soul.Name: Hound Mastery
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: wild dog] units get MAX HP+10, HP+10 and AT+30. Return three random [subtype: wild dog] cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Heel Command
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: wild dog] units get AGI+1 for this turn and AT+10.

Skill1.Name: Howling Echo
Skill1.Comment: Subtract [target's base AT - target's current AT] directly from the HP of one enemy unit.

Skill2.Name: Attack Command
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT of target friendly [subtype: wild dog] unit] to two random enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'All right now. There goes some prey. Go get it, boys!'
FlavorText.Text2: A man who works as a thief and uses wild dogs to do his bidding. His skills are so great, he and his dogs are enough to take down an entire village.

Soul.Name: True Nightmare
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Lawtia level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Harbinger
Skill0.Comment: Rival Iczer gets only 1 SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Soul Eater
Skill1.Comment: Both Iczers get only 1 SP at the beginning of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's the nightmare of all those with souls, and it lives out there.'
FlavorText.Text2: A monster living on the frontier. It's said that it can eat souls, and if this monster kills you, you depart for the world of the dead with the memory of the pain intact.

Soul.Name: Lycanthropy / Nue
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. You get LP-1.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Hunger to Live
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Fully restore HP. Decrease all of Rival Iczer's Sphere levels by 1.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Deadly Appetite
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit gets AT+40 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: 3rd Stage: Whisper of Violence
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Subtract AT-10 directly from the MAX HP of two random enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'There are cries... The cries of the Nue, the screams of the victim, and the weeping of those left at the scene of the murder.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world. This specific type is said to be easy to spot because the appetite sharply increases before it manifests.

Soul.Name: Astral Shield
Soul.Comment: All friendly units gets [DF+ your SP X 5].

Skill0.Name: Ectoplasmic Field
Skill0.Comment: One random [subtype: cursed legions] unit gets AT-20.

Skill1.Name: Astral Sword
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. If that unit's HP is 0 or below, Rival Iczer gets SP-2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Spirit response of 1000AP recorded...  Expanding field.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer. Her body is loaded with magic charms in order to counter spirit enemies. She can use the soul energy she absorbs and generate a powerful shield.

Skill0.Name: Bitter Destiny
Skill0.Comment: Send all Closed units to the Cemetery. No Grimoire card in your Card File may be set for 3 turns.

FlavorText.Text1: 'And with one dark turn, mankind is doomed to another great war.'
FlavorText.Text2: A deadly attack is launched by the leader of the Augments. Solar Prince Verlaat falls into a dark ravine with no visible bottom. As a result, the war progresses into a new phase with no end in sight...

Soul.Name: Energy Drain
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. And then, one friendly unit is healed 40 HP.

Skill0.Name: Invitation to the Grave
Skill0.Comment: Return one [card: Criminal Edge] that was removed from the game to your Card file. And then, you get SP+3.

Skill1.Name: Magic of Hatred
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets [AT+ number of Closed units X 10] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Well then, I shall punish you just for living!'
FlavorText.Text2: An undead creature that was once a mage, and is now twisted by a wicked power. It possesses intelligence and culture, and is extremely difficult to handle. But as its only goal is to kill the living, there's no mistaking how warped it is.

Soul.Name: Shadow's Prey
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. Decrease Rival Iczer's Lawtia level by 2.

Skill0.Name: Lurk in the Shadows
Skill0.Comment: This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Surprise Pounce
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focus] Do [damage: AT+20] to one random enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It doesn't just appear from the shadows, it is the shadows.'
FlavorText.Text2: A large monster, said to have been generated by an evil miasma, that lurks in shadows. It wanders from shadow to shadow, hunting its prey.

Soul.Name: Result of Evil
Soul.Comment: Set Rival Iczer's Refess level to 0.

Skill0.Name: Hypnotism Spell
Skill0.Comment: Target enemy unit gets AT-30 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Magic Backfire
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units in range. Select a random Grimoire Card from rival Iczer and send it to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, perhaps I'll also throw in an animal test subject.'
FlavorText.Text2: A test subject used by Annarose when she created the Augments. He's controlled by a special hypnotism spell, and follows Annarose's orders above all others.

Soul.Name: Trapped by Violence
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all enemies. Engage one enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Fear Becomes Hate
Skill0.Comment: Two friendly units get [AT + their level x 5] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Urge to Lash Out
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Th-There he is! Burn him!'
FlavorText.Text2: Ordinary people who live in and around the Duchy of Crest. Getting pulled into the conflict has left them nervous and suspicious. Their fear has become hate for what they don't understand, and now they're hostile towards strangers.

Skill0.Name: Word of Dalos
Skill0.Comment: Engage all non-Characters.

Skill1.Name: Oni's True Voice
Skill1.Comment: Return two random [subtype: Abyssal Forces] cards from your Cemetery to your Card File. And then, you get one less SP at the beginning of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Who's gonna fight me!?'
FlavorText.Text2: Dalos, said to be a guest of Annarose, gets ready to fight alongside the Augments. It seems he was just looking for an excuse to exercise his destructive power, and Annarose was happy to oblige him.

Soul.Name: Ultimate Nullifier
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one random enemy unit. Decrease all of Rival Iczer's Sphere levels by 1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets HP +20.

Skill0.Name: Disruption Pulse
Skill0.Comment: Neither Iczer can Set a grimoire card next turn or the turn after.

Skill1.Name: Release Dortnail's Power
Skill1.Comment: Send a Grimoire Card from your Card File to the Cemetery. And then, this unit gets AT=50 and HP+40. Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit in range.

Skill2.Name: Burn Away Enchantment
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: number of grimoires in rival Iczer's Card File x20] to a random enemy unit in range. Select a random Grimoire Card from rival Iczer and send it to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Don't assume you'll live to regret it if you mess with me...'
FlavorText.Text2: A former Crest officer with a demonically transformed body. Annarose used him as a test subject and fused him with Flame Demon Dortnail. Afterward he was regarded as a failure and discarded, but he survived and now awaits his chance for revenge against Annarose. He's currently hiding out in the Mercenary Nation.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: You Gotta Have Guts
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get MAX HP+10 and fully recover their HP. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Olvaus Double Headlock!!!
Skill0.Comment: One random unit lvl 5 or higher except this unit gets AT-5 and is Called Out until end of next turn. One enemy in range gets AT-5 and is Called Out until end of next turn. This unit is Focused until end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Olvaus Double Pile Driver!!!
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focus] Set two units that have been Called Out to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You didn't bring enough people...  Hah!  You'll never win!  Olvaus Backfist!!!'
FlavorText.Text2: A martial artist with monstrous strength, and the catchphrase 'You gotta have guts, you gotta be smart, and you gotta... uh, have guts!' Though he's known as a martial artist, he's actually low on technique and relies on raw power to settle things.

Soul.Name: Cause and Effect
Soul.Comment: Revive all units of level 2 or lower and give them MAX HP+20 and AT+20.

Skill0.Name: The Price of Advancing
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in range. This unit gets LV+1.

Skill1.Name: The Sake of Better Times
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/LV 5 or higher] All friendly units heal 20 HP or are Revived, except this unit. All friendly units get AT+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Sumer... Will I ever be as important to you as your despair?'
FlavorText.Text2: Along with Black Cat Fellana and Doll Master Sumer, she researched the laws of cause and effect, until the day she encountered the Mazoku Extension. As a result, fear turned her hair white as snow and she was left with the power to see Lavato's future. In order to protect her friends, she found service with the Mercenary Nation.

Soul.Name: Invisible Strike
Soul.Comment: Set a random disengaged enemy unit to HP=0. Rival Iczer cannot Set a grimoire card next turn or the turn after.

Skill0.Name: Lumilarin's Drop
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets [DF+ number of friendly [subtype: faerie] units X 10] for this turn, max +30 DF.

Skill1.Name: Knight's Heart
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/DF 30 or higher] This unit gets AT+20. Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Let me handle this, Princess...'
FlavorText.Text2: A pixy girl who was enlarged to the size of human. Torte travels the world to learn its languages and hopes to save it from evil. She has a magic cloak named Lumilarin's Drop that lets her turn invisible and protects her. Mermaid Princess Emana rescued her during her travels, so now she accompanies Emana to repay the debt.

Skill0.Name: Brave Strike
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly Warrior gets AT-20. Do [damage: number of friendly [subtype: warrior] units X 20] to two target enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Let me pass!' - Dilate
FlavorText.Text2: When you are truly brave, you can strike with unbeatable power. If your entire army is truly brave, then nothing can stop you!

Soul.Name: Instantaneous Strike
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen level x 20] to one unit.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Iaijutsu Stance
Skill0.Comment: This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Sword Draw Slash
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focus] Do [damage: AT X2] to one random enemy row in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You fought a swordsman like me before? Then you're not in luck. I won't go easy on you.'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman from a land far to the east. Her unique sword skills allow her to inflict tremendous wounds with her eastern weapon, a type of sword known as a 'katana.'

Soul.Name: Pride of the Dragon Kingdom
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get [AT+ your SP X 5].

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 7 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, DF +10, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Battlefront Morale
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: beltorat kingdom] units get AT+10 and DF=10 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Dragon Charge
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Subtract AT X2 directly from the HP of one random enemy unit in range. Do [damage 50%: MAX HP] to this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, follow the king!  We're going to fight too!'
FlavorText.Text2: Elite knights of Beltorat, under the command of the king Dragoneye Ainhazard. Legend has it that for good luck, their armor is made to look like the red scales of the dragon Beltorat, for whom the kingdom is named.

Soul.Name: Spell Distruption
Soul.Comment: Target friendly [subtype: mage soldier] unit gets AGI+2. And then, Rival Iczer cannot set a grimoire card for 3 turns.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Anti Magic Armor
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be affected, targeted, or randomly chosen by Grimoires.

Skill1.Name: Grimoire Bane
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit within range. Select a random Grimoire Card from rival Iczer and send it to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You're a fool if you point that wand at me.'
FlavorText.Text2: A mercenary swordsman affiliated with Heierrat. He wears a suit of armor acquired long ago in the Wizard Kingdom, and when he's equipped with it, no magic spell can affect him.

Soul.Name: Strength in Numbers
Soul.Comment: Target friendly [subtype: wyvern] unit fully recovers its HP. You get SP+ [that unit's base level].

Skill0.Name: Total Swarm
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: wyvern] units get AT+20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Flame breath
Skill1.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of target enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If you see one, there are dozens of them. Then, in the blink of an eye, you choke to death.'
FlavorText.Text2: This type of wyvern lives in forests and operates in large packs. When they find prey, one wyvern will bite it, and then the rest of them will swoop down. Even a full-grown man doesn't last long when several dozen latch onto him.

Soul.Name: Wildfires
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all units.

Skill0.Name: Fire Burst
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to three random enemy units.

Skill1.Name: Double Fireball
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Magic flows, so does fire. Put them together and things get scary.'
FlavorText.Text2: A magician affiliated with the Mercenary Nation. He uses special flame spells he developed personally. These spells change his body into flame and attack several targets at once. However, he can burn up a lot of magic energy.

Soul.Name: Pefect Spearmanship
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: beltorat kingdom] units get LV+1, and AT+20. Do [damage: 30] to one random enemy column.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 7 or higher, this unit gets HP +20, AT +20.

Skill0.Name: Lancer
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Wh-What?  The sky went dark...'
FlavorText.Text2: Spearmen of Beltorat, under the command of the king Dragoneye Aihazard. Spears are the primary weapon used by the Red Dragon Kingdom's troops. They were headed for the Wizard Kingdom, but suddenly the weather changed, instilling them with fear.

Soul.Name: Treasure of the Pixies
Soul.Comment: Return five random [subtype: faerie] cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Fight for Treasure
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. And then, you get SP+1->2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh yeah!  Jackpot!  I wonder what's in here...  Let's see.'
FlavorText.Text2: A treasure hunter who sneaks into dungeons and ruins all over the world in search of valuables. The thrill she feels discovering treasure can't be put into words, but she's terribly disappointed when she comes up empty.

Soul.Name: Double power
Soul.Comment: You get SP+2 at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Pixy Blitz
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: number of [subtype: faerie] units in your Card File X 5] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill1.Name: Revival
Skill1.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1:
'Everybody attack on the count of three.  Got it?' 
'Roger!'
FlavorText.Text2: Pixy sword fighters who fit in the palm of a grown man's hand. Armed with a sword in each hand, they form groups and swoop down to stab at their enemies all at once. Even an armored warrior can't withstand their blitz.

Soul.Name: Urge to Devour
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. Decrease Rival Iczer's Gowen level by 2.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Raiding Civilization
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Select a random Grimoire Card from rival Iczer and send it to the Cemetery.

Skill1.Name: Mauling Strike
Skill1.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of a random enemy unit in range. Engage this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I guess it got tired of just eating, and figured out how to steal too.'
FlavorText.Text2: A monster that looks like a humanoid pig. It achieved a near-human level of intelligence, and in addition to satisfying its appetite, it's learned how to raid and lead with efficiency. Orks' strength surpasses that of humans, so they're extremely dangerous when they form groups.

Skill0.Name: Burning Air
Skill0.Comment: Subtract [number of units X 5] directly from the HP of all units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ah, ahhhhh, it burns!!!'
FlavorText.Text2: In a town ablaze with fire, the flames raise the temperature of the air so high that nearby people begin to spontaneously catch on fire.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: ノゼの攻撃

Soul.Name: Archive out of Control
Soul.Comment: Remove from the game three random cards from your Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Uncontrollable Forces
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack, Move or Rest action, you get LP-1.

Skill1.Name: The Advent of a New Devil
Skill1.Comment: Engage all units.

Skill2.Name: Domain of Magic
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: number of times you've invoked a Grimoire Card X 20] to all units except this unit. You get LP-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I am the completed form of Noze, the harbinger of destruction given form by the power of the Archive.'
FlavorText.Text2: Elgandi's servant Galdirea created the prototype magic doll Noze, and this is her evolved form once she absorbed the Wizard Kingdom's Magic Archive. There's now no trace of her former appearance, and her destructive ability is far higher than before. Galdirea is trying to use Noze to destroy the world.

Soul.Name: Shield of Truth
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get DF+50 for this turn. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Prepared for Treachery
Skill0.Comment: This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Share the Truth
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/ Focus] Disengage target friendly engaged [subtype: wizard kingdom] unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I won't let you pass through this door. I protect the Magic Archive.'
FlavorText.Text2: The artifact known as the Magic Archive in the Wizard Kingdom can manipulate people, and created the kingdom to protect itself. Inzaghi is the Archive's final guardian, and one of the six paladins linked to it who can use its power. However, he is murdered by Durendal.

Soul.Name: Preserve the Kingdom
Soul.Comment: Return target engaged enemy unit of level 2 or lower to its Card File. Target friendly unit gets MAX HP+10, AT+20 and fully recovers its HP.

Skill0.Name: Assault Strategy
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: number of friendly [subtype: Wizard Kingdom] units X 10] to two random enemy units of lvl 3 or lower. Return one random unit of HP 0 or lower to its Card File.

Skill1.Name: Threatening Maneuver
Skill1.Comment: One enemy unit of level 4 or higher gets LV-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The Wizard Kingdom...is burning down.  But that still doesn't mean we've lost.'
FlavorText.Text2: Leader of the Branches of the Tree of Wisdom, the Wizard Kingdom's council on strategic warfare. She's a woman, but she inherited the knowledge, techniques, and will of her father, the former leader of the Branches. Undefeated in battle, her insight surpasses even his.. She survives the downfall of her kingdom and fights on to preserve what she can.

Soul.Name: Children of the Sea
Soul.Comment: Three target enemy units get HP=10.

Skill0.Name: Ocean Call
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: sea behemoth] units get DF+10 for this turn and are healed 20 HP.

Skill1.Name: Brought Some Friends
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: sea behemoth] units get AT+10 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Magic Flintlock Pomode
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: target friendly [subtype: sea behemoth] unit's LV X 10] to target enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ahoy there!  You'll get blown away if you stand in my path!'
FlavorText.Text2: The general of the barbarians raiding the Wizard Kingdom. He knows how to train the monstrous Sea Hunters and has them do his bidding. His right hand is artificial, made of scrap. He lost the hand when it was cut off by a deep sea mermaid, but he conceals this fact, perhaps out of embarrassment.

Skill0.Name: The Truth of Regus
Skill0.Comment: Reveal number of Rival Iczer's non-Character units, Characters and Grimoires under Battle Data.

Skill1.Name: Hero's Dillema Dilemma
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Rival Iczer has 8 or more Characters in Card File] You get SP+2.

Skill2.Name: Magic Archive
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Rival Iczer has 5 or more Grimoires in Card File] Select a random Grimoire Card from rival Iczer and send it to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What? So that's what the Magic Archive really is...'
FlavorText.Text2: Dilate, running to Cassandra's aid as she pursues Galdirea, lays eyes on a surprising truth in the heart of the Wizard Kingdom's Magic Library. The king of Regus is not a human, but in fact a magical artifact.

Soul.Name: Static Field
Soul.Comment: Engage two enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Deadly Thunderbolt
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 50 directly from the HP of one random unit of level 4 or lower.

Skill1.Name: Wings of Lightning
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the HP of all units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Well, this sheds a whole new light on what a living thing really is.'
FlavorText.Text2: A wyvern living in thunder clouds and known as also the king of storms. Usually it lives high in the sky and doesn't go near the ground, but occasionally one that's lost its sense of direction will do so. It's a formidable enemy, as humans have few ways of defeating it.

Soul.Name: Elite Magic Armor
Soul.Comment: Target friendly unit gets DF+ [times you've invoked a Grimoire X 5].

Skill0.Name: Magic Guard
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be affected, targeted, or randomly chosen by Grimoires.

Skill1.Name: Elite Protection Spell
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. This unit gets AT+10, DF+5 and is healed 20 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Think you can handle this just because I'm surrounded?  Don't underestimate me.'
FlavorText.Text2: A high-ranking knight of the Wizard Kingdom, who excels at defense and defending important sorcerers. However, the power of his anti magic armor somewhat suppresses his attack power.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Impaling Spell
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Falkow level x 20] to one unit.

Skill0.Name: Trident Lancer
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemy units within range.

Skill1.Name: Whirlwind Trident Strike
Skill1.Comment: Engage all friendly disengaged [subtype: mermaid] units. And then, do [damage: AT] to two random columns of enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's Lord Vonderam's orders.  You're all going to die here!'
FlavorText.Text2: Mermaids live in the depths of Lavato's seas. Furious over the sea floor's devastation and the near loss of his own life, Sea Lord Vonderam transformed the mermaids so they could operate on dry land. They've been ordered to recover Mermaid Princess Emana, who's gone missing somewhere on land.

Skill0.Name: Thunder Drop
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 20 directly from the HP of three random units except [card: Lightning Girl / Rubia].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Fall, lightning of the gods!'
FlavorText.Text2: High order thunder magic conjured by the archmage Rubia.  Its effect is usually to stun the enemy, but when a wielder with strong magic power uses it, it will rain down destructive lightning.

Skill0.Name: Eldritch Hands
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: times you've invoked a Grimoire X 5] to target enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I don't know who was behind this...'
FlavorText.Text2: A strange magic artifact that uses the power of some otherworldly demon. Any creature grasped by these hands is torn apart.

Soul.Name: Amulet Against Spells
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. Decrease Rival Iczer's Falkow level by 2.

Skill0.Name: True Magic Ward
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT-10] to target enemy unit in range. Select two random Grimoire Cards from rival Iczer and send them to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That talisman protects against all powers, and gives her the power to fight.'
FlavorText.Text2: A woman with a talisman possessing a special magic power.  It has the ability to seal off spells.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Extinguish
Soul.Comment: Set Rival Iczer's Gowen level to 0.

Skill0.Name: Call of Healing
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: mermaid] units are healed 30 HP.

Skill1.Name: Magic Typhoon
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 50% AT] to two random enemy units in range. All engaged units hit are moved to random open areas.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Our magic shall scatter you!'
FlavorText.Text2: Mermaids rule the depths of Lavato's seas. Their lord, Vonderam, has sent them to the surface to put a stop to Galdirea's wicked designs. However, this added conflict is just what Galdirea wanted.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Leaving the Ocean
Soul.Comment: Set Rival Iczer's Falkow level to 0.

Skill0.Name: Sword of Tears
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT+20 directly from the HP of target enemy unit in range.

Skill1.Name: Numbing Slash
Skill1.Comment: Engage one friendly disengaged [subtype: Mermaid]. Then, do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range. All units hit of AGI 0 or lower get DF=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Yeah! Now that mermaids are on the surface, there's no way we can lose!'
FlavorText.Text2: The mermaid fighters are masters of Lavato's seas. They're taking part in surface conflicts after being transformed into human forms by their lord, Vonderam. His orders are twofold. One is to defeat the evil manipulator Galdirea. The other is to locate their missing princess, Emana.

Soul.Name: Deep Justice
Soul.Comment: Send two random [subtype: mermaid] cards from your File to your Cemetery. All friendly [subtype: deep ones] units get MAX HP+10, HP+10 and AT+20.

Skill0.Name: Chumming the Water
Skill0.Comment: Send five random [subtype: mermaid] cards from your Card File to your Cemetery.

Skill1.Name: Song of Justice
Skill1.Comment: Remove one [subtype: mermaid] unit in your Cemetery from the game and then, target friendly unit gets AT+20, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's wicked.  The most wickedly warped thing out there.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the savage types of corrupted Mermaids. An evil manipulator put a curse on her, completely altering her form. Her terrible cries strengthen her comrades.

Skill0.Name: Wizard's Gale
Skill0.Comment: Return one enemy unit of level X or lower to its Card File, where X equals the number of friendly [subtype: archmage] units on the field. And then, you get Falkow+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That's a wall of air, but when manipulated by a powerful wizard it can swat a dragon out of the sky.'
FlavorText.Text2: Wind magic that can only be controlled by the most experienced wizards. If wielded by a caster with great power, it will blow its target very far away.

Soul.Name: Black Magic Ice
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. This effect counts as two Grimoire activations.

Skill0.Name: Freezing Spell
Skill0.Comment: Engage one enemy unit until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The snow is so beautiful...'
FlavorText.Text2: This Ice Sorceress is a member of the Regus army, but her job is to conduct magic experiments and perform day-to-day spells needed for the system to function. Because of that she's still innocent, and enjoys Yule from the bottom of her heart. Don't confuse her with her icy sister who enjoys combat duty.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It is a great mystery why half-snowflakes fall here, but matching them makes for a fun game.'
FlavorText.Text2:
Match snowflakes to win prizes!
1 or more left Snowflakes + 1 or more right Snowlfakes =  Seasonal 'Year of the Dog' Frost Bow Archer
10 or more left Snowflakes + 10 or more right Snowflakes = Seasonal 'Holiday Dress' Guard Captain / Afeemina
20 or more left Snowflakes + 20 or more right Snowflakes = Seasonal 'Winter Snow' 2nd Dragonrider / Resource

FlavorText.Text1: 'It seems the residual energy of a powerful teleportation spell is splitting these snowflakes.'
FlavorText.Text2:
Match snowflakes to win prizes!
1 or more left Snowflakes + 1 or more right Snowlfakes =  Seasonal 'Year of the Dog' Frost Bow Archer
10 or more left Snowflakes + 10 or more right Snowflakes = Seasonal 'Holiday Dress' Guard Captain / Afeemina
20 or more left Snowflakes + 20 or more right Snowflakes = Seasonal 'Winter Snow' 2nd Dragonrider / Resource

FlavorText.Text1: 'Don't eat that!'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect Snowflakes to earn prizes!
For every 20 Yellow Snowflakes = 1 Point Card

Soul.Name: Aura of the Dragon
Soul.Comment: All units get MAX HP -10.

Skill0.Name: Strength of a True Hero
Skill0.Comment: Remove one [card: 2nd Dragonrider/Resource] in your Cemetery from the game, and then your units Iczer Attack for 2 LP.

Skill1.Name: For What You Believe In
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: HP X 2] to target enemy unit. This unit gets HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's started to snow, why don't we take a break?'
FlavorText.Text2: After the disappearance of the black dragon knight Millia, this dragonrider was raised by Wasseir. However, he could not think of the world in terms of black and white like Wasseir or Millia so he left to find the true meaning of justice. He always takes the Yuletide holiday as an opportunity to get some much-deserved rest.

Soul.Name: Glimpse of Sun
Soul.Comment: Send five random [subtype: undead] cards from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Grace of the Princess
Skill0.Comment: Revive one random friendly closed [subtype: solar kingdom] unit.

Skill1.Name: Warmth of the Princess
Skill1.Comment: All friendly units heal 10 HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Happy New Year, everyone! Please continue to look after me this year!'
FlavorText.Text2: Because of her friendly, outgoing personality, it's no wonder that Aliria is a match for the Zodiac sign of the Boar. In fact, a piglet is among the cute animals she keeps as pets.

Soul.Name: Anthem of Crest
Soul.Comment: Send target level 3 unit directly to the cemetery. And then, you get one less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Guard Captain's Formation
Skill0.Comment: Target [subtype: duchy of crest] non-character gets AT+20.

Skill1.Name: Be a Sword for the Duchy
Skill1.Comment: Select one friendly [subtype: duchy of crest] unit. Do [damage: chosen unit's AT] to target enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Maybe I was wrong. Dressing up once in a while isn't a bad thing, is it?'
FlavorText.Text2: The leader of the Duchy of Crest's Castle Guard and the only aide who has the complete trust of Princess Eskatia. She is known as the 'Lady of Thorns' by the troops because she's so strict. She was choosing an outfit so she could serve as Eskatia's chaperone at a holiday party, but because she hadn't gotten dressed up in so long, she got a little carried away.

Soul.Name: Doll Invasion
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: magic doll] units get AT+20 and AGI+2.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Acceleration System
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/a friendly closed [subtype: magic doll] unit is on the field] This unit gets AT+20 and AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1:
'I love you Elize!'
'Please. This troubles me, young miss.'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic Dolls are not just used in the armies of the Duchy of Crest, they are also bought by aristocrats for domestic use. Because of their high productivity, Mobility units are among the most popular. This Magic Doll was named Elize by the aristocrats who bought her. What kind of life is in store for her?

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Brutal Pounding
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 3 or higher] Do [damage: 50] to two random disengaged enemy units. Decrease Gowen level by 3.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +10.

Skill0.Name: Violent Pounding
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: 30] to two random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You're the king of this mountain, huh!?  I'm here to take your life!'
FlavorText.Text2: Dandan heard a rumor about someone or something called the King of the Mountain living in the Solar Kingdom's tallest mountain range, the Arban Mountains. Dandan finally found this king on the first day of the new year, and a fierce battle was had, replete with true martial arts prowess!

Soul.Name: A Single Sweep
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Slash
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

Skill1.Name: Red is the Color of Bravery
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this units's HP is 30 or lower] Do [damage AT X 2] to a row of enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I remember, she used to love playing in the white snow...'
FlavorText.Text2: Taking a new job, the mercenary Dilate is on his way to another battlefield. On the way it begins to snow pure white flakes. It reminds him of a girl he failed to protect when he was younger. Returning to his march, he holds his regret close is determined to keep on moving forward.

Soul.Name: Blazing Flames
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all units level 3 and below.

Skill0.Name: Emissary of Flame
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 10HP from target unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'In the Far East, things get pretty crazy around the new year.'
FlavorText.Text2: On the mainland the new year is not a major holiday, but in some parts of the Far East it is a cause for great celebration. The Salamanders, known there as 'fire folk' or 'fire spirits,' are summoned by local magic users as part of the traditional dances.

Soul.Name: Water Spirits' Messiah
Soul.Comment: Engage all units.

Skill0.Name: Currents of Purification
Skill0.Comment: Return one enemy unit within range and AGI 0 or below to its Card File.

Skill1.Name: Dragon Water Backlash
Skill1.Comment: Return one enemy unit within range and AGI 6 or higher to its Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I hope this year is a good one...Zzzzz.'
FlavorText.Text2: The Aqua Sorcerer Mystere shares a connection to the Zodiac sign of the Mouse. Coincidentally, she fell into a deep sleep on New Year's night, and was met by a group of mouse gods in her dreams. They declared her o be the '9th god' and they all set sail by ship for a new journey. Then she woke up, but she believed the dream was good luck.

Soul.Name: Numbing Arrows
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get RNG-1 for this turn. Do [damage: your Falkow level X 5] to those units.

Skill0.Name: Frost Bow Gale
Skill0.Comment: All enemy units get AT-10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Freezing Arrow
Skill1.Comment: Two random enemy units within range and of level 5 or higher get AT=0 and AGI=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'We'll protect everyone next year, too!'
FlavorText.Text2: Frost Archers serve as support for the Regus armies, using their magic only to protect their comrades from attacks. They are also known for having their own code of loyalty and justice separate from the army's code. Because of this, they share many similarities to the Zodiac sign of the Dog.

Soul.Name: Reinforcement Barrage
Soul.Comment: Revive one friendly unit. Do [damage: that unit's HP] to two disengaged enemy units.

Skill0.Name: The Lion's March
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/your SP is 2 or lower] You get SP+1.

Skill1.Name: Never Give Up
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/LP 3 or lower] This unit gets AT+10, DF+5 and is healed 20 HP.

Skill2.Name: Charge to the Rescue
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT X 2] to a random enemy unit in range. Do [damage AT X 2] to a random enemy unit not in range. If either unit is lvl 5 or higher, you get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Indeed it is a wonderful sunrise.'
FlavorText.Text2: The commander of the Solar Kingdom's military forces. To celebrate the first dawn of the new year, Zagar goes climbing in the Arban Mountains so he can feel the sun's rays from the highest point in the Solar Kingdom. The dogs symbolize Zagar's connection to the Zodiac sign of the Dog, but we're not sure why they followed him up the mountain, either.

Soul.Name: Divine Power Man Made
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to target enemy unit. You get SP+1->2.

Skill0.Name: Holy Ray
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/LV 5 or higher] Do [damage: AT] to two target enemy units in range.

Skill1.Name: Sense Evil
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets LV+1, AT+30, AGI-1, and is healed 10 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The sword is near...  I must acquire it and defeat that devil.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem that's existed since ancient times and is often named in legend as an angel.  Its purpose is to eradicate something it calls the 'negative forces' of the world. Many consider it to be an angel because it reacts automatically to evil. It is presently searching for a missing holy weapon destined to smite a specific 'negative force'. Silverion has been on the trail of this evil force for many years.

Soul.Name: Love for the Departed
Soul.Comment: All friendly units are fully healed. Send one character from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Wall of Kindness
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly unit, except this unit, gets DF+[number of friendly units X 5] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Benefits of Healing
Skill1.Comment: Target friendly unit gets [AT+their DF] and is healed [HP+their DF].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh my, what's wrong dear ones?'
FlavorText.Text2: A beautiful priestess who runs an orphanage in a little town on the outskirts of the Solar Kingdom. She takes in and raises the children who have lost their parents in war.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: [RNG内]の敵軍ユニットからランダムで1体選び[最大HP-：AT]する。

Soul.Name: Secret Strike: Flying Blades
Soul.Comment: Subtract 30 directly from the Max HP of three random disengaged enemies of level 4 or lower.

Skill0.Name: Cut Through Life
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, subtract AT directly from the MAX HP of one random enemy unit in range.

Skill1.Name: Soulblade: Difora
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy row in range. You get LP-1.

Skill2.Name: Secret Strike: Broken Dragon
Skill2.Comment: Subtract AT+20 directly from the MAX HP of one random enemy unit of level 5 or higher.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hey, don't bother me. I'm eating, here.'
FlavorText.Text2: Bounty hunters and mercenaries say that despite her unmatched beauty, if you make her draw her sword she's the last woman you'll ever see. It is also said that no bounty she's ever gone after has lived. In her travels to the Far East she became known as the Black Dragonfly, because the dragonfly is a symbol of victory. She wields the ultimate soulblade Difora, which cuts through life itself.

Soul.Name: Soul Feedback
Soul.Comment: You get SP-[number of enemy units]. Do [damage: 40] to all enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Refresh
Skill0.Comment: Send one [card: EX: Cursed Armor Knight] from your File to your Cemetery. And then, this unit gets MAX HP=40 and is fully healed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I had no idea Zugateroza had created such effective soldiers.'
FlavorText.Text2: Armored dolls sewn together from the bodies of the undead, filled with the hate and grudges of fallen soldiers. They combine the skill of soldiers in war with the power and menace of undead.

Soul.Name: Lord of the Species
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+20, DF+20 and AGI=1.

Skill0.Name: Irginiavay
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer Attack action, reduce Rival Iczer's LP by 2.

Skill1.Name: Erkshirebay
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: ork] units get MAX HP+10, HP+20, and AT+10, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Ibericohay
Skill2.Comment: Revive one closed [subtype: ork] friendly unit. And then, subtract the Revived unit's MAX HP directly from the HP of target enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My plans are unfolding. It looks as if I will be able to see his orders through after all.'
FlavorText.Text2: He is a mutant ork with human-level intelligence who rules over an ork kingdom. He was just another giant ork at birth, but one day a sinister man appeared and gave him his current powers. He's also the first ork to ever have a bounty on his head.  His indiscriminate looting raids on human towns cause a lot of trouble for human civilization.

Soul.Name: Corpulent Masses
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 60 divided by number of enemy units] to all enemy units.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 4 or higher, this unit gets AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Aggressive Urge
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of a random enemy unit within range. This unit becomes engaged.

FlavorText.Text1: 'These things bring trouble wherever they go.'
FlavorText.Text2: A monster that looks like a humanoid pig.  It is not very intelligent, and its only instinct is to consume everything.

Soul.Name: Sister's Protection
Soul.Comment: All units get AT=0 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Devil Hunter
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy Character and render it engaged.

Skill1.Name: Bounty on the Enemy
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 10 directly from the HP of all enemy units and give them AGI-2 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hmm...  Now I can buy that cute doll for her!'
FlavorText.Text2: Rosa is the elder sister of Cassandra the hunter. Everyone who lives on the Grand Surface is part of one mercenary tribe or another. Her parents were also famous bounty hunters. Now that they've gone missing, Rosa works as a bounty hunter to support her baby sister, Cassandra. Rosa's nickname, 'The Sunflower,' comes from her smile. Currently, she's after a bounty named Grebados.

Soul.Name: Archery Skill: Five Lives
Soul.Comment: Subtract 10 directly from the HP of target enemy unit.  This skill is repeated five times.

Skill0.Name: Archery Skill: Enchant Bow
Skill0.Comment: Two target friendly units get AT+ [their AGI X 5] for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Triple Fire
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in range.  This effect is repeated three times.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If we increase their attack power with magic, everyone will take notice of the results.'
FlavorText.Text2: Archers of the Wizard Kingdom.  They fire at their enemies with magically endowed bows.  These enchantments can pierce any target and bind its movements.

Soul.Name: Double power
Soul.Comment: You get SP+2 at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Pixy Blitz
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: number of [subtype: faerie] units in your Card File X 5] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill1.Name: Revival
Skill1.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'This is a present from us!'
FlavorText.Text2: The Pixy Dual Wielders always attack as a group, and are famous for getting along and doing everything together. Blini, a member of a Dual Wielder team, fell in love with a human, so her squad all gave him chocolates.

Soul.Name: Settled on the Battlefield
Soul.Comment: Subtract 30 directly from the MAX HP of target enemy unit. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: What Legends are Made of
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+ [HP of target enemy unit] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Unleash Heroine's Sword
Skill1.Comment: [Conditional use /AT100 or higher] Remove target enemy unit within range from the game. This unit gets AT=0.

Skill2.Name: Last Survivor of Gabilab
Skill2.Comment: Target friendly unit with HP of 1 or higher gets HP=0. And then, this unit is fully healed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Let's settle this on the battlefield.'
FlavorText.Text2: A survivor of Gabilab, a great empire that was destroyed by Flame Emperor Allind.  She's been on a journey since then to defeat the dragon emperor, despite his divine power.  While on a previous quest to dethrone the Demon Tyrant Carmeah who was plotting to take over Lavato, she acquired a set of divine arms that could repel even the power of a dragon emperor.

Soul.Name: Failed Experiment
Soul.Comment: All units get RNG=1.

Skill0.Name: Incomplete Flight Spell
Skill0.Comment: Decrease your Falkow level by 1.  You get SP+1.

Skill1.Name: Magic Chain Reaction
Skill1.Comment: All units get AGI+2 and RNG=3 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I overdid that just a bit...'
FlavorText.Text2: A girl who learned flight magic on her own and somehow managed to graduate from the magic academy. Now she's aiming to become a master-level spellcaster, so she's studying under the ice sorcerers.

Skill0.Name: Instincts of the Oni
Skill0.Comment: Choose one enemy unit.  For this turn, this unit gets AT + ten times the level of the chosen unit.

Skill1.Name: That's Better
Skill1.Comment: Remove all units you hate from the game.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Humans are so funny. I wonder how long before they're nerfed out of existence? Gye-hehehe!'
FlavorText.Text2: Chibi Dalos is a member of the rare Oni race. As is normal for a Chibi Oni, he's quite a trickster. His jokes might seem harmless at first, but when he throws a tantrum... watch out!

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, look.  A bunny, how cute!'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect sets of Eggs to win prizes!
Make 1 set with 4 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Guardian and one copy of Seasonal Girl Spectre
Make 5 sets with 4 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Mitzette and one copy of Seasonal Metia
Make 10 sets with 4 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Renally
You can only get each prize once.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, look.  A bunny, how cute!'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect sets of Eggs to win prizes!
Make 1 set with 4 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Guardian and one copy of Seasonal Girl Spectre
Make 5 sets with 4 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Mitzette and one copy of Seasonal Metia
Make 10 sets with 4 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Renally
You can only get each prize once.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, look.  A bunny, how cute!'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect sets of Eggs to win prizes!
Make 1 set with 4 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Guardian and one copy of Seasonal Girl Spectre
Make 5 sets with 4 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Mitzette and one copy of Seasonal Metia
Make 10 sets with 4 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Renally
You can only get each prize once.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, look.  A bunny, how cute!'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect sets of Eggs to win prizes!
Make 1 set with 4 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Guardian and one copy of Seasonal Girl Spectre
Make 5 sets with 4 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Mitzette and one copy of Seasonal Metia
Make 10 sets with 4 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Renally
You can only get each prize once.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, look.  A bunny, how--arghahaghaaah!!!'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect sets of Eggs to win prizes!
Get 5 Evil Egg cards : Receive an Easter avatar and 5 Point Cards
After receiving the avatar players will receive 1 point card per Evil Egg card

Soul.Name: Force of Nature
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your SP X 10] to two random disengaged enemy units.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, AT +10.

Skill0.Name: To Fight for a Cause
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: faerie] units get AT+20 and AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Inspired by Heroism
Skill1.Comment: Two friendly [subtype: faerie] units get AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Fey Blade
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. This effect is repeated a total of twice.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You don't know how important you are yet, do you?'
FlavorText.Text2: One day, she was summoned by the Seven Sages of the fairies and given an important mission. Mitzett was to travel to the lands of humans and protect a certain young girl until she turned 18 years old. Mitzett accepted because she respected the wisdom of the Sages, but now she has developed a strong relationship with the girl and would protect her without orders.

Soul.Name: Noble Line of Evil
Soul.Comment: Return two random unit cards of level 5 or higher from your Cemetery to your card File.

Skill0.Name: I've Got You Now!
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 0] to target enemy unit. From now on, when you activate this skill, add +10 damage.

Skill1.Name: I'll Get You Next Time!
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in range. Return this unit to the Card File. You get SP+4.

Skill2.Name: What!? That's Impossible!
Skill2.Comment: Send this unit to the Cemetery. You get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Argh! You stupid Faustinas! I'm not going to lose to you today!'
FlavorText.Text2: Ellie is from a noble line of villains. Her grandfather gave her the family evil organization on her birthday, so now she wants to become a great villain herself. She moved to Regus, encountered the heroine team Faustina's Maidens, and became their nemesis. She's friends with one of the Maidens named Isami at school, but neither girl is aware they're enemies.

Soul.Name: Quick Lunge
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Lawtia level X 5] to three random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Double Attack
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT 50%] to 2 random enemies in range.

Skill1.Name: Combat Support Lv2
Skill1.Comment: The units on the left and the right of this unit get AT+10 this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I wonder if Master might be pleased with this...'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic dolls don't have emotions, but sometimes those that are in operation for a long time display almost human-like anger or sadness. This Fencer type has been treated with great care for a long time. When she sees some women in line at a sweets shop on Valentine's Day, for some reason she ends up in line to purchase chocolate...

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Tears of a Mermaid
Soul.Comment: Return target disengaged unit to the Card File.

Skill0.Name: Protection of the Princess
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: mermaid] in [area: 1-2-3] cannot be hit by Attack actions for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Underwater Battle
Skill1.Comment: [Conditional use/AGI 0 or lower] Two enemy units in range get AGI=0 for this turn. This unit gets AGI=1.

Skill2.Name: Aquamantic Barrier
Skill2.Comment: All units of LV 3 or lower cannot be affected or selected by other cards' effects that include engaging until end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Wow, that looks really tasty.'
FlavorText.Text2: Emana is the princess of the mermaids. She used a secret mermaid art to transform herself and walk around on land, but she has trouble hiding her surprise at the strange culture she finds everywhere. She reacts overtly to everything she sees. Chocolate in particular caused her to make quite a scene.

Soul.Name: Magic Armor Disengage
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Enchanted Armor Rambar
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+20 and DF+20. Do [Damage: AT] to one random enemy unit within range.

Skill1.Name: Mage Paladin Commander
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets [AT + number of friendly [subtype: Wizard Kingdom] units x 20] for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Rambar Unleashed
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/DF=30 or higher] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's true that one of a paladin's duties is to be courteous to the fairer sex, but still...'
FlavorText.Text2: Distrier is known throughout the Wizard Kingdom for being very serious. His popularity with the ladies is second only to that of Ibert. On Valentine's Day, you can be sure to catch sight of Distrier in distress as he deals with his admirers. The girls love how he earnestly tries to answer even the most absurd questions.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Death to the Heretics
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+60, DF+60 and AGI-5 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Hammer of Justice
Skill0.Comment: Do damage [AT + number of friendly units x 10] to one random enemy unit within range.

Skill1.Name: Revival
Skill1.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'I can do whatever I want!'
FlavorText.Text2: Cynthia was born to one of the richest families in the Solar Kingdom.  She lived her life with no hardships until the day when she tragically lost her parents. After the adults around her used treachery to size her fortune, Cynthia was taken in by a convent. There she met her honored teacher, and her rival for life.

Skill0.Name: Howling
Skill0.Comment: One random enemy unit gets AT-10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Puppy!'
FlavorText.Text2: Catching and domesticating young dogs became big business in some outlying towns of the Duchy of Crest. However, these locals have tried to trap the wrong puppy.

Soul.Name: From a Forgotten People
Soul.Comment: Return one random disengaged non-Character of level 3 or below to its Card File. You get two less SP at the beginning of next turn.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Holy Sword: Arken
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT+10 from the MAX HP of a target column of enemy units in range.

Skill1.Name: Soulblade: Difora
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+20] to two random enemy units in range. Subtract one from your LP.

FlavorText.Text1:
-'How is it? Do you like it?'
-'Yes! Very much!'
FlavorText.Text2: Cassandra lost her homeland and sister from the conflicts with a cursed sorcerer. She ended up traveling with the bounty hunter Francis, who taught her to fight. Because of her past, she always carried herself like an adult. But when Francis gave her a some sweets from the far East, Cassandra acted her age for a moment.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Where's my best man?'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect Sets of Garters to win prizes!
Make 1 set with 4 different cards except Annarose's Garter: One copy of Summer Archer Scout and one copy of Summer Sorcerer Guard
Make 5 sets with 4 different cards except Annarose's Garter: One copy of Bridal Rasam
Make 10 sets with 4 different cards except Annarose's Garter: One copy of Honeymoon Annarose

FlavorText.Text1: 'Why are you hesitating, soldier?'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect Sets of Garters to win prizes!
Make 1 set with 4 different cards except Annarose's Garter: One copy of Summer Archer Scout and one copy of Summer Sorcerer Guard
Make 5 sets with 4 different cards except Annarose's Garter: One copy of Bridal Rasam
Make 10 sets with 4 different cards except Annarose's Garter: One copy of Honeymoon Annarose

FlavorText.Text1: 'Someday, the peace will be so strong even mercenaries will be able to get married.'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect Sets of Garters to win prizes!
Make 1 set with 4 different cards except Annarose's Garter: One copy of Summer Archer Scout and one copy of Summer Sorcerer Guard
Make 5 sets with 4 different cards except Annarose's Garter: One copy of Bridal Rasam
Make 10 sets with 4 different cards except Annarose's Garter: One copy of Honeymoon Annarose

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, you're such a kidder. Now back off or it's the icebox.'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect Sets of Garters to win prizes!
Make 1 set with 4 different cards except Annarose's Garter: One copy of Summer Archer Scout and one copy of Summer Sorcerer Guard
Make 5 sets with 4 different cards except Annarose's Garter: One copy of Bridal Rasam
Make 10 sets with 4 different cards except Annarose's Garter: One copy of Honeymoon Annarose

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm not the marrying type. But, I am a fan of Garters.'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect sets of Garters to win prizes!
Get 5 Annarose's Garter : Receive a blue Bridal Avatar and 5 Point Cards
After receiving the avatar players will receive 1 point card per Annarose's Garter

Soul.Name: Miracle of the Light Sword
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to one enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Lantylit
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+10] to a random row of enemies. For each enemy unit of HP 0 or below, you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Here goes!  Try and catch it!'
FlavorText.Text2: This is the traditional white wedding dress of Folrart, symbolizing the purity of the bride and the sun. One June festival, it was modeled by the big sister of the Solar Kingdom, Lapierre. Normally she's more likely to brandish her sword against waves of enemies then wear a feminine dress. But, she's having fun throwing the bouquet. Everyone was impressed how well the seasoned warrior wore a delicate dress.

Soul.Name: The Noble Moon
Soul.Comment: Revive one closed friendly unit. After that, do [damage: 30] to two random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Night of the Beautiful Moon
Skill0.Comment: Change battletime to night.

Skill1.Name: Moon Sword Lunara
Skill1.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of any enemy unit.

Skill2.Name: Revival
Skill2.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Am I not like any other woman?'
FlavorText.Text2: Many families in Crest continue the tradition of a black wedding dress. The acting ruler of the Duchy of Crest, Eskatia herself, once modeled one in a June festival. Dressed in her towering black armor, she inspires awe in neighboring countries, but in an elegant dress, her presence is no less powerful. All those who saw her thought she was the ideal woman of mystery.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 7 or higher, this unit gets AT +20.

Skill0.Name: Charge
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: ATX2] to a random enemy in range.  Do [damage: 50% of MAX HP] to this unit.

Skill1.Name: Bullet Storm
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/after rank up]  Do [damage: AT] to three random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1:
'Heh. Can a shy girl like you wear such a dress?'
-Fierte
FlavorText.Text2: In towns around the Grand Surface, the dust would show on any white wedding dress. Usually brides are married in other colors, like orange. During a lively June festival to celebrate a time of peace, Yuni modeled this dress. It was a perfect match for her charismatic personality and flowed freely enough to allow for her athletic nature.

Soul.Name: Absolute Zero
Soul.Comment: Two disengaged enemies are engaged until the end of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Greater Freezing
Skill0.Comment: Engage two random enemy units within range until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Ice Storm
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the HP of all engaged units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You look very nice.  ...Please don't get mad.'
FlavorText.Text2: Wedding gowns from the Far East are prized in the Wizard Kingdom. The 'Icy Smile of Regus', Rasam, was enlisted to model one at a June festival. Fellana later said 'I think she was perfect, but not many people would go up for a close look... er, well after they saw what happened to that first guy...' Everyone agreed Rasam was an iconic cold beauty.

Soul.Name: Orchestrated Withdrawal
Soul.Comment: Revive one closed friendly unit. After that, you get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: Allure of Darkness
Skill0.Comment: Engage one enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Dark Scheme
Skill1.Comment: All Lawtia units get AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Revival
Skill2.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, hello there. Whatever are you doing way out here?'
FlavorText.Text2: The true culprit behind the War of the Sun and Moon, and a member of the Triad of Chaos under Elgandi. She looks like a normal human, but when powerful wizards or priests see her, they feel only a great foreboding. Many wonder about her lifestyle and daily activities but those who are able to find her during a private moment generally never come back.

Soul.Name: Knight's Chief Patron
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random disengaged enemy units. One friendly unit gets DF+10.

Skill0.Name: Impenetrable Cloak
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets MAX HP+40 and is healed 40 HP.

Skill1.Name: Charming Exit
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/HP150 or higher] Return this unit to your File. You get SP+4.

Skill2.Name: Impatience
Skill2.Comment: This unit cannot use Rest.

Skill3.Name: Subdue the Rabble
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/HP 60 or lower]  Do [damage: number of times this skill has triggered X10] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What a situation... This is what happens when you let some people do whatever they want.'
FlavorText.Text2: The leader of the Solar Kingdom's Royal Guardian Knights, he's from the family responsible for protecting the Solar Kingdom's secrets.
