His younger sister is the Realm Guardian, Mayleen. Thanks to his nonchalant demeanor and sarcastic attitude, Lapierre doesn't get along with him. Rubens deliberates with the Shrine Knights to resolve the crisis.

Soul.Name: Frightening Strategy
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV 3 or higher] One Refess unit of LV 2 or higher gets MAX HP+30 and is fully healed. And, do [damage: 40] to an enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: The Lion's Aide
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen LV 1 or higher] Decrease Gowen LV by 1. One friendly non-[subtype: undead] gets MAX HP+10, AGI+1 and is healed 20 HP. If that unit is Refess or Gowen, it gets AT+10.

Skill1.Name: Commandeer Resources
Skill1.Comment: If Gowen level is 3 or lower, increase your Gowen level by 1. Otherwise, you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'General Zagar. I managed to muster the troops.  All that remains is for you to issue your orders.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lion General Zagar's personal adjutant, who keeps a close eye on all the general's affairs.  She was originally second-in-command of the Guardian Knights, but her commander made her Zagar's aide when he saw how inundated Zagar was with work. It's said she can be a scary woman, but not by Zagar.

Soul.Name: Lapierre's Orders
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to target enemy unit. One friendly [subtype: shrine knight] unit gets MAX HP+20, and is fully healed.

Skill0.Name: Recovery Formation
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: shrine knight] units get MAX HP+10 and are healed 10 HP.

Skill1.Name: Miracle of the Shrines
Skill1.Comment: Revive one friendly [subtype: shrine knight] unit and give it MAX HP+10 and HP+10.

Skill2.Name: One for the Team
Skill2.Comment: All friendly [subtype: shrine knight] units are healed 15 HP and get AGI+1 and AT+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm sure the prince is alive! Our mission is to find him and make sure he stays that way!'
FlavorText.Text2: The leader of the 4th unit of Folrart's Shrine Knights. Shrine Knight leaders are known for having their share of quirks, but she's the most ordinary of them in terms of personality.  She often operates as Lapierre's adjutant, and is therefore also known as the 'shadow leader' of the Shrine Knights.

Soul.Name: Coordinated Charge
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: number of friendly units X20] to two random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Fortification Debriefing
Skill0.Comment: One friendly [subtype: knight] unit gets MAX HP+10, +15 AT for this turn, and is healed 20 HP.

Skill1.Name: Counterattack Plan
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: this unit's MAX HP-current HP] to one friendly [subtype: knight] on the left or right of this unit. And then, this unit is healed 30 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Whew...  I'm not sure if this news from my friend in Crest is good or bad...'
FlavorText.Text2: Second-in-command of the Solar Kingdom's Royal Guardian Knights, he's also known as the Right Hand of the knights. As a friend of Rubens, the group's leader, he speaks his mind openly to him. As adjutant to Rubens, he keeps tabs on the kingdom's royalty. In fact, he uses personal connections to keep an eye on the royalty of multiple lands.

Skill0.Name: The General's Order
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: solar kingdom] units get AT+10. If there are 3 or more friendly units, all friendly units get AT+10.

Skill1.Name: The General's Determination
Skill1.Comment: All friendly units cannot be targeted, affected or randomly selected by other cards' send to Cemetery effects until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Folrart forces, advance!'
FlavorText.Text2: The order to march was issued to all forces by General Zagar. This proves to be the harbinger of a major series of battles.

Soul.Name: Jade Luster
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. One friendly unit gets DF+10.

Skill0.Name: Green Fury
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/DF0] Do [damage: AT+15] to one random enemy unit. This unit gets DF+10 and is engaged.

Skill1.Name: Green Feedback
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/DF10 or higher] target enemy unit in range gets AT-10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Its stone might be green, but I'm going to stand over here just to be safe.'
FlavorText.Text2: A gem beast with a green stone in its brow.  There's another, very friendly gem beast that also sports a green stone, but this one has an aggressive personality. Confusing the two could be dangerous.

Soul.Name: The Lion's Men
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: number of cards in your Cemetery X10] to target disengaged enemy unit. One friendly Refess unit gets AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Ready the Tower Shield
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/DF0] This unit gets DF+10 and is engaged.

Skill1.Name: Optimize Armor
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/DF10] This unit gets DF+10 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Anti Magic Armor
Skill2.Comment: This unit cannot be affected, targeted, or randomly chosen by Grimoires.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The third heavy armor division has returned alive!'
FlavorText.Text2: A division of heavily armored soldiers affiliated with the Solar Kingdom's Royal Knights and trained to defend against any attack, physical or magical. They set forth to protect Prince Verlaat, but then were separated from him in the battle with the Augments. They returned home with Fistara and her troops.

Soul.Name: Group Deployment
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: shrine knight] units get AT+20 and RNG+1.

Skill0.Name: Advance Formation
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: shrine knight] units get RNG+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Pinpoint
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'So, they're looking for the prince too...  We'll get the drop on them!'
FlavorText.Text2: Shrine Knights are knights who also receive training as priestesses. They excel at evading enemy attacks and inflicting fatal strikes to their enemy's vital points. They aren't as tough as regular knights, but they can use divine powers that become stronger if they work as a team. Knights of the 4th Shrine specialize in reconnaissance and intelligence gathering.

Soul.Name: Divine Darkness
Soul.Comment: You get Refess LV+2 and Lawtia LV+1.

Skill0.Name: Disruption Strike
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT+[Lawtia LV X5] directly from the MAX HP of one enemy unit in range. Increase your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill1.Name: Trial by Fire
Skill1.Comment: All friendly units are healed 15 HP. Target friendly unit is healed [Gowen LV X5] and gets AT+[Gowen LV X10] for this turn. Increase your Gowen level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm going to destroy your wickedness.'
FlavorText.Text2: An acolyte of the True God Church, the world's most widespread religion, who defeats evil in accordance with its doctrine. During the day he works as a priest, and when the townspeople request it, he fights as a warrior against wickedness and evil spirits.

Soul.Name: Nothing Left
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get DF=0.

Skill0.Name: Full Retreat
Skill0.Comment: Return this unit to the Card File. Increase your Lawtia, Gowen and Falkow levels by 1. You get SP+1.

Skill1.Name: Cover the Withdrawal
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/HP -15 or lower] Engage one enemy unit until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This looks like my chance to escape! I'm retreating!'
FlavorText.Text2: Members of the Solar Kingdom's Royal Knights.  They took part in Prince Verlaat's mission, but found themselves cornered when the Augments attacked. Spotting an opening in the enemy ranks, they somehow managed to successfully retreat.

Soul.Name: Sun Ray Arrow
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to target enemy column.

Skill0.Name: Sun Bow Burst
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+Total Sphere levels X5] to two random enemy units in range. Decrease all Sphere levels by 1.

Skill1.Name: Penetrate
Skill1.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of one random enemy unit in range.

Skill2.Name: Solar Bow
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/AT30 or lower] This unit gets AT+5.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Grant me power, magic that flows all around us...'
FlavorText.Text2: Members of the Sun Bow Archers, a division of the Solar Kingdom's Royal Knights. They're able to harness the magic energy that flows throughout Lavato, unaware that it's the remnants of the energy of the four sleeping gods of old.

Soul.Name: Precautionary Measures
Soul.Comment: One Friendly unit gets DF+10,and then Do [damage: 30] to a row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Espionage Mission
Skill0.Comment: Send a Grimoire from Rival's File to the Cemetery. Return a Grimoire from your Cemetery to your File, then do [damage: AT+10] to a random enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: No Evidence
Skill1.Comment: Increase your Lawtia level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'So, that enemy hasn't been discovered within Crest...'
FlavorText.Text2: A scout dispatched by the Solar Kingdom's Guardian Knights. Each division of Folrart's forces has its own scouting unit. Intelligence gathered by them is delivered to their respective leaders.

Soul.Name: Rainbow Connection
Soul.Comment: Increase your Refess, Lawtia, Gowen and Falkow levels by 1. You cannot Set a Grimoire card next turn.

Skill0.Name: Legendary Guardian
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV 3 or lower] Increase Lawtia, Gowen, and Falkow levels by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It looks like flashes of light burst under that horse's hooves when it gallops.'
FlavorText.Text2: Supernatural creatures said to live in nigh-uninhabited mountains. They're quite aggressive toward humans. It's also said that wherever these monsters are found, you'll often find other rare creatures of all kinds.

Skill0.Name: Talisman of Disruption
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use / Refess LV 3 or higher] Target [subtype undead] gets MAX HP-40 and DF=0. And then target friendly unit gets DF+10.

Skill1.Name: Talisman of Protection
Skill1.Comment: Target friendly unit gets DF+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Back to the afterlife with you, evil dead!'
FlavorText.Text2: An anti-undead magic item made by priests, through the use of components such as holy water. It extinguishes any undead with a single strike.

Soul.Name: Price of Youth
Soul.Comment: Send three random cards from your Cemetery out of game.

Skill0.Name: Corrupt Blessings
Skill0.Comment: Subtract [AT-base AT + DF-base DF] directly from the MAX HP of target enemy unit. That unit gets AT and DF returned to base values.

Skill1.Name: Dark Soul of Tears
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: undead] units get MAX HP+5 and are healed 5 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Zuggie gave the order himself, so what can you do...?'
FlavorText.Text2: The lich queen of what's known as the land of the undead. Zugateroza, king of the undead, orders her to take part in the attack on Crest. She wields sorcery that allows her to remake any corpse into a unique and formidable zombie. When she was alive, she sought a spell for eternal life and youth, but an experiment went wrong and killed her, turning into an undead.

Soul.Name: Sword Draw: Soul Conditioning
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen LV 3 or higher] One friendly Lawtia unit of LV 2 or higher gets MAX HP+30 and is fully healed. And, do [damage: 40] to an enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Sheathed Sword
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot execute an Attack action. When this unit uses Rest, this unit heals 50% of MAX HP and is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Sword Draw: Wolf Slash
Skill1.Comment: Subtract this unit's AT directly from the HP of one random row of enemy units in range. This unit gets AT=0 if it is not Focused.

Skill2.Name: Sword Draw: Iaijutsu Stance
Skill2.Comment: This unit gets AT+40.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Augments? Whatever, I'll end this with a single strike.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the Duchy of Crest's three captains, he's mastered Far East sword fighting techniques to the point that he can even cut through steel. General Dical had ordered him to observe Annarose's actions. Her latest exploits have finally led him to the headquarters of the Abyssal Forces.

Soul.Name: Perfect Awareness
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. Reveal number of Rival Iczer's non-Character units, Characters and Grimoires under Battle Data.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Heierrat Data File
Skill1.Comment: Decrease Rival Iczer's Gowen level by 1. Increase your Gowen level by 1.

Skill2.Name: Regus Data File
Skill2.Comment: Decrease Rival Iczer's Falkow level by 1. Increase your Falkow level by 1.

Skill3.Name: Administrator Privileges
Skill3.Comment: The unit directly in front of this unit gets AT+20 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Crest is completely surrounded by an undead army.  ...Oh boy, I'm going to get it if I don't hurry and find the Solar Prince.'
FlavorText.Text2: The intelligence expert of the Augments, a group of restructured humans produced by Chaoslady Annarose. She also manages the physical and psychological information on her comrades. She originally worked in a Crest library, until Annarose took an interest in her and reformed her. She lives a life of fear amongst the band of sub-humans.

Soul.Name: Curse of Undeath
Soul.Comment: Revive target friendly unit. And then, do [damage: 30] to all units.

Skill0.Name: Refresh
Skill0.Comment: Send [card: Death Dragonknight / Langbart] from your File to your Cemetery. After that, this unit fully recovers its HP and gets AT+10.

Skill1.Name: Dark Miasma
Skill1.Comment: Subtract [5 X the number of times Close skill has activated] directly from the HP of all enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This means I can finally get even with that wench who killed me.'
FlavorText.Text2: Until recently he fought to hold back the undead army as a knight captain of Crest, but he was assassinated via Annarose's plot. Zugateroza ordered the Unclean One to reanimate his corpse as an undead. He had great strength when he was alive, and now wields a sword too large for any two humans to handle. His personality hasn't gotten any less ferocious, either.

Skill0.Name: Dire Straits
Skill0.Comment: Target enemy unit gets LV-1, AT-10, AGI-1, DF=0 and is Engaged. Decrease all Rival Iczer's Sphere levels by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, you're just sooo adorable!'
FlavorText.Text2: Cassandra challenged Abyssal Strategist Galdirea to battle, but she was unable to stand up to the warlock's power alone. Is there any hope left of defeating him?

Soul.Name: Covert Kill
Soul.Comment: Send one friendly unit directly to the Cemetery. And then, send one disengaged enemy unit directly to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Covert Assassination
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/AT40 or higher] Set one random enemy unit in range to HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Perfect Disguise
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow LV 1 or higher] This unit gets AT+10 and RNG+1. Decrease your Falkow level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Modifying operation mode. Now disposing of target.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer.  The Covert type is made to strongly resemble a human, so she can approach her target in disguise and function as both a spy and assassin.

Soul.Name: Fire of the Soul
Soul.Comment: Increase your Lawtia level by 2. Increase your Gowen level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Moonlight Sword
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/AT60 or higher] This unit gets AT+10, DF+10 and AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Bash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] and engage one random enemy unit in range.

Skill2.Name: Code of Loyalty
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Refess LV 1 or higher] This unit gets AT+10 and is healed 20 HP. Decrease your Refess level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'No matter what happens, you will not see Lady Eskatia at this time.'
FlavorText.Text2: A lady knight of Crest who answers directly to Princess Eskatia and has taken special vows of loyalty. If given the order, she will fight enemies on Eskatia's behalf, and bravely volunteer to bodily shield her from danger.

Soul.Name: Lycanthropy / Belphegor
Soul.Comment: Engage one random enemy unit. Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit is fully healed.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Gestation
Skill1.Comment:
[conditional use/battletime noon]
This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill2.Name: 3rd Stage: Numbing Horror
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] All enemy units get AGI-1 for this turn. This unit gets AT+50 for this turn.

Skill3.Name: 4th Stage: Beyond Help
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night/Focused] This unit's AT becomes permenant.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's c-cold...  I'm freezing!'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world. With this strain, a deep chill emanates from the body, numbing everything around it. It only spreads at night, but can gestate during the day.

Skill0.Name: Stronghold of Chaos
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV is exactly 3] Increase your Refess, Gowen and Falkow levels by 1.

Skill1.Name: Stronghold of Power
Skill1.Comment: Target friendly unit gets AT+10 for this turn. You get Lawtia LV+1. Decrease all Rival Iczer's Sphere levels by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This place is so overflowing with evil, you can sense it from the outside.'
FlavorText.Text2: The stronghold of the Abyssal Forces, it was hidden in the Gondfore Mountain range, which separates the Duchy of Crest from a neighboring country.

Soul.Name: Killing Edge
Soul.Comment: Target disengaged enemy unit of AGI 4 or higher gets HP=0.

Skill0.Name: Hiding in Shadows
Skill0.Comment: Target non-character [subtype: Assassin] cannot be hit by Attack actions for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Strike to the Vitals
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AT40 or higher] Do [damage: AT+20] and render engaged one random enemy unit in range.

Skill2.Name: Wear the Red Mask
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen LV 1 or higher] This unit gets AT+10 and AGI+1. Decrease your Gowen level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'There's a lot of people...  Guess I'll kill them all.'
FlavorText.Text2: An assassin who creeps through the dark of night to kill his enemies.  He'll do anything it takes to murder his target, wearing a red mask that indicates his willingness to draw blood.

Soul.Name: Teeth of the Corpse
Soul.Comment: You get SP-[number of cards in your Cemetery].

Skill0.Name: Made of Bodies
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/DF10 or higher] This unit gets DF=0 and is healed HP+40.

Skill1.Name: Harvesting Bones
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets DF+5.

Skill2.Name: Refresh
Skill2.Comment: Send [card: Marching Death] from your File to your Cemetery. After that, this unit fully recovers its HP and a friendly unit gets MAX HP+10 and HP+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That misshapen soldier was formed from all manner of corpses.'
FlavorText.Text2: A soldier made by the Cursed Legions by joining together a variety of dead bodies too broken to be animated alone. It strengthens itself by harvesting additional corpses.

Soul.Name: Soul Furnace
Soul.Comment: You get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: All Together
Skill0.Comment: The units in the front, back, left and right of this unit get AT+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Play with me
Skill1.Comment: [Conditional use / 2 or more [Magic Doll -Mini-] on the field] Increase Refess/Gowen/Falkow by # of [Magic Doll -Mini-] units on your field, and send them to the Cemetery.

Skill2.Name: Broken Toys
Skill2.Comment: Return one or more [Magic Doll -Mini-] cards from your Cemetery to your File. And then, you get SP+1 and this skill will not activate again.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come play with us. Come play with us.'
FlavorText.Text2: Golems created by the twisted witch Sumer. The Mini is said to be a type marketed for, among others, elderly couples not blessed with children. The truth is, they're an experiment in cost-reduction.

Soul.Name: Soul Cutter
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] one random row of enemy units. Do [damage: 10] to target row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Haste Magic
Skill0.Comment: The units on the left and right of this unit get AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Magic Surge
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to target unit and give it AGI+1. If that unit is friendly, you get SP+1. You get Falkow LV+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My ears are killing me!  I can't stand this noise!'
FlavorText.Text2: A spellcaster with Annarose's Augments. She's controlled by a special magic spell, and follows Annarose's orders above all others. Also, under Fran's control she uses all manner of spells to attack her enemies.

Skill0.Name: Dark Confederation
Skill0.Comment: Send one random level 1 or lower card from Rival Iczer's File to the Cemetery. Rival Iczer gets SP-1.

Skill1.Name: Dark Covenant
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Refess LV1 or higher] All friendly units cannot be affected or selected by effects that include MAX HP change until end of next turn. Decrease Refess by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Give this power to the dead.'
FlavorText.Text2: A cursed contract that is sealed to give undead further powers. It requires the ability of a high level spellcaster.

Soul.Name: Second Life
Soul.Comment: Revive two friendly units of Level 3 or higher and give them AT+20 and AGI+1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Divine System
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+ Lawtia LVL X10 and MAX HP- Lawtia LVL X5.

Skill1.Name: Awakened Swords
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: AT50%] to three random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Noze... You and Galdirea must pay! I will defeat you even if it means my destruction.'
FlavorText.Text2: Esria was the prototype for Noze, and this is her form after awakening to new powers thanks to Noze's attack. At the same time, her memories returned and she became aware of her true identity. However, this power is steadily undermining Esria's body, leading eventually to her collapse.

Soul.Name: Fire Dance Sword
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow LV3 or higher] One friendly Gowen unit of LV 2 or higher gets MAX HP+30 and is fully healed. And, do [damage: 40] to an enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Might of the Swift
Skill0.Comment: When this unit hits an enemy of AGI 2 or lower with an Attack action, subtract an additional 30HP from that unit.

Skill1.Name: Ki Concentration
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets AGI+1. Do [damage: AGI X5] to a random column of enemy units within range. This unit is focused until the end of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Meteor Style Iaijutsu
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/focused] Do [damage: AGI X10] to a random row of enemy units within range.

Skill3.Name: Inspiring Spirit
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/focused] Target friendly unit gets AGI+2 for this turn and is focused until the end of next turn, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Can you keep up with my flash steps?'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman who mastered sword techniques in an area of Lavato called the Far East. Her skills are expert level, and she attacks with a speed no typical warrior can follow. That speed and the name of the sword she wields, Ryuuseimaru, result in her being called the Shooting Star. Her personality is hearty, but her tastes and diet are feminine.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: [RNG内]の敵軍ユニットからランダムで1体選び[ダメージ：AT]する。このスキルを2回繰り返す。

Soul.Name: Qi Burst
Soul.Comment: Do [damge: 50] to target enemy unit of AGI 3. Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit of AGI 4 or higher.

Skill0.Name: Staff Mastery
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. This skill is repeated a total of twice.

Skill1.Name: Qi Energy Strike
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Refess LV3 or higher] Subtract [their AGI X20] from the HP of a random enemy unit in range. This unit is Focused until end of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Extending Staff
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit with AGI 4 or higher. This unit gets AT+10 and RNG+3 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You must have challenged me because you think you can beat a girl...  You have a lot to learn.'
FlavorText.Text2: A martial artist from the mainland, not far from the Far East, who fights with an energy called qi and a two-handed staff. She's quite a formidable fighter, and at the moment nobody can withstand her.  She always speaks condescendingly and aggressively to men, but she has a weak spot when she is smitten.

Soul.Name: Dillinger's Shot
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen LV4 or higher] Do [damage: 40] to two random disengaged enemies. Move enemies in [Area:4,5,6] randomly. Enemy in Area 9 gets HP=0.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 7 or higher, this unit gets AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Called Pocket
Skill0.Comment: Choose an open area. Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range and move it to that area.

Skill1.Name: Break Shot
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: 20] to enemies in range and move them. Do [damage: 40] to enemies in [area: 1,3,7]. Send enemy in [area: 9] out of game.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Want to play a game with me? We'll wager our lives.'
FlavorText.Text2: A mysterious mercenary assassin. When his wife and daughter were killed, he found himself with a special power that allows him send his enemies flying exactly where he wants them. He works as a mercenary to put his power to good use, and to locate the man who killed his wife and daughter.

Skill0.Name: Final Showdown
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: Total Refess, Lawtia and Falkow Sphere Levels X10] to target enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Sometimes you have to let go with everything you have left.'
FlavorText.Text2: In a balanced fight, it's luck that finally decides the outcome.

Soul.Name: Sorrow of the Magic Sword
Soul.Comment: One Friendly unit gets AT+ your Falkow LV X10.

Skill0.Name: Restore the Wizard Kingdom
Skill0.Comment: Increase your Falkow level by 1. Decrease your Gowen level by 1.

Skill1.Name: Recovery Spell
Skill1.Comment: This unit is healed 5 HP X number of Grimoire cards in Rival Iczer's Cemetery.

Skill2.Name: Bane Slash
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT+ Falkow LV X10] to one random enemy row in range. Select a random Grimoire Card from rival Iczer and send it to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That's enough of that. Grownups shouldn't gang up and bully people.'
FlavorText.Text2: This man was once a high-ranking knight in the Wizard Kingdom. He escaped just before its destruction by a fiend's attack, and made for the allied Mercenary Kingdom. Now he joins in the fight against the evil forces as a mercenary to restore his kingdom. Wielding both magic and a sword, he's a knight who can cope with any situation.

Soul.Name: Speed of Battle
Soul.Comment: Increase your Gowen level by 2. Increase your Falkow level by 1.

Skill0.Name: In the Name of the Red Dragon
Skill0.Comment: Send a [subtype: dragon kin] card from your File to the Cemetery. And then, this card gets AT+10 and do [damage: AT] to a random unit who is not [subtype: beltorat kingdom].

FlavorText.Text1: 'All right now, let's go kick them around!'
FlavorText.Text2: Stormtroopers of Beltorat, under the command of Dragon Eyed King Ainhazard. Legend has it that the red of their armor is based for good luck on the red scales of the dragon Beltorat, for whom the kingdom is named. They charge onto the battlefield in preemptive strikes.

Soul.Name: Rabble Rouser
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one random enemy unit. One friendly [subtype: ork] gets AT+10 and AGI+1.

Skill0.Name: Shouted Commands
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: orks] of AT30 or lower get AT+20 and AGI-1 this turn, but this unit. One friendly [subtype: ork] gets AGI=4 this turn, but this unit.

Skill1.Name: Latent Urges
Skill1.Comment: This unit cannot use Rest.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's almost human, the way it commands its people to attack the enemy.'
FlavorText.Text2: A monster that looks like a humanoid pig. It achieved a near-human level of intelligence, and in addition to satisfying its appetite, it's learned how to seize land and issue orders. Furthermore, it deludes its fellow giant orks into invading human territory.

Skill0.Name: Fireball Breath
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Fireball Meltdown
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen LV6 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Increase Refess, Lawtia Falkow levels by 1. Decrease Gowen level by 3.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That's hotter than any human can endure.'
FlavorText.Text2: A ball of flame spat out by a Fire Dragon. Fire Dragon flames will burn anything manmade to ashes. Its special properties can melt anything down to its component elements, and many alchemists wish they could harness it.

Soul.Name: Wind Blade
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to one row of enemy units. All friendly [subtype: faerie] units get AT+10 and AGI+2.

Skill0.Name: Dash Magic
Skill0.Comment: One friendly [subtype: faerie] unit gets AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Accelerated Healing
Skill1.Comment: One friendly unit is healed 20 HP, except this unit. And then, increase Refess level by 1 and decrease Gowen level by 1.

Skill2.Name: Soul Strike Boost
Skill2.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+20 for this turn, except this unit. And then, increase Lawtia level by 1 and decrease Gowen level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Our quickness will help the others!'
FlavorText.Text2: Faeries who excel at controlling wind and haste magic.  They can use their powers in creative ways, or just rush into battle at blinding speed for a simultaneous attack.

Soul.Name: Giant Swarms
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to target enemy row.

Skill0.Name: Striking Out
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to all enemy units of AGI 4 or higher.

Skill1.Name: Bladed Wings
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 10 from the HP of two random enemy units in range. If either unit is at 0 HP or below, this unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Mindless Predator
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units in range. This unit gets AT+10 and AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That thing is huuuuge! And is it ever gross!'
FlavorText.Text2: A gigantic dragonfly monster. It's carnivorous, and will even attack and eat humans. It acts almost mindlessly, striking out at anything that moves. The only way to survive is to stand still.

Soul.Name: Cannibalism
Soul.Comment: Send one random card from your File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Hurling Urge
Skill0.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of a random enemy unit in range. Engage this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Holy cow, they learned how to throw rocks!'
FlavorText.Text2: A monster that looks like a humanoid pig. It learned how to use tools, and started raiding villages. It lifts giant rocks with its characteristic strength, and attacks with them. This type of Ork has such a bottomless hunger, it's known to be cannibalistic.

Soul.Name: Magic Sword Slash
Soul.Comment: Return one random [subtype: Wizard Kingdom] card in your Cemetery to your Card File. And then do [damage: 30] to a row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Empower Magic Greatsword
Skill0.Comment: Increase Falkow level by 1 and decrease Gowen level by 1. Do [damage: AT+ Falkow LV X5] to a random enemy unit in range.

Skill1.Name: Slash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy row in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I swear we'll take back our home someday...'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman of the Wizard Kingdom, which lost its king to the schemes of Abyssal Strategist Galdirea and the betrayal of the paladin Durendal. She was quite a high level wizard soldier, freely using all types of magic and magic items to fight her enemies. Those from Regus now use their powers in different lands as they try to restore their kingdom.

Skill0.Name: Fire Snake Whip
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one random enemy unit in [area: 1-2-3], [area: 4-5-6], and [area: 7-8-9].

FlavorText.Text1: 'These flames won't let you escape.'
FlavorText.Text2: A whip of flame used by spellcasters. It moves according to the caster's will, making it hard to evade.

Soul.Name: True Corruption
Soul.Comment: Target disengaged enemy unit gets MAX HP=30, HP=30, AT=0 and DF=0.

Skill0.Name: Corruption of the Abyss
Skill0.Comment: All enemy units get MAX HP=30, HP=30, AT=30, DF=0, AGI=2 and RNG=2.

Skill1.Name: Hands of Black Rot
Skill1.Comment: Send a random enemy unit in range with HP=30 to the Cemetery. Rival Iczer gets SP equal to the level of the unit. This skill is repeated a total of twice.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, my pretty boys. You're going to regret ever wounding me!'
FlavorText.Text2: The true form of Abyssal Strategist Galdirea, of the Triad of Chaos. Dilate and Ibert came running to help Cassandra in her time of trouble, and Galdirea unleashed his true form in order to put an end to the three once and for all. Thus does this battle become the beacon of humanity's counterattack.

Soul.Name: Birth of the Mage Princess
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV3 or higher] One friendly Falkow unit of LV 2 or higher gets MAX HP+30 and is fully healed. And, do [damage: 40] to an enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: The Book of the Archive
Skill0.Comment: This skill counts as a Grimoire activation.

Skill1.Name: Turn the Page
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/4 or more Grimoire activations] This unit gets AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Magic Seal Barrier
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/8 or more grimoire activations]  Target friendly unit of LV 3 or lower cannot be hit by an Attack action for this turn.

Skill3.Name: Magic Seal Power
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/11 or more Grimoire uses] Do [damage: 50% AT] to a random enemy unit in range. If it has DF < your Grimoire activations, engage it.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I will protect this book.  ...The new Archive.'
FlavorText.Text2: Bernet was just a girl who loved books. The musty old book she found one day in the Magic Library was an artifact. It dragged her into war, and she watched as her home was destroyed by a fiend and a magic doll. When she learned her book could determine the fate of the world to come, she chose to stop being a crybaby, and follow the path of a mage princess.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: At Blade's Length
Soul.Comment: Both Iczers get SP+[number of grimoires in your Cemetery]. Two friendly units get AT+number of grimoires in your Cemetery X5].

Skill0.Name: Mermaid in Human Form
Skill0.Comment: Send a copy of [card: Mermaid Transformation] removed from game to your File. And then, this unit gets AT + [number of friendly [subtype: mermaid] units X5] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Magic Greatsword Andante
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. If that unit is disengaged, do [damage: AT 50%] to that unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's Lord Vonderam's orders.  You're all going to be cut down!'
FlavorText.Text2: Mermaids live in the depths of Lavato's seas.  Furious over the sea floor's devastation and the near loss of his own life, Sea Lord Vonderam transformed the mermaids so they could operate on dry land. Shufas adapted very well to human form. She brandishes a huge sword with both hands, overpowering her human opponents.

Soul.Name: Ball Lightning
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: target friendly unit's AGIX10] to one random row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Lightning Cloud
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets HP-20 and DF=0. Subtract HP directly from the HP of two random enemy units. This skill counts as a Grimoire activation.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Our king was a magic artifact, and we had a traitor.  This kingdom has some terrible luck, but I won't let anything else happen to it!'
FlavorText.Text2: The leader of Regus' Battle Mage forces. His offensive magic power surpasses that of other master level spellcasters. He lost heart when he learned the truth about his kingdom just as it was being destroyed. But, he knew the people devoted to him were no illusion, so he musters the last of his power to do battle with the fiend's forces.

Skill0.Name: Celerity
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit of level 5 or lower gets AGI+2. All friendly [subtype: Wizard Kingdom] units get AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Beyond Speed.
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/8 or more Grimoire activations] All friendly units get AGI+1 and are disengaged.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Go!  As fast as you can!'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic that generates such speed that nothing else can keep up. It's often used on small fighting forces so they can ambush armies in an instant.

Soul.Name: Depth of Faith
Soul.Comment: Engage target Disengaged enemy unit. And then, Rival Iczer gets 1 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Song of Faith
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/AT30 or lower] Send one friendly [subtype: mermaid] from the Cemetery out of game. Then, this unit gets AT+40.

Skill1.Name: Slash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy row in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The fiend's curse has reached all the way to land.'
FlavorText.Text2: A Mermaid corrupted by a curse. This is the result of it happening to a Mermaid who had left for the surface. Its characteristics include walking on all fours and a gaping mouth with countless dog-like teeth. It rushes to attack indiscriminately once it sees its prey.

Soul.Name: The Skull and Crossbones
Soul.Comment: Increase your Falkow level by 2. Increase your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Just Here for the Booty
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Rival has 2 or more SP] Do [damage: AT+ 0->30] to one enemy unit in range. If unit is at HP0 or lower, Rival gets SP-1 and you get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ahoy thar! it's high time we did a bit of swashbucklin'!'
FlavorText.Text2: A female pirate who leads the pirates rampaging around the coastal waters. Their defense is so good because they skillfully use armor made from the shells of sea floor monsters called Sea Hunters.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Swiftness of the Mermaids
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one random enemy column. All friendly [subtype: mermaid] units get AGI+2.

Skill0.Name: Pinpoint
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Magic Bow of Waves
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets RNG-1. Do [damage: AT] to one enemy unit. Repeat this skill once for each point of RNG, max 3.

FlavorText.Text1: 'At this rate...that fiend's corruption will reach all the way to the sea floor.'
FlavorText.Text2: Mermaids live in the depths of Lavato's seas.  Sea Lord Vonderam changed her and sent her to the surface along with mermaid soldiers and sorceresses in order to stop Galdirea the fiend. Now that she's grown legs, she can move around nimbly on dry land too.

Skill0.Name: Ice Storm
Skill0.Comment: All units get RNG=0 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Ice Blizzard
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/8 Grimore activations or more] Subtract 20 directly from the HP of all units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Magic made the ice mean, mean enough to assault people.'
FlavorText.Text2: A magic spell. It's a wide-area attack spell that artificially generates hail, and those hit with it are frozen on the spot.

Soul.Name: Lost Promises
Soul.Comment: You get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: We'll Meet Again Someday
Skill0.Comment: Return this unit to the File. This skill counts as two Grimoire activations.

Skill1.Name: Distraction Magic
Skill1.Comment: Increase your Falkow level by 1. Set your Refess, Lawtia and Gowen levels to 0->1. This skill counts as a Grimoire Activation.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Retreat at full speed! Let's all live long enough to meet again.'
FlavorText.Text2: The Wizard Kingdom is perishing. When the royal army decided to evacuate, the flying mage division chose to take to the air as their rear guard.

Soul.Name: Pirate Chantey
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: pirate] units get MAX HP +20, AT+20 and are healed 20 HP.

Skill0.Name: Ready to Keelhaul
Skill0.Comment: [Conditional use/two or more subtype: pirates are on the field] This unit gets AT+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Gather the Mateys
Skill1.Comment: The units in the front, back, left and right of this unit get AT+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'There are now many pirates running rampant in the ruins of Regus, in search of the treasures that still slumber there.'
FlavorText.Text2: Crew members of a pirate ship. They band together at sea to plunder, and they have a reputation for coordinated maritime attacks.

Soul.Name: Rise From the Sand
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. One friendly unit of AGI 2 or lower gets DF+5 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Armored Shell
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/4 Grimoire activations or higher] This unit gets DF=20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Charge
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT X2] to one random enemy unit in range. This unit takes [damage: MAX HP50%].

FlavorText.Text1: 'That knight conceals itself in the ocean depths. You'll never see it 'till it springs from the sand.'
FlavorText.Text2: A type of giant crab living on the ocean floor.  It's sometimes called the Knight of the Sea because of the carapace covering its body and its left arm, which has evolved into a shield-like shape. It usually hides in the sand, but when it's time to catch prey, it stabs it with its pincer and tears it apart.

Soul.Name: Soaring Flight
Soul.Comment: Return one friendly unit to the card File.

Skill0.Name: Blade Wind
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] This unit switches AGI with target enemy of AGI 3 or higher. And then, Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy in range.

Skill1.Name: Wind Torrent
Skill1.Comment: Enemy units are moved to random open areas and Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit. This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Everyone Scatter! All it has to do is fly, to create an invisible blade that can cut through a mountainside.'
FlavorText.Text2: A wyvern that lives on high mountains and in gorges. It has a slim physique for a wyvern, but it's a ferocious creature that flies around at high speed and high altitudes, searching for prey and kicking up wind. It can scatter an army with wind blasts, or suddenly dive and create an unstoppable blade of air.

Skill0.Name: Withdrawal Strategy
Skill0.Comment: Return target friendly unit of LV 2 or lower to your Card File, and then return one random LV 3 enemy unit to its Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The kingdom is ruined, but that doesn't mean its soldiers are ruined.'
FlavorText.Text2: These are the tactics used by Wizard Kingdom forces when they were evacuating. They made it look like they were running away, to lure enemy forces into a trap, then dealt a heavy blow to them. It requires the use of a decoy, so it's most effective when there are large numbers of friendly forces.

Soul.Name: The Sun and Moon Meet
Soul.Comment: You get Refess LV+2 and Lawtia LV+2. You may not set a Grimoire card next turn or the turn after.

Skill0.Name: Lunara Cries
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] All friendly [subtype: Duchy of Crest] units get AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn. Set Battletime to Morning.

Skill1.Name: Claevolg Answers
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] All friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] units get AT+10 and DF+5 this turn and heal 10 HP. Set Battletime to Noon.

FlavorText.Text1:
-'It's you!?'
'Who am I...? What am I doing here...?'
FlavorText.Text2: Duchy of Crest Field Commander Yug was leading the battle at the moment Verlaat was thrown down. He extricated Verlaat from danger before anyone else could, and brought him to Eskatia.  However...

Soul.Name: Sister's Showdown
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random disengaged enemy units. And then, one friendly unit gets AT+20.

Skill0.Name: An Even Match
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to target friendly unit. And then, do [damage: 50] to one random enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Soul System Resonates
Skill1.Comment: Target friendly [subtype: magic doll] unit gets AT+ [Lawtia level X5 + Gowen level X5] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1:
-'Let me through!'
-'No, we're going to put an end to this here and now, Sister.'
FlavorText.Text2: The fighting rages between Esria, the magic doll who's been travelling with Dilate, and Astaforse, the magic doll who pursued Esria on a mission to kill her. Their even match is about to be spoiled by their little sister, Noze.

Soul.Name: Red Death and Azure Flash
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to the disengaged units in a random enemy row with at least one disengaged unit. And then, one friendly unit gets AGI+1.

Skill0.Name: Fighting Back to Back
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot use the Attack Action. When using Rest, this unit gets AT=80 and is healed 25% of MAX HP.

Skill1.Name: I Got This One!
Skill1.Comment: [Conditional use AT70 or lower] Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemy units in range. This unit gets AT=80.

Skill2.Name: It's My Turn!
Skill2.Comment: [Conditional use AT80 or higher] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. This unit gets AT=40.

FlavorText.Text1:
-'Let's join forces and fight our way through here, Dilate!'
-'You got it! I'm worried about Cassandra.'
FlavorText.Text2: Cassandra pursued Complete Form Noze, who had been awakened in the heart of the Wizard Kingdom, and her master, the Abyssal Strategist Galdirea. Dilate and Ibert hurried after her when she launched her lone assault. However, Galdirea's familiars were waiting to stand in their way.

Soul.Name: Girls Linked by Fate
Soul.Comment: Set one random disengaged enemy unit to HP=0. Return two random [subtype: magic doll] cards from your Cemetery to your File.

Skill0.Name: Cause and Effect Feedback
Skill0.Comment: Send one Grimore card from Rival Iczer's card File to the Cemetery. And then, send one [subtype: magic doll] card from your Cemetery to your File.

Skill1.Name: Unlucky Guest
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy in range. Send one Grimoire from Rival's File to Cemetery. One friendly [subtype: magic doll] gets MAX HP+10 and HP+20.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Well, Fellana...  You've finally come all the way here and made it back to me...'
FlavorText.Text2: Fellana was 'escorted' out of the collapsing Wizard Kingdom. This was Annarose's doing, so she could get her hands on Fellana's special research on causality. Then as she was held prisoner in Annarose's laboratory, Sumer appeared before her. What could she be up to?

Soul.Name: Fury of the Lion
Soul.Comment: Subtract 30 from the MAX HP of three random disengaged enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Discipline of the Lion
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime noon] This unit gets LV +1, and MAX HP/AT +[# of enemy units X5]. Do [damage: AT] to a random engaged enemy in range.

Skill1.Name: Lion Rests At Night
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit is engaged, fully healed and gets DF+20 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll use my power for the peace of the world!'
FlavorText.Text2: This is Zagar, grand general of Folrart, in his younger days. He was born the eldest son of a family of military heroes. With his natural talent, he became the youngest ever to reach the rank of general. However, it's said that behind his remarkable exploits lies the grueling training he received from Dical, then one of his military academy professors.

FlavorText.Text1: You won Set 8! Yes, one copy of each!
FlavorText.Text2: Congratulations! The ultimate rare prize card of the Super Rarity Lotto is yours! After the event is over, this card will be exchanged for 1 copy of every card in Set 8!

Soul.Name: Heart of the Rose
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to two random enemy units. And then, Send one unit card from rival Iczer's card file to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Raven Black Sword
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. If enemy unit's HP is 0 or below, this unit gets AT+10 and AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The world sure is a dangerous place...  I mean, they'll pay somebody like me money to commit murder.'
FlavorText.Text2: A lady mercenary known as the 'black rose woman' because of the artificial black rose on her chest. She's easygoing, but she has godlike strength that lets her wield the infamous cursed weapon Raven Black Sword Lazayef. She loves flowers, and biting her nails.

Attack.Name: Attaｃｋ
Attack.Comment: このユニットの[攻撃]は以下のスキルである。■[RNG内]の敵軍ユニットからランダムで1体選び[ダメージ：プレイヤーの[影響力：リフェス]×5]する。

Soul.Name: Speed of the Light Bow
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AGI+5 for this turn. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: The Wings of Olivia
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: your Refess level X 5] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill1.Name: Ultimate Aim
Skill1.Comment: This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Olivia Takes Flight
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Focus] Do [damage: AT+ your Refess level X 5] to two enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Myowr!?  Well, um, swimming makes for good physical training...'
FlavorText.Text2: The Solar Kingdom rarely sees heavy heat waves, and this one had an obvious negative effect on morale. Ernst, captain of the Royal Knights, summoned the assistant captains to an emergency meeting on troop morale. Fistara, however, failed to appear. Upon searching the royal palace, Princess Aliria found Fistara playing at the pool. She was dragged off and scolded beneath the blazing sun.

Soul.Name: Girls Linked by Fate
Soul.Comment: Set one random disengaged enemy unit to HP=0. Return two random [subtype: magic doll] cards from your Cemetery to your File.

Skill0.Name: Cause and Effect Feedback
Skill0.Comment: Send one Grimore card from Rival Iczer's card File to the Cemetery. And then, send one [subtype: magic doll] card from your Cemetery to your File.

Skill1.Name: Unlucky Guest
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy in range. Send one Grimoire from Rival's File to Cemetery. One friendly [subtype: magic doll] gets MAX HP+10 and HP+20.

FlavorText.Text1:
-'Come on, Sumer.  Cut that out...!'  
-'Oh lighten up.  It's not like I'm hurting you!'
FlavorText.Text2: Sumer and Fellana were good friends. Perhaps we might have seen them enjoying summer together like this, had Sumer not gone along with Fellana's tragic experiments. However, that was never meant to be. Now that the War of the Sun and Moon has taken over both their fates, Fellana was abducted as Regus fell under attack, and she was reunited with Sumer. What will their relationship be like now?

Soul.Name: Invisible Strike
Soul.Comment: Set a random disengaged enemy unit to HP=0. Rival Iczer cannot Set a grimoire card next turn or the turn after.

Skill0.Name: Lumilarin's Drop
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets [DF+ number of friendly [subtype: faerie] units X 10] for this turn, max +30 DF.

Skill1.Name: Knight's Heart
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/DF 30 or higher] This unit gets AT+20. Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1:
-'Hey, Torte. This fish is trying to tell me something...'
-'All right. I'll snag him, and give him to you!'
FlavorText.Text2: Emana and Torte are travelling the world in search of the human's king. They stop by a Matsuri summer festival while passing through a Solar Kingdom town. It's a Far East tradition, but it caught on in Folrart after one was held in the capital. The two companions find it quite fascinating. But then, Emana senses something problematic. Torte figures she might as well try her hand at scooping goldfish.

Soul.Name: Spiral Squall
Soul.Comment: Do [damage:30] to all units with AGI 3 or higher.

Skill0.Name: Flying Attack
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy.

Skill1.Name: Take Flight
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AGI 6 or higher] This unit gets AT+10 and RNG+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'One, two, three, four!'
FlavorText.Text2: Morning calisthenics are a regular thing for Regus scouts, who need to stay limber for flying. It's done in the early morning during the summer when the heat is still easy to bear. It seems like one of them isn't a morning person and it looks like she's still half asleep.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Rest.Name: Rest
Rest.Comment: When this unit uses Rest, it recovers 25% MAX HP and becomes Focused until the end of next turn.

Soul.Name: Strength of the Abby
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: True God Church] units get MAX HP+20 and HP+20. And then, do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Holy Stance
Skill0.Comment: When this unit uses Rest, it recovers 25% MAX HP and becomes Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Double Punishment Fist
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Subtract AT+ Refess LV X5 from the MAX HP of two random enemies in range. This unit is no longer Focused.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's to safeguard the Holy Realm? Of course I'll help you.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the inquisitors from the Church of the True God. During times of peace, she works to make life miserable for the Shrine Knights. She and their leader, Lapierre, are on the same level, but they fight like cats and dogs.

Soul.Name: Roar of Battle
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: total of Rival's Sphere lvls X 20] to target enemy unit. If Rival's total Sphere lvls is 10 or higher, Rival gets -2 to all Sphere lvls.

Skill0.Name: Dark Centaur Trample
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 999 directly from the HP of two random units of level 2 or lower.

Skill1.Name: Single Combat
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in range. That unit does [damage: AT] to this unit. Continue this exchange until one unit is at HP 0 or below, or after four iterations.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A warrior's battle is a warrior's joy.'
FlavorText.Text2: A close associate of the princess of the Duchy of Crest, Eskatia.  He is a remnant of the forgotten race of centaurs.  As he conceals his entire body in an armor and helm, no one knows what he looks like.  Only in battle does he feel alive.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Get Angry
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AGI+2 for this turn. All enemy units are affected by Death Touch.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, RNG +1.

Skill0.Name: Armor Fracturing Punch
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Subtract AT directly from the HP of one random enemy unit in range. That unit gets DF=0 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Death Touch
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 0] to target enemy unit. Whenever that unit is hit by an Attack from a [subtype: martial artist], it also gets HP-[Attacking unit's AT].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come on, let me have some more fun!'
FlavorText.Text2: An unstable martial artist who is not always at the top of his game. He ended up working as a trainer in Heierrat, insisting that by pounding his pupils day in and day out, they'd toughen up. His former students are known for their endurance on the battlefield.

Soul.Name: Balance of the Elements
Soul.Comment: Return target Open or Closed friendly unit of level 2 or lower. And then, return one random disengaged level 3 enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Ultimate Elementalist
Skill0.Comment: All friendly level 1 [subtype: Great Spirit] units get LV=3, MAX HP=50, HP=50, AT=30, DF=0, AGI=2 and RNG=2.

Skill1.Name: Wind on the Water
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit of AGI 4 or higher. Do [damage: 60] to one random enemy unit of AGI 0 or lower.

Skill2.Name: Elemental Cycle
Skill2.Comment: Return target Open or Closed [subtype: Great Spirit] unit to the Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Water is my friend.'
FlavorText.Text2: A great wizardress who controls water magic.  Her magic powers were innate from birth, so she never learned wizardry as a craft.

Soul.Name: Green Diva Sings
Soul.Comment: Subtract 30 directly from the MAX HP of target enemy unit. One row of friendly units gets DF+5.

Skill0.Name: Knight of Songs
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Singing] This unit gets AT+20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Hymn of Victory
Skill1.Comment: Disengage this unit.

Skill2.Name: Sing
Skill2.Comment: This unit begins Singing.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It'd make me happy if the world was so peaceful everyone would sing this song to themselves.'
FlavorText.Text2:
A singing voice came from somewhere in a forest brimming with spring green. It was a girl clad in armor, all alone. I stood still in that place until her song ended. Her voice ceased, and a silence enveloped us. After a time she stood up, said to me 'Don't die,' and departed.
--Excerpt from a soldier's report upon returning from the battlefield (C)CFM

Soul.Name: Harmonic Revival
Soul.Comment: Revive one friendly [subtype: Diva] unit and give it DF+5 and AGI+1. That unit begins Singing.

Skill0.Name: Recovery Live
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Singing] All friendly Refess units are healed 15 HP and get AT+5.

Skill1.Name: Sing Harmony
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Diva] units begin Singing.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My job is to make everyone happy!'
FlavorText.Text2: I was so enthusiastic about making everybody happy, but hardly anybody listened to me! You were the only one who praised me! You said I was a good singer! That's why I'm going to try as hard as I possibly can for your sake. I'll sing so that you can be even happier! (C)CFM

Soul.Name: My World
Soul.Comment: Engage a random disengaged enemy unit for each engaged friendly unit. All friendly engaged units are disengaged and get AT+15 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Take the Stage
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/0 copies of [card: Sonic Seraphim] are in the Cemetery] You get SP+1.

Skill1.Name: Sing for Master
Skill1.Comment: This unit begins Singing.

Skill2.Name: Melody of Destruction
Skill2.Comment: Set a random enemy column within range to DF=0 and do [damage: number of turns total this unit has been Singing X 15] to that column.

Skill3.Name: Hope of the Singer
Skill3.Comment: Return one [subtype: Diva] unit from your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I will sing my master's ultimate song in my ultimate singing voice. That means everything to me.'
FlavorText.Text2: What are you doing here? I'm a singer, so how can I sing if I have no song? Yes, I'll be here alone until the song is finished. Even so, all I want to sing is my master's 'perfect song.' That is what will make me happy, so I can stand to wait here in this world of boredom... I don't know how you got here, but leave. This world is for my master and myself. (C)CFM

Soul.Name: Magic Greatsword 'Keyboard'
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one random enemy unit. Engage target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Start the Music!
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Diva] units begin Singing.

Skill1.Name: The First Sound
Skill1.Comment: This unit begins Singing. All friendly Singing units get MAX HP+10, and are healed 20 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This world's a big place! Maybe there's a lot more fun in store for me!'
FlavorText.Text2: An adventurer who wields 'Keyboard,' a greatsword that plays music. She searches for the legendary 'first sound,' and is interested in all types of music. When she first set foot on Lavato, everything she encountered was a new sound to her, and she couldn't contain her excitement. 'I'll get the people of this world to listen to me sing,' she said enthusiastically as she set out on her adventure. (C)CFM

Soul.Name: No Heart Live
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. One friendly unit gets AT=[AT of that unit] for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Sing All Night
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit begins Singing, and then rival Iczer gets SP-1.

Skill1.Name: Dance to the Music
Skill1.Comment: Engage one random disengaged enemy unit in range. Do [damage: that unit's AT] to one random unit who is not Singing. This skill is repeated a total of twice.

Skill2.Name: Lavato Festival!
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Singing] All units get AT+20 and AGI=5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Thank you all for coming today, everyone! Let's start the Lavato Festival! â™ª'
FlavorText.Text2:
You know what! I want everybody to listen to this song a bunch! And then sing, celebrate, and dance! I want us all to be happy and smile!  I can sing this song because it was made with the feelings I have for all of you! I'm so happy I might cry. â™ª
--With thanks, a Lavato Festival advertisement (C)CFM

Soul.Name: Be Quiet and Listen!
Soul.Comment: Engage two enemy units. All friendly [subtype: Diva] units begin Singing.

Skill0.Name: Sing
Skill0.Comment: This unit begins Singing.

Skill1.Name: Music Strike
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random units who are not Singing.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Bad mannered children need to be punished!'
FlavorText.Text2: People were enjoying my singing, and that was really terrible of you to shout out like that! I'm an adult so I tried to be nice at first, but you just wouldn't stop. By the end, you started saying my singing sucks... Well fine, I can't take it anymore! I guess you just need a little pain! Even if it makes me late to work and I have to submit a written apology... (C)CFM

Soul.Name: Stained Diva
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all enemy units. One enemy unit gets AT-10 and AGI=0.

Skill0.Name: Infected Voice
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Singing] All units who are not Singing get AGI-1 for this turn. This unit gets AT+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Song Infection Spreads
Skill1.Comment: This unit is healed 5 HP X number of Closed units.

Skill2.Name: Broken Butterfly Dreams
Skill2.Comment: Send [card: Broken Virus] from your File to the Cemetery and then, this unit fully recovers HP, and begins Singing.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My song will never touch anyone again.'
FlavorText.Text2: When the singer awoke, she saw in the mirror a ghost of what she once had been. She continued to sing with a voice devoid of the beauty it once held, for the singer was a singer no more. 'Now that I've been reduced to this state, nobody will listen to me anymore. Yet I will still sing. After all, I am a singer.'

Soul.Name: Killing Mission
Soul.Comment: One friendly unit is healed 50% MAX HP. Then, subtract 40 from the HP of number of random enemies equal to the amount your Rival's field outnumbers yours.

Skill0.Name: Sing
Skill0.Comment: This unit begins Singing.

Skill1.Name: Requiem for Myself
Skill1.Comment: Set one random unit of HP 30 or higher who is not Singing to HP=0.

Skill2.Name: Broken Virus Cure
Skill2.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Diva] units begin Singing.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I feel like I can't completely give up.  Maybe I can save the other me.'
FlavorText.Text2: I understand. You're me, after all. It was sad and painful, wasn't it? But you don't have to cry anymore. You don't have to sing anymore. I'll deal with it all now... At least at I can let you rest in peace. 'Broken Virus. I am the singer who protects myself,' she said as she sung a song of affection for the one who was once herself, and struck.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack skill for Gowen Divas

Soul.Name: Sword of the Swan
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random disengaged enemy units, and then, target friendly gets AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Battle Song
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range and then this unit begins Singing.

Skill1.Name: Blade Chorus
Skill1.Comment: Do [Damage: number of friendly Singing units X 20] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You said I'm like a swan? I'll take that as a compliment!'
FlavorText.Text2: I was taking a break from training, relaxing at the lake, when a child playing nearby said I look like a swan. It was my fault for wearing that outfit... I went and said 'Wrong.  I'm the Swan Knight,' and his eyes sparkled. What else could I do? I told them I'd give him a treat and show him my combat gear... But hey, this might be kind of cool. (C)CM

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack skill for Gowen Divas

Soul.Name: Deliver from Despair
Soul.Comment: Engage one random unit.

Skill0.Name: Battle Song
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range and then this unit begins Singing.

Skill1.Name: Bewitching Voice
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Singing] Do [damage:20] to one random enemy unit in range and give it LV+1.

Skill2.Name: Song of Moon and Water
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT +Lawtia LV X10 +Falkow LV X10] to all enemy units of LV 4 or higher.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You look like you would appreciate my singing...  I'll sing for you the best song there is.'
FlavorText.Text2: A phantom songstress who appears before those on the verge of losing hope. It's said she whispers bewitching words and sings in a beautiful voice to deliver you from despair, but it's unknown if she actually exists. Those who hear the rumor dismiss it as gossip, but many claim she's not a phantom but 'virtual.' What does that mean? It will forever remain a mystery. (C)CM

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack skill for Gowen Divas

Soul.Name: Dimensional Diva
Soul.Comment: One friendly [subtype: Diva] unit begins Singing. And then, do [damage: 40] to two random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Battle Song
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range and then this unit begins Singing.

Skill1.Name: Turn it Up
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets AGI+1 for every friendly Singing unit for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Dimensional Dischord
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT+20] to a random enemy in range. If that unit is HP 0 or lower, all friendly [subtpype: Diva] units begin Singing and get AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My song can be heard through any wall.'
FlavorText.Text2: There's a story in Lavato about a beautiful female singing voice that comes out of nowhere. Some people think it's the Fairy Dance, but in recent years the voice has been heard in large cities. A famous detective tried to solve the mystery. After hearing it, he said it was the work of the inter-dimensional diva and closed the case. It appears his words were true. (C)CFM

Soul.Name: One Voice to the World
Soul.Comment: Engage one enemy unit until the end of next turn. Do [damage: 20] to one disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Mass Mute
Skill0.Comment: All enemy [subtype: Diva] units stop Singing.

Skill1.Name: Song of Peace
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Singing] This unit cannot be hit by an Attack action for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Move the World
Skill2.Comment: This unit begins Singing. Move enemy units from [area: 1-2-3] to [area: 7-8-9], and [area: 7-8-9] to [area: 1-2-3]. Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'With this, I too can become a great singer!  ...Maybe.'
FlavorText.Text2: 'It's finally mine! This strange object can project my voice all over the world... So, time to sing! Uhh, ahem. I'm a little nervous. Be confident! It's all right, I'm sure my song will touch everyone's hearts. Okay! Switch it on... H-Hello! Please listen to my song, because I want to be a songer!' She flubbed her opening, but her singing was beautiful. (C)CFM

Soul.Name: Song of Wishes
Soul.Comment: Return three random [subtype: Diva] units from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Backup Singers
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Singing] All friendly Singing units in Area [7-8-9] get AT+10 and RNG+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Lead Singer Center Stage
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is in [Area: 5]] This unit begins Singing. Enemy unit in [Area: 5] gets AGI-3.

Skill2.Name: Front Row Seats
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AGI X 5] to enemy units in Area[1-2-3]. All friendly units in Area[1-2-3] get AGI+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Those who've come here are lucky. I make one of their wishes come true.'
FlavorText.Text2: Oh, you're the first visitor I've had in a while. You're a curious girl, to come here. I had just finished what I was doing and was going to rest, so I'll hold a special audience with you. Listen to one of my songs. I think I'm a pretty good singer... Now, down to business. I'll grant just one of your wishes.  What might your wish be? (C)CFM

Soul.Name: Transfer Student is a Diva
Soul.Comment: Return one friendly unit to the Card File. And then, return one disengaged enemy unit of equal or lower level to the Card File.

Skill0.Name: Idol of the Academy
Skill0.Comment: [Conditional use/Singing] This unit gets AT+30 and RNG+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Clef Arrow
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in range. That unit stops Singing.

Skill2.Name: Sing
Skill2.Comment: This unit begins Singing.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I sure hope my feelings reach you!'
FlavorText.Text2: Suddenly, a mysterious Transfer Student shows up at the new Magic Academy! She quickly becomes the talk of the campus, and the entire class gets excited when she first walks in!  I mean, she's that singer! Her singing is famous even in Regus! What a surprise, a famous singer who's going to use magic! She puts music into her magic and shoots her targets! (C)CFM

Soul.Name: Song of the Skies
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to four random units. Return one [subtype: dragon kin] card of level 7 or lower from your Cemetery to your File.

Skill0.Name: Refrain of Magic
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly [subtype: Diva] unit begins Singing and gets AGI+2 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Verse of Power
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit in area[7-8-9]] This unit begins Singing. One friendly unit of AT 20 or lower gets DF=10 for this turn and AT+10.

Skill2.Name: Verse of Speed
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/this unit in area[7-8-9]] This unit begins Singing. One friendly unit of AGI 2 or lower gets DF=10 for this turn and AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My day begins when they listen to me sing.'
FlavorText.Text2: You see, I sing to them all every morning like this. At first, only one dragon would listen to me! Before I knew it, this whole bunch of dragons was gathering! What? Aren't I scared? No, I was at first. I thought they were gonna eat me. But not now. Now they're all good friends of mine! (C)CFM

FlavorText.Text1: Collect copies of this card from Oct 17th to Nov 6th in Treasure Battles to win prizes!
FlavorText.Text2:
-Every 5 Miku Collector Cards: Get 3 point cards
-10 Miku Collector Cards: Get 1 Dragon Song Princess.
-20 Miku Collector Cards: Get 2nd Dragon Song Princess. 
At most, you'll get 2 copies of Dragon Song Princess and 12 Point Cards. We give out prizes Mon

Soul.Name: Blessing of Light
Soul.Comment: Add Rival Iczer's present SP value to your SP.

Skill0.Name: Power Source
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly gets MAX HP+10 and HP+20.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come forth, Will o' the Wisp!'
FlavorText.Text2: A spirit that represents the power of light.  Its appearance changes depending on the mind and ability of she who summons it.  With some summoners, it's possible for the spirit to appear in a humanoid form like this one.

Soul.Name: Advent of the Dragon Emperor
Soul.Comment: Two friendly units get AT+30, DF+30 and AGI+3 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: True Holy Light
Skill0.Comment: Revive all closed friendly units.

Skill1.Name: True Holy Roar
Skill1.Comment: Return 1 random card from your Cemetery to your Card File, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Emperor of Dragonkin
Skill2.Comment: Target friendly Refess unit with 40HP or lower gets MAX HP+10 and is healed 30HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The Holy Dragon Emperor has revealed his true form in Lavato's darkest hour.'
FlavorText.Text2: This white dragon is the true form of the king of the legendary Dragon Emperors. He has returned to his true glory to fight against the Envoy of Chaos and his three servants.

Skill0.Name: Merciless Death
Skill0.Comment: Send target unit to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'For birth, a ritual is necessary, but death requires nothing.'
FlavorText.Text2: Death is an inescapable fate.  Another life ends too soon.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: The Monks' Rebellion
Soul.Comment: One enemy unit gets AT-30. Subtract 1 from your LP.

Skill0.Name: Fruits of Training
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets [AT + number of [cardtype: Martial Artist] cards in your Cemetery X 10] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This gem gives me the power of my ancestors.'
FlavorText.Text2: These martial artists train for years to sync with special gems that enhance their powers. These gems are found deep in the earth, and are said to hold a portion of the power of Gowen himself.

Soul.Name: Spell Recall
Soul.Comment: Return two random Grimoire Cards that have been removed from the game to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Magic Sword Bandalt
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+ [times you've invoked a Grimoire X 10] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Unlock Bandalt
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to random enemy unit in range. Return one Grimoire that was removed from the game to your Card file.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I cannot let you go any further. If you insist, then I, Mirelia, will fight you.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of six paladins who protect the Wizard Kingdom. She fights with a magic sword named Bandalt. Its power is affected by the spells used around her. She may look young and cute, but her real age is unknown.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Battlefield Conditions
Soul.Comment: Units in [area: 1-2-3] get DF+10 on both sides of the field. Units in [area: 4-5-6] get RNG+1 on both sides of the field.

Skill0.Name: Pinpoint
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'When will the war end?'
FlavorText.Text2: A soldier in the mermaid army that is under the protection of Vonderam. She was ordered by Vonderam to take the field and help prolong the war between the humans. However, she sees no good reason for fighting and is even starting to doubt Princess Emana's words.

Soul.Name: Mass Impale
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to a random column of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Brutal Goring
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT X 2] to a random enemy column in range. This unit is healed 40 HP and engaged until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Run if you have to, just not in a straight line.'
FlavorText.Text2: There are monsters that have been living deep in the eldritch forests since ancient times. They're very territorial, and attack anything that enters their domain.

Soul.Name: Blessing of the Fey World
Soul.Comment: If Refess is lvl is 4 or lower, send 4 Refess unit cards from your cemetery to the card file. Otherwise, you get SP+2 and Refess+1.

Skill0.Name: Luck of the Cat
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+0->1. If you get SP0, all friendlies are healed 10HP.

Skill1.Name: Magic Boots
Skill1.Comment: Send this unit to the cemetery. Increase your Refess level by 1 and you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Meow meow meow meow-meow. Meow meow meow-meowâ™ª'
FlavorText.Text2: A rare type of fairy that can walk on its own two feet. It uses a cat's body to travel around the world of mortals, and legends have it that seeing one on your travels will bring you good luck.

Soul.Name: Protection of Comrades
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get MAX HP+50% and are fully healed.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Guard Formation
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: shrine knight] units get DF+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Don't let Captain Shathia down!'
FlavorText.Text2: The Knights of the 2nd Shrine are one regiment of the Shrine Knights. They're led by Shathia. They're famous for their devotion to their leader, and will follow her orders without hesitation.

Soul.Name: Good for Digestion
Soul.Comment: One unit of LV 2 or lower gets MAX HP=0. And then, add that units' MAX HP to the MAX HP and HP of target friendly unit.

Skill0.Name: Price of Ultimate Evil
Skill0.Comment: No unit card in your Card File may be set next turn.

Skill1.Name: Save Room for Dessert
Skill1.Comment: This unit cannot use the Attack action.

Skill2.Name: It's Time to Eat!
Skill2.Comment: Set one random enemy unit of lower HP than this unit to MAX HP=0. And then, this unit gets LV+1, MAX HP+15, and DF=0.

Skill3.Name: Ready for Seconds
Skill3.Comment: This unit gets MAX HP+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, so many tasty looking people. And me with an empty stomach. What am I to do?'
FlavorText.Text2: Annette was one of the servants under the Saint of Water, Actoul. She was a queen from another world who lived in the lap of luxury. She had a taste for human flesh and blood, and it's said that by the time she was executed, she'd killed thousands of her people. A practitioner of black magic, she used it to capture and devour those anyone she took a liking to.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: 攻撃

Soul.Name: Perish in Enlightenment
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/LP 11 or higher] You get SP+3.

Skill0.Name: Price of Ultimate Evil
Skill0.Comment: No unit card in your Card File may be set next turn.

Skill1.Name: Ray of Hope
Skill1.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit of LV3 or higher in range.

Skill2.Name: Fundamental Doom
Skill2.Comment: Subtract 50% AT directly from the HP of two random enemy units.

Skill3.Name: Final Temptation to Forget
Skill3.Comment: Do [damage: AT 50%] to two random enemy units. Send one random enemy unit of HP 0 or lower to the cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Your lives exist for my entertainment, and nothing more.'
FlavorText.Text2: Shvara was one of the servants under the Saint of Water, Actoul. He ruled a number of lands on another world, where he was known as the Mad King for his bizarre appearance and tactics. He also devoted himself to sorcery, and it's said that the tip of his spear was imbued with the malice of several thousand of the dead, dooming anyone stabbed by it to an eternity in hell.

Soul.Name: Unparalleled Under Heaven
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. One friendly unit cannot be hit by Attack actions for three turns.

Skill0.Name: Price of Ultimate Evil
Skill0.Comment: No unit card in your Card File may be set next turn.

Skill1.Name: Heaven and Earth
Skill1.Comment: This unit cannot be affected, targeted, or randomly chosen by Soul Skills.

Skill2.Name: Sword of the Heavens
Skill2.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer Attack action, Rival Iczer gets LP-2.

Skill3.Name: Unparalleled Slash
Skill3.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy row in range. All units hit are moved to random open Areas.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The earth shakes and the heavens tremble. None can withstand my ultimate might.'
FlavorText.Text2: Genshin was one of the servants under the Saint of Water, Actoul. He was an unrivaled swordsman from another world, and it's said he won every one of his battles against the many martial artists he fought. He was never defeated, but his fighting style was so brutal, no one wanted to be his apprentice. He lived out the last of his years in a cave as a hermit.

Soul.Name: Border of the Demon Path
Soul.Comment: Send two random Grimoire Cards from your File out of game. Return one random Grimoire of LV 5 or lower that was removed from game to your File.

Skill0.Name: Price of Ultimate Evil
Skill0.Comment: No unit card in your Card File may be set next turn.

Skill1.Name: Trials of the Soul
