Skill1.Comment: Return a Grimoire Card from your Cemetery to the Card File. And then, do [damage: number of Grimoires used X 10] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill2.Name: Recalling the Soul
Skill2.Comment: Return one random enemy unit of level 1 or lower within range to the card file.

FlavorText.Text1: 'All people belong to me.'
FlavorText.Text2: Hirume was one of the servants under the Saint of Water, Actoul. She was a witch queen who reigned over a large nation on another world. It's said she used talismanic cards to foresee future threats, and to rule the minds of those antagonistic towards her.

FlavorText.Text1: You won Set 1! Yes, one copy of each!
FlavorText.Text2: Congratulations!  The ultimate rare prize card of the Super Rarity Lotto is yours!  After the event is over, this card will be exchanged for 1 copy of every card in Set 1!

FlavorText.Text1: You won Set 2! Yes, one copy of each!
FlavorText.Text2: Congratulations!  The ultimate rare prize card of the Super Rarity Lotto is yours!  After the event is over, this card will be exchanged for 1 copy of every card in Set 2!

FlavorText.Text1: You won Set 3! Yes, one copy of each!
FlavorText.Text2: Congratulations!  The ultimate rare prize card of the Super Rarity Lotto is yours!  After the event is over, this card will be exchanged for 1 copy of every card in Set 3!

FlavorText.Text1: You won Set 4! Yes, one copy of each!
FlavorText.Text2: Congratulations!  The ultimate rare prize card of the Super Rarity Lotto is yours!  After the event is over, this card will be exchanged for 1 copy of every card in Set 4!

FlavorText.Text1: You won Set 5! Yes, one copy of each!
FlavorText.Text2: Congratulations!  The ultimate rare prize card of the Super Rarity Lotto is yours!  After the event is over, this card will be exchanged for 1 copy of every card in Set 5!

FlavorText.Text1: You won Set 6! Yes, one copy of each!
FlavorText.Text2: Congratulations!  The ultimate rare prize card of the Super Rarity Lotto is yours!  After the event is over, this card will be exchanged for 1 copy of every card in Set 6!

FlavorText.Text1: You won Set 7! Yes, one copy of each!
FlavorText.Text2: Congratulations!  The ultimate rare prize card of the Super Rarity Lotto is yours!  After the event is over, this card will be exchanged for 1 copy of every card in Set 7!

FlavorText.Text1: You won Set 9! Yes, one copy of each!
FlavorText.Text2: Congratulations!  The ultimate rare prize card of the Super Rarity Lotto is yours!  After the event is over, this card will be exchanged for 1 copy of every card in Set 9!

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: When this unit uses Attack, do [damage: 50%AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

IczerAttack.Name: Iczer Attack
IczerAttack.Comment: [クローズ]の敵軍ユニットから1体選び[消滅]させる。

Soul.Name: Sun King's Double
Soul.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the MAX HP of target disengaged enemy unit. Change battletime to morning.

Skill0.Name: Progura Sheathed
Skill0.Comment: When this unit uses an Attack, do [damage: 50%AT] to a random enemy unit in range. When this unit uses Iczer Attack, send a random Closed enemy unit to the Cemetery.

Skill1.Name: Order to Mobilize
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AGI 3 or higher] All friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] units of AGI 2 or lower are disengaged.

Skill2.Name: Progura's True Form
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV2 or higher] Subtract [# cards in Rival's Cemetery X5] from the HP of one enemy unit. Return a card from your Cemetery to the File. You get Lawtia-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Well, my little brother's quite the handful.  ...The Solar Kingdom forces are to march on the Gondfore mountain range, the Envoy of Chaos' castle.'
FlavorText.Text2: Alphonce is Verlaat's older brother and a man known as the Solar Eclipse. He returns in disguise to take Verlaat's place after receiving a message from Safiria. Alphonce immediately takes command of the offensive against the Envoy of Chaos' castle. However, what is his real objective?

Soul.Name: Justice Delivered
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Refess LV 5 or higher] Set one enemy unit to MAX HP=0.

Skill0.Name: Teamwork Formation
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+10, except this unit. If it is a [subtype: warrior], this unit is focused until the end of this turn.

Skill1.Name: True Secret of Justice
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/focused] Do damage [number of friendly units X15] to two random enemy units in range.

Skill2.Name: Flashy Escape
Skill2.Comment: This unit is healed 10 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You can call me Justice. But there's no reason for you to remember it. My name might as well be unknown.'
FlavorText.Text2: A masked swordswoman who goes by the name 'Justice'. She wanders the Solar Kingdom at night, wielding her swords against gangs of criminals. She darts away before those she saves can thank her, so nobody knows her identity. Rumor has it she knows a lot about the Shrine Knights and the Church of the True God, so maybe she's somehow involved with them...

Soul.Name: Reborn in Light
Soul.Comment: Two units get MAX HP=25, HP=25, DF=20, AT=10, and AGI=2.

Skill0.Name: Rain of Light
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+1.

Skill1.Name: Blasting Sunbeam
Skill1.Comment: One friendly unit of LV4 or higher gets AT+20 for this turn and is healed 10 HP, except this unit. Then, do [damage: AT] to a random enemy column in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ladies. These are our first marching orders in some time. Let us put fire in our hearts as we now depart.'
FlavorText.Text2: The leader of the 5th unit of Folrart's Shrine Knights. As the youngest of the current Shrine leaders, the others treat her like a little sister. However, her personality is not so cute, and she's obsessed with combat. Her preferred weapon is a strangely large magic lance. Her subordinates are just like her, so people call the 5th a 'bunch of crazies'.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack, do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit in range. If the unit hit is [subtype: Undead] subtract AT X2 from its MAX HP.

Soul.Name: Punishment of God's Messenger
Soul.Comment: One friendly unit is fully healed. Do [damage: amount healed X2] to one random enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Blessed Sword
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack, do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit in range. If the unit hit is [subtype: Undead] subtract AT X2 from its MAX HP.

Skill1.Name: True God Doctrine
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV 2 or higher] Do [damage: AT+20] to a random unit within range. This unit is healed HP = to the damage the enemy takes.

Skill2.Name: Shield of Divine Spirit
Skill2.Comment: One enemy unit gets AT-10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Our decree comes from God!  We'll purge every last one of you unclean devils and send you to Hades!'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight commander of the True God Church. A zealous adherent, he always bases his actions on its doctrine. He wears an asymmetrical suit of armor, resists attacks with a shield on his right arm, and destroys enemies with a sword in his left hand, just as the True God is said to have done. With True God rituals he heals as he fights, making him seem invincible.

Skill0.Name: Inspiration
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+3. Rival Iczer gets SP+1. You get one less SP at the beginning of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What does a warrior need to survive? Courage to stand against the enemy, and a moment of insight.'
FlavorText.Text2: Sometimes, a quick idea occurs to soldiers when they're faced with crisis on the battlefield.  Excellent ability is important for survival, but so is a flexible mind.

Soul.Name: Opal Radiance
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Return the oldest card in your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: White Glow
Skill0.Comment: One friendly [subtype: Carbuncle] is healed 30 HP.

Skill1.Name: Opal Dazzle
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/HP 20 or lower] You get SP+0->1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You don't often see this carbuncle. That's because just when you think you've spotted one, it's already gone.'
FlavorText.Text2: A gem beast with a white stone in its brow. Its stone is a size smaller than that of the diamond carbuncle, and its body is smaller as well. They live in packs, in forests uninhabited by humans. When attacked by an enemy, they emit a dazzling light from the stone in their brow, and run away at full speed.

Soul.Name: Squad Leader
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Return the newest card in your Cemetery to your Card File if it's a Refess card.

Skill0.Name: Hilt Punch
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Folrart Swordsmen, prepare to engage the enemy!'
FlavorText.Text2: A squad leader within the Folrart Swordsmen. She relies on her dance-like irregular movements to get in range of an enemy, and slays them with a single stroke of the giant scimitar she wields. If they get to close, she can knock them back with a double-fisted hilt punch.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Light and Fire
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Refess LV3 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Increase your Gowen level by 2.

Skill0.Name: Team Training
Skill0.Comment: The [subtype: Martial Artist] units on the left and right of this unit get MAX HP+10.

Skill1.Name: Expert Palm Strike
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 20 directly from the MAX HP of a random enemy unit in range. And then, do [damage: AT] to that unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You stand in my way at your own peril!'
FlavorText.Text2: A martial artist who underwent especially rigorous training, even by the Church of the True God's standards. His body, disciplined to its limit, exhibits its power in the midst of adversity. Also, it's said that the energy of his body is so well trained, he can use it to execute powerful chi strikes.

Soul.Name: Lost in the Sun
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+5 and DF+5. You get SP+1. Change battletime to morning.

Skill0.Name: Monster Calvary
Skill0.Comment: The [subtype: Monster] unit directly in front of this unit gets AT X2 for this turn. And then, this unit gets AT+15 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Sun Crop
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 10 directly from the HP of the Refess [subtype: Monster] directly in front of this unit. Then, give it AGI+1 and do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill2.Name: Flying Attack
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Our enemy is the Forces of Chaos. Charge!'
FlavorText.Text2: Griffins are known for their ferocity, but if tamed at an early age, they take on an obedient personality. The Solar Kingdom has been training griffins to serve as mounts for knights in the coming great war.

Soul.Name: Solar Magicians
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Refess LV3 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Increase your Falkow level by 2.

Skill0.Name: Trap Intruders
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets RNG-1. Engage one random disengaged enemy unit for every point of RNG this unit has. Engage this unit.

Skill1.Name: Shattered Statue
Skill1.Comment: Send this unit to the Cemetery. You get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Magic users set up all manner of traps to protect their dwellings from intruders. This Beast Statue is one of the most dangerous of them.'
FlavorText.Text2: A grotesque stone statue with a magic trap set in it. Its eyes shine ominously when it detects an intruder, and being struck by the emitted beams results in paralysis.

Soul.Name: Battlefield Advantage
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Refess LV3 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Increase your Lawtia level by 2.

Skill0.Name: Siege Machine
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot use Attack or Rest.

Skill1.Name: Operator Required
Skill1.Comment: Engage one friendly disengaged [subtype: Solar Kingdom] unit.

Skill2.Name: Smashing Ram
Skill2.Comment: Subtract 20 from the HP of target enemy column in range. Do [damage: their LV X10] to all hit units of LV4 or higher.

Skill3.Name: Down for Repairs
Skill3.Comment: This unit is healed 50% MAX HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This is the start of our general offensive! Send forth the battering ram!'
FlavorText.Text2: Various weapons have been developed by the Solar Kingdom for the coming great war. The battering ram is one of them, and it's said to be very successful at penetrating enemy strongholds.

Skill0.Name: Meeting of Kings
Skill0.Comment: Send two random [subtype: Royalty] cards of level 3 or lower from your Cemetery to your File.

Skill1.Name: The Kings' Compromise
Skill1.Comment: You get SP=[4 + current SP] at the beginning of next turn instead of the usual 2 SP. You get SP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'As soon as he recognized him to be the King of Mankind himself, the king of the dead, Zugateroza, knelt on the spot.'
FlavorText.Text2: Verlaat, his memory still missing, goes with Duchy of Crest forces to the land of the undead and meets with Zugateroza, king of the dead. When Zugateroza sees Verlaat, he kneels out of respect. He then says 'I've been waiting for you, King of Mankind.'

Soul.Name: Knight of Chaos
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia 4 or higher] Send one random enemy unit to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Piece of the Abyss
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be affected, targeted, or randomly chosen by Soul Skills.

Skill1.Name: Ultimate Light of Hell
Skill1.Comment: A friendly unit gets HP=0, except this unit. Do [damage: that unit's LV X20] to one enemy unit. Then, this unit gets AGI+1 for this turn and you get 0 SP beginning of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Final Descent
Skill2.Comment: Send one friendly Closed unit to the Cemetery. And then, you get SP+[2 + that unit's level].

FlavorText.Text1: 'For mere humans, you make this a good time.  But don't underestimate the powers of the Triad of Chaos...  I will get serious!'
FlavorText.Text2: The unveiled true nature of Zalzagul, Hellspawn of the Triad of Chaos. He appears before the Solar Kingdom army led by the Pretender to the Sun and reveals his true form while doing battle with Zagar and Ernst. The gold armor he wears brushes aside most physical and magical attacks.

Soul.Name: Path of Red and White
Soul.Comment: Send all Closed units of level 3 or lower directly to the cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Caring System
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Magic Doll] units get LV+2, MAX HP+10 and are healed 10 HP.

Skill1.Name: Red Lily Whip
Skill1.Comment: Set one friendly [subtype: Magic Doll] unit to HP=0. And then, subtract LV X10 from the HP of two random enemy units.

Skill2.Name: Bloody Flower
Skill2.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Magic Doll] units get AT+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ahh, finally. Here comes someone who looks like fun. Please, come play rough with me...until I'm laying in pieces on the ground!'
FlavorText.Text2: Both the command unit magic dolls White Lily and Scarlet Rose were heavily damaged in the previous war. This doll is Lily revived in Rose's body. As this process was forced, her thought patterns are unstable and her personality has become severely masochistic.

Soul.Name: My Own Will
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: number of cards in your Cemetery X 5] to two random disengaged enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Farewell, Beloved
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/AGI6 or higher] Do [damage: this unit's HP] to all enemy units in range. This unit gets HP=0.

Skill1.Name: You Don't Get to Die
Skill1.Comment: Revive one friendly [subtype: Magic Doll] unit. That unit gets HP=10, LV+2, and is engaged.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's because my 'will' was in accordance with your goal.'
FlavorText.Text2: She was a magic doll who bravely saved Eskatia when the Augments fiercely attacked her. She fights according what she calls her own 'will', but what's etched onto her shoulder is beyond a doubt the serial number of Belfyna's doll army...

Soul.Name: Words too Late
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one random enemy unit. Rival Iczer gets SP-1.

Skill0.Name: Whisper of a Boy's Soul
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime noon] Set battletime to night.

Skill1.Name: Demon of Disease
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the HP of one unit with AT 0 and give it AT+30.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That does it for the land of the undead. Come, Dear, let's make our way to the next place.'
FlavorText.Text2: A lich queen known as the 'False Mother' in the land of the undead, where the dead are said to walk. Rasthiria carries the spirit of a boy with her wherever she goes, and he whispers into her ear before she speaks. Her forte is sorcery, and it's said it always becomes night wherever she appears.

Skill0.Name: Metis' Plan
Skill0.Comment: Target enemy unit of AGI4 or higher gets HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Yug's Plan
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Metis' Plan failed] All friendly units capable of Focus get AT+10, AGI+2, DF+5 and are Focused for this turn. And then, you get SP+1.

Skill2.Name: Igina's Plan
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Metis and Yug's Plans failed] Send 5 random cards from Rival Iczer's Cemetery out of game. You get LP-1.

FlavorText.Text1:
-'The general's summoned us! You two can't bicker forever.'
-'I know, but I don't like this guy!'
-'Nor I you, you little shrew.'
FlavorText.Text2: The Duchy of Crest's three top commanders are summoned by Dical when Eskatia goes marching forth. They each follow their own strategies, but when war comes they prove that they can work together well.

Soul.Name: Lycanthropy / Janus
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] One random enemy unit gets HP=0.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Strangling Death
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Do [damage: AT-10] to one random enemy unit in range]. This unit is fully healed.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Burning Mind
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit gets AT+40 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: 3rd Stage: Twisted Arms
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If you get to pass the time with a peerless beauty, maybe it's not so bad after all?'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world. With this strain, a woman's body grows out of the infected's shoulder and indiscriminately lashes out at anyone who approaches. No matter how much you attack the host, it will continue to function unless you also destroy the parasite.

Soul.Name: Fight Under the Moon
Soul.Comment: Remove all cards in your Cemetery from the game. Friendly level 3 units get AT +[number of cards removed X5] and AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Claw Charge
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT X2] to one random enemy unit in range. This unit gets HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Night System
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit is fully healed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Three targets acquired, switching to combat mode.  ...Master, please leave this to me.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer. She's a specialized combat type like -Fencer- and -Grappler-, and at night a special enhancement System activates. This makes her very popular as a nighttime VIP bodyguard.

Skill0.Name: Order to Sortie
Skill0.Comment: Engage one friendly unit of level 3 or lower. And then, engage one random enemy unit. Do [damage: AT of other unit] to each unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Make for the land of the undead! And take care, men, for the fate of the world depends on your efforts!'
FlavorText.Text2: In response to the King of Mankind Verlaat's memory loss, the Duchy of Crest began preparing to dispatch a large army to the land of the undead. Taking command of the force is Eskatia, the ruler of Crest, herself.

Soul.Name: Wall of Bones
Soul.Comment: Target friendly unit gets RNG=0.

Skill0.Name: Pinpoint
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

Skill1.Name: Refresh
Skill1.Comment: Send [card: Skeleton Archer] from your Card File to the Cemetery. And then, this unit fully recovers its HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A soldier you can replace as many times as you like is a handy thing.'
FlavorText.Text2: A skeleton warrior animated by magic. These are more sluggish than regular skeleton warriors, but they'll regenerate over and over until reduced to little pieces, so evil mages commonly use them as guards.

Soul.Name: Burning Augment
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV3 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Increase your Gowen level by 2.

Skill0.Name: Cursed Ignition
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly [subtype: Crest] unit gets AT+30 and HP=10.

Skill1.Name: Combustion Failsafe
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to two random units, except this unit. This unit gets HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Can you believe I can make someone catch on fire  just by pointing at them? Watch, I'll prove it!'
FlavorText.Text2: A Crest soldier upon whom Annarose performed augmentation surgery. He was brought under a mind-control spell at the same time, and now he obeys her will. These soldiers have had their brain waves enhanced, and have the ability to make a target ignite by focusing on it.

Soul.Name: Dark of the Soul
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV3 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Increase your Refess level by 2.

Skill0.Name: Burst from the Mountains
Skill0.Comment: Engage one random enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Digest Slowly
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one random enemy unit in range. If that unit is HP0 or below, send it to the Cemetery.

Skill2.Name: Thrashing Death
Skill2.Comment: Engage all disengaged enemy units except one.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It comes out of nowhere, and crushes its poor surprised prey before it has a chance to react. Then it takes its time sucking the soul out of the remains.'
FlavorText.Text2: An unidentified monster lurking in the depths of the mountains. It usually does its lurking underground, but it reacts to the sound of footsteps of creatures walking overhead, suddenly lashing out at them.

Skill0.Name: Song of the Night Singer
Skill0.Comment: All units get AT+20 and AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Song in a Lonely Night
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Send a random card from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The song resounded clearly on a moonlit night.'
FlavorText.Text2: A magic song sung by the Night Singer, Miandela. Despite it's sad, soulful sound, it is said to give send those in the midst of battle into a frenzy.

Soul.Name: Survivors Strike Back
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to two target units.  Fully heal two target units.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 1 or higher, this unit gets AGI +3.

Skill0.Name: Flash Paladin Gauntlets
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow LV 2 or higher/this unit has HP 10 or lower] This unit is fully healed. All friendly [subtype: wizard kingdom] units get AT+10.

Skill1.Name: Red Death Slash
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Rival Iczer has more units on the field] Do [damage: AT X2] to one enemy row in range. Decrease your Falkow LV by 1.

Skill2.Name: Heroes Don't Give Up
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] This unit gets HP=10 and Ranks Down.

FlavorText.Text1: 'She's still alive...  I swear I'll rescue her!  And, Esria... watch over me.'
FlavorText.Text2: Despite a terrible cost, Dilate defeated Galdirea of the Triad of Chaos. Esria lost her life in the battle, but Dilate learned from her that the girl he failed to protect when he was a boy is still alive. To fulfill his childhood promise, he sets out for the stronghold of the Envoy of Chaos to save her. He now has gauntlets and a cloak from the Wizard Kingdom that protect him.

Soul.Name: Burning Fangs
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all enemy units. All units hit begin Burning.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +10.

Skill0.Name: Chain of the Soul
Skill0.Comment: Both Iczers get SP+current SP at the beginning of next turn. Both Iczers get SP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'As beasts and soldiers, it's our duty to answer the call of the beast king. Don't think that any mere human can beat me!'
FlavorText.Text2: A boy with brown skin and wild golden hair. In truth he's the reincarnation of Scarrion. The birthmark on his forehead in the shape of Scarrion's scar is proof. He was travelling around as a mercenary, but the call of Beast King Rivera awakens him as a beast soldier. He specializes in moving around like a wild animal, causing confusion for his opponent.

Soul.Name: Red Dragon's Plan
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get LV+2, AT+20, Rankup and also AGI+1 for this turn.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 7 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Strategic Maneuver
Skill0.Comment: One friendly [subtype: beltorat kingdom] unit gets Lv+1 and also AT+10, AGI+1 and RNG+1 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Precognitive Strike
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT + number of friendly [subtype: beltorat kingdom] units on the field X10] to one random enemy unit of RNG2 or higher.

FlavorText.Text1: 'There's no room for failure in strategy! Only the unseeing eye can see the truth of our victory!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of Beltorat's generals, also known as the 'God of War'. He lost an eye in an accident, but ever since he's been able to predict the future, and he wins every battle in which he participates. A magic gauntlet allows him to control a ferocious earth dragon, galloping around wherever he wishes on the battlefield.

Soul.Name: Raging Carpet of Flame
Soul.Comment: [conditional use Gowen LV 5 or higher] Do [damage: 40] to one random enemy unit. This skill is repeated 4 times.

Skill0.Name: Time for the Big One
Skill0.Comment: All enemy units begin Burning.

Skill1.Name: Uncontrolled Magic Blast
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: Gowen LV X5] to one random enemy unit. Repeat this for every friendly [subtype: Mercenary Nation] unit on the field, max of 4.

Skill2.Name: Wild Exploding Blast
Skill2.Comment: Do damage 0->100 to one random enemy unit who is Burning. This skill is repeated a total of 4 times.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Even if I can't use clever spells... I'll make up for it with unadulterated power!'
FlavorText.Text2: An apprentice of the magician Primrose. He joins the Mercenary Nation and fights against the Abyssal Forces. Mesrag uses incredibly destructive explosion magic, but its might changes depending on his mood, so Primrose has scorned him for being a 'washout'.

Skill0.Name: Controlling Dortnail
Skill0.Comment: All Burning units get HP-20. And then, Rival Iczer gets LP-1.

Skill1.Name: Inferno of Anger
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Controlling Dortnail failed] Do [damage: Gowen level X10] to target enemy unit. All enemy units start Burning.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The flames of Nullifier Vol Agni's anger literally 'burned everything to cinders'.  --Everyone the flames touched was burned black and blown away.'
FlavorText.Text2: This is Vol Agni, a former Crest officer remodeled by Annarose, once he can no longer fully control the powers of Flame Demon Dortnail, with whom he was fused. It's said that those touched by the flames that shoot out of him are instantly burnt to a crisp and blown away.

Soul.Name: Dragon Rush
Soul.Comment: All friendly units level 2 and below get LV+1, AT+10, AGI+1, and fully recover HP.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 7 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, AGI +1, RNG +1.

Skill0.Name: In Beltorat's Name
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/a friendly [subtype: Beltorat Kingdom] unit is on the field] Increase your Gowen level by 1.

Skill1.Name: Mounted Knight
Skill1.Comment: The [subtype: Dragon Kin] unit directly in front of this unit gets AGI+2 and DF+10 for this turn. And then, this unit gets AT+20 and RNG+1 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Double Attack
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT 50%] to 2 random enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The Forces of Chaos won't get away with their schemes so long as we're here!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of Beltorat's dragonrider corp. They ride flying dragons and attack from the sky. It's only a select elite, even for Beltorat, who receive this special training. The combined attack of lance and dragon flame is astounding.

Rest.Name: Rest
Rest.Comment: When this unit uses Rest, it heals 25% MAX HP and is engaged until the end of next turn.

Soul.Name: Territoriality
Soul.Comment: Set one friendly unit to HP=10.

Skill0.Name: The First Giant
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 99 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Deep Sleeper
Skill1.Comment: When this unit uses Rest, it heals 25% MAX HP and is engaged until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I guess you don't need to think, when you're that big.'
FlavorText.Text2: A brutal one-eyed giant, it lives in wild forests and hill country. It has a strong sense of territory, and will mercilessly attack those who come near. It's not very intelligent, but its superhuman strength is astounding.

Skill0.Name: The Fate of Esria
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+1. One friendly unit gets LV+2 and also AT+ [the AT of target friendly Closed LV3 or lower unit] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Dilate's party won its bitter fight against the Triad of Chaos member, but the price they paid was so high.'
FlavorText.Text2: This is the fate of the Lost Magic Doll Esria, who bodily shielded Dilate and the others from an attack by Noze, after Noze had become a member of the Triad of Chaos. Her hopes and dreams, however, were inherited by Astaforse.

Soul.Name: Assault Formation
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen level X5] to target enemy row. One friendly unit gets AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Soul of the Red Dragon
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/6 or more [subtype: dragon kin] cards are in your Card File] This unit gets AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Mounted Soldier
Skill1.Comment: The [subtype: Dragon Kin] unit directly in front of this unit gets AT+20 and AGI+1 for this turn. And then, this unit gets AT+20 and AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Flanking Ambush
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: number of friendly units on the field X 15] to one random engaged enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Our enemy is the Forces of Chaos.  They'll make for worthy opponents!'
FlavorText.Text2: A proud member of Beltorat's dragonrider corp.  The corp is split into two groups, the airborne riders and the surface combat light cavalry. The light cavalry learns to ride land-based dragons and raptors, overwhelming enemies by attacking in waves.

Soul.Name: Dragon Maiden
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen LV3 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Increase your Lawtia level by 2.

Skill0.Name: Blessing of the Dragons
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get AT+10 for this turn. All friendly [subtype: Dragon Kin] units of level 7 or lower are healed 20 HP.

Skill1.Name: Dragon's Heart
Skill1.Comment: One unit is healed HP+ [25% that unit's AT].

Skill2.Name: Dragon Summon
Skill2.Comment: Return an Open or Closed [subtype: Beltorat Kingdom] unit to the File. You get SP +[unit's base level]+2. You cannot Set units except [subtype: Dragon Kin] of LV 7 or lower until end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Beltorat shamans believe in dragon gods. They're excellent priestesses, and at the same time excellent dragon handlers.'
FlavorText.Text2: Shamans who serve the gods of Beltorat. In Beltorat they believe in dragon gods, and in these shamans dwells the power to tame dragons. It's said their very presence improves the activity of the dragon mounts Beltorat utilizes.

Soul.Name: Long-range Shooter
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen LV3 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Increase your Falkow level by 2.

Skill0.Name: Attach Scope
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is in Area[7-8-9]. This unit gets RNG+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Retreating Attack
Skill1.Comment: This unit switches places with the unit directly behind it. And then, this unit gets AT+30 and AGI+1.

Skill2.Name: Charge
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT x 2] to a random enemy unit within range. Do [damage: 50% of MAX HP] to this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Don't move.  You know what'll happen if you do...right?'
FlavorText.Text2: Musketeers affiliated with the Mercenary Nation. They never miss their intended target, even when shooting from horseback. They also undergo systematic training, and can attack while falling back to the rear when danger threatens.

Skill0.Name: Bonds of Friendship
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+10 for this turn. If that unit has HP below its MAX HP, give it DF+10/AGI+1 for this turn. Increase Gowen and Falkow levels by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'When Ibert was knocked off the cliff and Dilate's hand immediately shot out, it was truly by a hair's breadth that he caught him.'
FlavorText.Text2: Noze's attack didn't just destroy Esria, it also put Dilate and the others in danger. The surprise attack nearly knocked Flash Paladin Ibert off a cliff. But it was the hand of Dilate, who Ibert disliked, that saved him from falling.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Tragedy of the Princess
Soul.Comment: Engage one enemy unit until the end of next turn. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Mermaid Water Enchantment
Skill0.Comment: Target unit of AGI2 or higher gets AGI-5 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Mage Jewel Aurora Orb
Skill1.Comment: Revive all Closed friendly units of LV3 or lower and give them MAX HP+10. If they are not [subtype: Mermaid], engage them. This unit gets HP=0.

Skill2.Name: Fey Blade Meliae
Skill2.Comment: Heal all friendly [subtype: Mermaids] HP+10 except this unit. And then, do [damage: that unit's AT] to a random enemy unit in range of AGI 0 or lower.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now let us stand against the fiend who means to plunge the world into chaos! We must put aside our differences and stand united!'
FlavorText.Text2: This is Mermaid Princess Emana, armed for battle. She set out on a journey to hold an audience with the Solar King concerning the struggle with the Envoy of Chaos, but she met many people along the way and learned just how close to peril the world actually is. She stands up now to fight, with magic armor made for her ease of movement.

Soul.Name: Slave to Noze
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random engaged enemy units. One friendly unit is fully healed.

Skill0.Name: Corruption Arrow
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/2 or more units in your cemetery] One unit gets MAX HP=30, HP=30, AT=30, DF=0, AGI=2 and RNG=2. Then, remove 2 units in the Cemetery from game.

Skill1.Name: Paralysis Arrow
Skill1.Comment: Remove one [subtype: Mermaid] card in your cemetery from the game. And then, do [damage: AT] to one enemy unit in range and engage it until the end of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Magic Bow Venguss
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/2 or more unit cards in your cemetery] One random engaged enemy unit in range gets HP=0. And then, remove 2 units in the Cemetery from game.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Heroes, Mistress Noze has ordered me to come for your life. I shall now kill every single one of you.'
FlavorText.Text2: A girl who used to be a Wizard Kingdom aristocrat. She once had a kind personality, but the curse of Triad of Chaos Noze reduced her to an evil vanguard soldier who casually toys with the lives of her victims. It's said that those who become targets of her magic bow, Venguss, are guaranteed to lose their lives.

Soul.Name: Dragon Summons Strike
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow LV 4 or higher] Do [damage: 40] to two random disengaged enemy unis. Engage one disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Fire Dragon Summons
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets MAX HP=120, HP=120, AT=60, DF=0, AGI=1, and RNG=3.

Skill1.Name: Ice Dragon Summons
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets MAX HP=80, HP=80, AT=70, DF=0, AGI=3 and RNG=4.

Skill2.Name: Fire Dragon Burning Breath
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Fire Dragon] Do [damage: AT] to all enemy units in range. This unit has all stats returned to base values and is engaged.

Skill3.Name: Ice Dragon Freezing Breath
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/Ice Dragon] Do [HP-30] to all enemy units in range and engage them. This unit has all stats returned to base values and is engaged.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come forth my Summons...repel the enemies who stand before me!'
FlavorText.Text2: A former Wizard Kingdom sorceress who is known for strange dragon summoning magic. She calls them her 'Summons' and they come down from the sky and replace her on the battlefield for a short time. After the Wizard Kingdom fell, she wandered various countries, cleaning out their monsters. Little is known for sure, but her name always comes up in adventure stories.

Soul.Name: Silver Magic
Soul.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit until the end of next turn. This counts as a grimoire activation.

Skill0.Name: Silver Shield Spell
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/4 Grimoire activations or higher] The units on the left and the right get DF+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Return with the Troops
Skill1.Comment: Send a copy of [card: Forbidden Book] removed from game to the File. Then, return a [subtype: wizard kingdom] unit from the Cemetery to the File, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Silver Slash
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/6 or more grimoire activations] Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in range. This unit gets DF=10. Decrease Grimoires used by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Our kingdom is gone, but we aren't dead.  We'll take part in this fight so we can reclaim our native land!'
FlavorText.Text2: A woman who used to be a knight captain in the Wizard Kingdom. She escaped with the strategists to a foreign land, but hearing news of a mermaid princess raising an army leads her back into war. When the magic shield she deploys to protect herself is neutralized, she falls back on the silver sword she wields.

Skill0.Name: Aquamantic Bubbles
Skill0.Comment: Return all Closed friendly units to your Card File. And then, all friendly units cannot be hit by an Attack action this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Anyone those bubbles engulf is floated away to safety.'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic bubbles conjured by a spellcaster. It's used to carry away injured allies, and protect the ones still standing from attacks.

Soul.Name: Below the Thunders
Soul.Comment: Engage one random unit.

Skill0.Name: Release the Kraken
Skill0.Comment: You may not Set a [card: The Kraken] next turn.

Skill1.Name: Tentacles Rise
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/ 6 or more [subtype: Monster] in the Cemetery] Do [damage: 80] to target enemy.

Skill2.Name: Tentacles Fall
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/ 6 or more [subtype: Monster] in the Cemetery] Do [pierce damage: 80] to target enemy.

Skill3.Name: Submerged in the Depths
Skill3.Comment: Return this unit to the Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'All manner of dangers lurk in the night sea. Storms and pirates that fall upon you like a whim, and then there's the kraken.'
FlavorText.Text2: A giant ocean beast that appears by night, rising up from the deepest, darkest depths. It's said its mere arrival causes a storm to start, and it attacks ships laden with treasure. It also possesses an unexpectedly high level of intelligence, and they say it can understand human speech.

Soul.Name: Vengeance of Regus
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV3 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Increase your Falkow level by 2.

Skill0.Name: No Fear
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is in area[1-2-3]] This unit gets AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Revenge Strike
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+20] to one random enemy character in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm not about to die here of all places, you see.'
FlavorText.Text2: A wizard soldier who survived the war-torn death of the Wizard Kingdom. He lost an arm in the great battle, but he continues to train with the sword. He takes part in the war to defeat the Envoy of Chaos in order to avenge himself on the enemy who destroyed his kingdom, targeting those enemies who've made a name for themselves.

Skill0.Name: Gigantic Illusion
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+30, DF+30 and RNG=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'With this spell, even a weak old man can suddenly be a giant. ...But only in terms of appearance.'
FlavorText.Text2: A type of illusion spell. It makes its target momentarily grow to giant size, fooling the enemy. However, it only works for a short time.

Soul.Name: Version Upgrade
Soul.Comment: Target unit gets LV+3. You get LP-1.

Skill0.Name: Research Master
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow LV3 or higher] Send ten random cards from Rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill1.Name: Research Complete
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow LV3 or higher] Return all cards from the Rival Iczer's Cemetery to his Card File.

Skill2.Name: Ancient Repairs
Skill2.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Mech Soldier] units get LV+1, AT+10 for this turn and are healed 20 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I've got to do my best until this war is over!'
FlavorText.Text2: A scholar familiar with ancient weaponry. In Regus, she avidly researched ancient cultures, and gradually discovered techniques for handling ancient weapons. Most research was lost when the kingdom fell, but the scholars tried to use their knowledge in other lands. Her techniques for repairing ancient weapons are better than her skills at using them.

Soul.Name: Wind of Salvation
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow LV3 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Increase your Refess level by 2.

Skill0.Name: Whirlwind Spell
Skill0.Comment: Engage 2 random characters.

Skill1.Name: Storm Magic Strike
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 20 directly from the HP of one random enemy unit in range. This effect repeats twice.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll just go ahead and buy us a bit of time.'
FlavorText.Text2: A magician who was researching wind-control spells in the Wizard Kingdom. After the kingdom fell, a lot of the superb talents who fled were installed in important positions in other lands, and she's one of them. In battle she creates blasts of air among the enemy ranks to keep them from moving.

Soul.Name: Burn it With Fire
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow LV3 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. Increase your Gowen level by 2.

Skill0.Name: Carrier Infection
Skill0.Comment: Send one random [subtype: Mermaid] card from out of game to your Cemetery for every friendly [subtype: Deep One] on the field, max 3.

Skill1.Name: Fate of the Lost
Skill1.Comment: Engage one random disengaged enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I couldn't even tell you where it came from, at this point.'
FlavorText.Text2: A cursed mermaid who turned into a monster. Something is different about this strain of the carrier curse, and she changed entirely, into an ugly form that one might call a lizard person. The curse emanating from her also gradually weakens nearby living creatures, and she might be the key to the research that created the carriers in the first place.

Skill0.Name: Disorientation
Skill0.Comment: All units get RNG=1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This magic just makes you feel dizzy for a second.'
FlavorText.Text2: This spell puts a hex on all nearby, inducing vertigo. It's simple magic, but effective at making it impossible for spellcasters and archers to aim properly.

Soul.Name: This Duel is Over
Soul.Comment: Set a random disengaged enemy unit to HP=0. Rival Iczer cannot Set a character card next turn.

Skill0.Name: Play by my Rules
Skill0.Comment: When this card is in the file, it cannot be Locked by other units' Open Skills.

Skill1.Name: Play by My Rules
Skill1.Comment: Rival may not set any card until the end of next turn, except for 4 random cards.

Skill2.Name: I Hope You Saved
Skill2.Comment: Rival Iczer's File is Unlocked.

Skill3.Name: Dual Wielding Smash
Skill3.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random enemies.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm going to own these guys. Wait, 'own'!? Heh, looks like the admins refuse to write the flavor text in leet.'
FlavorText.Text2: The man behind the Triad of Chaos and the War of the Sun and Moon. His powers are shrouded in mystery, but it's said he's capable of knowing about and influencing every event that happens in the world. He talks as if he's from a place outside Lavato, as he plots to become its absolute ruler.

Soul.Name: God or Devil
Soul.Comment: Decrease all of both Iczer's Sphere levels by 1.

Skill0.Name: Pure Chaos
Skill0.Comment: You get Lawtia LV+1. If your Lawtia LV is 9, set your Lawtia level to 4. And then, remove one random enemy unit of level 3 or lower from the game.

Skill1.Name: Power of Insanity
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV4 or higher] Do [damage: number of your soul cards that have triggered X20] to two enemy units in range. You get Lawtia-2.

Skill2.Name: Absorb Her Father
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/your LP is 3 or higher] Decrease your LP by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I am Noze, the malevolent god born to create the world Father desired. Humans...die as Father did! As my sister did! Ahahahaha!!'
FlavorText.Text2: Noze absorbed Galdirea after he was defeated by Dilate, and attained this new form. She's so evil, she's also known as the Goddess of Darkness. She destroys the awakened Esria, and spreads the curse created by Galdirea and cultivated by her around the world. The effects of her curse can now effect humans, and it begins to distort the world itself.

Soul.Name: Phoenix Arc
Soul.Comment: Revive one closed friendly unit. Return one random card from your Cemetery to your File.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Refess level of 4 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, AT +20.

Skill0.Name: Strict Captain
Skill0.Comment: One friendly [subtype: warrior] except this unit gets AT+10 for this turn, and if it's a Refess unit, AGI+2 for this turn. Then you get SP+2 and this unit is Focused for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Perfect Concentration
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] You get SP-2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Don't stand between me and my work...  One cut from my sword can split even the heavens.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the Solar Kingdom's assistant knight leaders. She was born in the Far East, and in addition to her katana 'Hououmaru', she conceals numerous weapons inside the coat she wears. Her uncooperative personality is part of why, even though she's a leader, she often works alone.

Soul.Name: Two Sisters One Body
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to two random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Divine Soul System
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+ Lawtia X5. This unit heals HP+ Gowen X5.

Skill1.Name: Two Sword Strike
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range. Then, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range of HP 1 or higher.

Skill2.Name: Awakened Buster System
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range. Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit for every friendly, closed  [subtype: Magic Doll] you have.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Sister, you weren't able to accomplish this, but I swear I'll take your hopes and dreams and see them through. Until then, protect me...'
FlavorText.Text2: Astaforse inherited the hopes and dreams of her sister, who was destroyed protecting Dilate from Triad of Chaos Noze's attack. Astaforce then joined Dilate's team. She lost the right half of her body as a result of Noze's attack, but she used the remains of Esria's body to repair herself. Reborn, her goals are to rescue the singer and destroy Noze.

Soul.Name: Trade of Life and Death
Soul.Comment: Remove all cards in your File from the game. If at least 3 cards are removed, return all cards in your Cemetery to the File.

Skill0.Name: Slaying Stab
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets HP=0, except this unit. And then, this unit becomes Focused for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Reviving Stab
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Revive one friendly unit and engage it.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You thought you could see my sword?  That's impossible. I'm the only one in the world who can keep up with its speed.'
FlavorText.Text2: A former captain of the Wizard Kingdom. She led assault troops and fought heroically in the kingdom's battles. Nothing was heard from her immediately after the conflict, but she returned to fight in the war between the Envoy of Chaos and the Solar Kingdom. Her magic sword techniques are unworldly, allowing her to put any target to death...for a short time.

Soul.Name: Magic Blade Storm
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: number of times you've invoked a Grimoire X 5] to two random disengaged enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Remember Your Training
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen LV 3 or higher] This unit gets AT+10 for this turn. Otherwise, this unit gets AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Sokomaru's Spell
Skill1.Comment: Engage one random disengaged enemy unit in range. Do [damage: AT] to one disengaged enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The time's come for me to use my unclean sword again...  Get ready to die, fiends.'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordsman from the Wizard Kingdom. After surviving the conflict there, he hid out in the Mercenary Nation, and began to forget his training as a wizard soldier. But soon, his mercenaries joined the fight against the Envoy of Chaos. He wields the sword, Sokomaru, in one hand, while casting spells with the other for double effectiveness.

Soul.Name: Heat of the Sun
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to one random enemy unit. One friendly unit get DF+10. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Sun and Fire
Skill0.Comment: The first time this skill is activated, increase your Refess and Gowen levels by 1.

Skill1.Name: Flame Strike
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 10 directly from the HP of target unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now you will feel my burning blade of vengeance, servants of evil!'
FlavorText.Text2: After the downfall of the Wizard Kingdom, some refugee magic swordsmen came to Folrart and trained their troops. In battle, these troops use long swords and fire magic to defeat their foes. It's said they fought bravely against the Envoy of Chaos, and made great gains in battle.

Soul.Name: Asylum to the Worthy
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of RNG=0 to the Card File. And then, you get one less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Moon and Sea
Skill0.Comment: The first time this skill is activated, increase your Lawtia and Falkow levels by 1.

Skill1.Name: Sacrifice Tactic
Skill1.Comment: The unit directly in front of this unit gets MAX HP-10, and also AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'With the fall of the Wizard Kingdom, the outstanding wisdom stored there was scattered to the winds.'
FlavorText.Text2: Young refugees from the Wizard Kingdom. Before the kingdom fell, they were aides to the strategists, and afterwards they made use of their knowledge while in other lands in an effort to defeat the enemies who destroyed their homeland.

Soul.Name: Wash Away
Soul.Comment: Return one engaged unit of agility 3 or higher to the Card File.

Skill0.Name: Aquamantic Droplets
Skill0.Comment: One random friendly unit gets AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn. Repeat this skill a total of three times.

Skill1.Name: Water-drop Burst
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT-10] to target enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You shall proceed no further, evil beings.'
FlavorText.Text2: Faeries who live near bodies of water, such as lakes. They have calm personalities and like peace, and usually don't reveal themselves to humans, but they'll fight hard if the wicked seek to harm their way of life. They excel in water-control magic, and utilize various spells in battle.

Soul.Name: Failed Summoning Spell
Soul.Comment: Send one friendly unit directly to the cemetery. And then, do [damage: 80] to one enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Magic Howl
Skill0.Comment: Target enemy unit gets AT-20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Lurk in the Smoke
Skill1.Comment: This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Summoned Ambush
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Do [damage: AGI X10] to one random enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'These dogs are superb. They'll obey any command... except 'sit'.'
FlavorText.Text2: A monster shaped like a dog, summoned from another world via wicked arts. Their bodies are always wrapped in thick smoke, and they zip around with magic swiftness and slash their enemies. While extremely ferocious, they're loyal to the mage who summons them.

Soul.Name: Balance of Darkness
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/your SP=3] You get SP+2. Rival gets SP-1.

Skill0.Name: Sun and Moon
Skill0.Comment: The first time this skill is activated, increase your Refess and Lawtia by 1.

Skill1.Name: Balance of Light
Skill1.Comment: Target friendly  Refess or Lawtia unit that is LV 4 or lower gets [AT+ your Lawtia X5] for this turn and is healed 5HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ye two beings, moon and sun, listen to our call.'
FlavorText.Text2: Priestesses of the Church of the True God who were sent to negotiate with the royalty of Crest. They perform rituals unlike any other True God divine magic with the scales they carry. It's said when they place a weight on the scale and chant an incantation, they can influence anyone's decision.

Soul.Name: Lethal Sabotage
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 60] to a random enemy. If that unit is at HP-20 or below, Rival gets 1 less SP at the start of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Moon and Fire
Skill0.Comment: The first time this skill is activated, increase your Lawtia and Gowen by 1.

Skill1.Name: Nasty Traps
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 1-10] to a random enemy. Repeat this skill a total of 3 times.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This security is really tight...  What in the world do they have hidden here?'
FlavorText.Text2: Specialists of espionage, even compared to other knights of Crest. Within the duchy, they're referred to as 'Shadows'. They're masters of disguise, and their orders include setting deadly traps, the assassination of prominent figures and infiltration of important facilities.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Mermaid Attack to work with Emana

Soul.Name: Eye of the Storm
Soul.Comment: Send one grimoire card from your Card File to the Cemetery. And then, subtract 50 directly from the HP of one enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Fire and Sky
Skill0.Comment: The first time this skill is activated, increase your Gowen and Falkow by 1.

Skill1.Name: Arcane Wind
Skill1.Comment: One random friendly gets AGI+1 for this turn. One friendly [subtype: Mermaid] gets AGI+1 for this turn, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What an ominous wind...  What's about to happen?'
FlavorText.Text2: Mermaids with deep knowledge of nature and weather are referred to as 'observers'. They literally 'observe' the weather, which it's said allows them to predict the near future.

Soul.Name: Battle Melody
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to two random enemies. This counts as a grimoire activation.

Skill0.Name: Sun and Sky
Skill0.Comment: The first time this skill is activated, increase your Refess and Falkow by 1.

Skill1.Name: Song of the Road
Skill1.Comment: One random enemy gets AGI-1 for this turn. If that unit has AGI0 or lower, this unit gets AGI+2 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I wonder if this number of opponents is enough to be a match for me?'
FlavorText.Text2: A bard's official occupation is to walk along the highway, earning money by playing and singing songs. However, some of them are also informants by trade, who pick up information in bars and tell it to people of importance in various lands. While self-taught, some also learn how to sword fight, and their prowess should not be taken lightly.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It is a great mystery why half-snowflakes fall here, but matching them makes for a fun game.'
FlavorText.Text2:
Match snowflakes to win prizes!
1 or more left Snowflakes + 1 or more right Snowlfakes =  one copy of Seasonal Yule Dress Refugee Flying Apprentice
10 or more left Snowflakes + 10 or more right Snowflakes = one copy of Seasonal Yule Dress Black Valkyrie / Igina 
20 or more left Snowflakes + 20 or more right Snowflakes = one copy of Seasonal Yule Dress Unknown Knight / Aano

FlavorText.Text1: 'It seems the residual energy of a powerful teleportation spell is splitting these snowflakes.'
FlavorText.Text2:
Match snowflakes to win prizes!
1 or more left Snowflakes + 1 or more right Snowlfakes =  one copy of Seasonal Yule Dress Refugee Flying Apprentice
10 or more left Snowflakes + 10 or more right Snowflakes = one copy of Seasonal Yule Dress Black Valkyrie / Igina 
20 or more left Snowflakes + 20 or more right Snowflakes = one copy of Seasonal Yule Dress Unknown Knight / Aano

FlavorText.Text1: 'Don't eat that!'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect Snowflakes to earn prizes!
For every 10 Yellow Snowflakes = 1 Point Card,
maximum of 15 Point Cards

FlavorText.Text1: Enjoy a fantastic world of Yuletide night.
FlavorText.Text2: This card will be switched to Yuletide Background avatar.
This card will be switched to Awakened Esria's armor avatar.

Soul.Name: Grand Cross
Soul.Comment: Revive all closed units.

Skill0.Name: Behind the Solar Curtain
Skill0.Comment: Target unit gets AT restored to base value.

Skill1.Name: True Secret of Zero
Skill1.Comment: Remove target enemy unit of AGI 4 or higher from the game. Return this unit to the Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You want me to stop? But we're not standing on ceremony today. Your orders don't mean a thing.'
FlavorText.Text2: The Holy Valkyrie White Seasonal festival is held every year at Yule, and Aano impulsively decided to participate. To get the Eye of Karite pendant awarded to the 'Valkyrie', she pleases the crowd with her white armor and ribbon whip. Then, a band of thieves after the Eye of Karite bursts into the hall! They don't stand a chance, as Aano's whip rounds them up.

Soul.Name: Mass Decapitation
Soul.Comment: Subtract 50 directly from the HP of three random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Maiden of Battle
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT=[AT-DF]x3 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Scythes: Fear and Despair
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AT 150 or higher] Subtract AT directly from the HP of two random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You savages will pay for walking all over my resolve!'
FlavorText.Text2: Metis suggested that Igina take part in the Holy Valkyrie White Seasonal festival. However, no one told her she'd have to perform, and she's vehemently opposed to it! But she's told that refusing would besmirch her sovereign's honor, so she agrees. Just as she's about to begin, thieves burst into the hall! Angry, Igina teaches them a lesson! She is the perfect Valkyrie.

Soul.Name: Lost Promises
Soul.Comment: You get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: We'll Meet Again Someday
Skill0.Comment: Return this unit to the File. This skill counts as two Grimoire activations.

Skill1.Name: Distraction Magic
Skill1.Comment: Increase your Falkow level by 1. Set your Refess, Lawtia and Gowen levels to 0->1. This skill counts as a Grimoire Activation.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I-I can do it too, when the time comes!  I mean...I have to do it!'
FlavorText.Text2: The Holy Valkyrie White Seasonal winter festival was held outside the Wizard Kingdom shortly after the capital fell, to give people hope. Guards came to protect the refugees attending. One of them is a panicky apprentice, clad in white for the festival. But when local thieves attack some children, she casts a spell to save them. She comes through when it counts.

Soul.Name: Tears of the Blade
Soul.Comment: One random enemy unit gets RNG-1. This skill is repeated a total of twice.

Skill0.Name: Enchanted Blade Spell
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV 1 or higher] This unit gets AT+20 for this turn and is focused for the rest of this turn. Decrease Lawtia level by 1.

Skill1.Name: Silencing Stab
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit in range. If that unit is engaged, Rival Iczer cannot Set a LV3 card next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: '...We want you.  As a sacrifice to our god.'
FlavorText.Text2: Melodia was a mermaid from the deep ocean. She once laid waste to the sea as an ocean-floor assassin, but she became overconfident. This angered the sea god Vonderam, who cursed her with a form that could never again return to the ocean floor. Now she works as Vonderam's underling so he'll one day remove the curse.

Soul.Name: Do it my Way
Soul.Comment: One friendly unit gets MAX HP+30 and HP+30. Select an enemy unit. Do [damage: chosen unit's level X 10] to that unit.

Skill0.Name: Kick 'em Into Gear
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: acolyte] units get AT+10 and AGI+2 for this turn. All friendly [subtype: priest] units get DF+5 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Weapon Breaker
Skill1.Comment: Set a random enemy unit within range to DF=0, do [damage: AT] to that unit and give it AT=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Have you been good, my children!?  Gah hah hah!'
FlavorText.Text2: Bopors is leader of the cleric soldiers that fight with the Solar Kingdom's Royal Knights, and is known for being a self-taught ruffian of a holy man. During Yule he wears the Duke of Yule hat and give out presents for his two beloved children. His son's dream is to become an tough acolyte like his dad, and his daughter's dream is to marry someone stronger than her dad.

Soul.Name: The Skull and Crossbones
Soul.Comment: Increase your Falkow level by 2. Increase your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Just Here for the Booty
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Rival has 2 or more SP] Do [damage: AT+ 0->30] to one enemy unit in range. If unit is at HP0 or lower, Rival gets SP-1 and you get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Have yourselves a merry time today, me hearties!'
FlavorText.Text2: Pirates are always doing illegal things, but many of them are kind-hearted enough to get along well with peaceful townspeople. This young leader of her band of scurvy dogs doesn't trouble those who live in peace. She only goes after miscreants and other pirates. During Yule, she brings her pirate band ashore to spend an enjoyable night partying.

FlavorText.Text1: Turn any Card you already have into 3 copies!
FlavorText.Text2:
Congrats! Send a REQUEST email to support_alteil@gamepotusa.com 
with your Iczer name and the full name of the 3-star card you want to turn into 3 copies by Jan 15th!  *please note that the requested card must be one you already have.

FlavorText.Text1: Turn any Card you already have into 3 copies!
FlavorText.Text2:
Congrats! Send a REQUEST email to support_alteil@gamepotusa.com 
with your Iczer name and the full name of the 4-star card you want to turn into 3 copies by Jan 15th!  *please note that the requested card must be one you already have.

FlavorText.Text1: Turn any Card you already have into 3 copies!
FlavorText.Text2:
Congrats! Send a REQUEST email to support_alteil@gamepotusa.com 
with your Iczer name and the full name of the 5-star card you want to turn into 3 copies by Jan 15th!  *please note that the requested card must be one you already have.

Soul.Name: Wisdom of the Sage
Soul.Comment: Increase your Falkow level by 3.

Skill0.Name: Bookworm
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hoho, you seek something of me?'
FlavorText.Text2: A sage in charge of the study of writings in the Wizard Kingdom libraries.  It's said no document exists that he does not grasp.

Soul.Name: Lava Drop
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 60] to one enemy unit with a RNG of 1 or lower.

Skill0.Name: Heat of the Earth
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/a friendly closed [subtype: monster] unit is on the field] Return a lvl 4 or higher [subtype: monster] from the Cemetery to your File, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Lava Clobber
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT X2] to one random enemy unit in range. This unit is engaged until the end of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Magma Wave
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to 1 random enemy in Area[1-4-7], Area[2-5-8] and Area[3-6-9].

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's a horrible monster that lives on the devil's peak Rayvurn in the Glassjack mountain range.'
FlavorText.Text2: A volcano giant that's been alive since ancient times. Because it's been alive so long, it's on an entirely different level than other giants. The balls of flame it shoots from its hand-like appendages are hot enough to burn its enemies to ashes.

Soul.Name: Pure Truth
Soul.Comment: Target enemy unit of HP 50 or higher gets HP=0.

Skill0.Name: Fierce Howl
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: wild dog] units are Focused until the end of this turn.

Skill1.Name: Fury
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit gets LV=6, MAX HP=70, AT=50, DF=0, AGI=4, and is fully healed.

Skill2.Name: Scar Strike
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/this unit's lvl=6] Subtract AT directly from the HP of one random enemy unit. One random enemy unit of HP 10 or lower gets MAX HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Do my claws hurt? You bet they do. That's the purest form of truth in this world.'
FlavorText.Text2: In Lavato there exist beings disconnected from the limitations of mundane living things. This is one of these so-called Mazoku. He transfers his own scars to nearby humans and animals, for the purpose of leaving evidence of his existence.

Soul.Name: Perfect Awareness
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. Reveal number of Rival Iczer's non-Character units, Characters and Grimoires under Battle Data.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Heierrat Data File
Skill1.Comment: Decrease Rival Iczer's Gowen level by 1. Increase your Gowen level by 1.

Skill2.Name: Regus Data File
Skill2.Comment: Decrease Rival Iczer's Falkow level by 1. Increase your Falkow level by 1.

Skill3.Name: Administrator Privileges
Skill3.Comment: The unit directly in front of this unit gets AT+20 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Eek! Oh, don't go messing that up!'
FlavorText.Text2: 'Sure, you can visit home every now and then', said Annarose as she agreed to let Fran drop by her own house. Clever and sensitive as all those born in the year of the Mouse, she headed home to usher in the new year with style. She'd been gone for so long, however, some adorable roommates had taken up residence in her absence...

Soul.Name: Drive Away the Curse
Soul.Comment: Remove from the game up to 10 cards from rival Iczer’s Cemetery. If 10 cards are sent, increase your Falkow level by 3.

Skill0.Name: Activate the Rune Sword
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia lvl is 1 or higher] This unit gets AT+20 for this turn and AGI+1. Decrease your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill1.Name: Corruption of the Runes
Skill1.Comment: You get Lawtia level=1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You shouldn't play so rough, you know!'
FlavorText.Text2: Some wild boars were running amok in the Solar Kingdom, and they were about to start attacking the citizenry! But just then, a fighter girl knocked one out like it was child's play. She was as fun and generous as one would expect from someone born in the Year of the Boar.

FlavorText.Text1: Piece 1 out of 4 of a love letter to Francis. It is signed ____ Gr_____.
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect fragments of the letter, make full sets to win prizes!
1 Set or more  =  1 copy Last Hunter / Cassandra
5 Sets of Letter or more = 1 copy Black Dragonfly / Francis and Hunter / Rosa.
10 Sets or more = 1 copy Spring Cassandra and 2 copies Rosa.
15 Sets or more = 1 copy Children's Day Cassandra and 2 copies Francis.

FlavorText.Text1: Piece 2 out of 4 of a love letter to Francis. It is signed King _______.
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect fragments of the letter, make full sets to win prizes!
1 Set or more  =  1 copy Last Hunter / Cassandra
5 Sets of Letter or more = 1 copy Black Dragonfly / Francis and Hunter / Rosa.
10 Sets or more = 1 copy Spring Cassandra and 2 copies Rosa.
15 Sets or more = 1 copy Children's Day Cassandra and 2 copies Francis.

FlavorText.Text1: Piece 3 out of 4 of a love letter to Francis. It is signed ____ ____dos.
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect fragments of the letter, make full sets to win prizes!
1 Set or more  =  1 copy Last Hunter / Cassandra
5 Sets of Letter or more = 1 copy Black Dragonfly / Francis and Hunter / Rosa.
10 Sets or more = 1 copy Spring Cassandra and 2 copies Rosa.
15 Sets or more = 1 copy Children's Day Cassandra and 2 copies Francis.

FlavorText.Text1: Piece 4 out of 4 of a love letter to Francis. It is signed ____ __ba___.
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect fragments of the letter, make full sets to win prizes!
1 Set or more  =  1 copy Last Hunter / Cassandra
5 Sets of Letter or more = 1 copy Black Dragonfly / Francis and Hunter / Rosa.
10 Sets or more = 1 copy Spring Cassandra and 2 copies Rosa.
15 Sets or more = 1 copy Children's Day Cassandra and 2 copies Francis.

FlavorText.Text1: The Valentine's Day Collecting Event! There are 4 fragments of a Love Letter and this Chocolate Box to collect.
FlavorText.Text2: Each Chocolate Card will be exchanged for one point card when the Collecting event is over.
This card will be exchanged for Valentine's Magic Doll Avatar after the event is over.
This card will be exchanged for the Adorable Heart Avatar after the event is over.
This card will be exchanged for the Adorable Heart Avatar Pet after the event is over.

Soul.Name: Behind the Scenes
Soul.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the MAX HP of target enemy unit. If unit is at HP 0 or below, Rival gets 1 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Lady of Chaos
Skill0.Comment: This card is treated as [card: Chaoslady / Annarose] in regards to [card: Deadly Scheme] and [card: Triad of Chaos Meets].

Skill1.Name: Game of Pawns
Skill1.Comment: Engage a disengaged friendly unit, except this unit. Engage one random disengaged enemy unit.

Skill2.Name: Endless Conflict
Skill2.Comment: Return 1 Refess card of LV2 or higher from your Cemetery to your File, except this unit. And then, return 1 Lawtia card from your Cemetery to your File, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'All right, milady of Crest. I shall follow your lead, this time.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the Triad of Chaos, manipulating the Duchy of Crest and Solar Kingdom alike to stir up conflict. Her goal is to keep the two sides locked in battle, so neither will notice what is happening behind the scenes. The military attire she wears here was Eskatia's idea, not her own, for when she leads armies on the battlefield.

Soul.Name: False Innocence
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target unit. If unit is at HP 0 or lower and disengaged, return it to the Card File. You get 2 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Lady of Chaos
Skill0.Comment: This card is treated as [card: Chaoslady / Annarose] in regards to [card: Deadly Scheme] and [card: Triad of Chaos Meets].

Skill1.Name: Ultimate Manipulator
Skill1.Comment: Send one random unit from Rival Iczer's File to the Cemetery. Send one random card from your File to the Cemetery.

Skill2.Name: Double Cross
Skill2.Comment: Return the newest card in your Cemetery to your Card File. Return one random card from the enemy Cemetery  to the Card File.

Skill3.Name: Spell Manipulation
Skill3.Comment: Do [damage: target's AGI X10] to a random enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hey there. Wanna play together?'
FlavorText.Text2: One of Envoy of Chaos Elgandi's servants. She loyally follows his commands, transforming Lavato into a world of chaos and destruction by using her powers of manipulation to control the minds of those in power. She has been known to take the form of an innocent young girl to gain the trust of the most jaded.

Soul.Name: Grand Voice
Soul.Comment: All units get DF+10 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Ancient Knight
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/LV 4 or lower] Engage this unit.

Skill1.Name: Grand Armor
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets LV-1, AT+30, DF+5, AGI-1 and is healed 10 HP.

Skill2.Name: Grand Sword
Skill2.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of target enemy unit in range. This unit gets LV+1.

Skill3.Name: Reawakened
Skill3.Comment: This unit gets LV+1 and is disengaged.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm the man-made knight Silverion, who destroys evil and wields righteousness... No, call me Granverion!'
FlavorText.Text2: A man-made knight built in ancient times, who revived when he sensed Galdirea's maliciousness. Galdirea defeated him five years ago, but he somehow survived thanks to Rosa's sacrificial attack. Silverion realized he was weak, and set out on a journey with Francis and Cassandra to obtain true power. Then, he finally acquired the ability to crush evil.

Soul.Name: Fountain Sword Strike
Soul.Comment: Subtract 40 from the MAX HP a random number of enemy units between 1 and 3.

Skill0.Name: True Fountain Sword
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/HP 40 or lower] Do [damage: 20] to one enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Water of Life
Skill1.Comment: Revive target enemy unit. And then, you get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'With this sword I will protect the prince.'
FlavorText.Text2: A young female knight and attendant to the prince of the Solar Kingdom.  She was hand-picked for this honor from the kingdom's elite knights.  Her power was concentrated into an enchanted weapon known as the Fountain Sword.  When fortune turned against the prince she was unable to prevent his fall, so she took her own life.

IczerAttack.Name: Iczer Attack
IczerAttack.Comment: [conditional use/Spy Form] This unit gets LV=1, AT=20 and AGI=2. When this unit executes an Iczer Attack this turn, decrease Rival Iczer's LP by 2.

Soul.Name: Worry and Separation
Soul.Comment: Remove from the game up to 10 cards from rival Iczer's Cemetery. Do [damage: 50] to target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Jealousy and Ecstasy
Skill0.Comment: Choose one enemy unit. If unit is LV 1, 2 or 3 take Battle Form. If unit is LV 4 or higher, take Slayer Form. Otherwise, take Spy Form.

Skill1.Name: Compassion and Empathy
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Battle Form] This unit gets LV=3, AT=40, AGI=3 and RNG=1.

Skill2.Name: Hesitation and Shame
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Slayer Form] Do [damage: AT X2] to one random enemy unit of level 4 or higher in range.

Skill3.Name: Whim and Regret
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/Spy Form] This unit gets LV=1, AT=20 AGI=2 and RNG=1. If this unit executes an Iczer Attack this turn, decrease Rival Iczer's LP by 2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I've killed again today... But every time I see that face, I can't stop feeling this way...  I've got to do something...'
FlavorText.Text2: A humanoid weapon built by Galdirea of the Triad of Chaos. She's the third experimental matrix for the Living God Project. Rivarre I and Rivarre II have already been disposed of. She is also incomplete, but for now he's kept her alive for a certain project. She's on a journey in an attempt to find the woman she sees in her memories.

Soul.Name: Chaos Dragon's Will
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: number of non-character unit cards in your file X 5] to one random enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Gladeel's Edge
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] This unit gets AT + 25%AT.

Skill1.Name: Gladeel's Breath
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT divided by number of enemy units in range] to all enemy units in range. This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Yes, let's go... into the sky you call home, Gladeel.'
FlavorText.Text2: The top pupil of the world's first dragon knight, Wasseir.  Her friend, the black dragon Gladeel, once lived to spread war and conflict across the world and was therefore known as the Chaos Dragon.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. If that unit takes damage, it gets HP=0.

Soul.Name: Obsession in Battle
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. From now on, when any of your units executes an Attack action add +5 damage. This effect is cumulative.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AGI +2.

Skill0.Name: Two Daggers, One Smile
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. If that unit takes damage, it gets HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Re-equip
Skill1.Comment: Restore the AT of one friendly [subtype: Warrior] to base value. This unit gets AT = [that unit's AT].

FlavorText.Text1: 'I found you, Francis! ...Just hang on, Cassandra.  I'm about to rescue you.'
FlavorText.Text2: A survivor of a village of hunters destroyed by Galdirea and Grebados. She admires Rosa, the hunter killed in battle five years ago, and is on a journey to rescue Rosa's little sister Cassandra. However, due to skillfully manipulated information, she thinks Francis is the fiend who destroyed her village.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in one random enemy row in range. for EX Diosaur

Soul.Name: Final Fist
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one random enemy unit.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AGI +1, RNG +1.

Skill0.Name: Flying Tiger Fist
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in one random enemy row in range.

Skill1.Name: Ultimate Training
Skill1.Comment: One non-character [subtype: martial artist] who isn't a Student gets LV=6, MAX HP+40, HP+40, AT=60, AGI=4, RNG=1 and becomes a Student.

Skill2.Name: Student and Teacher Combo
Skill2.Comment: Engage all friendly disengaged Students, and then do [damage: AT] to one random enemy column and enemy row. This skill is repeated a total of twice.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Defending against my fist with armor? You have much to learn of kung fu.'
FlavorText.Text2: He is a legendary martial artist. His fist can punch through a mountainside, but his true value is what he can teach others.

Soul.Name: Stay!
Soul.Comment: Revive one closed friendly unit and give AGI+1 to the unit. And then, engage one enemy unit until the end of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Raise!
Skill0.Comment: Set the HP of three random enemy units in range to 10->40.

Skill1.Name: Fold!
Skill1.Comment: Send the last card (closest to lower right) in your File to the Cemetery if it's a character. Then, return a random unit to its card file and send this unit to the Cemetery.

Skill2.Name: Call!
Skill2.Comment: All units get AT=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh dear, my darling beloved Francis. Are you having a bad day?'
FlavorText.Text2: An simulacrum Galdirea produced to be his messenger. He appears before Felice and feeds her information on Francis, and he reports to Francis about what Galdirea's up to. His behavior is mysterious, and sometimes it seems he's trying to bring harm upon Galdirea.  In reality, he just enjoys the chaos of the world, so maybe he's only along for the ride.

Soul.Name: Lightning Shield Feedback
Soul.Comment: Target unit gets DF+10. Return one disengaged unit with DF 20 or higher to its card file. You get two less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Lightning Skin
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to X random units, except this unit. X is your Falkow level. Decrease your Falkow level by 1.

Skill1.Name: Thunder Stun
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to two random enemy units in range and give them AGI-1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Thunder is the roar of the gods.'
FlavorText.Text2: A great wizardress who could control lightning.  All alone she developed a spell to bend lightning to her will, but the side effects made her unable to pass on this knowledge.

Skill0.Name: Strongest File Ever
Skill0.Comment: You may have up to 30 copies of [card: Sunday Afternoon Bringer] in your File. Except coding that would be hard...
