Skill1.Name: Nerfs are for Losers
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 999] to one enemy unit. Decrease your Gowen level by 2.

Skill2.Name: You'll Win Anyway
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen 5 or higher] Do [damage: AT+ [9 - enemy unit's level] X 10] to target enemy unit in range. If enemy unit's HP is 0 or below, this unit is healed 20 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Am I gonna have to stand up for this?'
FlavorText.Text2: A legendary mercenary, seen loafing around parks all over Lavato. It's rumored when you're the best, you get a little sloppy. You don't bother putting on your armor for every little battle - because seriously, that takes like 40 minutes. Maybe you live off your girlfriend for a few months, whatever. Not that Bringer does that, I'm just making conversation.
This card will be switched to Pink Bunny Body avatar.
This card will be switched to Yellow Bunny Body avatar.
This card will be switched to Purple Bunny Body avatar.
This card will be switched to Blue Bunny Body avatar.
This card will be switched to Evil Bunny Body avatar.
This card will be switched to Egg Hunt Background avatar.
This card will be switched to Evil sky background avatar.

FlavorText.Text1:
Sakura Collectors collecting event.
Start from 9th Monday, go until the 22nd.
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect...15 Sakura Cards: 1 Copy of Spring Seasonal Scarlet Rose
30 Sakura Cards: 1 Copy of Spring Seasonal Shathia (recently buffed!)
20 GOLDEN Sakura Cards:  1 copy of Spring Seasonal Renally
40+ Sakura for every 10 Sakura you collect over the 30 needed, you get 5 POINT CARDS, max of 30 Point cards.

FlavorText.Text1:
Sakura Collectors collecting event.
Start from 9th Monday, go until the 22nd.
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect...15 Sakura Cards: 1 Copy of Spring Seasonal Scarlet Rose
30 Sakura Cards: 1 Copy of Spring Seasonal Shathia (recently buffed!)
20 GOLDEN Sakura Cards:  1 copy of Spring Seasonal Renally
40+ Sakura for every 10 Sakura you collect over the 30 needed, you get 5 POINT CARDS, max of 30 Point cards.

Soul.Name: Blade of Dreams
Soul.Comment: Rival Iczer cannot set a unit card next turn.

Skill0.Name: Magic Sword Juei
Skill0.Comment: All units of HP 30 or lower get RNG-1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: The Other Side
Skill1.Comment: Remove one copy of [card: Phantom Swordsman / Rowan] in your Cemetery from the game. And then, this unit is fully healed.

FlavorText.Text1: '...Laughable. I can shift reality with a swing of my sword. No one can stand against my powers.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of The Four Calamities, the most infamous outlaws in the history of Lavato. He was the greatest swordsman of his day, but he was still tempted to take up the cursed sword Juei. Juei has a uniquely shaped blade, and any who hear the sound of it being swung are bound by illusions. Rowan used this cursed sword to cut through countless soldiers sent to capture him.

Soul.Name: Evernight of Sorrow
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to target enemy unit. Reduce all of Rival Iczer's Sphere levels  by 1.

Skill0.Name: Magic Sword Eiqar
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Refess Lv 2 or higher] One friendly unit gets HP=0, except this unit. And then, one enemy unit gets HP=0. Decrease your Refess LV by 2.

Skill1.Name: Dirge of Sadness
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Send target closed unit directly to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: '...It feels empty. I've conquered the entire world, and now there's nothing left for me to do.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of The Four Calamities, the most infamous outlaws in the history of Lavato. She was a court magician of a powerful kingdom of her day, but a certain incident resulted in her exile, and while wandering the world, she came to possess the cursed sword Eiqar. Eiqar absorbs the ego of those it cuts, and it's said Barbara used it to devastate her home kingdom.

Soul.Name: Sudden Burnout
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to all engaged units. Decrease your LP by 1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Getting Carried Away
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to one random enemy unit. If that unit is at HP=0 or below, do [damage: 20] to one random friendly unit.

Skill1.Name: Magic Sword Modinart
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+10] to one random enemy unit in range. One random enemy unit of HP 40 or higher gets HP-10 and begins Burning.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My wrath is like this sword's flames, it never extinguishes. Now, disgrace yourself by pleading for your life!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of The Four Calamities, the most infamous outlaws in the history of Lavato. Deslasta was their leader, and well known at the time. He had fled from his post as a captain of mage swordsmen when falsely accused of assassinating his king. Questing for vengeance, he found the disastrous cursed sword Modinart. Modinart's flames grow based on the power of the wielder.

Soul.Name: Turn of Misfortune
Soul.Comment: Return one unit of level 2 or below to its Card File.

Skill0.Name: Magic Sword Celfa
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Do [damage: AGI X15] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill1.Name: Punish the Weak
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 10 directly from the HP of target enemy unit in range. Repeat this skill a total of 3 times. This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'More! Let me see more of that agonized look on your face!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of The Four Calamities, the most infamous outlaws in the history of Lavato. A magician of unknown age said to have mastered every known spell during her time. She's the one who created the four cursed swords. Arroi wielded one of the swords herself: Celfa. Celfa can freely change its length and coil about opponents like a living serpent.

Soul.Name: Time of Rebirth
Soul.Comment: Return 5 random non-character LV 3 unit cards from each Iczer's Cemetery to their Card File.

Skill0.Name: Message on the Breeze
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Return five random non-character Refess units of LV 3 or lower from your cemetery to your Card File.

Skill1.Name: Time of Budding
Skill1.Comment: One friendly Refess non-character of LV 3 or lower gets MAX HP+10 and is healed 40 HP. And then, return a card of equal LV to that unit from your cemetery to your file.

Skill2.Name: Warmth of the World
Skill2.Comment: One random enemy unit of LV 4 or higher gets MAX HP=40 and AT=30. If that unit is LV 6 or higher, all friendly units of LV 3 or lower get AT+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm gonna bring so much life to the whole world!'
FlavorText.Text2: A great faerie who announces the arrival of spring to the world. Areas she visits are released from cold, dark winter, and enter spring with its fresh spreading verdure. The particles of light she scatters bring with them vivid spring flowers, and greatly enliven the emotions of those people who bless the arrival of spring.

Soul.Name: Blossoms of a Dark Star
Soul.Comment: Subtract Lawtia X5 directly from the HP of two random enemy units. For every enemy unit of HP0 or lower, send 1 cards from Rival Iczer's File to the cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Petals Scattered at Night
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Rival Iczer gets SP-1.

Skill1.Name: Soulblade: Aoizakura
Skill1.Comment: Subtract AT+10 directly from the HP of two random enemy units. If there is an enemy unit of HP 0 or lower, decrease your LP by 1.

Skill2.Name: Soul of the Cherry Tree
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use / MAX HP=0] This unit gets MAX HP=60 and is fully healed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Have you come to hurt Ippon Zakura, too?  I have bad news for you.'
FlavorText.Text2: The spirit tree, Ippon Zakura, is in the Far East, and a family lives at its base. The strongest of the family is given the magical sword Aoizakura, and the duty of protecting the tree. However, when the mercenary band Masters of Nabari came to pay reverence to the tree, Sakon learned of the world's crisis, and she promised to fight with them in emergencies.

Soul.Name: Return of the King
Soul.Comment: Revive one friendly unit and give it MAX HP+50 and HP+50.

Skill0.Name: Advent of the Sun
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get DF+10 and are engaged. For every engaged friendly unit, engage one random disengaged enemy. Decrease your Refess LV by 2 and set battle time to Morning.

Skill1.Name: Power of Mankind
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] units get AT+10 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Claevolg Awakened
Skill2.Comment: Subtract 20 X number of friendly units from the MAX HP of one random enemy unit in range. All friendly units are healed 10 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now is the time for us to personally bring down the fiend who toys with Lavato!'
FlavorText.Text2: This is Verlaat, awakened as the King of Mankind by his meeting with Zugateroza. His missing memory isn't completely restored, but he's appeared on the battlefield with the Duchy of Crest to fight Elgandi, the enemy of Lavato. With the other rulers he turns the tide against Elgandi, and challenges him to the final battle.

Soul.Name: Light Overload
Soul.Comment: Increase each Iczer's SP by the number of cards in each Iczer's Cemetery. Remove all unit cards in both Iczer's Cemeteries from the game.

Skill1.Name: Light of the Universe
Skill1.Comment: You get SP+1.

Skill2.Name: Moon Child Blessing
Skill2.Comment: All friendly units get AT+10 and are healed 10 HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Annarose has finally revealed her true nature. But... what is this power? Be careful, everyone!'
FlavorText.Text2: Miffyre, who had information pertaining to the Abyssal Forces, participated with Beast King   Rivera in this battle that was to become the final showdown. She unleashes her true power, which even she did not know about, and seeks to find in this battle the meaning of her own destiny.

Soul.Name: Silence of the Flock
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Refess level 2 or higher] Target engaged enemy unit gets MAX HP=0. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Order to Kill
Skill0.Comment: All friendly non-character units of AT 35 or lower and AGI 2 or lower get AT+10 and are healed 20 HP.

Skill1.Name: Sword of Sacrifice
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] units of HP 0 or lower are healed 30HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: '...You know, I'm sick of you and you're in the way. Why don't you just die?'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the Solar Kingdom's Royal Knights. She was originally a knight of the True God Church, but there were 'orders from above' that she join the Royal Knights. Her reticence and blank expression make her seem docile, but her impatient personality has caused many incidents that have resulted in injury. She's apparently receiving orders from Gilensa.

Soul.Name: For the Honor of the Shrine
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Holy Pulse
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 15+ Rival Iczer's Lawtia level X5] to target enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Wide Stance
Skill1.Comment: This unit is Focused until the end of this turn. Disengage this unit.

Skill2.Name: Crushing Swing
Skill2.Comment: This unit can only Attack if Focused. When this unit executes an Attack, do [damage: AT] to an enemy in range. If that unit is engaged, do [damage: 50% AT] to that unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hahh, hahh... Looks like we managed to make it here in time. Ladies, please get to work supporting the others!'
FlavorText.Text2: Leader of the 6th unit of Folrart's Shrine Knights. Her gentle personality contrasts with the idiosyncrasies of the other Shrine leaders, making her the object of their teasing. Her hobbies are eating and studying military strategy. Her plans have saved the army many times. Her nickname is the 'Giant Sun Over Folrart,' but she's sensitive about the word 'giant.'

Soul.Name: Ready to Rumble!
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit. All units get AT, AGI and RNG restored to base values.

Skill0.Name: Battle Cry Formation
Skill0.Comment: Two friendly [subtype: Shrine Knight] units get LV+2 and also AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Holy Charge
Skill1.Comment: Subtract AT + [10 X number of friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] units on the field] from the MAX HP of one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's war, and that means it's our turn! Fifth Shrine Knights, charge!'
FlavorText.Text2: Shrine Knights belonging to the unit led by 5th Shrine Leader Judie. They're made up of the Shrine Knights with the wildest temperaments. They specialize in frontal assault, and try to resolve every situation with brute strength, so they only see action during wartime, but they plainly demonstrate their true worth in this conflict with the Forces of Chaos.

Soul.Name: Shrine Disruption
Soul.Comment: One random disengaged enemy unit gets MAX HP=0.

Skill0.Name: Protection Barrier
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be affected, targeted, or randomly chosen by Grimoires.

Skill1.Name: Healing Formation
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Shrine Knight] units are healed 5 HP.

Skill2.Name: Grimoire Bane
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy in range.  Select a random Grimoire from rival's file and send it to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'We'll set up our magic barrier and heal each of you as soon as we can!'
FlavorText.Text2: The Shrine Knights led by Lumira. Their ranks are more skilled in magic than swordplay. Their primary role is logistical support and healing. Many of them normally work as nuns at their shrine, and rarely see combat, but they also have the courage to sacrifice themselves when war comes.

Skill0.Name: Bond With the Fallen
Skill0.Comment: Revive one friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] unit of level 2 or lower. And then, all friendly units get DF+5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Even if you're struck down, another will inherit your righteous intent.'
FlavorText.Text2: The armies of Folrart made many sacrifices in their conflict with the Envoy of Chaos. It's said its members would clad themselves in equipment of the fallen, as mementos or charms. This custom that spontaneously came about was known in posterity as the 'Bond With the Fallen'.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, if it hits a Character, it does an additional [damage: AT+20] to that Character.

Soul.Name: Reach of the Horn
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. One unit gets RNG=3.

Skill0.Name: Unicorn's Fury
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, if it hits a Character, it does an additional [damage: AT+20] to that Character.

Skill1.Name: Blessing of Protection
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: knight] units get DF+5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Only a pure maiden can handle a unicorn, and her voice can invigorate the weakened.'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight who rides unicorns. A unicorn's wild temperament naturally makes it avoid people, and it only allows women who've undergone sacred rituals to sit upon its back. It's said the holy powers awaken the abilities she has hidden within her.

Soul.Name: Spiked Armor
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one random enemy unit. One unit gets DF+10 and is engaged.

Skill0.Name: Spine Counterattack
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+10. Subtract AT directly from the HP of one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'His good manners are one of his better qualities.'
FlavorText.Text2: The Spined Armadillo is an animal with an unusual name that's sold for a high price amongst Solar Kingdom aristocracy. They were originally wild animals inhabiting the southern jungles. Now they wear collars, imbued with magic power by True God Church priests that make them obey their owners. They're submissive to the owner and her family, but they'll mercilessly attack anyone else.

Soul.Name: Black Radiance
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to one enemy unit. One friendly unit gets AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: The Weak Save the Strong
Skill0.Comment: One friendly [subtype: carbuncle] gets AT+10 and also DF+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Stone of Resurrection
Skill1.Comment: Target friendly [subtype: carbuncle] unit fully recovers its HP or is Revived, except this unit. Send this unit to the cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A war to decide the fate of the world began. The powerless Obsidian Carbuncles simply hid, breathed quietly, and waited for the danger to pass.'
FlavorText.Text2: A gem beast with a black stone in its brow.  They were originally friendly with humans, but thanks to carbuncle persecution in the Solar Kingdom the past few years, they've been driven out of towns, and now live huddled together in forests. There's restorative magic power in their gems, but they don't often use it as it costs their own life in return.

Soul.Name: Chick Foundling
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to 1 + [50% number of Grimoires used] random enemy units and give them DF=0. Set number of Grimoires used to 0.

Skill0.Name: Reborn from Ashes
Skill0.Comment: [Conditional use/level=5 or lower] This unit gets LV=6, MAX HP=90, AT=30, DF=0, RNG=4 and is fully healed.

Skill1.Name: Burning Wings
Skill1.Comment: [Conditional use/level=6 or higher] Do [damage: AT] to all enemies in range. This unit gets LV-1. Do [damage: 10] to all friendly [subtype: monster] units, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This chick, which sells for a high price to aristocrats, is a dream catch for hunters. However, it's hard to bring one back safely.'
FlavorText.Text2: Phoenix chicks. The phoenixes of Lavato evolved from birds, and they build nests high in the mountains. The chicks that hatch are no different from regular birds, but the stories say that, like their parents, they resurrect if they're killed, and they're sold as extremely precious commodities on the urban black market.

Soul.Name: Storm of Chaos
Soul.Comment: Subtract 50 directly from the HP of three random disengaged enemy units. Rival Iczer gets SP+2.

Skill0.Name: True Lady of Chaos
Skill0.Comment: This unit is not treated as a Character.

Skill1.Name: Lady of Chaos
Skill1.Comment: This card is treated as [card: Chaoslady / Annarose] in regards to [card: Deadly Scheme] and [card: Triad of Chaos Meets].

Skill2.Name: Spirit of Division
Skill2.Comment: You get SP+5. All friendly [card: Chaos Form / Annarose] get AT+40, and then engage one unit. You cannot Set a Character for 3 turns.

Skill3.Name: Cycle of Chaos
Skill3.Comment: Return this card to your Card File. Decrease your LP by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Heeheehee! I'm the one you all have to face. From now on, I can't waste any time.'
FlavorText.Text2: The true form of Chaoslady Annarose. Because she herself scornfully calls this form 'the ugliest in the world,' nobody had ever seen it but Elgandi. She'd been working as a manipulator, but her true form is so strong, no ordinary creature can cope with her. She stands on the battlefield as the final member of the Triad, so she can fulfill Elgandi's purpose.

Soul.Name: Perfect Firewall
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit. Neither Iczer can set a card of level 4 or higher next turn or the turn after.

Skill0.Name: Ultimate Last Resort
Skill0.Comment: Send one unit of LV 4 or lower directly to the Cemetery. Set your Lawtia Level to 0. Reduce all of your other spheres by 1.

Skill1.Name: Lady of Gluttony
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV 1 or higher] Set one friendly unit to HP=0, other than this unit.

Skill2.Name: Augment Absorption
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: 10 X number of [subtype: Augmented] units in the Cemetery] to a random enemy in range. If unit is HP 0 or below, Subtract one from rival Iczer's LP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, now, Anna. Don't go leaving me out when you talk about who's the strongest. You made me, and I'll show you who owns that title!'
FlavorText.Text2: The new form of Gaieshart, who was the leader of the Augments. He became jealous of Annarose's creation, Narevez, and used his power to absorb other Augments, thus evolving. Merging with Fran resulted in this new form and release from Annarose's control. He ignores the battle against the Solar Kingdom in order to fight Narevez for the title of the strongest.

Soul.Name: False Words
Soul.Comment: One Poisoned enemy unit gets HP=0. All enemy units are Poisoned until the end of next turn. Poisoned units cannot regain HP by Resting.

Skill0.Name: False Saber
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT [+10 X number of [subtype: Abyssal Forces] units in the Cemetery] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: False Shield
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/5 or more [subtype: Augmeted] units in the Cemetery] This unit is healed 20 HP and gets AT+10. Send one random [Subtype: Augmented] unit from the Cemetery out of game.

Skill2.Name: False Slash
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/5 or less cards in your file] Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy row in range and send a random enemy unit of HP 0 or lower to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Are there any men brave enough to fight The Hero!? Come and fight The Hero!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the Augments produced by Chaoslady Annarose. He was originally a man who wished to be heroic, so after his restructuring he refers to himself as 'The Hero'. Despite this, he has the personality of a coward, and he's a narrow-minded man who can't stand for anyone to be more prominent than him.

Soul.Name: Veteran Maneuver
Soul.Comment: Both Iczers get SP=1. Both Iczers get 1 SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Company of the Black Spear
Skill0.Comment: [Conditional use/Focused] All friendly [Duchy of Crest] units get AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn. All friendly non-characters get AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Loyal Strike
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+20] to one random enemy unit of level 4 or higher in range.

Skill2.Name: Cost of War
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/two or more Closed units on either side of the field] This unit is Focused until end of next turn and healed 25% of MAX HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I would gladly sacrifice these old bones of mine, if it was for the future of Crest.'
FlavorText.Text2: A prominent figure who long served the Duchy of Crest alongside Dical. He used to serve as the Captain of the Guard, but he's retired from that post, and his daughter currently fills it. He's no longer on the front lines, but continues to train physically. In the conflict with the Envoy of Chaos, he volunteered to return to battle for his ruler, Eskatia.

Soul.Name: Suicide Rush
Soul.Comment: Send one friendly unit of level 2 or lower to the Cemetery. Do [damage: that unit's AT] to all enemy units. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Shield of Allies
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/DF=0] Send one random non-character unit card from your File to your Cemetery. And then, this unit gets DF+10.

Skill1.Name: Execution Blades
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 50%AT] to one random enemy column in range. Repeat this skill a total of twice.

FlavorText.Text1: 'After the sun has set on the battlefield, Death appears, riding on the wind.'
FlavorText.Text2: A type of Augment produced by Annarose. This one was originally a royal knight. His agility has been drastically enhanced, and he can fly about the battlefield at will even while wearing steel armor. He no longer has any sense of self, and won't hesitate to kill his former comrades.

Soul.Name: Electromagnetic Aura
Soul.Comment: Engage all units of AGI 3 or higher.

Skill0.Name: Made from Parts
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Augmented] units get AT+10 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Overdrive Attack
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is disengaged] Do [damage: 40] to one random enemy unit.

Skill2.Name: Revival
Skill2.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Large number of intruders detected at 9 o'clock. Now commencing extermination procedures.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer.  She was remodeled by the wicked magic power of Chaos Form Noze. She has a special booster system that is completely self-sustaining and unleashes corrupt energy on her attacker.

Skill0.Name: Overdose
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+30 for this turn and HP=0. If it's not [subtype: Augmented], do [damage: 50% unit's AT] to 1 random enemy. If it is, effect hits 2 enemies and you get SP+1. Decrease your Lawtia level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oops, another failure.' -- Chaoslady Annarose
FlavorText.Text2: An augmentation experiment Annarose carries out in absolute secrecy. New chemicals are administered to human specimens whenever the situation calls for it. Successful cases are uncommon, and many lose their lives during surgery.

Soul.Name: Little Murders
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to three target units.

Skill0.Name: Uncontrollable Excitement
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AGI +2 X number of closed friendly units for this turn. And then, this unit gets AT+10.

Skill1.Name: Hatchet Tragedy
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random units that are not [subtype: Abyssal Forces].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Her world was full of light when she sought to become a knight. When she became more than a knight, her world sank into darkness.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the soldiers augmented by Annarose. She was originally a girl attending military school in order to become a royal knight. Her power has been drastically enhanced, and she has deadly combat reflexes. As a side effect, she loses control of her urge to destroy, and winds up attacking everything she can see, friend or foe.

Soul.Name: Lingering Attachment to Master
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to target enemy unit. One unit gets AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Energy Siphon
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets MAX HP-20. And then, this unit gets MAX HP=60 and is healed 20 HP.

Skill1.Name: Energy Release
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT X number of times Energy Siphon has been activated since the last time this skill was used] to target enemy unit in range.

Skill2.Name: Refresh
Skill2.Comment: Send [card: Magic Doll -Undead-] from your Card File to the Cemetery and then, this unit fully recovers HP and gets MAX HP-10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Target...detected...  Tik-tik-tik... Initiating... attack.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer. Hers is the resurrected body of a magic doll destroyed on the battlefield. There are rumors that curses animate her, or that the residual negative energy of soldiers killed on the battlefield are her source of power, butit is not clear.

Soul.Name: Berserk Overdose
Soul.Comment: One unit gets MAX HP=10, AT+30 and AGI+2.

Skill0.Name: Charge
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: ATX2] to a random enemy in range.  Do [damage: 50% of MAX HP] to this unit.

Skill1.Name: Instincts
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/HP 20 or lower] This unit gets MAX HP = HP, AT+20, and AGI+3.

FlavorText.Text1: 'They often say, 'Even an idiot has his uses,' right?' -- Chaoslady Annarose
FlavorText.Text2: One of the soldiers augmented by Annarose. He was originally a royal soldier. The augmentation procedure abnormally increased his physical strength, and he easily wields a massive club that a normal large adult couldn't even get off the ground. But his ability to think deteriorated, and now he can only understand simple orders.

IczerAttack.Name: Iczer Attack
IczerAttack.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer Attack, Rival Iczer cannot Set a Character next turn and decrease Rival Iczer's LP by 1.  このユニットの[イクサーアタック]は以下のスキルである。■【消費[SP]：1】ライバルイクサーの[ファイル]の[ネームドカード]をすべて選び[セット不可能：1ターン]する。ライバルイクサーの[LP]を1減らす。

Soul.Name: Vengeful Gaze
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Neither Iczer can Set a Rarity 5 card for 3 turns.

Skill0.Name: The Evil Eye
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer Attack, it costs 0 SP, Rival Iczer cannot Set a Character next turn and decrease Rival Iczer's LP by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The eyes are the windows to the soul.'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic beings dwelling in the land of the undead. They move under the power of the lich queens who reside there, and said queens can perceive the images these creatures see. These beings can also use magic to temporarily paralyze those with whom they make eye contact.

Soul.Name: Emperor's Claw
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: their level X 15] to one enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Armor of Belus
Skill0.Comment: If there are no friendly units, engage one random disengaged enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Sword of Orthos
Skill1.Comment: Subtract AT directly from the HP of a random enemy unit in range and render it engaged. Remove from the game 5 random cards from rival Iczer’s Cemetery.

Skill2.Name: Scarrion's Memory
Skill2.Comment: This unit is healed 30 HP. From now on, when any of your units executes an Attack action add +10 damage. This effect is cumulative.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, how about you creeps tell me where your boss is?'
FlavorText.Text2: When Rivera, one of the Four Kings of prophecy, fights, she clads herself in her 'Beast Emperor' battle gear. This gear is actually the transformation of Belus and Orthos, so her sword cuts an enemy's soul, and her armor retaliates against attacks with a paralyzing roar. She's operating independently of the Allied Army of Mankind, searching for Elgandi.

Soul.Name: Angry Hunter
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. If it's a character, it gets HP=0.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, DF +5, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Thunder of Vengeance
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: number of [subtype: warrior] units in the Cemetery X 5] to one random enemy Character in range.

Skill1.Name: Give her a Hammer
Skill1.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, the unit hit gets AT-10 and AGI-1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm taking part in this war. And I'm taking your boss's head so my tribe can rest in peace!'
FlavorText.Text2: Another survivor from Cassandra's tribe of hunters. Since escaping that tragedy, she's been living in a community of women of valor. She joined in the conflict upon learning it was to defeat the one who'd been controlling Galdirea.

Soul.Name: First Form: Cross Cut
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 45] to two random enemy units. And then, one friendly unit gets [HP-20] and AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Second Form: Reverse Stab
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+10] to target enemy unit. Then, do [damage: that unit's AT] to this unit.

Skill1.Name: Third Form: Thunder Strike
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] This unit gets AT X2. Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill2.Name: Fourth Form: Petals Scattering
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/HP 20 or lower] This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You pick a fight with Litho in broad daylight?  You really are a fool.'
FlavorText.Text2: A master of the Reformed Asada School, one of the Far East's so-called great sword styles. Her style has seven secret principles, and only one is taught to each master. Should the current head of the school retire or die, the masters choose a new one. There are currently 11 masters. Litho is younger sister to Fistara, an assistant captain of knights in Folrart.

Soul.Name: Secret of the Purple Stone
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random enemy units.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +20.

Skill0.Name: Ancient Trap Discovered
Skill0.Comment: All units get AGI=1.

Skill1.Name: Disarm Traps
Skill1.Comment: All units get AT and AGI restored to their base values.

Skill2.Name: Trusty Whip
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: AT+10] to one random enemy unit of level 2 or higher in range. Decrease your Gowen level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm just part of this because there's no other choice.  Since the world will end if we lose, I kind of have to help out.'
FlavorText.Text2: A world-famous adventurer. He's still in the prime of his life, but he's already acquired treasures from ruins in every land. He had nothing to do with the battle on which rests the fate of the world, but a certain treasure that had been sleeping in a ruin led to his assisting the Allied Army of Mankind.

Soul.Name: Compact Bow
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. Neither Iczer can set a card of AGI 4 or higher next turn or the turn after.

Skill0.Name: Sword of the Knight
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+20] to one random enemy unit in range. Two friendly units are Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Poison Arrow
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Engage one random enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Not that I'm exactly what you'd call your average knight, though.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of Lavato's rare feline kin. Feline kin love freedom so not many of them serve just one land. But Heierrat was formed by mercenaries, so many of them there go from being mercenaries to knights who exclusively serve that kingdom. Combat makes good use of their physical prowess, and they fight using bows and arrows along with their swords.

Soul.Name: Battle Orders
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+20, AGI+2 and become Focused until the end of this turn.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets HP +20.

Skill0.Name: Troop Coordination
Skill0.Comment: Friendly [mercenary nation] units on the left and the right of this unit get DF=10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Supply Lines
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/rank up/a [subtype: Mercenary Nation] unit has used an Action Skill this turn] One friendly unit gets AT+10. You get SP+1.

Skill2.Name: Second Surge
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/two [subtype: Mercenary Nation] units have used an Action Skill this turn] One friendly [subtype: Mercenary Nation] unit is disengaged, except [card: Heierrat Field Commander].

FlavorText.Text1: 'In the Mercenary Nation, as long as you have skills, you can lead. Things like nobility and gender aren't important.'
FlavorText.Text2: An individual working as a field officer in her Mercenary Nation unit. She also serves as the adjutant of the unit, works as the assistant to the commander. Field commanders have an abundance of combat experience and skill, even for a mercenary, and are able to coordinate their units on the ground perfectly.

Skill0.Name: Song for a Hero
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit of LV5 or higher gets AT X2 and cannot be targeted, affected or randomly selected by other cards' send to Cemetery effects for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Holding Out
Skill1.Comment: If above unit is alone on the field, give it MAX HP+30 and HP+50.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The hero came to a halt, certain he heard the voice of the girl he hadn't seen since they were young.'
FlavorText.Text2: A prayer of the captive singer. The prayer receives voice and makes its way to the hero.

Soul.Name: Flammable Spores
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to target enemy unit.  One enemy unit begins Burning.

Skill0.Name: Proliferation
Skill0.Comment: Decrease your Gowen level by 1. Increase your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill1.Name: Poison Spores
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 15 X number of friendly [subtype: monster] units] and Poison two random enemies until end of next turn. Poisoned units cannot regain HP by Resting. Engage this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Mister, come help me!  I'm lost and all alone.'
FlavorText.Text2: Plants that grow in the primeval forest sometimes take on human form and attack people. Myconida are mushrooms that have turned into monsters. They take on the form of adorable girls to make people lower their guard, then assault them with toxic spores when they come near.

Soul.Name: Breathe In
Soul.Comment: All friendly units are focused until the end of this turn and get AGI+1.

Skill0.Name: Flame Breath Burst
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Rival Iczer has more units on the field] One friendly [subtype: Beltorat Kingdom] unit gets AT+10, and then do [damage: 30] to one random enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Protector Dragon
Skill1.Comment: The unit directly in front of this unit gets AT+10 for this turn. And then, this unit gets AGI+1 and RNG+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Dragons are objects of awe for people, but in Beltorat, they can be handy for backup.'
FlavorText.Text2: A small dragon that's kept as a pet. In Beltorat, where dragons are revered as divine and live alongside humans, small dragons domesticated as pets are a common sight. They're only about the size of cats, but the power of the flames they breathe is enough to drive away hooligans.

Soul.Name: Blasting Spell
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 10->40] to one random enemy unit. This effect is repeated four times.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AT +30.

Skill0.Name: Burning Chain
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 30 directly from the HP of target Burning enemy unit in range.

Skill1.Name: Flame Cross
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all enemy units in areas [2,5,8]. Do [damage: 20] to all enemy units in areas [4,5,6]. All units hit begin Burning.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Explosions are an art form.'
FlavorText.Text2: A magician who deals with explosion spells. Explosion spells originally came about as an application of elemental magic such as flame and ice spells, but they're currently undergoing a proprietary evolution at the hands of Primrose and other Mercenary Nation mages. These sorcerers produce explosive flames in a cross shape to disrupt enemy formations.

Soul.Name: Through Enemy Lines
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all units of LV3 or higher and engage them.

Skill0.Name: Message for the Army
Skill0.Comment: Friendly [subtype: Warrior] units cannot be affected or selected by other cards' effects that include engaging until end of this turn.

Skill1.Name: Dangerous Mission
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit and send one [subtype: Faerie] unit from your Cemetery to your Card File. Return this unit to the Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This is an important message!'
FlavorText.Text2: Faeries exist all over Lavato, and these particular ones act as messengers. They're always a team of two, and when they unroll their message, the words on it emerge by magic. This made them excellent messengers during the fight with the Envoy of Chaos, where they supported the human army by alerting them to traps.

Soul.Name: Banishment
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of AGI 7 or higher to its Card File. You get one less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Archive Shield
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Rival Iczer has more units on the field] This unit gets RNG+ [times you've invoked a Grimoire] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Repulsion Blast
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/RNG 10 or higher] Return target engaged unit to the card file. Decrease your number of Grimoires used by 3.

Skill2.Name: Magic Knight
Skill2.Comment: This unit gets AT+ [times you've invoked a Grimoire X 5] for this turn. Do [damage: AT] to one enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I am Nereis. My princess, I will both live and die by your side.'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight who appeared from Bernet's book once she became princess of Regus. She's loyal to Bernet's orders, and constantly works to protect her. She's actually a magic being the Archive produced to protect itself. It modeled her appearance based on its possessor's state of mind. This is the image it chose, since it thought Bernet needed a friend her own age.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: If this unit Attacks, do [damage: AT] to a random enemy in range and give him AGI-1 for this turn, and do [damage: AT] to a random enemy in range and give him AT-10 for this turn.

Soul.Name: Fire of Absence
Soul.Comment: Send three random Grimoire cards from your Card File to your Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Magic Sword Goumaken
Skill0.Comment: If this unit Attacks, do [damage: AT] to a random enemy in range and give him AGI-1 for this turn, and do [damage: AT] to a random enemy in range and give him AT-10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Spell: Flame Awakening
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen level exactly 2] Increase your Gowen level by 1.

Skill2.Name: Fire Barrier
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/this unit cannot be hit by an Attack action] This unit gets AT+20 for this turn.

Skill3.Name: Greatsword of Demon Fire
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/1 or more grimore activation] Do [damage: AT+ Gowen LV X 5] to a random enemy in range. Send a random Grimoire from rival Iczer to the Cemetery. Decrease grimoires used by 3.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A whole lot of them turned up, but it's still not even enough for a warm-up.'
FlavorText.Text2: A former student of Durendal, who was behind the fall of Regus. His sword, Goumaken, fights with the power of a bound fire demon. Ryu was training away from the Wizard Kingdom when it collapsed. He escaped that hardship, but regrets being unable to stop his former teacher, or help his two colleagues. He's tall and attractive, but has a sharp tongue.

Soul.Name: Devouring Curse
Soul.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the HP of one enemy unit. If that unit is at HP -10 or below, Rival Iczer gets 1 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Carrier Infestation
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow LV 5 or higher] Target unit gets LV-1.

Skill1.Name: Young Cannibal
Skill1.Comment: Remove one Character card in your cemetery from the game. And then, all friendly [subtype: Deep Ones] get MAX HP+10 and HP+10.

Skill2.Name: Corrupt Chi Flow
Skill2.Comment: Remove one Character card in Rival Iczer's cemetery from the game. And then, This unit gets AT+20 and AGI+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Welcome to my flower garden. You're Brave Hero Dilate, yes? From here on, you get to play with me.'
FlavorText.Text2: A girl who made a name for herself as a martial artist in the Wizard Kingdom. She originally had a strong-willed personality, but Noze's curse reduced her to an evil shock trooper who carelessly toys with the lives of others. She stands in the path of Dilate and friends as they chase after Noze.

Soul.Name: Snatched Away
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of AGI 4 or higher to its Card File. You get two less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Share the Wealth
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Rival Iczer has SP 4 or higher] Rival Iczer gets SP-1. You get SP+1.

Skill1.Name: Surrender Recommendation
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Rival Iczer has SP 2 or higher] Do [damage: 1->20 + number of unit cards in Rival Iczer's Card File] to one random enemy unit.

Skill2.Name: Get Moving!
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: 5] to one friendly [subtype: Pirate] except this unit. Then, that unit gets AGI+1 and do [damage: that unit's AT] to a random enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Heh heh, I've found more nasty-looking pirates today! Now to help myself to their treasure.'
FlavorText.Text2: A lady pirate notorious for launching raids on pirate ships. The money and goods she seizes go toward supporting her family, who were driven from their home by war. She's actually the daughter of a small country's nobility, but a certain incident led her into the pirating trade.

Soul.Name: Confusion of an Ambush
Soul.Comment: Move enemy units from [area: 1-2-3] to [area: 7-8-9], and from [area: 7-8-9] to [area: 1-2-3]. Engage all enemy units of level 4 or higher.

Skill0.Name: Leading the Flight
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets AGI+2 for this turn. If that unit is a [subtype: Wyvern] you get SP+1.

Skill1.Name: Command Instinct
Skill1.Comment: Return a friendly Open or Closed [subtype: Wyvern] unit to the Card File, except this unit. You get SP+ [unit's base level], and then engage one random, disengaged enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It might not be human, but you still have to respect a leader. I bet those who trespass in their domain learn that at their own peril.'
FlavorText.Text2: A wyvern leader that governs the wyverns living amongst the Gondfore Mountains. It sends out special signals, delivering commands to other wyverns. They mercilessly attack those who trespass within their territory, which hinders the Solar Kingdom's march through Gondfore.

Soul.Name: Rusted Trap
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit, give it DF=0 and render it engaged.

Skill0.Name: Spinning Gears
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets LV+1.

Skill1.Name: Precision Shot
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is LV4 or higher] Do [damage: AT+10] to target enemy unit. This unit gets LV-2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'An ancient legacy will defeat a future evil.'
FlavorText.Text2: An ancient weapon excavated from some ruins. It didn't function at all at the time of excavation, but military machinists since restored it. Apparently modeled after a horse, it gallops around the battlefield on four legs, bringing down a merciless rain of arrows on enemy soldiers.

Skill0.Name: Reinforcements from the Sky
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units cannot be hit by Attack actions until the end of this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'No matter how many of the Forces of Chaos were defeated, more appeared. It was the soldiers of a previously fallen kingdom who saved the day.'
FlavorText.Text2: Soldiers of the old Wizard Kingdom showed up as reinforcements for the Solar Kingdom's forces, who were being gradually overpowered in their battle with the Forces of Chaos. Their addition marked the start of the Solar Kingdom's counteroffensive.

Soul.Name: Ballad of Magic
Soul.Comment: Return one engaged unit of agility 3 or lower to the Card File.

Skill0.Name: Song of the Sea God
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Refess LV 0] Return one Open or Closed friendly unit to the File.

Skill1.Name: Refrain of the Sea God
Skill1.Comment: Revive one friendly [subtype: Mermaid] unit. And then, decrease Refess LV by 1.

Skill2.Name: Mermaid Harp
Skill2.Comment: All friendly units of LV 2 or lower get AGI+1 for this turn, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I will sing a song, for the sake of those on the surface...'
FlavorText.Text2: Mermaid musicians. The timbre of the harps they play steals their enemy's will to fight, and their singing boosts their allies' fighting spirit.

Soul.Name: Undertow Trap
Soul.Comment: One random enemy unit gets RNG-1. Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Catching a Wave
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AGI+1.

Skill1.Name: Dolphin Javelin
Skill1.Comment: Subtract [AGI X 10] directly from the HP of one random enemy unit not in range. This unit gets AGI=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'We've detected signs of the enemy! Everyone be on guard!'
FlavorText.Text2: There's a tribe on the continental archipelago that lives with dolphins. Normally they live as fishermen, but after the Wizard Kingdom fell, they joined forces with Wizard Kingdom mages who drifted there to fight the Forces of Chaos. They're good at communicating their intent to the dolphins they ride, which allows them to move about freely at sea.

Soul.Name: Electric Burst
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to 1 + [50% number of Grimoires used] random enemy units and give them AGI-1. Set number of Grimoires used to 0.

Skill0.Name: Mystery of the Depths
Skill0.Comment: Send this unit to the Cemetery. You get SP=0 and +2 SP at the beginning of next turn. Decrease your LP by 1.

Skill1.Name: Collapse
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'They look like jewels from a distance, but you see how wrong you are, up close.'
FlavorText.Text2: Jellyfish-like creatures that inhabit the sea. Details of their ecology are shrouded in mystery. What's known is that they react to trouble by emitting electric shocks around them, sometimes causing unexpected injury.

Soul.Name: Meaning of Dreams
Soul.Comment: Engage one enemy unit until the end of next turn. This counts as two grimoire activations.

Skill0.Name: The Curse Spreads
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/a friendly [subtype: Deep One] unit is on the field] All friendly units get AT+10 and DF+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Song of Dreams
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/a friendly closed unit is on the field] Send one [subtype: Deep One] from your Cemetery to your Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Evil curses even warp holy powers.'
FlavorText.Text2: Mermaids who were warped by a curse. As these were mermaid clergy, the staves that were their sacred symbols likewise took on sinister shapes. They cast evil spells, and mercilessly attack their former sisters.

Soul.Name: High-Speed Strike
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to three random disengaged enemy units. Rival Iczer gets SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Perfect Kill
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/there are 0 cards in your Cemetery] Set two random enemy units to HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Invincible Body
Skill1.Comment: Send [card: Perfect Augment / Narevez] from your Card File out of game. And then, this unit fully recovers its HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Lady Annarose gave me my orders. She said to kill everythiiiiing!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the Augments produced by Annarose. Annarose calls him 'the strongest'. By this time, she had experimented on every type of human and living thing. According to Annarose, he needs no weapons and will never betray orders. He was supposed to herald a major shift in the war, but the appearance of Gaiessoul causes that objective to fall wide of its mark.

Soul.Name: Light of the Soul
Soul.Comment: Set one friendly unit to HP=0. And then, you get get SP+3.

Skill0.Name: Miracle of Life
Skill0.Comment: All units are fully healed.

Skill1.Name: Equal Force
Skill1.Comment: One random enemy unit gets AT=MAX HP for this turn. One friendly unit gets AT=MAX HP for this turn, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Many lives are being lost in this conflict. Is there nothing I can do but stand by and watch?'
FlavorText.Text2: A priestess with inborn healing powers, and some say she's the reincarnation of a goddess. She has no memory of her childhood, and for as long as she can recall she's been raised with care to be a priestess of the True God Church. Until now she's never been far from her shrine, but she's worried about the soldiers dying in the war, and volunteered to join the campaign.

Skill0.Name: Game Over
Skill0.Comment: All units get HP=0. Both Iczers get SP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'They call this a super move.'
FlavorText.Text2: A forbidden spell unleashed by Envoy of Chaos Elgandi. The only reason he can wield this overwhelming power is that he exists beyond Lavato. In his words, 'I guess it means every opponent around Elgandi loses.'

Soul.Name: Light of Annihilation
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to all units. Decrease your LP by 1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AGI +2.

Skill0.Name: Speed Magic
Skill0.Comment: The [subtype: Mage Soldier] directly in front of this unit gets AGI+1 for this turn. And then, this unit gets AGI=4 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Teleport Stab
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AGI X10] to one random enemy unit of AT0.

Skill2.Name: Flash Spear
Skill2.Comment: Target column of enemy units gets AT-10. Do [damage: AT] to the unit in [area: 1-2-3] in that column and restore its AT to base value.

FlavorText.Text1: 'When it comes to this fight upon which rests the fate of the world, we faeries will gladly lend a hand.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the seven faerie heroines, she controls the ultimate striking speed of flash magic. She excels in valor even for one of the heroines, and her combat abilities are arguably the best amongst all faeries. The armor she wears allows her to dart around in flashes of light. She's cautious in battle, but she led her people and fought alongside the Army of Mankind.

Skill0.Name: Flames of Judgment
Skill0.Comment: Two random enemy units get MAX HP=0. Decrease your Refess and Gowen levels by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The flames of purification burn away evil, and eradicate its very existence.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the miracles of True God Church priests. They cast sacred flames at evil enemies, which burn away their very existence.

Soul.Name: Spear Form: Liberating Stance
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. friendly units cannot be affected or selected by other cards' effects that include engaging until end of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Warned by a Bird
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be affected or selected by other cards' effects that include engaging until end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Seisou's Barrier
Skill1.Comment: Neither Iczer can set a Grimoire Card next turn.

Skill2.Name: Spear Form: Star Strike
Skill2.Comment: Subtract AT+10 directly from the HP of a random enemy column in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I have word. It's finally our time to move out.'
FlavorText.Text2: A refugee knight from Regus. She wields the Star Lance 'Seisou,' one of Regus' magic treasures, and she wandered with it through various lands to keep it from enemy hands. She can speak to birds, and used them to gather information on the Forces of Chaos. Now, she takes command of refugees from Regus, and they join the army of Folrart.

Skill0.Name: Chaos Absorption
Skill0.Comment: Send 2 random cards from Rival Iczer's file to the Cemetery. Send one card from Rival Iczer's Cemetery out of game for every unit on enemy Field, max of 4.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Noze's curse undermines the nature of life itself, and warps it into something evil.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of Chaos Form Noze's curses. She focuses magic power into both of her palms, and then grabs somebody. Whoever she grabs ends up degrading and degenerating, vanishing or turning into an evil being.

Soul.Name: Clash of the Elements
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to two random enemy units. Rival Iczer gets SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Master Elementalist
Skill0.Comment: When this unit is affected by a Gowen or Falkow grimoire that gives +AT, you get SP+1.

Skill1.Name: Swordsman Sage
Skill1.Comment: Two friendly [subtype: Mage Soldier] units get AT+10 and cannot be hit by an Attack action for this turn, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Magic Sword Dual Wield
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units in range.

Skill3.Name: Elemental Meditation
Skill3.Comment: This unit gets AT+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I've already retired, but I guess that will never do!'
FlavorText.Text2: An old man who was once known as a great wizard. He could use every elemental spell, and was an expert magic swordsman. He was also virtuous and many adored him, but one day he suddenly vanished. His intent was to live out the rest of his life as a hermit, but upon learning about the world's current crisis, he joins in the fight against the Envoy of Chaos.

Skill0.Name: Faerie Blessing
Skill0.Comment: Return one random non-character unit of level 6 or lower from your Cemetery to your File.

Skill1.Name: Freed by the Fairies
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Refess LV3 or higher] Friendly units cannot be affected or selected by other cards' effects that include engaging until end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It allows you to evade any trap or magic binding. This is how faeries do battle.'
FlavorText.Text2: A secret art passed down amongst faeries. It's an incantation that allows a soldier to move and fight freely, even when bound or trapped underwater.

Soul.Name: Doom on Lavato
Soul.Comment: Remove one random closed unit from the game.

Skill0.Name: Made by Elgandi
Skill0.Comment: Set rival Iczer's SP to 2.

Skill1.Name: Paralyzing Gaze
Skill1.Comment: All enemy units get RNG=1 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Spirit Absorption
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one enemy unit in range. If that unit is at HP0 or below, this unit is fully healed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll prepare a crazy strong miniboss. That's something every good game needs!' -- Envoy of Chaos Elgandi
FlavorText.Text2: A life form created by Elgandi. Its entire body emits wicked magic power, and its stare alone can produce paralysis. Also, its magic power lets it naturally recover from the wounds it sustains.

Soul.Name: Venomous Appetite
Soul.Comment: All units are Poisoned until the end of next turn. Poisoned units cannot regain HP by Resting.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AT +30.

Skill0.Name: Noxious Cloud
Skill0.Comment: [Conditional use/lawtia LV 2 or higher] All enemy units in range get [HP-15] and are Poisoned until end of next turn and cannot regain HP by Resting. Decrease Lawtia LV by 1.

Skill1.Name: Unquenchable Urge
Skill1.Comment: [Conditional use/Rank up] Subtract AT directly from the HP of a random enemy unit.

Skill2.Name: Immobile Mass
Skill2.Comment: Engage this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's lovely when a mere pig gets this fat.' -- Chaoslady Annarose
FlavorText.Text2: An ork whose body grew and mutated, as a result of a drug used in augmentation procedures. It's been altered at the genetic level, and although it's hardly mobile anymore, it grabs and eats everything it can with the tentacles growing from its body.

Soul.Name: Take Their Place
Soul.Comment: Choose two units. The second unit gets MAX HP, AT and AGI set equal to the first unit's, and is fully healed.

Skill0.Name: Lady of Chaos
Skill0.Comment: This card is treated as [card: Chaoslady / Annarose] in regards to [card: Deadly Scheme] and [card: Triad of Chaos Meets].

Skill1.Name: Shape Change
Skill1.Comment: Set one random enemy unit to AT=0 for this turn. And then, this unit gets AT= [AT of chosen unit] and AGI= [AGI of chosen unit].

Skill2.Name: Deadly Temptation
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one enemy unit in range. If that unit is at HP0 or below, send a random card from Rival Iczer's File to the cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Well, you don't make many mistakes when you send yourself. Not that I suppose it's usually possible.' -- Chaoslady Annarose
FlavorText.Text2: A familiar of Chaoslady Annarose, who does her bidding as she maneuvers secretly from within the Duchy of Crest. It takes the form of Annarose, and works secretly as her body double in various lands. It can copy an opponent's abilities, and then can take their place once it's defeated them.

Skill0.Name: Breath of the Dead
Skill0.Comment: One random Poisoned unit gets HP=0. Then, decrease your Lawtia and Gowen LV by 1.

Skill1.Name: Poison Breath
Skill1.Comment: All enemy units are Poisoned until the end of next turn. Poisoned units cannot regain HP by Resting.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A lich queen obtains energy from the living and from the earth, and the air she breathes is filled with energy and evil.'
FlavorText.Text2: Yudit, one of the lich queens of the land of the undead. When she inhales somebody's breath, she sucks out their vitality, and those who inhale her breath become envenomed.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: [RNG内]の敵軍ユニットからランダムで1体選び[最大HP-：AT]する。

Soul.Name: Blessing of the Sea Gods
Soul.Comment: You get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: Holy Staff
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, subtract AT directly from the MAX HP of one random enemy unit in range.

Skill1.Name: Aquamantic Prayer
Skill1.Comment: One friendly unit is healed 20 HP, except this unit. If that unit had HP below its MAX HP, it gets AGI+1.

Skill2.Name: Exiled Oracle
Skill2.Comment: One enemy unit of AGI 4 or higher gets RNG-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'May the Sea Lord protect everyone on the surface...'
FlavorText.Text2: Mermaid priestesses. They're shrine maidens for Sea Lord Vonderam, and are opposing the curses Chaos Form Noze has sent swirling into the sea. Their prayers protect their comrades, and cast aside those hostile to them.

Soul.Name: Killer Reputation
Soul.Comment: Send one friendly unit to the Cemetery. After that, send one disengaged enemy unit of your choice to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Blinding Fast Strike
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen LV 5 or higher] One friendly unit gets HP=0. And then, one enemy unit of HP 60 or lower gets HP=0. Decrease your Lawtia LV by 1.

Skill2.Name: Envenomed Blade
Skill2.Comment: Subtract 5HP from target enemy in range and mark it.

Skill3.Name: Second Dose
Skill3.Comment: Set target Marked enemy in range to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I was so intent on swinging my sword, at some point I picked up a role I'd rather not have.'
FlavorText.Text2: A mercenary who uses a strange sword style. There are many swordsmen from the Far East in the Mercenary Nation, and it's popular to develop original techniques that borrow from their styles. This mercenary did just that, focusing on killing the enemy in one strike no matter what it took. Unfortunately, for that he was cast into the role of an assassin.

Skill0.Name: Elemental Burst
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to two random enemy units. All friendly units get AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This spell was just developed as a cantrip, but it's surprisingly intricate.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell that scatters sparks, increasing speed and power and burning those nearby. Generating the sparks requires the collision of opposing elements, so it demands the skill to handle multiple incantations.

Soul.Name: Knight of Chaos
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia 4 or higher] Send one random enemy unit to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Piece of the Abyss
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be affected, targeted, or randomly chosen by Soul Skills.

Skill1.Name: Ultimate Light of Hell
Skill1.Comment: A friendly unit gets HP=0, except this unit. Do [damage: that unit's LV X20] to one enemy unit. Then, this unit gets AGI+1 for this turn and you get 0 SP beginning of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Final Descent
Skill2.Comment: Send one friendly Closed unit to the Cemetery. And then, you get SP+[2 + that unit's level].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, am I on already?'
FlavorText.Text2: In a park in a certain city, there's a hero show the kids love, 'Brave Sentai Deranger'. One of the three top enemy leaders, General Zalzagul, Is a monster any Iczer would be likely to recognize. But those kids probably have no idea that inside is a lady who's chasing her dream.

Soul.Name: Assault Formation
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen level X5] to target enemy row. One friendly unit gets AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Soul of the Red Dragon
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/6 or more [subtype: dragon kin] cards are in your Card File] This unit gets AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Mounted Soldier
Skill1.Comment: The [subtype: Dragon Kin] unit directly in front of this unit gets AT+20 and AGI+1 for this turn. And then, this unit gets AT+20 and AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Flanking Ambush
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: number of friendly units on the field X 15] to one random engaged enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Don't let your guard down just because it's a ceremony.'
FlavorText.Text2: Visitors were due to arrive in Beltorat from a small country in the Far East. Beltorat's King Ainhazard showed respect for the visitors, and even prepared Far East attire for his guards.  But because said attire ended up merely being 'Far East-esque,' he learned later that he had slightly misinterpreted the country's culture.

Soul.Name: Slave to Noze
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random engaged enemy units. One friendly unit is fully healed.

Skill0.Name: Corruption Arrow
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/2 or more units in your cemetery] One unit gets MAX HP=30, HP=30, AT=30, DF=0, AGI=2 and RNG=2. Then, remove 2 units in the Cemetery from game.

Skill1.Name: Paralysis Arrow
Skill1.Comment: Remove one [subtype: Mermaid] card in your cemetery from the game. And then, do [damage: AT] to one enemy unit in range and engage it until the end of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Magic Bow Venguss
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/2 or more unit cards in your cemetery] One random engaged enemy unit in range gets HP=0. And then, remove 2 units in the Cemetery from game.

FlavorText.Text1: *Cough, cough!* 'I've been coughing a lot lately.  I wonder if something's amiss.'
FlavorText.Text2: A noble girl of the Wizard Kingdom. She's played outdoors a lot since she was little, so even though they can't speak, she has a knack for understanding what animals are thinking. Also, the archery skills her father taught her are so good, she's been offered a place in the Regus military. Though for the past several days, she's been complaining about not feeling well...

Soul.Name: Slave to Noze
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random engaged enemy units. One friendly unit is fully healed.

Skill0.Name: Corruption Arrow
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/2 or more units in your cemetery] One unit gets MAX HP=30, HP=30, AT=30, DF=0, AGI=2 and RNG=2. Then, remove 2 units in the Cemetery from game.

Skill1.Name: Paralysis Arrow
Skill1.Comment: Remove one [subtype: Mermaid] card in your cemetery from the game. And then, do [damage: AT] to one enemy unit in range and engage it until the end of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Magic Bow Venguss
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/2 or more unit cards in your cemetery] One random engaged enemy unit in range gets HP=0. And then, remove 2 units in the Cemetery from game.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm not gonna make it in time! Nooo!'
FlavorText.Text2: Shecas was working hard at her studies at a certain academy in the Wizard Kingdom. She was surprisingly scatterbrained as a student, and was notorious for her lack of punctuality. That was when she mastered the art of eating on the run, but the jury's still out on whether it helped her body's sense of balance, or if it was any use where her archery skills were concerned.

FlavorText.Text1: You won Set 10! Yes, one copy of each!
FlavorText.Text2: Congratulations!  The ultimate rare prize card of the Super Rarity Lotto is yours!  After the event is over, this card will be exchanged for 1 copy of every card in Set 10!

Soul.Name: Stampede
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to all enemy units in [area: 1-3-5-7-9]. Engage all enemy units in [area: 2-4-6-8].

Skill0.Name: Mild Temperament
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot use the Attack action.

Skill1.Name: Brutal Trampling
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is in area [1-2-3]] Do [damage: AT] to all enemy units in range. Engage this unit.

Skill2.Name: Enrage
Skill2.Comment: This unit gets AT+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Once it starts running wild, nothing can stop it.'
FlavorText.Text2: A strange monster that appears to be a giant hairy elephant. They appeared in the northern areas of the land of Lavato and grew huge. Normally they're very well-tempered, but once one becomes upset, nothing can stand in its way.

Soul.Name: Rage on the Brink
Soul.Comment: Subtract 60 directly from the MAX HP of target disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Instinct to Hurt
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] All friendly units get AT+20 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'And I thought he was on the heavy side before.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world. Hanuman Lycanthropy spreads very slowly through the body. Because of the extended period of pain, most die before becoming an ape.

Soul.Name: Blessing of the Fey World
Soul.Comment: If Refess is lvl is 4 or lower, send 4 Refess unit cards from your cemetery to the card file. Otherwise, you get SP+2 and Refess+1.

Skill0.Name: Luck of the Cat
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+0->1. If you get SP0, all friendlies are healed 10HP.

Skill1.Name: Magic Boots
Skill1.Comment: Send this unit to the cemetery. Increase your Refess level by 1 and you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Meow meow meow meow-meow. Meow meow meow-meowâ™ª'
FlavorText.Text2: A rare type of fairy that can walk on its own two feet. It uses a cat's body to travel around the world of mortals, and legends have it that seeing one on your travels will bring you good luck.

Soul.Name: Immortality Disruption
Soul.Comment: All units get MAX HP+10.

Skill0.Name: Living Dead
Skill0.Comment: Fully restore HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Some things don't die even if you kill them.'
FlavorText.Text2: A type of bird monster that goes through many stages of development.  Legends say that even if it dies, it will rise again from its ashes.

Soul.Name: Defend at All Costs
Soul.Comment: Increase your Refess level by 2. Increase your Lawtia level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Fight of the Bodyguard
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+DF] to one random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Identify yourself!'
FlavorText.Text2: Specially trained bodyguards who protect the royalty of the Solar Kingdom. Their power rivals that of the strongest assault knights, but their true potential only manifests when they are protecting others.

Soul.Name: Quality of Light
Soul.Comment: All units heal 20 HP.

Skill0.Name: The Grace of Light
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Refess lvl 3 or higher] All friendly units get DF+5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Follow us! We have the protection of Refess! Don't let the enemy close to the Holy Realm!'
FlavorText.Text2: A special division of Folrart knights assigned to protect the shrine called the Holy Realm. They don't follow the True God Church, but are part of an order that still worships Refess, the goddess who governs light and the stars.

Soul.Name: Solar Arrow
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 10] and engage a row of enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Healing Arrow
Skill1.Comment: One friendly unit heals 30 HP and becomes engaged.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Second wave of enemy troops in range. Fire!'
FlavorText.Text2: Elite magic archers fielded by the Kingdom of Folrart. Their magic arrows can wound the enemy or even heal allies.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, if it hits a Character, it does an additional [damage: AT+20] to that Character.

Soul.Name: Reach of the Horn
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. One unit gets RNG=3.

Skill0.Name: Unicorn's Fury
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, if it hits a Character, it does an additional [damage: AT+20] to that Character.

Skill1.Name: Blessing of Protection
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: knight] units get DF+5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Only a pure maiden can handle a unicorn, and her voice can invigorate the weakened.'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight who rides unicorns. A unicorn's wild temperament naturally makes it avoid people, and it only allows women who've undergone sacred rituals to sit upon its back. It's said the holy powers awaken the abilities she has hidden within her.

Soul.Name: Final Charge
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Refess level X 5] to three random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: The Cavalry Arrives
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+30] to one engaged enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Don't hold back just because the enemy's full of women! Let's go!'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight of Folrart. With lance in hand he assaults the enemy, his goal is to destroy the enemy's formation by charging through the front lines and eliminating captains and archers.

Soul.Name: Soul Furnace
Soul.Comment: You get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: All Together
Skill0.Comment: The units in the front, back, left and right of this unit get AT+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Play with me
Skill1.Comment: [Conditional use / 2 or more [Magic Doll -Mini-] on the field] Increase Refess/Gowen/Falkow by # of [Magic Doll -Mini-] units on your field, and send them to the Cemetery.

Skill2.Name: Broken Toys
Skill2.Comment: Return one or more [Magic Doll -Mini-] cards from your Cemetery to your File. And then, you get SP+1 and this skill will not activate again.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come play with us. Come play with us.'
FlavorText.Text2: Golems created by the twisted witch Sumer. The Mini is said to be a type marketed for, among others, elderly couples not blessed with children. The truth is, they're an experiment in cost-reduction.

Soul.Name: Deadly Flash
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to a random enemy unit. Change battletime to night.

Skill0.Name: One on One
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/1 enemy unit is in Area[1-2-3]] This unit gets AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Strike Enhancer
Skill1.Comment: Subtract [AT+ unit hit's AT] from the HP of a random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'All invaders confirmed as silenced.  Rescinding warning protocols.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer.  Specializing in close quarters fighting, it excels at independent physical combat.

Soul.Name: The Long Awaited End
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to one enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Living Dead
Skill0.Comment: healed

Skill1.Name: Wrath of the King of Death
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 666] to a random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I have no fear of death... or at least, of dying.'
FlavorText.Text2: The lord of a race of giants that were wiped out in times long past.  Through necromancy, he remains in this world even though his flesh has fallen apart.  He is the quintessential undead master, commanding the forces of the dead.

Soul.Name: Grip of Hell
Soul.Comment: All units get AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Refresh
Skill0.Comment: Send [card: Hell Smoke] from your Card File to the Cemetery and then, this unit fully recovers HP, and a friendly unit gets AT+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If I kill the dead, they only become stronger... Now what?'
FlavorText.Text2: The aggregate of negative energy born from evil souls. If struck it disappears into a cloud of smoke, but then simply reforms and attacks again.

Soul.Name: Wall of Bones
Soul.Comment: Target friendly unit gets RNG=0.

Skill0.Name: Pinpoint
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

Skill1.Name: Refresh
Skill1.Comment: Send [card: Skeleton Archer] from your Card File to the Cemetery. And then, this unit fully recovers its HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A soldier you can replace as many times as you like is a handy thing.'
FlavorText.Text2: A skeleton warrior animated by magic. These are more sluggish than regular skeleton warriors, but they'll regenerate over and over until reduced to little pieces, so evil mages commonly use them as guards.

Soul.Name: Lycanthropy / Janus
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] One random enemy unit gets HP=0.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Strangling Death
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Do [damage: AT-10] to one random enemy unit in range]. This unit is fully healed.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Burning Mind
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit gets AT+40 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: 3rd Stage: Twisted Arms
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If you get to pass the time with a peerless beauty, maybe it's not so bad after all?'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world. With this strain, a woman's body grows out of the infected's shoulder and indiscriminately lashes out at anyone who approaches. No matter how much you attack the host, it will continue to function unless you also destroy the parasite.

Soul.Name: Dark Discipline
Soul.Comment: Increase your Lawtia level by 2. Increase your Refess level by 1.

Skill0.Name: Honor of a Dying Man
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Get them before they get you. That's the motto of our squad.'
FlavorText.Text2: Crest-employed soldiers who fight with specially designed halberds. Their pragmatic ideology allows them to ignore the so called rules of war and fight dirty when they have to. They are not the most feared division of the Crest army, but perhaps the most avoided.

Soul.Name: Fight Under the Moon
Soul.Comment: Remove all cards in your Cemetery from the game. Friendly level 3 units get AT +[number of cards removed X5] and AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Claw Charge
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT X2] to one random enemy unit in range. This unit gets HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Night System
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] This unit is fully healed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Three targets acquired, switching to combat mode.  ...Master, please leave this to me.'
FlavorText.Text2: A golem created by the twisted witch Sumer. She's a specialized combat type like -Fencer- and -Grappler-, and at night a special enhancement System activates. This makes her very popular as a nighttime VIP bodyguard.

Soul.Name: Life Suction
Soul.Comment: You get [SP - number of enemy units].

Skill0.Name: Nightmare
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Both Iczers get SP=0.

Skill1.Name: Night Summoner
Skill1.Comment: Change battletime to night.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, it's our time.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lost souls cut off from human life and entranced by evil.  Drinking up human vitality gives them sustenance and increases their power.  They descend on the streets when night falls, indiscriminately attacking the townspeople.

Soul.Name: Shadow's Prey
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. Decrease Rival Iczer's Lawtia level by 2.

Skill0.Name: Lurk in the Shadows
Skill0.Comment: This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Surprise Pounce
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focus] Do [damage: AT+20] to one random enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It doesn't just appear from the shadows, it is the shadows.'
FlavorText.Text2: A large monster, said to have been generated by an evil miasma, that lurks in shadows. It wanders from shadow to shadow, hunting its prey.

Skill0.Name: Consuming Grudge
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 50 directly from the HP of one random enemy unit. Subtract 1 from your LP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What? This is the power of their grudge? But it has a physical form!'
FlavorText.Text2: The grudges the dead hold against the living are gathered by necromantic power and became a creature with a shape. No one can survive its soul-shattering touch.

Skill0.Name: Pure Terror
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 999 directly from the HP of one unit level three or below.

FlavorText.Text1: 'All I see around me is madness.'
FlavorText.Text2: An enchantment that creates the illusion of what its victims most fear, from the depths of their souls.  The result is always death.

Skill0.Name: Bond With the Fallen
Skill0.Comment: Revive one friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] unit of level 2 or lower. And then, all friendly units get DF+5 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Even if you're struck down, another will inherit your righteous intent.'
FlavorText.Text2: The armies of Folrart made many sacrifices in their conflict with the Envoy of Chaos. It's said its members would clad themselves in equipment of the fallen, as mementos or charms. This custom that spontaneously came about was known in posterity as the 'Bond With the Fallen'.

Soul.Name: Magma Ignition
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to two random enemy units. All friendly units get AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Lava Blast 1
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Do [damage: 40] to units in [area: 1-2-3] on both sides of the field, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Lava Blast 2
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime noon] Do [damage: 40] to units in [area: 4-5-6] on both sides of the field, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Lava Blast 3
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Do [damage: 40] to units in [area: 7-8-9] on both sides of the field, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'After you're dead it'll cremate you, too. Convenient, no?'
FlavorText.Text2: A wyvern that lives in the volcanic tropical region of Lavato. It excretes highly flammable bodily fluids through its pores, and then keeps them ignited with its high body temperature.

Soul.Name: Both Barrels
