Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one random enemy unit. Then, if that unit's HP is 0 or below, do [damage: 50] to one random enemy unit.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 7 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Rapid Fire
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'All right. Come on. Let's have a right honest duel.'
FlavorText.Text2: A skilled gunslinger from the Mercenary Nation who fights with two revolvers. He's so fast, his bullets hit the enemy before they even see him draw.

Soul.Name: Maul
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to a random number of enemy units between 1 and 4.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Double Pounce
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+30] to two random enemy units in [area: 7-8-9].

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's a big one! It's huge!'
FlavorText.Text2: When a tiger grows large by feasting on humans, it becomes a real monster. Its appetite and ferocity are terrifying compared to regular tigers.

Soul.Name: Instantaneous Strike
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen level x 20] to one unit.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Iaijutsu Stance
Skill0.Comment: This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Sword Draw Slash
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focus] Do [damage: AT X2] to one random enemy row in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You fought a swordsman like me before? Then you're not in luck. I won't go easy on you.'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman from a land far to the east. Her unique sword skills allow her to inflict tremendous wounds with her eastern weapon, a type of sword known as a 'katana.'

Soul.Name: History of Battle
Soul.Comment: Increase your Gowen level by 2. Increase your Refess level by 1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets DF +10.

Skill0.Name: The Higher the Fee
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets Lv+1, AT+20 and DF+5. Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I only do what I'm paid to. No more, no less, got it?'
FlavorText.Text2: True mercenaries only do exactly the work they're paid for. In fact, it is said that the higher the fee, the physically stronger the true mercenary gets.

Skill0.Name: Ball of Flame
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to one enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: Ball of Flame: Detonation
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen lvl 5 or higher] Subtract 20 directly from the HP of all enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The ball of flame explodes and does widespread damage.'
FlavorText.Text2: An intermediate spell that creates a ball of flame. The initial damage is nothing impressive, but it's designed to quickly start fires. The spreading flames have been known to destroy entire towns.

Soul.Name: Pulled Under
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged unit of AGI 6 or higher, or AGI 0 or lower to its card File. And then, you get SP-2 at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Pluck from the Surface
Skill0.Comment: If there are no friendly units, one random unit of level 4 or lower is moved to a random open area and engaged.

Skill1.Name: Tentacle Slap
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to target enemy unit. This skill is repeated a total of twice.

Skill2.Name: Triple Tentacle Attack
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to three random enemy units within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That's quite the nasty monster, and twelve for the price of one.'
FlavorText.Text2: A monster from the deepest reaches of the sea, it looks like a squid, only much bigger. It has twelve long tentacles, which it uses to prey upon creatures as far up as the surface.

Soul.Name: Inhuman Swiftness
Soul.Comment: Engage one friendly unit. Do [damage: that unit's AGI X 10] to two random disengaged enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Dark Water Stealth
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be hit by an Attack action for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Poison Stinger
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one random enemy unit in range. That unit gets AT-10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'There's not much you can do about these things. They swim so silently you'll never notice one before it's too late.'
FlavorText.Text2: A giant ray that lives in the waters around the Wizard Kingdom. Its stealth is a perfect defense. And if you do manage to spear it, its barbed stinger will slash at you, delivering a poison strong enough to cripple a dragon.

Soul.Name: Creature of the Deep
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get DF=0.

Skill0.Name: Living Island
Skill0.Comment: Return one random card of AGI 2 or lower to its Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Looking for the demon of the deep? I think I found it.'
FlavorText.Text2: A colossal monster that lives in the deepest oceans. It's so big, it is often mistaken for an island. Simply by moving, it can cause tremendous waves that swallow up local fishermen.

Soul.Name: Water Spirits' Messiah
Soul.Comment: Engage all units.

Skill0.Name: Currents of Purification
Skill0.Comment: Return one enemy unit within range and AGI 0 or below to its Card File.

Skill1.Name: Dragon Water Backlash
Skill1.Comment: Return one enemy unit within range and AGI 6 or higher to its Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Water is my friend.'
FlavorText.Text2: A great wizardress who controls water magic.  Her magic powers were innate from birth, so she never learned wizardry as a craft.

Soul.Name: Thunderclap Lunge
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Return one random Falkow card from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Vortex Stance
Skill0.Comment: One enemy unit of AGI 4 or higher gets AGI-3. And then, this unit gets AT+10 and AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The power of my strike is so great, it'll form a vortex in the air and pull you in.'
FlavorText.Text2: The strongest Fencers of Regus have mixed magic into their sword fighting. With their magic strikes they can immobilize opponents or enchant their blades.

Soul.Name: Pirate Chantey
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: pirate] units get MAX HP +20, AT+20 and are healed 20 HP.

Skill0.Name: Ready to Keelhaul
Skill0.Comment: [Conditional use/two or more subtype: pirates are on the field] This unit gets AT+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Gather the Mateys
Skill1.Comment: The units in the front, back, left and right of this unit get AT+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'There are now many pirates running rampant in the ruins of Regus, in search of the treasures that still slumber there.'
FlavorText.Text2: Crew members of a pirate ship. They band together at sea to plunder, and they have a reputation for coordinated maritime attacks.

Skill0.Name: Sweeping Tidalwave
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow lvl 3 or higher] Return one unit lvl 2 or below to its Card File. Send a Grimoire card from your Card File to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The waters can rise in an instant, washing anything away.'
FlavorText.Text2: A huge tidal wave created for use as a weapon. Its true advantage is from the speed of the waves.

Skill0.Name: Withdrawal Strategy
Skill0.Comment: Return target friendly unit of LV 2 or lower to your Card File, and then return one random LV 3 enemy unit to its Card File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The kingdom is ruined, but that doesn't mean its soldiers are ruined.'
FlavorText.Text2: These are the tactics used by Wizard Kingdom forces when they were evacuating. They made it look like they were running away, to lure enemy forces into a trap, then dealt a heavy blow to them. It requires the use of a decoy, so it's most effective when there are large numbers of friendly forces.

Soul.Name: Violet Reincarnation
Soul.Comment: Send five random cards from your cemetery out of game. Return five random cards from your cemetery to your File.

Skill0.Name: Light of the New Soul
Skill0.Comment: The first time this skill activates, give one friendly LV3 [subtype: carbuncle] MAX HP+5. And then, you get SP+1.

Skill1.Name: One True Sight
Skill1.Comment: One enemy unit gets AGI-1 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Purple Stone
Skill2.Comment: One friendly [subtype: carbuncle] is fully healed, except this unit. Then, do [damage: AT+ amount healed] to one enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Is this you're first time seeing me like this? Don't be nervous, it's nothing unusual... Heh, heh...'
FlavorText.Text2: A carbuncle of legend who has the power of reincarnation in order to serve 'The One Gem'. She reincarnated in a human form, and protects the interests of carbuncles inside human society. Her goal is to keep 'The One Gem' safe from its ancient enemy. If killed, her power is inherited by her next body, but her personality isn't, so she is a new person.

Soul.Name: Onset of Day
Soul.Comment: One disengaged unit gets AT=0. Repeat this skill a total of twice.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Scattered Sunlight
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] All friendlies are healed  15HP, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: 3rd Stage: Breaking Dawn
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. Set battletime to night.

FlavorText.Text1: 'First corruption, then pain... and then madness.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world. Brahma Lycanthropes transform when exposed to morning sunlight, and are known to appear in cities, causing total chaos.

IczerAttack.Name: Iczer Attack
IczerAttack.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer Attack, it costs 0 SP and the Rival Iczer gets LP-1.

Soul.Name: Figure in the Moon
Soul.Comment: Rival Iczer gets SP-2. Decrease your LP by 1.

Skill0.Name: Dance of the White Rabbit
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be affected, targeted, or randomly chosen by Soul Skills.

Skill1.Name: Cutting Wire
Skill1.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer Attack, it costs 0 SP.

Skill2.Name: Night of Mourning
Skill2.Comment: This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill3.Name: Rabbit Hunt
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Master, Mistress, young lady, young master... all of you... I will never forget who my enemy is.'
FlavorText.Text2: She was once a domestic magic doll owned by a family of nobles who were murdered in the night. Vowing revenge, she became an assassin and used the money she earned to augment herself and track down the killers. However, the killers are already dead, so she will never have her revenge no matter how long she searches.

Soul.Name: Rampant Lycanthropy
Soul.Comment: Two random disengaged enemy units of HP 60 or higher get HP=0.

Skill0.Name: 1st Stage: Undying
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night]  Fully restore HP.

Skill1.Name: 2nd Stage: Infectious Howl
Skill1.Comment: One random enemy gets AT-[number of friendly subtype: Wild Dogs X 10] for this turn. If it's at AT0 or below, this unit is Focused until end of this turn.

Skill2.Name: 3rd Stage: Savage Claws
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Do [damage: AT] to 2 random enemies in range. If an enemy unit's HP is 0 or below, Rival Iczer gets 1 less SP next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Lycanthropy or not, he had a choice. He could've just gone on his way.'
FlavorText.Text2: Lycanthropy is a mysterious contagion that is spreading throughout the world.  Unlike other forms of lycanthropy, Fenrir completely assimilates with its host.  Maybe for this reason, victims are said to be uncommon.

Rest.Name: Rest
Rest.Comment: When this unit uses Rest, it recovers 25% MAX HP and becomes Focused until the end of next turn.

Soul.Name: On the Outskirts
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: their LV X 10] to two random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Consider the Attack
Skill0.Comment: When this unit uses Rest, it recovers 25% MAX HP and becomes Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Void Slash
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] One random row of enemy units in range gets HP=[this unit's AT]. This unit gets AT=30.

Skill2.Name: Reason to Fight
Skill2.Comment: A friendly unit gets AT+[this unit's AT]. If unit is LV3 or lower, this unit is Focused until end of next turn. This unit gets AT=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Not so fast. The battle isn't over yet, now is it?'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordsman for hire who lives on the edge of the Mercenary Nation. He looks unkempt, but is really brilliant on the field of battle. He is known for achieving a sweeping victory from the jaws of sure defeat.

Soul.Name: Choosing heroes
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. 3 random unit cards in the Rival Iczer's file cannot be Set for 3 turns.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 4 or higher, this unit gets AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Secret Potential
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets LV+1, and also AGI +1 for this turn and is Focused until the end of this turn.

Skill1.Name: Sword of Sealing
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+10] to one random enemy in range. If that unit is at HP 0 or below, Rival Iczer may not set a Grimoire card next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'We can't sit by anymore... Guide that child to the shrine of the Holy Realm!'
FlavorText.Text2: Palm-sized fairies who fight as warriors. An old folk tale says if you judge them by their size, they will burn the tips of your fingers in your sleep. In reality, they are much more dangerous.

Soul.Name: Anger of the Elements
Soul.Comment: One random disengaged enemy unit gets HP=0. And then, return 3 friendly [subtype: great spirits] from your Cemetery to your File.

Skill0.Name: Pillar of Spirits
Skill0.Comment: One unit gets AGI+1 for this turn. One unit gets AGI-1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Power Synergy
Skill1.Comment: Whenever the Open Skill of a [subtype: Great Spirit] is activated, this unit is Focused until the end of this turn.

Skill2.Name: Elemental Absorption
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Do [HP-10] to 2 random enemy units. This unit gets LV+1, MAX HP+10, HP+20 and AT+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I will return... when there is a human who can be of some use.'
FlavorText.Text2: Among summoners who call upon manifestations of the forces that make up the world, it is said it is possible to summon one of overwhelming power. This 'spirit pillar' appears in the form of a beautiful woman. But if summoned by one with ill will in their heart, they will surely die. If anyone could successfully control it, they'd rule the world.

Soul.Name: End to War
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit. That unit gets RNG=1 and is engaged.

Skill0.Name: Doubt in the Princess
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/this unit cannot be hit by an Attack action] This unit is healed HP+20 and gets AGI=4.

Skill1.Name: Dive to Safety
Skill1.Comment: Two friendly units cannot by hit by an Attack action until the end of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Reckless Strike
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT+ number of friendly units who cannot be hit by Attack actions X10] to one enemy in range. This unit can now be hit by Attack actions.

FlavorText.Text1: 'When will the war end?'
FlavorText.Text2: A soldier in the mermaid army that is under the protection of Vonderam. She was ordered by Vonderam to take the field and help prolong the war between the humans. However, she sees no good reason for fighting and is even starting to doubt Princess Emana's words.

Soul.Name: Into Light
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to two disengaged enemies of HP1 or higher. Return any unit hit of HP 0 or below to the File. You get 2 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: True Holy Light
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] All friendly units have their HP restored or are Revived, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: True Light
Skill1.Comment: Remove one enemy unit from the game.

FlavorText.Text1: 'â€¦Hear me, being from another world.  By divine judgment do I banish you to another dimension.'
FlavorText.Text2: When Alphonce and Verlaat fight Elgandi, the brothers' powers combine and materialize into the advent of this being of light. He is the very being who Abel, founder of the True God Church, was seeking. As the culmination of the True God Church's Living God Project, he uses his overwhelming power to return Elgandi to another world.

Soul.Name: Solar Command
Soul.Comment: Revive one friendly Refess unit. Subtract that unit's HP directly from the MAX HP of one disengaged enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Lion Stance
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/AGI 3 or lower] Do [damage: 50%HP] to one random enemy unit in range. This unit is disengaged.

Skill1.Name: The Lion's Resolve
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets AT+ current HP.

Skill2.Name: Lion Hearted
Skill2.Comment: This unit cannot Rest.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The fighting is over...but will we really be at peace in the future?'
FlavorText.Text2: The Solar Kingdom's high general. He was victorious against the Abyssal Forces, and the marriage of Verlaat and Eskatia signified the end of the War of the Sun and Moon. However, Zagar harbored a small, unseen doubt in his heart. That doubt manifests twenty years later in the worst form imaginable.

Soul.Name: Lantylit's Miracle
Soul.Comment: Two friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] units are Revived or fully healed and get AT+10.

Skill0.Name: Holy Formation
Skill0.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] cards get AT+10 for this turn and LV+1.

Skill1.Name: Lantylit
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: number of friendly subtype: Solar Kingdom units X15] to one random enemy row.

Skill2.Name: Lantylit's Protection
Skill2.Comment: This unit is healed 10 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Feels like we've reached a good stopping point. I might just have myself a nice long vacation.'
FlavorText.Text2: Commander of Folrart's Shrine Knights. During the War of the Sun and Moon, she took part in the fight against Annarose, and finally won. At a banquet for end of the war, she drinks her favorite wine and makes a big decision about her career. Lapierre leaves the front lines and 20 years later she retires, passing Lantylit to a young Shrine Knight.

Soul.Name: Policy of the Cardinal
Soul.Comment: All enemy units get AT-10. Engage one enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Eyes of Ice
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets DF+10 for this turn, except this unit. One enemy unit gets AT-10 and AGI-1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Cardinal’s Resources
Skill1.Comment: One friendly [subtype: True God Church] unit of DF 10 or lower gets DF+10. If that unit is [subtype: Martial Artist], it gets MAX HP+20.

Skill2.Name: Necessary Sacrifice
Skill2.Comment: Send one [subtype: True God Church] non-character card from your File to the Cemetery. Then, you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Thank you for the report, Violet. The Envoy of Chaos did make a good 'villain', though. Now that the divine awakening has begun, let's move ahead with our purpose.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the True God Church's cardinals. She's feared within the church for her Eyes of Ice. The true mistress of the magic doll Violet X2, she's been working with Gilensa to advance the Living God Project. She learns from Violet's report of the advent of the 'mysterious being,' and begins to advance the project.

Skill0.Name: First Miracle
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] All friendly units get AT+10 and AT+20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Second Miracle
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime noon] All friendly units are fully healed.

Skill2.Name: Third Miracle
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Two friendly units are Revived.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Victory is ours!'  'All that's left to do is await the return of our king!'
FlavorText.Text2: High General Zagar and Ernst, leader of the Royal Knights, were fighting Chaos Form Zalzagul.  After a long battle, they unleased a miraculous combined attack, and they defeated him.  But, the war against the Abyssal Forces still isn't over yet.

Soul.Name: The Kingdom's Faithful
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+10, AGI+1 and are disengaged.

Skill0.Name: Royal Announcement
Skill0.Comment: All friendly engaged units are disengaged. And then, engage two random enemy units of level 4 or lower.

Skill1.Name: Pinpoint
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

Skill2.Name: Shield Crusher
Skill2.Comment: Set one random enemy unit in range of DF1 or higher to DF=0 and do [damage: AT X2] to that unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'We are the Solar Kingdom!  We're part of the allied army that vanquished the enemy of the world in the War of the Sun and Moon!'
FlavorText.Text2: A shrine paladin who serves the Solar Kingdom. A year after the destruction of the Abyssal Forces, the end of the protracted War of the Sun and Moon was formally announced at a ceremony held in Folrart's royal capital. At this time the marriage of Verlaat and Eskatia was also announced. Everyone thought it marked the start of a long peace.

Soul.Name: Foundation of Folrart
Soul.Comment: Increase your Refess level by 3.

Skill0.Name: Heavy Shield Slam
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: DF X2] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Peace has come. But our job has only just begun!'
FlavorText.Text2: A soldier who protects the Solar Kingdom. He's a member of the Folrart Guardians, who came to symbolize the peace of the kingdom. The system for enforcing the peace developed by Rubens, leader of the Royal Guard, and his close aide Aivault, stays in place for twenty years, and confers even more power upon the Solar Kingdom.

Soul.Name: Psychic Implosion
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Refess LV3 or higher] Return one random disengaged unit of AGI 3 or higher to the File. You get 1 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Weak Body
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot execute an Attack action.

Skill1.Name: Friend or Foe
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Duchy of Crest] units get AT+10 for this turn. And then, send 2 cards from Rival Iczer's cemetery out of game.

Skill2.Name: Psychokinetic Attack
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy in range. If the unit has HP1 or higher, it's fully healed, unless a [subtype: Duchy of Crest] unit is on the field.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Our powers are a symbol for the new Solar Kingdom.  Defeat is not an option.'
FlavorText.Text2: A unit formed at the end of the War of the Sun and Moon. The skill known as Psychokinetics, brought about by the True God Church, is a system different from both the holy miracles invoked by priests and the magic used by wizards, and it derives power from mental focus. This becomes the main force of Folrart's military during the 20 years after the war.

Skill0.Name: Holy Protection
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit is healed HP+20 and gets DF+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I don't know if this is a divine miracle or what, but must protect this person no matter what!'
FlavorText.Text2: A mysterious power brought about by divine protection. After the War of the Sun and Moon, the number of people who could use these power, among those who were not priests or even beleivers in the True God Church, grew and grew.  As a result, many people became fanatical followers of the True God.

Soul.Name: Blessing of the Soul
Soul.Comment: You get three total SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Calming Prayer
Skill0.Comment: You get Refess LV = number of friendly [subtype: True God Church] units X2.

Skill1.Name: Power of Prayer
Skill1.Comment: Two friendly units get AT+10 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Dear God. Let there be eternal peace in this world!'
FlavorText.Text2: A priestess who embraces the True God Church.  Divine messengers, whose numbers grew after the War of the Sun and Moon, often worked with devote beleivers such as her. However, the passage of twenty years saw a slow deterioration in their relationship due to prejudice amongst priests toward the divine messengers.

Soul.Name: Attack Enchantment
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit. Increase your Gowen and Falkow levels by 1.

Skill0.Name: Blessed Weapons
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units of AGI 2 or lower get AT+10 for this turn. This unit gets AGI-1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Faith to the End
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Refess LV 6 or higher] Disengage one friendly [subtype: True God Church] unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The Solar King believes in the True God Church, and it was the church's power that brought an end to the War of the Sun and Moon!'
FlavorText.Text2: A soldier who adheres to the True God Church.  After the War of the Sun and Moon ended, the church dispatched evangelists in order to gain adherents from other nations.  The evangelists brought along several acolytes to protect them, but unnecessary quarrels also ended up breaking out as a result of the attitudes of said church soldiers. However, these missions did result in an increase of new believers.

Soul.Name: Penetrating Light Arrow
Soul.Comment: Subtract your Refess LV X10 from the HP of one random enemy column.

Skill0.Name: Nocked Arrow
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. This unit gets RNG-1 and AT-10.

Skill1.Name: Solar Pinpoint
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in range. This unit gets RNG-1.

Skill2.Name: Reload
Skill2.Comment: This unit gets RNG=3 and AT=40.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Our king is victorious!  Now lets mop up the enemy's remaining forces!'
FlavorText.Text2: Solar Kingdom archers took part in the final showdown of the War of the Sun and Moon. When the two fiends of overwhelming power were defeated, the enemy forces began to collapse. When Elgandi vanished, the enemy lost any ability to remain deployed as a cohesive force.  It then became a mop up detail, signifying victory for the alliance of mankind.

Soul.Name: Soul of a Fighter
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit. Increase your Lawtia and Gowen levels by 1.

Skill0.Name: Acrobatic Assault
Skill0.Comment: The [subtype: warriors] on the left and/or right of this unit get AT+5 for this turn. Then, unit directly behind this unit gets AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Shield Piercer
Skill1.Comment: Subtract AT+20 directly from the HP of two random enemy units of DF1 or higher.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Still, though, these guys are out of controlâ€¦'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman belonging to the Solar Kingdom. The soldiers who took part in the War of the Sun and Moon went through hell during that fierce conflict, but they were able to believe the world would be at peace once the war ended.

Skill0.Name: Unity of Claevolg
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV0] All friendly units get DF+10 for this turn and are engaged. For every engaged friendly unit, engage one random enemy unit. Decrease Refess LV by 1.

Skill1.Name: Unity of Progura
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV1 or higher] Subtract [# cards in Rival's Cemetery X5] from the HP of a random enemy. Return a card that is LV 6 or lower from your Cemetery to the File. You get Lawtia-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I never thought he'd be this powerfulâ€¦'  'Here he comes, Brother!'  'You guys are way too weak to be the Last Gatekeepers.'
FlavorText.Text2: With help from all their allies, the solar siblings stand in Elgandi's path.  Elgandi's power defies human understanding, though, and it comes crashing down on the brothers like a nightmare.

Soul.Name: Path of Peace
Soul.Comment: Return one Closed unit to its card File. And then, you get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: Soul of Moonlight
Skill0.Comment: Both Iczers get SP-1.

Skill1.Name: Gift of the Moon
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV2 or higher] You get SP+2. Decrease your Lawtia level by 2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'May the world enjoy a long age of peace.  Let us join hands to that end, Solar King.'
FlavorText.Text2: The woman who ruled the Duchy of Crest.  A year after the final battle, she announces to the entire world the end of the war and her marriage to the Solar King.  Formerly dressed in black armor, Eskatia now walks the path of world peace while wearing a white veil.  However, her intent will be betrayed in twenty years.

Soul.Name: Incantation of Vengeance
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: number of cards in your Cemetery X10] to target disengaged unit. One friendly Lawtia unit gets AT+10 and and is Focused for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Fade Away
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Do [damage: AT X2] to a random enemy column in range. Rival Iczer gets LP-1. This unit gets HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Centaur Rage
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/a Closed friendly unit is on the field] Do [damage: AT X2] to two random enemy units in range. This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That was such a long struggle... Now I can finally rest.'
FlavorText.Text2: A general in Crest's army, and a remnant of the centaurs. Long ago, Elgandi attacked their village and slaughtered nearly all of them. Dical survived, and with a witch's incantation prolonging his life, he sought his revenge. When Elgandi vanished, the incantation begain to unravel, and Dical in turn quietly vanished from this world.

Soul.Name: Tail of the Chaos Dragon
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to one random enemy unit. Target enemy unit gets AT-20.

Skill0.Name: War Torn Heart
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets HP=0. Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill1.Name: Saved by Gladeel
Skill1.Comment: If this unit is at HP0 because of activating her Action skill, this unit gets HP=30, AT+10 and AGI+1 for this turn, and is disengaged.

FlavorText.Text1: 'â€¦Let's go on Gladeel, and get rid of the corruption that exists in the world.'
FlavorText.Text2: The dragon knight who working alongside Alphonce. She takes part in the battle with and helps secure victory against Annarose, who appears during the War of the Sun and Moon. After the war ended she and Alphonce left the battlefield and took to the sky. She never appeared on the stage of history again.

Soul.Name: Order of Imprisonment
Soul.Comment: You get SP+1. Neither Iczer can Set a LV1 card for 3 turns.

Skill0.Name: Deployment Orders
Skill0.Comment: Two friendly [subtype: Duchy of Crest] units get AGI+1 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Bitter Directive
Skill1.Comment: Send two random closed units directly to the cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A gruesome age has ended.  Now each nation must join hands and govern for the good of the world.'
FlavorText.Text2: A civil official who distinguished himself after the War of the Sun and Moon.  As a subordinate of Guard Captain Afeemina, he assertively established alliances with other nations to rally the Duchy of Crest when it was starting to collapse from within.

Skill0.Name: Tears of Blood
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: number of cards in your Cemetery X5] to two enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1:
-'No way!  I'mâ€¦invincible. Ahahahahah!'  
-'This will put an end to it all.'
FlavorText.Text2: Dilate's party's mission to rescue Miandela turned into a showdown with their fated enemy, Goddess of Darkness, Noze.  Noze possessed overwhelming power, but she wasn't unbeatable for Dilate's party, who had been through all kinds of hardships. And so, the vengeful attack of the swordswoman Cassandra made an end of it.

Soul.Name: Disable Attackers
Soul.Comment: All enemy units get AT-20 and AGI-2 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Impact Strike
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in range of LV 5 or lower. That unit is engaged.

Skill1.Name: Peak Conditioning
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/HP40 or higher] This unit gets AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Skilled Slash
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/AT 50 or higher] Do [damage: AT] to all engaged enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Our nation may be like falcon that lost its wings, but its talons are still as powerful as ever.'
FlavorText.Text2: A unit formed of handpicked knights of Crest. They work as bodyguards, and keep their faces and identities a mystery. Even internally, members refer to each other in code. Under the terms of peace, the Duchy of Crest could no longer maintain a strong standing army, but it compensated by allowing individual soldiers to perfect their skills.

Soul.Name: Extralegal Force
Soul.Comment: One disengaged enemy unit gets AT-20 for this turn. If that unit is at AT0, return it to the File and you get 2 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Shock Troop
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is in area [1-2-3]] This unit gets MAX HP-10 and AT+30.

Skill1.Name: Fighting Mad
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use HP 20 or lower] Do [damage: AT] to three random enemy units.

Skill2.Name: Afeemina's Design
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/AT100 or higher] Rival Iczer gets LP-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I won't show any mercy to corrupt people like you.  I'll tear you apart.'
FlavorText.Text2: A security force formed after the War of the Sun and Moon to pull the ruined Duchy of Crest back together. Afeemina designed them to be an extralegal force to deal with the unwanted individuals who gathered in Crest from all over the world after the war ended.

Soul.Name: Death Under the Moon
Soul.Comment: Increase your Lawtia level by 3.

Skill0.Name: Poison Wound
Skill0.Comment: Set a random enemy unit in range to HP=10 and Poison that unit until end of next turn. Poisoned units cannot regain HP by resting.

Skill1.Name: Finishing Touch
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/a friendly [subtype: assassin] is Open or Closed on the field. Do [Damage: 20] to target enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I call death itself from the shadows.'
FlavorText.Text2: Assassins don't disclose their true identities, even when they are working in tandem. They generally call each other by codenames, unaware of one another's actual names.  This assassin's codename is Lady, due to her movement-restricting clothing and how she conceals weapons.

Skill0.Name: Frenzy
Skill0.Comment: Choose two enemy units. They do [damage: their AT] to each other.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Wha!  â€¦How could this happen to me?'  'Hahahah!  I really am the strongestâ€¦!'
FlavorText.Text2: The infighting between Narevez and Gaiessoul, the Abyssal Forces' two mightiest soldiers, saw Gaiessoul losing the battle to Narevez's strength. However, the power of vindictiveness pushed Gaiessoul to bite out Narevez's windpipe. This battle between the two who both wanted the title of 'strongest' ended in their mutual deaths.

Soul.Name: Die Twice
Soul.Comment: Set a random disengaged enemy unit to HP=0. All units are Poisoned until the end of next turn. Poisoned units cannot regain HP by resting.

Skill0.Name: Poison Gas Spreads
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/MAX HP 100 or higher] Set all Poisoned enemies in range to HP=0. All enemies are Poisoned for 3 turns. This unit cannot Refresh this turn.

Skill1.Name: Refresh
Skill1.Comment: Send one [card:Knight of the Second Death] from your File to the Cemetery. And then, this unit gets MAX HP+20 and is fully healed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The scent of blood, anger with no outletâ€¦ Heh heh heh.  It could keep me entertained for eternity.'
FlavorText.Text2: A high-ranking knight from an obscure, little-known nation who died in the war, whose wicked intent made him become an undead. Being undead means having an 'incomplete death', and doesn't signify eternal existence. However, such a being is nearly immortal when it is cut off from the transmigration of souls.

Soul.Name: Tears of Hate
Soul.Comment: You get SP+1. Rival Iczer gets SP+2.

Skill0.Name: Refresh
Skill0.Comment: Send one [card: Noble Spectre] from your File to the Cemetery. Then, this unit recovers its HP and one enemy unit gets AT-10 and AGI-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hey, you lookâ€¦warm.  Could you warm me up?'
FlavorText.Text2: An aristocratic girl who died in an accident, and whose regret made her undead. After the War of the Sun and Moon, she followed the final order of Zugateroza, king of the Cursed Legions, and returned to the land of the dead. However, this land comes under the rule of True Immortal Durendal, becoming the enemy of all mankind.

Soul.Name: Spell of Second Birth
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit. Increase your Refess and Falkow levels by 1.

Skill0.Name: Call the Dead
Skill0.Comment: Return two random [subtype: Undead] cards from your Cemetery to your File.

Skill1.Name: Burn Her
Skill1.Comment: Send this unit directly to the Cemetery. Increase your Gowen LV by 2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Are you surprised by my magic, I wonder?'
FlavorText.Text2: A witch who researched sorcery for controlling spirits of the dead. Her spells give the dead the power they most enjoy. Humans such as her, who sided with the dead, could also be found within the offensive against all mankind, begun by Durendal after the conclusion of the War of the Sun and Moon.

Soul.Name: Fighting Skill of the East
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit. Increase your Refess and Gowen levels by 1.

Skill0.Name: Sprinting Strike
Skill0.Comment: When this unit uses the Move action, it is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Secret Skill: Snake Strike
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] This unit gets RNG+1. Do [damage: AT X2] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill2.Name: Clever Technique
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/AT50 or higher] This unit cannot be affected or selected by other cards' effects that include engaging until end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Looks like all you've learned how to do is fence. There's no way you'll keep up with my sword skills.'
FlavorText.Text2: After the War of the Sun and Moon, the Duchy of Crest made proactive attempts to adopt cultural aspects of other nations.  This had an influence on the military, and sword fighters who had learned the supremely clever techniques of the Far East were also recruited.

Soul.Name: Swords of the Raven
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Duchy of Crest] units get AT+20 and AGI+1. Return a [subtype: Duchy of Crest] card from your Cemetery to your file.

Skill0.Name: Sword of the Vanguard
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+10 for every 3 [subtype: Duchy of Crest] cards in your File.

Skill1.Name: Crest Recruit
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AT50 or higher] You get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: We have the strength of wild warriors. Let's use it now, for the sake of this country!'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman recruited from a nomadic tribe near the Grand Surface. Her overwhelming physical abilities and dauntless loyalty to her comrades make for a new kind of soldier the Duchy of Crest aggressively sought to recruit.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: このユニットの[攻撃]は以下のスキルである。■[RNG内]の敵軍ユニットからランダムで2体選び[ダメージ：AT]する。

Soul.Name: Three Bullets, Single Hole
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] three times to one enemy unit.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets HP +20, AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Double Revolver
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units in range.

Skill1.Name: Arrival of the Princess
Skill1.Comment: Target friendly [subtype: Mercenary Nation] gets HP+10 and AT+10. And then, subtract 50% [select unit's AT] from the HP of a random column of enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The War of the Sun and Moon is over!  But we too still have a lot of work to do towards world peace!'
FlavorText.Text2: The woman known as Heierrat's 'Princess Without a King.' She is the symbol of the kingdom she and her fellows founded. They won the war against the Envoy of Chaos, in which people all over the world took part. Her kingdom raised its voices in delight, and at this point she could not imagine the crisis of destruction they'd face in twenty years...

Soul.Name: At the Last Moment
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random disengaged enemy units of HP 40 or lower.

Skill0.Name: Held Out
Skill0.Comment: Whenever you activate a [card: Song for a Hero], this unit is also effected.

Skill1.Name: Scream of Red Death
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/LP 6 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit. Decrease your Gowen LV by 1.

Skill2.Name: Nightsinger's Blessing
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] One enemy unit gets AGI-2 for this turn.

Skill3.Name: Crimson Death
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/LP4 or lower] Do [damage: AT] to three random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm no hero.  I'm just a guy who chased his dream.'
FlavorText.Text2: The one who defeated the Goddess of Darkness, Noze, and changed the course of the battle for the fate of the world. If Noze reached Elgandi, the battle would've been lost. In the legends he's called the Crimson Hero, but after the fight he disappears from the stage of history. It's said he lived out his days in peace, deep in the mountains with a girl he rescued.

Soul.Name: Still a Legend
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/rival Iczer has 3 or more SP] Do [damage: 40] to three random enemy units.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 7 or higher, this unit gets DF +05, RNG +3.

Skill0.Name: Magic Bullet Reload
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT X2 and also gets DF X2 and is Focused until the end of this turn.

Skill1.Name: Gun of Legends
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units. This unit gets DF=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Yuni, Fierte.  I'm sorry it looks like I ran awayâ€¦but now that I have this gun I have to be on my own.'
FlavorText.Text2: The man who raised Heierrat's Princess Yuni and Prime Minister Fierte. It's said he died fighting a bounty, but actually he was dragged into the intrigue surrounding a legendary gun. He had been living in the underworld, but when he heard the girls were involved in a war for the future of humanity, he challenged the Abyssal Forces himself.

Soul.Name: Cloak of Magic
Soul.Comment: One friendly unit is Revived or fully healed. Do [damage: that unit's DF X2] to two enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Charge Lumilarin's Drop
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT and DF +[the DF of target enemy unit.] That unit gets DF=0.

Skill1.Name: Defend the World
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/DF30 or higher] This unit gets AT+10 and DF=20.

Skill2.Name: Knight's Torn Heart
Skill2.Comment: This unit gets DF+10 and LV+1. Do [damage: AT+10] to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm sorry to leave without saying anythingâ€¦  But we can't afford to celebrate this victory.  There's someone who must be protectedâ€¦'
FlavorText.Text2: As one of the seven faerie heroines, Torte took part in the battle to protect the world alongside Emana, but it was so gruesome it tormented her. During the conflict, the faeries sensed an evil greater than Elgandi. Shortly after the battle, she slips away from her human friends in order to prepare for the true evil to come. And come it does, 20 years later...

Skill0.Name: Fire Demon's Blaze
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: their AT] to one enemy unit. Rival Iczer cannot Set a grimoire card next turn or the turn after.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Farewell, Iginaâ€¦  My goal's already been achieved.'
FlavorText.Text2: Vol Agni, who had sworn revenge against Annarose of the Triad of Chaos, finally managed to unleash the flame demon sealed within him, and used it to finish her off.  However, he senses the rampage the unleashed demon will proceed to engage in, and he takes his own life to prevent it.

Soul.Name: Knight's Offence
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 15] three times to two random enemy units.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AT +20, DF +5.

Skill0.Name: Defend the Princess
Skill0.Comment: Target friendly unit gets +5 DF for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Double Stab
Skill1.Comment: This unit is healed HP+ [DF of one friendly subtype: Mercenary Nation]. And then, do [damage: AT 50%] to two random enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hey you guys, don't lose focus just because we're at peace now!'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight affiliated with the Mercenary Kingdom.  The War of the Sun and Moon ends, and this kingdom that took part in it gains a large voice in world affairs.  Originally there was no concept there of a 'knight' of Heierrat, but it was decided after the war that such a position would be established.

Soul.Name: Defenders of Nations
Soul.Comment: Increase your Gowen level by 3.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, AGI +1.

Skill0.Name: Get Behind Me
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Rank Up] The unit directly behind this unit gets AT+10 and +1 AGI for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Flash of the Blade
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+1->20] to two random enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Our job is to maintain the peace through force of arms.'
FlavorText.Text2: After peace was announced, major disputes no longer broke out between the nations of Lavato. But the Cursed Legions, led by Durendal, appear as the enemy of all mankind. Heierrat fights the Cursed Legions on behalf of the nations impoverished by the war, and becomes renowned as the nation that defends nations.

Soul.Name: Three Angry Heads
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 10->100] to a number of enemy units between 1 and 3.

Skill0.Name: Triple Prey
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 20->60] to a number of enemy units between 1 and 3.

Skill1.Name: Three Head Strike
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 50%AT +0->100] to 1->3 random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ahh! What's going on here?  Three heads? No one ever said anything about three heads!'
FlavorText.Text2: A mutation of the Dragon Kin, the most powerful type of creatures on Lavato. It looks like it has three heads, but two of them have no minds of their own. They're like hands that move and prey upon enemies under direction of the center head. It lives in woodlands near a volcanoes, and the Dragons living in there seem to explain its origins.

Skill0.Name: Cry of Anger
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: number of closed friendly units X20] to two enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm going to take all the anger I feel inside out on you!'
FlavorText.Text2: Igina was fighting Annarose, but then was rescued by Vol Agni. Because this ultimately resulted in his death, Igina experienced deep regret and anger directed at herself. When Mordmarc appears before her at the moment of her despair, she kills him instantly with a single wrathful strike.

Soul.Name: Gaia Bullet
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: Gowen LV X10] to target enemy column.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, RNG +1.

Skill0.Name: Pinpoint
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: AT] to a target enemy unit within range.

Skill1.Name: Snipe
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+20] to one enemy character in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If you want to stir up chaos in the enemy ranks, sure enough, just attack their leader.'
FlavorText.Text2: A gunner affiliated with the Mercenary Kingdom.  After the war ends, the Mercenary Kingdom initiates the conflict against the Cursed Legions, who become the enemy of all mankind.  The Mercenary Kingdom boosts its military might even higher in the face of the overwhelming power of the dead.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: When this unit executes an attack action, do [damage: AT] twice to one random enemy unit in range.

Soul.Name: Star of Conviction
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit. Increase your Refess and Lawtia levels by 1.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 9 or higher, this unit gets HP +30, AGI +2.

Skill0.Name: Ronin Iaijutsu
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an attack action, do [damage: AT] twice to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill1.Name: Triple Charge
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: AT] three times to one random enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's a bad idea to pick a fight with me just because I look weak, kiddo.'
FlavorText.Text2: A lady swordfighter who's come from an island nation called the Far East. The 'iaijutsu' attack she unleashes while unsheathing her sword is formidable. Until now the Far East has been shrouded in mystery, but the activities of its forces during the War of the Sun and Moon has resulted in more of its swordsmen coming to the mainland.

Soul.Name: Ready for Combat
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. One friendly unit is Focused for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Magic Into Arms
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/LV 5 or lower]Send one Grimoire from your File to the Cemetery, and this unit gets LV+1, MAX HP+20, HP+20, AT+20 and AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ha-ha!  You're pretty brave to still attack even though I'm here.'
FlavorText.Text2: Mage swordsman is a title for a soldiers versed both in magic and swordplay, and who uses magic power to enhance their arms. She originally worked for a nation called the Wizard Kingdom, but it was destroyed in the war, so now she makes her living as a mercenary. She excels at summoning swords and armor via magic, and she's able to instantly augment her fighting strength.

Soul.Name: Flare
Soul.Comment: Choose one friendly unit. Do [damage: 50% that unit's HP] to all units. Set that unit to MAX HP=0.

Skill0.Name: Midair Explosion
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 20 directly from the HP of all enemy units.

Skill1.Name: Explode
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 999] to this unit. Subtract 10 directly from the HP of all enemy units, and they begin Burning.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That thing sure lives up to its name.'
FlavorText.Text2: A type of wyvern that lives in volcanic regions.  They fly high in the sky and set off a series of firey explosions, raining destruction far down below.

Skill0.Name: Dragon Fire
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: number of friendly subtype: dragon kin units X30] to one enemy unit for every friendly [subtype: dragon kin].

Skill1.Name: Burning Breath
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/no friendly [subtype: Dragon Kin] on the field] Subtract 50 directly from the HP of target Burning unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You get to see breath of flame.  Then once you see it, you die.'
FlavorText.Text2: The breath true Dragons emit is extremely hot, which makes it clearly visible, but humans who see it rarely get to discribe it's beauty, because they generally burn to death immediately.

Soul.Name: For the New Archive
Soul.Comment: Move all enemy units to random open Areas and Engage them.

Skill0.Name: Magic Seal Opened
Skill0.Comment: Send two Grimoires from your File to the Cemetery. And then, you get +1 SP at the beginning of next turn. You cannot set a Grimoire Card for 5 turns.

Skill1.Name: Princess Magic
Skill1.Comment: One friendly [subtype: Wizard Kingdom] unit gets AGI+1, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Archive Reborn
Skill2.Comment: Return one random Grimoire from your Cemetery to your File. This counts as a Grimoire activation.

Skill3.Name: Book of Record
Skill3.Comment: Return one random Falkow Grimoire of LV5 or lower from out of game to your File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I am... Ariete, princess of the Wizard Kingdom.  Let us make an effort toward an ongoing world peace.'
FlavorText.Text2: The new princess of Regus. She obtained a tome of seals called the Book of Record, which controls all magic, and now it's now the new Archive. She's awakened to her role as a princess, and she and her prime minister are now pouring all their energies into rebuilding the kingdom. She abandons her original name, and adopts a new name as its princess.

Soul.Name: Wrath of Noze
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Both Iczers LP=1] Send all cards in both Iczer's Files and Cemeteries out of game.

Skill0.Name: Rage of the Goddess
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random disengaged unit, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Chaos Displacement
Skill1.Comment: Return one random engaged unit to the card File.

Skill2.Name: Storm of Insanity
Skill2.Comment: Return one [card: Black Storm] that was removed from game to the card File. And then, you get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Okay, fine!  I'll show you what happens when I get serious!  So you better not expect to ever leave here alive!'
FlavorText.Text2: Noze absorbed Galdirea and become the goddess of darkness. She used her power to make servants to defeat the hero Dilate, but they were defeated and she was forced into a corner. Before she could reach her master Elgandi, she was stopped by the Crimson Hero and his companions. She was to be used by Elgandi as a device to manipulate fate.

Soul.Name: Flash Dodge
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to target enemy unit. One friendly unit cannot be hit by Attack actions for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Flash Sword
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AGI+ number of friendly [subtype: Wizard Kingdom] units for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Blinding Stab
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AGI X15] to one enemy column in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's not too late to recover. That's what makes us human. We'll make this a peaceful world, even if that idiot isn't around.'
FlavorText.Text2: A man who fought the Goddess of Darkness as Dilate's friend, rival, and ally. After the battle, he parts ways with Dilate, and devotes himself to restoring Regus. He used to dislike serving his kingdom, but after winning the war he decided willingly to use his powers for his native land. However, he meets with a tragic fate 20 years from now.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit of 30 HP or higher in range.

Soul.Name: Unlock the Paladin's Blade
Soul.Comment: Engage one disengaged unit. Return one random Grimoire Card that has been removed from the game to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Bandalt's Pacifism
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit of HP 30 or higher in range.

Skill1.Name: Storm Sword
Skill1.Comment: Do [Damage: AT+10] to target enemy unit. This counts as a grimoire activation.

Skill2.Name: Dance of the Butterfly
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: 50% AT+ number of Grimoires used X5] to all enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Let's watch over Bernet until she can stand on her own.'
FlavorText.Text2: Leader of the new Wizard Kingdom's knights. She assumes this office to watch over Bernet, who surmounted the collapse of Regus, became its princess, and changed her name. Of the paladins besides Mirelia and Ibert, Larut and Inzaghi died in battle, Durendal became the world's enemy, and Distrier embarked on a journey in pursuit of Durendal.

Skill0.Name: Black Storm
Skill0.Comment: Subtract number of Grimoires used X5 directly from the HP of all units, except the units in [area 5].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ahahahahah!  Just blow everything away!'
FlavorText.Text2: A storm of magic power evoked by the Goddess of Darkness, Noze.  Its area of effect drags in enemies and allies alike.  Even the one invoking this poer is not immune to its destructive effects.

Soul.Name: Bonds of Regus
Soul.Comment: Increase your Falkow level by 3.

Skill0.Name: Giant Illusion
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+30, DF+30 and RNG=0 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Pinpoint
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The Wizard Kingdom's knights, warriors, and whatnot still know all these spells.  That's not fair.'
FlavorText.Text2: A knight affiliated with the reborn Wizard Kingdom.  With her eye on rebuilding the kingdom, the Paladin Captain makes it possible for her knights to pursue a combination of swordplay and magic.

Soul.Name: Spell Seal
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AGI+1 for this turn. Rival iczer cannot set a Grimoire card for 3 turns.

Skill0.Name: Magic Empowering
Skill0.Comment: Two friendly [subtype: Wizard Kingdom] units get AT+ their AGI X5 for this turn. One friendly unit gets RNG+1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Magic Ray
Skill1.Comment: Choose one friendly [subtype: Wizard Kingdom] unit except this unit. Do [damage: that unit's RNG X10] to one enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My magic is something you'd better not take lightly.'
FlavorText.Text2: A wizard of the reborn Wizard Kingdom.  As the most trusted unit in Regus, they excel in techniques to support their sparse warrior units.  The Wizard Kingdom begins to rebuild in the name of its new princess, then plays an important role twenty years hence.

Soul.Name: Bane Breaker
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Return 2 Grimoire cards from your Cemetery to your Card file.

Skill0.Name: Sky Sword
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/AGI6 or higher] Do [damage: AT] to two enemy units.

Skill1.Name: Protective Cloak
Skill1.Comment: The unit directly behind this unit gets RNG+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You're going to learn that brazen attacks are meaningless against me.'
FlavorText.Text2: A soldier affiliated with the reborn Wizard Kingdom. Her unit is equipped with special magic-based attack and defense technology, and it's difficult to find flames aside from Dragon breath that can penetrate their magic cloaks. As Regus rebuilds, it takes to vigorously applying magical technology. This cloak goes on to see widespread use in fire prevention.

Skill0.Name: Sweet Dreams
Skill0.Comment: All friendly unis are engaged and can't be hit by Attack actions for this turn. You get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If it lasts forever, wouldn't you be happier with a fun dream than with a nightmare?  Well, the only reason I don't recommend nightmares is that they're easy to wake up from.'
FlavorText.Text2: Magic that uses an incantation technique for inducing an extended period of sleep.  It lengthens its time of effectiveness by relaxing the target's mental state.

Soul.Name: Aquamantic Displacement
Soul.Comment: Choose one open Area on the enemy field. Move target enemy unit into the chosen area. Engage that unit.

Skill0.Name: Aqua Magic
Skill0.Comment: One enemy unit gets AGI-1.

Skill1.Name: Mermaid Spear
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in range. This unit gets AGI+1 and RNG+1.

Skill2.Name: Defending New Regus
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/AGI 5 or higher] Two friendly [subtype: Wizard Kingdom] units are fully healed, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I have a place where I belong on the surface now, and I'm going to defend it.'
FlavorText.Text2: A former mermaid soldier who joined the Wizard Kingdom. After the War ends, Vonderam lifts the ban on cultural exchange between the mermaids and the surface. At first he declares the reason for this is to learn the intentions of humanity, but his real objective is revealed during the War of the Emperor of the Silver Sun.

Soul.Name: Night Over a Deep Sea
Soul.Comment: Neither Iczer can set a Grimoire card next turn.

Skill0.Name: Water Wings
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets AGI+1 and RNG+1.

Skill1.Name: Dive Below the Surface
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is in [area:7-8-9]] This unit cannot be hit by Attack actions for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Ocean Lunge
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT+30] to one random enemy in range. Move friendly units from [area: 1-2-3] to [area: 7-8-9], and from [area: 7-8-9] to [area: 1-2-3].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Just because you can see it doesn't mean you can beat it.  Your attacks aren't going to hit it, at any rateâ€¦'
FlavorText.Text2: A wyvern that lives in the sea.  It's active both in the sky and underwater, in that it hunts its prey beneath the waves, then flies through the air to search for new hunting grounds.

Soul.Name: Flying Teleport
Soul.Comment: Choose one open Area on the enemy field. Move target enemy unit into the chosen area. This skill is repeated a total of twice.

Skill0.Name: Teleport
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow LV 3 or higher] Choose one open Area on the enemy field. Move target enemy unit into the chosen area.

Skill1.Name: Teleport Evasion
Skill1.Comment: Choose one open Area on the your field. Move target friendly unit into the chosen area, except this unit. Return this unit to your File.

Skill2.Name: Incomplete Training
Skill2.Comment: Send this unit directly to the cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Okay then, the restoration of the Wizard Kingdom starts here.'
FlavorText.Text2: A survivor of the flying apprentices who fled outside the country when the Wizard Kingdom collapsed. She came back when she heard the call put out by the new princess and Mirelia. Back then she was an absentminded girl, but now she's reached the point where she can offer distinguished service as an airborne soldier.

Soul.Name: Invocations of the Church
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit. Increase your Lawtia and Falkow levels by 1.

Skill0.Name: Sunbeam Cage
Skill0.Comment: All non-Refess units get RNG=0 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Magic Bash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+ this unit's AGI X 5] and render engaged one random enemy unit within range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I bet you weren't expecting a combination of offensive attacks, holy invocations and magic spells, were you?'
FlavorText.Text2: A warrior who serves the reborn Wizard Kingdom.  Because the True God Church began also proselytizing in other nations after the War of the Sun and Moon, its adherents increased within the Wizard Kingdom, giving rise to warriors who study how to utilize both holy miracles and sorcery in battle.

Skill0.Name: Acid Rain
Skill0.Comment: Two enemy units get AT-20 and AGI=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That rain brings with it pain.'
FlavorText.Text2: A magic spell that creates highly acidic rain.  All equipment made of iron this rain falls on becomes useless.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: When this unit executes an attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy in range. If that unit is HP0 or below, remove it from the game.

Soul.Name: Whole New Game
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: SP X20] to one disengaged enemy unit. And then, both Iczers get SP=0.

Skill0.Name: I Break the Rules
Skill0.Comment: When this card is in the file, it cannot be Locked by other units' Open Skills.

Skill1.Name: Save Data Corrupted!
Skill1.Comment: When this unit executes an attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy in range. If that unit is HP0 or below, remove it from the game.

Skill2.Name: Extra Lives
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/LV5] This unit gets LV=9, MAX HP=50, HP=50, AT=30 and AGI=5.

Skill3.Name: Dual Wielding Awesome
Skill3.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units in range. Remove any units hit of HP0 or below from the game.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Game over for me, huhâ€¦?  â€¦Well, looks like I'm not going to die, I'll have extra lives in the next world.'
FlavorText.Text2: Elgandi is banished by the power of a being of light. What kinds of evil deeds will he commit in this world he's been banished to? His final words are 'Even with me gone, this world won't be at peace. In fact, you'd probably have been happier if I'd become your god. Not that you know what I mean... yet.' The meaning of this becomes clear 20 years later.

Soul.Name: Breaking Bad Luck
Soul.Comment: Engage one friendly disengaged unit, and then engage two enemy units. Rival Iczer gets 1 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Cause and Effect United
Skill0.Comment: Revive on random friendly unit that is both Lawtia and Falkow. And then, decrease your Falkow level by 2.

Skill1.Name: Causality Failure
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV 1 or higher] Reduce the sphere levels of both Iczers by 2.

Skill2.Name: Change Fate
Skill2.Comment: Engage one enemy unit AGI0 or lower until the end of next turn, and restore its AGI to base value.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This is the gate that takes you to the gods of the world.  â€¦Just one more step forward, and you can become a god.'
FlavorText.Text2: Fellana was abducted and taken to Elgandi when the Wizard Kingdom collapsed.  Together with Sumer, she opened the gate of causality for Elgandi.  Why she did this for him is unknown, but it seems something Sumer said to her had some influence.

Soul.Name: Portal Lockdown
Soul.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit. Rival Iczer gets SP-2.

Skill0.Name: Cause and Effect United
Skill0.Comment: Revive on random friendly unit that is both Lawtia and Falkow. And then, decrease your Falkow level by 2.

Skill1.Name: Body Double
Skill1.Comment: Two target enemy units get AT-20 for this turn and also AGI=0.

Skill2.Name: Portal Destruction
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV0] Set two random enemy units in range to HP=0. Increase your Lawtia LV by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Eeh-hehe, this is a crossroad of destinies.  Now, the rest is a race against time.'
FlavorText.Text2: Sumer was researching the laws of cause and effect under Elgandi. As Fellana cooperates with her in this, they succeed in opening the door to causuality. However, the Sumer who was helping Elgandi turned out to be a fake, a body double made by the real her.  She said to Fellana 'I'm waiting in the arms of fate', and then she vanished.

Soul.Name: Master Plan
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/rival Iczer has 7 or more SP] Rival Iczer gets SP=0.

Skill0.Name: Two-Sided Blessing
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units that are both Refess and Lawtia units are healed HP+20.

Skill1.Name: Ceremony
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. One friendly unit is healed HP+ this unit's AT.

Skill2.Name: Final Manipulation
Skill2.Comment: Two friendly [subtype: True God Church] units are healed 10 HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hmm, our god has at last descended. All that remains is to gather all the sacred treasures, and make divine power ours!'
FlavorText.Text2: Priests of the religion called the True God Church.  However, some of them had a hidden agenda in addition to providing people with tranquility and sufficiency. When the king of the Solar Kingdom awakened to true power, their ancient agenda was set in motion...

Soul.Name: Spear Form: Liberating Stance
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. friendly units cannot be affected or selected by other cards' effects that include engaging until end of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Warned by a Bird
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be affected or selected by other cards' effects that include engaging until end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Seisou's Barrier
Skill1.Comment: Neither Iczer can set a Grimoire Card next turn.

Skill2.Name: Spear Form: Star Strike
Skill2.Comment: Subtract AT+10 directly from the HP of a random enemy column in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Argh! How does anyone move in a costume like this?'
FlavorText.Text2: The Solar Kingdom hosted a huge celebration for the new year, including a number of physical contests and sports. Aria, a knight who was originally from the first Regus kingdom, was one of the ones chosen for the bull ride. Unfortunately, she was dressed in a new-year's outfit someone had given to her at the time.

Soul.Name: Penetrating Light Arrow
Soul.Comment: Subtract your Refess LV X10 from the HP of one random enemy column.

Skill0.Name: Nocked Arrow
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. This unit gets RNG-1 and AT-10.

Skill1.Name: Solar Pinpoint
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in range. This unit gets RNG-1.

Skill2.Name: Reload
Skill2.Comment: This unit gets RNG=3 and AT=40.

FlavorText.Text1: 'May this age of peace last forever!'
FlavorText.Text2: After the defeat of Elgandi, the Solar Kingdom threw a huge New Year's celebration. Those of their soldiers who originally came from the Far East put a lot of effort into organizing it, but all subjects of the kingdom participated. The archery division competed in several sports, including shooting targets from horseback.

Soul.Name: Swords of the Raven
Soul.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Duchy of Crest] units get AT+20 and AGI+1. Return a [subtype: Duchy of Crest] card from your Cemetery to your file.

Skill0.Name: Sword of the Vanguard
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+10 for every 3 [subtype: Duchy of Crest] cards in your File.

Skill1.Name: Crest Recruit
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AT50 or higher] You get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'To all kingdoms, Happy New Year!'
FlavorText.Text2: The New Year celebration held by the Solar Kingdom attracted many participants from other nations. From the Duchy of Crest the most likely to come where soldiers recruited from outside the regular army, like this former nomad turned Blitz Swordswoman.

Soul.Name: At the Last Moment
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random disengaged enemy units of HP 40 or lower.

Skill0.Name: Held Out
Skill0.Comment: Whenever you activate a [card: Song for a Hero], this unit is also effected.

Skill1.Name: Scream of Red Death
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/LP 6 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to one enemy unit. Decrease your Gowen LV by 1.

Skill2.Name: Nightsinger's Blessing
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] One enemy unit gets AGI-2 for this turn.

Skill3.Name: Crimson Death
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/LP4 or lower] Do [damage: AT] to three random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1:
'Things are looking up. What did yours say?'
'Um... Good luck, I think...'
FlavorText.Text2: Lost among the crowds at the New Year's celebration in Folrart was the one who defeated the Goddess of Darkness, Noze. He was just trying to fit in and live a normal life with the girl he rescued. Together, they participated in a festival event, where they were given fortunes for the upcoming year.

Soul.Name: Bound in Holy Chain
Soul.Comment: Two random enemy units get MAX HP-30.

Skill0.Name: Ready to Throw
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is in [area:5] This unit gets AT+40 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Holy Chain Sword
Skill1.Comment: Do HP-10 to the friendly unit in [area: 3], then do [damage: AT] to enemies in [area: 1-5-3]. Do HP-10 to the friendly unit in [area: 1]. This unit gets AT=0.

Skill2.Name: Holy Thrust
Skill2.Comment: Subtract 30 directly from the MAX HP of target enemy column in range. This unit is healed HP+20.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I prefer you not think of me as decoration. The truth is I'm pretty strong, you know?'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the fighters the True God Church keeps in in reserve for when they have to get serious. She's a swordswoman who wields the Holy Chain Sword, and she follows a path of purification. At the Holy Meteora convent, she was stuck in the shadow of a certain famous duo, but she's capable enough that she can take on entire enemy formations at once.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: [conditional use LV 3 or higher] Attack

Soul.Name: Encased in Stone
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to two random disengaged enemy units. And then, one friendly unit gets LV+2 and DF+5.

Skill0.Name: Rusted Solid
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot use Rest or Iczer Attack. This unit can do nothing but Stand Steadfast until it Breaks Free.

Skill1.Name: Break Free
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/0 copies of this unit in the File/unit has not Broken Free] This unit gets HP=30, AT=LVX10, AGI=3 and Breaks Free.

Skill2.Name: Stand Steadfast
Skill2.Comment: This unit gets LV+1.

Skill3.Name: Full Charge
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/LV 6 or higher] Do [damage: 50%AT] to two random enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A statue encased in stone from the distant past still stands in that mountain range.'
FlavorText.Text2: A giant statue embedded in a certain mountain range. It's said to be a weapon built by an ancient civilization, developed during the same period as the Duchy of Crest's XXXX. It's encased in stone, but what if the stone was smashed away?

Soul.Name: Touched by Madness
Soul.Comment: [Conditional use your SP=1]Rival Iczer gets two less sp at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Ritual Complete
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/focused] One random unit that is not [subtype: True God Church] gets RNG=0 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Study of Madness
Skill1.Comment: Two random units of RNG 0 gets MAX HP=0, and then this unit is fully healed. Change battletime to noon.

Skill2.Name: Evil One's Words
Skill2.Comment: This unit gets MAX HP=70 and is Focused until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hehehehe! This is it! I found it!'
FlavorText.Text2: A priestess who lost her mind when she came face to face with an evil force. Perhaps she was touched by the ultimate evil beyond Lavato itself. Now she desperately hunts through forbidden tomes, looking to learn about the evil god.

Soul.Name: Experiment Gone Wrong
Soul.Comment: One random enemy unit gets HP=0. Send one random Grimoire card from rival Iczer's Card File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Poison Spreads
Skill0.Comment: All Poisoned enemy units get HP-15. And then, Poison 3 random enemy units until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Poison Spell
Skill1.Comment: Poison 3 random enemy units until the end of next turn. Poisoned enemy units get HP-15. Poisoned units cannot recover HP by resting.

Skill2.Name: Envenomed Corpse
Skill2.Comment: One Poisoned unit in range gets HP=0. And then, Rival Iczer gets 1 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill3.Name: Final Experiment
Skill3.Comment: Target unit is poisoned until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Now, perhaps I'll also throw in an animal test subject.'
FlavorText.Text2: A test subject used by Annarose when she created the Augments. He's controlled by a special hypnotism spell, and follows Annarose's orders above all others.

Soul.Name: Recovery Spell
Soul.Comment: Revive one friendly unit. That unit gets AT+20, DF+5, AGI+1, and is ranked up.

Skill0.Name: True Potential
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+ [Gowen level X5] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Crippling Wave
Skill1.Comment: Subtract AT 50% directly from the HP of 2 random enemies in range. And then, engage those units until the end of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Magic Sword Charge
Skill2.Comment: Do [Damage: AT X2] to target enemy unit within range. If it is engaged, move it to a random open area on the field.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I swear we'll take back our home someday...'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman of the Wizard Kingdom, which lost its king to the schemes of Abyssal Strategist Galdirea and the betrayal of the paladin Durendal. She was quite a high level wizard soldier, freely using all types of magic and magic items to fight her enemies. Those from Regus now use their powers in different lands as they try to restore their kingdom.

Soul.Name: Holy Talisman
Soul.Comment: One random unit gets MAX HP-30.

Skill0.Name: Talisman Barrier
Skill0.Comment: The Refess unit in front of this unit cannot be affected or selected by other cards' effects that include engaging until end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Magic Absorb
Skill1.Comment: Unlock all non-Falkow grimoires in your File. And then, this unit gets AT+10 and is healed HP+10.

Skill2.Name: Talisman Seal
Skill2.Comment: One Grimoire Card in your File cannot be Set next turn. And then, a Grimoire Card in Rival's File cannot be Set next turn and do [damage: AT] to a random enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That talisman protects against all powers, and gives her the power to fight.'
FlavorText.Text2: A woman with a talisman possessing a special magic power.  It has the ability to seal off spells.

Soul.Name: Berserk Curse
Soul.Comment: Set one friendly unit's HP=0. And then, do [Damage: that unit's AT X2] to two random enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Cycle of Death
Skill0.Comment: One friendly [subtype: Undead] gets HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Cycle of Undeath
Skill1.Comment: If Cycle of Death triggered successfully, send one [subtype: Undead] from your Cemetery to your File, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Refresh
Skill2.Comment: Send [card: EX: Ancient Zombie Lord] from your Card File to the Cemetery and then, this unit fully recovers HP, and one enemy gets MAX HP-40.

Skill3.Name: Command Minions
Skill3.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Undead] units get AT+10, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'How long can a king keep the souls of his subjects?'
FlavorText.Text2: The founder of an ancient and glorious kingdom, reduced to an evil spirit.  He demanded his subjects be bound to him forever, and he holds their souls even now.  His only goal is to be revived in the modern world.

Soul.Name: Of Those With Souls
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 15 X number of Rival's Soul Cards triggered] to two random disengaged enemy units.

Skill0.Name: Hope Erodes Darkness
Skill0.Comment: Subtract number of cards in Rival Iczer's File directly from the HP of this unit.

Skill1.Name: Feast On Souls
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets AT+ [number of Rival's Soul Card's triggered X 10] and AGI= number of Rival's Soul Card's triggered] for this turn.

Skill2.Name: True Pain
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's the nightmare of all those with souls, and it lives out there.'
FlavorText.Text2: A monster living on the frontier. It's said that it can eat souls, and if this monster kills you, you depart for the world of the dead with the memory of the pain intact.

Soul.Name: Light Magic Heal
Soul.Comment: All friendly units are healed and get AGI+2 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Nock Arrow
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/RNG0] This unit gets RNG=4. Engage this unit.

Skill1.Name: Arrow Flash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy column in range. This unit gets RNG=0.

Skill2.Name: Healing Shot
Skill2.Comment: Target unit is healed HP+15, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Second wave of enemy troops in range. Fire!'
FlavorText.Text2: Elite magic archers fielded by the Kingdom of Folrart. Their magic arrows can wound the enemy or even heal allies.

Soul.Name: Ocean Shield
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. Two target friendly units cannot be hit by an attack action this turn.

Skill0.Name: Taking Human Form
Skill0.Comment: One friendly [subtype: Mermaid] gets AGI-1. And then, one enemy unit gets AGI-1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Red Sword
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/this unit cannot be hit by an Attack action] Do [damage: AT+10] to one random enemy unit in range. This unit gets HP=0.

Skill2.Name: Second Wind
Skill2.Comment: If this unit is at HP0 because of activating her Action skill, this unit gets HP=40, AGI=0 for this turn, is disengaged, and can be hit by Attack actions.

Skill3.Name: On the Attack
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/this unit is not immune to attack actions] This unit gets AT+10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Yeah! Now that mermaids are on the surface, there's no way we can lose!'
FlavorText.Text2: The mermaid fighters are masters of Lavato's seas. They're taking part in surface conflicts after being transformed into human forms by their lord, Vonderam. His orders are twofold. One is to defeat the evil manipulator Galdirea. The other is to locate their missing princess, Emana.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, look.  A bunny, how cute!'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect sets of Eggs to win prizes!
Make 1 set with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Shathia
Make 5 sets with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Renally
Make 10 sets with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal EX Marchare
You can only get each prize once.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, look.  A bunny, how cute!'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect sets of Eggs to win prizes!
Make 1 set with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Shathia
Make 5 sets with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Renally
Make 10 sets with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal EX Marchare
