You can only get each prize once.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, look.  A bunny, how cute!'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect sets of Eggs to win prizes!
Make 1 set with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Shathia
Make 5 sets with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Renally
Make 10 sets with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal EX Marchare
You can only get each prize once.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, look.  A bunny, how cute!'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect sets of Eggs to win prizes!
Make 1 set with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Shathia
Make 5 sets with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Renally
Make 10 sets with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal EX Marchare
You can only get each prize once.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, look.  A bunny, how cute!'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect sets of Eggs to win prizes!
Make 1 set with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Shathia
Make 5 sets with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal Renally
Make 10 sets with 5 different cards except the Evil Egg : One copy of Seasonal EX Marchare
You can only get each prize once.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh, look.  A bunny, how--arghahaghaaah!!!'
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect sets of Eggs to win prizes!
Get 5 Evil Egg cards : Receive an Easter avatar and 5 Point Cards
After receiving the avatar players will receive 1 point card per Evil Egg card, MAX 20.

IczerAttack.Name: Iczer Attack
IczerAttack.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer Attack, it costs 0 SP and the Rival Iczer gets LP-1.

Soul.Name: Figure in the Moon
Soul.Comment: Rival Iczer gets SP-2. Decrease your LP by 1.

Skill0.Name: Dance of the White Rabbit
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be affected, targeted, or randomly chosen by Soul Skills.

Skill1.Name: Cutting Wire
Skill1.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer Attack, it costs 0 SP.

Skill2.Name: Night of Mourning
Skill2.Comment: This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

Skill3.Name: Rabbit Hunt
Skill3.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Good morning... Ah! Wait, I'm not dressed...'
FlavorText.Text2: There was a time when Marchare lived in peace as the maid of a certain noble family. She always had trouble getting out of bed in the morning, being more of a night person. The other members of the household also used to say she's quite shy. When her creator was asked about this, she said 'It's the individual quirks that make my magic dolls so collectible!'

Skill0.Name: Haaaah!
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/???] Unknown effect. And then, return Fusion Dance / Verlaat and Fusion Dance / Alphonce to the File.

Skill1.Name: True Light
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/???] Remove one enemy unit from the game. And then, return Fusion Dance / Verlaat and Fusion Dance / Alphonce to the File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Fuuu-!'
FlavorText.Text2: It is said that during the battle against Elgandi, Verlaat and Alphonce fought side by side, and in the heat of battle, their power combined to form the being of light known as the One True God. But how, exactly, did the brothers  merge? Now, that secret is revealed...

Skill0.Name: Haaaah!
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/???] Unknown effect. And then, return Fusion Dance / Verlaat and Fusion Dance / Alphonce to the File.

Skill1.Name: True Light
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/???] Remove one enemy unit from the game. And then, return Fusion Dance / Verlaat and Fusion Dance / Alphonce to the File.

FlavorText.Text1: '-sion!'
FlavorText.Text2: It is said that during the battle against Elgandi, Verlaat and Alphonce fought side by side, and in the heat of battle, their power combined to form the being of light known as the One True God. But how, exactly, did the brothers  merge? Now, that secret is revealed...

Soul.Name: Engulfing Light
Soul.Comment: One friendly unit is revived or fully healed and gets MAX HP+30 and HP+30.

Skill0.Name: Inspired by Pain
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit gets HP-10 and also AT+10 for this turn, except this unit. This unit is healed HP+[that unit's LV X5].

Skill1.Name: Greater Dispel Evil
Skill1.Comment: One random enemy unit in range gets MAX HP=0. Set this unit's MAX HP=[that unit's original MAX HP].

FlavorText.Text1: 'I dedicate the blood that flows from my enemies to the Lord. My holy battle begins now!'
FlavorText.Text2: Raste evaded pursuers from the True God Church as he journeyed. While camping on a plain lined with stone monuments, church assassins finally got the better of him and inflicted mortal wounds. As Raste was dying, the monuments gave off a light that engulfed him. Then, he was gone. Days later, a broad-chested fighter called Raste appeared in battle.

Soul.Name: Regroup Order
Soul.Comment: Return two [subtype: Shrine Knight] cards from your Cemetery to the File. All friendly [subtype: Shrine Knights] get DF+10.

Skill0.Name: Captain Formation
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT+[5 X number of [subtype: Shrine Knights] in the Cemetery] for this turn. Return a [subtype: Shrine Knight] from the Cemetery to the File, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Cross Slash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to all enemy units in [area: 1-3-5-7-9].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Lapierre, Shathia, you two are so impatient!'
FlavorText.Text2: The leader of the third unit of Folrart's most famous knights, the Shrine Knights. She's very easygoing and is even pushed around by her subordinates. However, when a battle begins, she takes the field with the demeanor of a warlord. She keeps horrifying notes in a journal with 'My Secrets' on the cover.

Soul.Name: Veil of Rest
Soul.Comment: Return two random cards from your Cemetery to your Card File. Rival Iczer gets one less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Servant of the Grave
Skill0.Comment: Send 1 copy of [card: Gravekeeper / Cornelia] from your file to the cemetery. Then, all closed friendly units are revived and get HP=10.

Skill1.Name: Cemetery Scythe
Skill1.Comment: Subtract [number of units in both Iczers' Cemeteries X2] from the HP of a random enemy row in range. For each unit hit, send one card from Rival's Cemetery out of game.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Cleaning, laundry, cooking, hospitality, grave keeping. I perform them all flawlessly. I excel at grave keeping in particular.'
FlavorText.Text2: A maid-of-all-work who wanders Lavato. She completes all her work flawlessly, and alone. She's actually a Magic Doll made by the twisted witch Sumer for her own personal use. With Sumer gone, Cornelia searches for the meaning of her own existence. Sumer made her a grave keeper, but she has yet to meet a client with the grave keeping work she seeks.

Soul.Name: True Darkness
Soul.Comment: Rival Iczer gets SP-[0->1]. If Rival Iczer has 0SP they get 2 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Noze's Curse
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/a [subtype: magic doll] in your cemetery] One random enemy unit gets MAX HP=30, HP=30, AT=30, DF=0, AGI=2, and RNG=2.

Skill1.Name: Absorb Life
Skill1.Comment: One random [subtype: magic doll] from your cemetery is removed from the game. Then, two random units of HP 30 or lower get HP=0.

Skill2.Name: Darkness Undying
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/MAX HP 70 or lower] Send two [subtype: magic dolls] from your cemetery out of game, and this unit gets MAX HP+10 and is fully healed.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I am Noze, the malevolent god born to create the world Father desired. Humans...die as Father did! As my sister did! Ahahahaha!!'
FlavorText.Text2: Noze absorbed Galdirea after he was defeated by Dilate, and attained this new form. She's so evil, she's also known as the Goddess of Darkness. She destroys the awakened Esria, and spreads the curse created by Galdirea and cultivated by her around the world. The effects of her curse can now effect humans, and it begins to distort the world itself.

Soul.Name: Thorn Swarm
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to all units. You get 2 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Roots of Evil
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV1 or higher] This unit gets MAX HP+10 and HP+10.

Skill1.Name: Make My Garden Grow
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/MAX HP=40] Summon one random LV2 [subtype: monster] of AT0 from your File to the Field and give it MAX HP+10 and HP+10.

Skill2.Name: Poison Vines
Skill2.Comment: Subtract 50% of this unit's MAX HP from the HP of a random enemy. If it is Poisoned, it gets HP=0 and you get Lawtia LV-1. Engage this unit.

Skill3.Name: Dark Seedling
Skill3.Comment: Reduce your Lawtia LV by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Why, hello there. Is it snack time yet, I wonder? Oh, wait, maybe you'll do...'
FlavorText.Text2: The Mistress is said to live in the Secret Garden, hidden within Lavato's gigantic, untamed forests. She's highly intelligent, can even cast spells, and survives by eating humans who lose their way there. Various rumors abound regarding what she looks like, but the reason nobody knows for sure is that nobody has ever encountered her and lived to tell the tale.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: Triple Qi Strike
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to three random units who are not [subtype: martial artist].

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Bojutsu
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy row not in range. This skill is repeated a total of twice.

Skill1.Name: Qi Infusion
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemies in range. If a unit is of HP0 or below, all friendly [subtype: Martial Artists] get AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You must have challenged me because you think you can beat a girl...  You have a lot to learn.'
FlavorText.Text2: A martial artist from the mainland, not far from the Far East, who fights with an energy called qi and a two-handed staff. She's quite a formidable fighter, and at the moment nobody can withstand her.  She always speaks condescendingly and aggressively to men, but she has a weak spot when she is smitten.

Soul.Name: Sword Spell Feedback
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to one enemy unit. You get SP+1. This counts as a Grimoire activation.

Skill0.Name: Lorachia Unsheathed
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/RNG0] Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit. This unit gets RNG+1.

Skill1.Name: Lorachia: Comet Blade
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/RNG1] Do [damage: number of Grimoires used X10] to a random enemy column with at least one unit not in range. This unit gets RNG+1.

Skill2.Name: Lorachia: Meteor Strike
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/RNG2] Do [damage: number of Grimoires used X10] to one random enemy row in range. This unit gets RNG-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I am Ariande, successor to the Buzzfich family. Taste the sting of my sword, evil one!'
FlavorText.Text2: The seventh generation successor to the Buzzfich family, a noble family from the Wizard Kingdom. She wields the magic sword Lorachia, and can alter its length at will. She is famous for her thickheaded personality. Her colleague Swan Swordswoman Alna is also her rival, and they each come up with new techniques for using magic in combat.

Soul.Name: Into the Book
Soul.Comment: One unit gets LV=3 and is engaged.

Skill0.Name: Prologue
Skill0.Comment: A friendly unit of RNG1 or higher gets RNG-1, and a friendly unit gets RNG+1 and also AT+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Library Lock
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Grimoires used is 2 or higher] Rival Iczer cannot set a Grimoire card next turn. Reduce Grimoires used by 1.

Skill2.Name: Awakening Archive
Skill2.Comment: One friendly unit gets AGI+1. This skill counts as two Grimoire activations.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I will protect this book.  ...The new Archive.'
FlavorText.Text2: Bernet was just a girl who loved books. The musty old book she found one day in the Magic Library was an artifact. It dragged her into war, and she watched as her home was destroyed by a fiend and a magic doll. When she learned her book could determine the fate of the world to come, she chose to stop being a crybaby, and follow the path of a mage princess.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack and set battletime to noon.

Rest.Name: Rest
Rest.Comment: Rest and set battletime to night.

Soul.Name: Survival of Mankind
Soul.Comment: Return two random cards of LV5 or higher from your Cemetery to your File. You get SP+3.

Skill0.Name: The Emperor's Word
Skill0.Comment: If this unit Attacks, do [damage: AT] to a random enemy in range and set battletime to noon. When this unit Rests, heal 25%MAXHP and set battletime to night.

Skill1.Name: Fight the Night
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Revive one closed friendly and engage it.

Skill2.Name: Silver Sunblade Signika
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/battletime morning] Do [damage: AT] to target friendly . Subtract AT+20 from the MAX HP of target enemy.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Everlasting peace...  I'd become a demon king and a god of destruction, in order to create that.'
FlavorText.Text2: King of the Solar Kingdom, and the hero who ended the War of the Sun and Moon. Since then, he's been working toward peace for Lavato. He took the title 'Silver Sun Emperor,' and fought the enemy of all life, the Cursed Legions. His title means he will provide everlasting peace as an 'eternal sun.' But historians would say his intentions lay elsewhere.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to three random enemies in range. All units at HP0 or below get HP=10.

Soul.Name: Prayer of Truth
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one random enemy unit. Return three cards of LV3 or higher from the Cemetery to your File.

Skill0.Name: Prayer on his Lips
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to three random enemies in range. All units at HP0 or below get HP=10.

Skill1.Name: Pain of the Right Hand
Skill1.Comment: Subtract 10 directly from the HP of one enemy unit of HP10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I may have turned my back on your god, but I'm not alone.'
FlavorText.Text2: After the War of the Sun and Moon, the True God Church initiated an unprecidented religious suppression, and smaller religions were snuffed out. Many priests spoke out against this change to the order, but they were named traitors. Leicester is uniting those working to restore the Church. However, he's unaware of the depth of its darkness.

Soul.Name: Excessive Force
Soul.Comment: Three target enemy units get HP=10.

Skill0.Name: Captain's Block
Skill0.Comment: Heal the friendly units on the left and right of this unit HP+10. This unit gets AT+10 and DF+5 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Guard Slash
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+DF] to one random enemy row in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'All Guardian Knights!  Give everything you have for King Verlaat, the bringer of peace to this world!'
FlavorText.Text2: The new leader of the Folrart Guardians, the vanguard in the fight against the Cursed Legions. He was a rookie at the end of the War of the Sun and Moon. The purpose of the Guardians was to defend the capital, but with the provincial towns in trouble, Guardians have taken to the front, and the capital has been left to the Royal Guard.

Soul.Name: Double Divine Blades
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one enemy row. If two or more units are hit, you get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Sword of Fear
Skill0.Comment: If this unit is Focused, unlock Light of Nachtom. Remains after Revive. Focus this unit until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Demon Nightmare
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Subtract AT directly from the MAX HP of two random enemy units in range with an AT less then or equal to this unit's AT.

Skill2.Name: Light of Nachtom
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/unlocked] Do [damage: number of friendly units X30] to two random enemy rows. Lock Light of Natchem.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Those old creeps in the True God Church are pushing too hard, making too many waves. But then, that makes things interesting for us...'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordsman who joined the Royal Guard recently. He uses a mysterious sword--a memento of his father--and fights like a master. The truth is he's traveled the world since a young age with nothing but this sword, and knows many secret techniques. He seems to know more than he should, and the other Royal Knights are wary of him.

Skill0.Name: Divine Impact
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 10] to a random enemy that is LV 2 or lower. Then, you get SP+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Begone, you who menace the world.'
FlavorText.Text2: A technique used by the Psycho Soldiers, manmade Psychokinetic troops. It was part of the the curriculum co-authored by the True God Church and the Divine Power Institute. It delivers a shock wave at a target in visual range through a simple focusing of awareness. Its might increases in proportion to the user's powers of concentration.

Soul.Name: Missionary Work
Soul.Comment: Revive all closed units of LV3 or lower.

Skill0.Name: Broken Shield
Skill0.Comment: Send this unit directly to the Cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Commander Darias' orders are to protect our charge to the last man! Give it your all!'
FlavorText.Text2: A force newly expanded by Darias, leader of the Solar Kingdom's Guardian Knights. They are masters of utilizing the heaviest armors and shields, and are trained to protect all manner of important people and positions on the field of battle. Their impregnable defense has successfully saved countless lives.

Soul.Name: Stasis
Soul.Comment: One unit is engaged for 3 turns and gets DF=30.

Skill0.Name: Psycho Barrier
Skill0.Comment: Two friendly non-Character units get DF+10 for this turn, except this unit.

Skill1.Name: Psycho Shield
Skill1.Comment: One friendly unit gets DF+10.

Skill2.Name: Power Disrupted
Skill2.Comment: This unit gets DF=0 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If you want an endurance contest against my shield, I won't stop youâ€¦but it'll only wear you out.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the current Solar Kingdom's military divisions that uses Psychokinetics. They're a collaboration between the True God Church and the Divine Power Institute -- currently under the guidance of a strategist known as the Light of the Silver Sun. Psychokinetics is easy for war orphans to master. These soldiers generate an invisible wall that intercepts attacks.

Soul.Name: The Pride Sleeps
Soul.Comment: Engage all friendly units for this turn. All friendly units get DF+5 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Lion Strike
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy row in range. And then, do [damage: 50%AT] to all enemies of LV3 or lower not in range.

Skill1.Name: Pact Between Tribes
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/one or more friendly [subtype: Barbarians] that are not Refess are on the field.] This unit gets AT+10 and is healed 10 HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Lions are the noblest, and the most ferocious.'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the Barbarians, a mighty force in the deep south of the central continent, on which the Solar Kingdom and the Duchy of Crest are located to the north. The Barbarians are made up of tribes of subhumans -- half man and half beast. This tribe boasts huge physiques, and they handle large weapons with ease. They also act with dauntless courage at all times.

Skill0.Name: Forced Conversion
Skill0.Comment: One non-Refess unit gets AT-10, DF=0 and AGI-1. And then, you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You ask what separates gods and demons? That's simple. Ours is the one absolute god, and all the rest are demons.'
FlavorText.Text2: After the War of the Sun and Moon, the True God Church began proselytizing in the small nations under the protection of the Solar Kingdom. However, soon its proselytization activities came to border on invasion. As a result of this conversion, many relics and sacred places of precious cultural value were destroyed.

Soul.Name: Punishment of Light
Soul.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit. Reduce Rival Iczer's Lawtia LV by 2.

Skill0.Name: Last Rites
Skill0.Comment: Remove this unit from the game. Return two random Refess cards of level 6 or below from your Cemetery to your File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Even if the times have changed, and justice has been perverted, belief in the True God, at least, remains the same.'
FlavorText.Text2: A nun of the True God Church, who prays to the True God. After the War of the Sun and Moon ended, some of the church's clergy extended their influence akin to the aristocracy, thereby harassing their own adherents. Most of the nuns who wanted to help the needy were said to be troubled by such faithlessness.

Soul.Name: Knight's Order
Soul.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit. Increase your Refess LV by 1.

Skill0.Name: Sword of God
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+10] to one random enemy unit in range. Return one random non-character unit card from your Cemetery to your File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Perish in the name of the god of the True God Church, heathens!'
FlavorText.Text2: The True God Church began to maintain its own forces after the War of the Sun and Moon ended. It's said the knights of the church would follow the bands of priests who proselytized in neighboring countries, and carry out enlightenment campaigns.

Soul.Name: Time Dilation
Soul.Comment: You get 4 SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Call of the Sun
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Refess LV4 or higher] Summon one random LV4 Refess non-Character unit that is not multi-Sphere directly to one random open area.

Skill1.Name: Displacement
Skill1.Comment: Move a friendly unit to a random open area and engage it. Move a random enemy to a random open area.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I wonder if that attack will manage to hit me.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the current Solar Kingdom's military divisions, the Psycho Soldiers, who manipulate Psychokinetics. She developed her powers by following the Divine Power Institute's curriculum. Many things are unkown about Psychokinetics, but the powers acquired differs according to gender. Only women can learn to compress space for teleportation.

Skill0.Name: Light of the True God
Skill0.Comment: All units are fully healed. You get SP+3.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Lord, I thank thee for imparting power unto me.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the magic spells used by priests of the True God Church.  Its light gives vitality to those who believe in the True God.

Soul.Name: Secret of Crest
Soul.Comment: Send one random engaged enemy unit directly to the Cemetery. You get 2 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Bisecting Strike
Skill0.Comment: [Conditional use/Focus] Send one random enemy unit in range directly to the Cemetery.

Skill1.Name: Soul Draining Sword
Skill1.Comment: Set one friendly unit to HP=0, except this unit. And then, this unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Ready a top intelligence operative immediately! I believe in Princess Eskatia, but if this information is true...'
FlavorText.Text2: The current grand duke of Crest. He was Eskatia's spymaster. When she married into the Solar Kingdom, Eskatia recommended Myuland to replace her because of his grasp of politics. He's been dealing with restoration of order and information warfare with other nations. But when he learns via personal channels about a new threat, even he is surprised...

IczerAttack.Name: Iczer Attack
IczerAttack.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer Attack, reduce Rival Iczers LP by 2.

Soul.Name: Moon Strike
Soul.Comment: One enemy unit gets HP=20. Rival iczer gets 1 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Demon of the Battlefield
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Iczer Attack, reduce Rival Iczers LP by 2.

Skill1.Name: Flurry of Darkness
Skill1.Comment: Subtract AT+20 directly from the HP of one random enemy column.

Skill2.Name: The Duke's Command
Skill2.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Duchy of Crest] units get LV+1, AT+10, MAX HP+10 and are healed 20 HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Come, come, come, foolish pitiful puppets!  Let my attack send you straight to heaven!'
FlavorText.Text2: The present high commander of Crest's army, now that Dical is dead. Along with the position, he inherited Dical's alias, the Dark Centaur. He's on a friendly basis with Verlaat, with whom he fought in the War of the Sun and Moon. When Folrart entered into combat against the Cursed Legions, Grand Duke Myuland granted him permission to go with the reinforcements.

Soul.Name: Feel of Death
Soul.Comment: Both Iczers get SP+current SP at the beginning of next turn. Both Iczers get SP=0.

Skill0.Name: Eye of Death Opens
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets LV=[your Lawtia LV]. If LV=0, set target unit of LV3 or lower to HP=0 and increase Lawtia LV by 1.

Skill1.Name: Eye of Soul Closes
Skill1.Comment: Set three random units of a LV equal to this unit's LV to HP=0.

Skill2.Name: Refresh
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV1 or higher] Send [card: Keeper of Filth / Garyis] from the File to the Cemetery. Then, this unit is fully healed and reduce Lawtia LV by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hehehehâ€¦ So many soulsâ€¦'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the high-ranking dead called the Seven Leaders. Those who see her with the naked eye have their souls drawn out. She didn't participate in the War of the Sun and Moon, not because she disobeyed Zugateroza, but because she personally refused to work with the living. The number of soldiers who've lost their lives to her has climbed into the thousands.

Soul.Name: Unsuppressed Violence
Soul.Comment: Send one open or closed unit of LV3 or lower directly to the Cemetery. You get 2 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Eve of Battle
Skill0.Comment: Set one friendly unit to HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Fighting Instinct Overdrive
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets AT=[number of units hit by Eve of Battle X60] for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Fighting Instinct Overload
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/AT0] This unit gets HP=0.

Skill3.Name: Slash
Skill3.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random row of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Weak!  So friggin' weak!  Come on, isn't there anybody left since the War of the Sun and Moon who can give me a thrill!?'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of Lavato's rare Oni race. With an exceedingly violent personality, his favorite things are fighting, conflict, and war. When he learned a major war had broken out between the Solar Kingdom and the Cursed Legions, he initially fought as a mercenary against the Cursed Legions.

Skill0.Name: Vision of Horror
Skill0.Comment: Reduce rival iczer's sphere levels by 2. Reduce your sphere levels to 0.

Skill1.Name: Harnessing Terror
Skill1.Comment: [Conditional use: Vision of Horror reduced your spheres by 6 or more]:Send target unit of level 3 or lower directly to the cemetery.

FlavorText.Text1: 'There are things in this world you mustn't see. Gyah ha ha ha ha, but it's human nature to want to see them!' -- Nephtem
FlavorText.Text2: One of the black arts used by Nephtem, member of the Seven Lords. Once someone's attention is focused on the mouth on her hand, she searches their mind, then inserts an image of whatever it is they dread most. It doesn't take long for those ensnared by the spell to go irrivocably insane.

Soul.Name: Dignitaries Kidnapped
Soul.Comment: Return one disengaged character of AGI3 or higher to the File. And then, you get 2 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Assassin's Grave
Skill0.Comment: Send one [subtype: Duchy of Crest] card from your Cemetery out of game. And then, target enemy unit of HP30 or lower gets HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The Duchy of Crest once menaced the world, and those who think it's lost its power are fools. They've elected to work behind the scenes.'
FlavorText.Text2: An assassin from the Duchy of Crest's intelligence agency. Assassins trained by the agency killed many important people during the War of the Sun and Moon, plunging the world into chaos. Now they function as a secret police, protecting world peace by covertly disposing of individuals such as crime syndicate leaders and rabble rousers.

Soul.Name: Wall of Shadows
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get DF+ [number of cards in your cemetery X5] for this turn. All enemies get DF+ [number of cards in Rival cemetery X5] for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Call of the Moon
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV4 or higher] Summon one random LV4 Lawtia non-Character unit that is not multi-Sphere directly to one random open area.

Skill1.Name: Shadow Feedback
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Rival Iczer has 0 SP] This unit gets AT+20 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hmhmâ€¦ You're in for trouble if you don't take me seriously.'
FlavorText.Text2: A mage who uses spells with a shadow as a medium. She can change her own shadow into a living creature and make it fight, or contain her opponent by rendering his shadow immobile.

Soul.Name: Dread and Weakness
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to two random enemy units. Rival  Iczer gets SP-1.

Skill0.Name: Spear of Wounding
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV1 or higher] Subtract AT directly from the HP of an enemy in range. This unit gets AT+10. Decrease Lawtia LV by 1.

Skill1.Name: Abyssal Strike
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia LV2 or higher] Do [damage: AT] to two random enemies. They get MAX HP=current HP. Decrease your Lawtia LV by 2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If you hear a clip-clop sound, hide under some handy corpses and cover your mouth and nose.  If you don't, you'll end up like me...'
FlavorText.Text2: A dead knight who appears on the battlefield night after night. Riding a headless horse, he's been feared as a symbol of death since ancient times. When night falls, he appears at a specific point, heralded by the sound of hooves, then sets about taking the lives of any present, and vanishes into the darkness once every human is dead.

Skill0.Name: Neglected Soul
Skill0.Comment: Revive all closed units and give them HP=10 and AT=10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You don't need some lofty human soul to animate the dead. Dog, cat, chickenâ€¦ Toss in some easy-to-handle animal spirit.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the dark spells used by necromancers. It animates all dead bodies nearby by temporarily possessing them with wandering spirits.

Soul.Name: Raw Materials
Soul.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit. Increase your Lawtia LV by 1.

Skill0.Name: Measured Plan
Skill0.Comment: The unit directly in front of this unit gets AT+20, DF+10 and AGI+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The enemy's current battle power is 8,860, and ours is 9,001. The battle is balanced, Master, but we have a slight advantage.'
FlavorText.Text2: A doll in use all over the continent. She's a model made from plans left behind by the Magic Doll creator Sumer, who disappeared after the War of the Sun and Moon. She can analyze information at high speed, and performs well as a basic military adviser. Unfortunately she doesn't adapt, so if an opponent knows he's facing a doll, he can easily counter her.

Soul.Name: Curse Backfire
Soul.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit. Reduce Rival Iczer's Refess LV by 2.

Skill0.Name: Recover
Skill0.Comment: This unit is healed HP+20.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Death wasn't the end.'
FlavorText.Text2: A corpse animated by wicked magic from the land of death.  It can only understand simple orders, but it will never stop moving unless you destroy the entire body.

Soul.Name: Grudge Magic
Soul.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit. And then, reduce all of Rival's Sphere Levels by 1.

Skill0.Name: Screaming Curse
Skill0.Comment: Rival Iczer gets 2 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Toads are vindictive, and even death won't make them forget the one who wounded them.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the Barbarians, group of tribes of half men, half beasts living in the south. The term that best describes him is 'toad man'. His tribe is endowed with high intelligence and magic power, and they hate the humans who consider them ugly. It's also said that all who hear their dying croak are doomed to misfortune.

Skill0.Name: Dark Revelation
Skill0.Comment: One enemy unit gets MAX HP=current HP. Rival Iczer gets SP-1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'To us, the darkness is a friend, a teacher.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell for speaking the to ancient souls lurking in darkness. Further, it's a spell that Yudit, one of the Seven Lords of the Cursed Legions, devised before she became an undead. Before she was undead, she was a famous practitioner of black magic, and it's said that no one was her equal.

Soul.Name: Demon Seal
Soul.Comment: All disengaged friendly units get AT+20, DF+10, AGI+1 and are engaged.

Skill0.Name: Bless the Weak
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units of HP20 or lower get MAX HP+10, AT+10 and are healed 40HP.

Skill1.Name: Chosen One
Skill1.Comment: Send this unit to the Cemetery. One friendly unit gets MAX HP+10, HP+10, AT+10 and cannot be affected or selected by other cards' effects that include engaging for 3 turns.

FlavorText.Text1: 'A great crisis will befall the world.  Please lend me your power, for the protection of Lavato!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the seven Faerie Heroines, and the most noble of all faeries. She has the duty of conveying the words of the seven Faerie Sages to the rest of the heroines. A great war has been foretold since the ancient past, and now that the day has come, she's gone to find the one who will become the key to the prophecy and provide her wisdom.

Soul.Name: New Generation of Strength
Soul.Comment: Disengage all Engaged units. And then, you get SP+2.

Skill0.Name: Shield Coat, Protect!
Skill0.Comment: The units on the left and right of this unit cannot be hit by Attack actions for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Shield Coat, Return!
Skill1.Comment: One friendly unit gets AT+10 and also DF+10 for this turn.

Skill2.Name: Commander Down
Skill2.Comment: All friendly units can be hit by Attack Actions.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The Cursed Legions are ravaging Lavato, and our Mercenary Kingdom forces will also take part in the fight against them.'
FlavorText.Text2: The Mercenary Kingdom's #2 strategist. She's the top student of Fierte, known for being Yuni's close associate and the most taciturn and cynical person in Heierrat. She uses the protective cloak Calkul, which was given to her by Fierte. On Yuni's orders, she and the mercenaries provide reinforcements for the Solar Kingdom in their war against the Cursed Legions.

Soul.Name: Ultimate Sword Techniques
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get AT+50 and are Focused until the end of this turn.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AT +10, AGI +2.

Skill0.Name: Mizalio's Secret Strike
Skill0.Comment: When this unit executes an Attack action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy in range. If unit is HP0 or below, reduce Rival Iczer's LP by 1.

Skill1.Name: Impact Strike
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy unit in range of LV 5 or lower. That unit is engaged.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I wonder if a sword attack will work on an opponent who's already died once.  Oh well, guess I'll just cut them to pieces!'
FlavorText.Text2: A student of Mizalio, Yuni's frivolous associate. He's currently second in command of Heierrat's royal guard. However, he's even more happy-go-lucky than his teacher, and is often spotted playing around with his old buddies in the castle town. He uses his acrobat-like agility and ability to attack with the sword from any direction to his advantage in battle.

Soul.Name: The Predator Returns
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Power of Revenge
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Focus] Do [damage: 50%AT] to a random enemy row in range. This unit gets AT+10 for every unit of HP 0 or lower and AGI=4.

Skill1.Name: Double up
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit in range. Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy unit out of range. This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The Solar Kingdomâ€¦  The land governed by the Silver Sun Emperor. So, that's where I need to go to find my revenge.'
FlavorText.Text2: A famous wandering lady mercenary. She's also feared as the Red-haired Demon. The reason she became a mercenary is to get revenge on whoever killed her adoptive father. The big sword she carries is a memento of him. She heard a rumor that the man she seeks has appeared in the Solar Kingdom, and she sets out for the boarder.

Skill0.Name: Purging Flames
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one random enemy unit of HP1 or higher. If unit is HP0 or lower, repeat this effect. If it triggers 3 times, activate Raging Flames.

Skill1.Name: Raging Flames
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to one random enemy unit of HP1 or higher. If unit is HP0 or lower, repeat this effect. If it triggers 3 times, activate Scorching Flames.

Skill2.Name: Scorching Flames
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: 60] to one random enemy unit of HP1 or higher. If unit is HP0 or lower, repeat this effect.

FlavorText.Text1: Those flames that burned the army of the dead were just like the flames that once guarded the gates to their lands.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spell used by mages. It causes a large fire by focusing magical power.  The flames feed on the life of their target, spreading to one after the next.

Soul.Name: Decapitation
Soul.Comment: Send one disengaged unit of HP 0 or below directly to the Cemetery.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +10.

Skill0.Name: Long Sword Style
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Focused] Do [damage: 30] to a random enemy unit. If it has HP0 or lower, a friendly [subtype: Far East] is Focused and gets AT+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Deadly Resolve
Skill1.Comment: This unit is Focused.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Undead who lack the resolve to die, I'll show you the true power of resolve!'
FlavorText.Text2: Warriors dispatched from the heroic land of Nabari in the Far East. They wear eccentric armor and helmets, and fight with katanas--Far East swords. They don't falter at all in the face of strong enemies, and fell every foe in their path with a single stroke.

Soul.Name: Reload and Requip
Soul.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit. Increase your Gowen LV by 1.

Skill0.Name: Loose Cannon
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT X2] to one random enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It was developed by the Mercenary Nation since the War. It has the firepower of a gun, and the utility of a lance.'
FlavorText.Text2: A soldier who handles a gun lance, a new weapon developed in the Mercenary Kingdom since the War of the Sun and Moon. There was a range of trial and error leading up to its implementation as a weapon. It was eventually redeveloped as a gun, making the shaft a gun barrel.

Soul.Name: Executioner's Assistant
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to one enemy unit. Two friendly units get Rankup.

Skill0.Name: Assassination Art
Skill0.Comment: Set one random enemy unit of LV4 or 5 to HP=0. This unit gets HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Revival
Skill1.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

FlavorText.Text1: 'Cursed ones, I'll destroy your impurity with my sword!'
FlavorText.Text2: An assassin from the heroic land of Nabari in the Far East. Unique assassination arts are developed there, and assassin educational institutions are popular in some areas. The essence of Nabari assassination arts is the preparedness to sacrifice one's life for a great cause.

Skill0.Name: Ambush
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 100] to one random character.

FlavorText.Text1: 'That overly conspicuous armor was an ideal target for the mercenaries.'
FlavorText.Text2: A tactic used by the mercenaries of the Mercenary Kingdom. They use the terrain to hide themselves, and set a trap for their opponent.

Soul.Name: Evaporating Flame
Soul.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit. Reduce Rival Iczer's Falkow LV by 2.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 3 or higher, this unit gets nothing.

Skill0.Name: Laziness
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] This unit gets AT=20 and AGI=1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Requirements for being a great commander, #1: The charisma to get lazy goblins to work according to orders.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the Barbarians, tibes of half men, half beasts living in the south. Each tribe of the Barbarians falls within a system of ranking, and the Goblin Tribe is at the very bottom.  They are extremely numerous and are used for manual labor, but they also serve as soldiers. They're just not very smart, so they seldom follow their commander's orders.

Soul.Name: Burst
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 15] three times to one enemy unit. Send one random card of LV4 or higher from Rival's File to the Cemetery.

Skill0.Name: Strafe
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to one enemy unit in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Gehâ€¦!  I never thought there'd be this many undead!'
FlavorText.Text2: A Mercenary Nation soldier equipped with a new type of gun developed by the kingdom. The new gun can fire bullets rapidly, and it has the weakness of soon running out of ammo, but it packs more destructive power than a regular gun.

Soul.Name: Evasive Maneuvers
Soul.Comment: All enemy units get RNG=0 for this turn.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets HP +20.

Skill0.Name: Call of the Flame
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen LV4 or higher] Summon one random LV4 Gowen non-Character unit that is not multi-Sphere directly to one random open area.

FlavorText.Text1: 'We of Nabari are proud of this, the gadget soldier.  It'll prove much more useful than a human when it comes to guard duty.' -- Hou Sen
FlavorText.Text2: An artificial soldier developed by the heroic land of Nabari in the Far East. Those from Nabari call it a gadget soldier. It can only comprehend simple behavior, but it will faithfully carry out its orders until it ceases functioning, making it optimal for guard duty.

Skill0.Name: Belief in Victory
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units get AT=their HP this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Soldiers are only as strong as their commander's conviction.'
FlavorText.Text2: A battle cry uttered when mercenaries in an inferior position have a chance to counterattack. Many of the Mercenary Nation's mercenaries fought in the final showdown of the War of the Sun and Moon, and now no predicament will ever make them give up.

Soul.Name: Formula of Three
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 30] to one disengaged enemy unit. This effect is repeated a total of 3 times.

Skill0.Name: Insufficient Magic
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/SP0] Reduce your LP by 1.

Skill1.Name: Sword of Emptiness
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to two random enemy units in range and engage them.

Skill2.Name: Final Authority
Skill2.Comment: Engage all enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'â€¦Legionsâ€¦ â€¦Resurrectionâ€¦  â€¦Do-or-die resistance.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the paladins of the reborn Wizard Kingdom. For some reason he only speaks haltingly, and it's difficult for his men to comprehend his orders. The Solar Kingdom and the Cursed Legions started the war, but he perceived a suspicious atmosphere and ordered his own men to prepare for combat.

Soul.Name: Detective's Name Revealed
Soul.Comment: You get SP+[number of engaged units].

Skill0.Name: He's the Criminal
Skill0.Comment: Engage one disengaged character of LV4 or higher.

Skill1.Name: Mystery Solved Already
Skill1.Comment: You get SP+[number of engaged units], max 5.

FlavorText.Text1: 'This stuff's only 20% cacao... Anyway, a spell locking the door in exactly five seconds doesn't make a room inaccessible!'
FlavorText.Text2: A mage who does detective work in Regus. From the whereabouts of a lost keepsake to the secrets of True God Church cardinals, if you can pay his fee, he'll solve the case. However, he often demands rare candy that money can't buy. Usually he takes it easy, but when he takes on a job from a certain girl, he ends up challenging the mystery of this world.

Soul.Name: Illusory Rainbow
Soul.Comment: Engage all units. You get LP-1.

Skill0.Name: Dragon's Oracle
Skill0.Comment: Move all enemy units to random open areas.

Skill1.Name: Revelation of Fate
Skill1.Comment: Return one random unit in [area:7-8-9] on either side of the field to its card File, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Such strange beings exist in the world. Nereis, it seems there are still things even I don't know.' -- Ariete
FlavorText.Text2: A dragon said to appear before the wise and predict future events, prior to great upheavals affecting all of Lavato. Legends say it takes a different form each time it appears, but its scales are rainbow-colored in every form, so it's called the Rainbow Dragon. It appeared before Princess Ariete of Regus, and informed her of the impending outbreak of a great war.

Soul.Name: Lightning Combo
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to two engaged units.

Skill0.Name: Opening Gambit
Skill0.Comment: One unit of LV 3 or lower gets RNG-1 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Clumsy Maneuver
Skill1.Comment: Two units of LV 6 or lower get LV=3. Return this unit to your File.

Skill2.Name: Simple Plan
Skill2.Comment: One unit gets LV+1

FlavorText.Text1: 'Augh, I got here late!  I have to hurry and deliver this to the Mistress!'
FlavorText.Text2: A girl born in the new Wizard Kingdom. She's studying to become a strategist under Rozari, who survived the War of the Sun and Moon. Lamia was a student at the Wizard's Academy, and a dunce who always messed up the chants. Invited to be a guest lecturer, Rozari perceived her potential, and persuaded her parents to let her become an apprentice.

Skill0.Name: Strategist's Intuition
Skill0.Comment: All units get AGI=[6-their AGI] for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Vordore, genius strategist of Regus, used his cleverness to save the his forces from crushing defeat multiple times.'
FlavorText.Text2: A stratagem thought up on the spur of the moment by a legendary strategist. In an even battle, the advantage is known to shift completely thanks to a strategist's wits.

Soul.Name: Circular Tactics
Soul.Comment: Return three random [subtype: Wizard Kingdom] cards from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Call of the Formless
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow LV4 or higher] Summon one random LV4 Falkow non-Character unit that is not multi-Sphere directly to one random open area.

Skill1.Name: Knack for Analysis
Skill1.Comment: One unit gets AGI+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'â€¦I am reading.  Would you mind keeping the noise down?'
FlavorText.Text2: A boy who goes to the wizard's academy. He loves books, and can memorize any strategy about which he reads. The historic strategies he finds especially helpful are those written by Vordore, the genius strategist of the Wizard Kingdom during the era of the War of the Sun and Moon. The books he left behind have become the foundation of strategy instruction.

Soul.Name: Tattoo of Sealing
Soul.Comment: Rival Iczer cannot set a card of LV2 or lower next turn or the turn after.

Skill0.Name: Curse Released
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Grimoire activations 1 or higher]This unit gets AT+10 and AGI+1. Decrease number of Grimoires used by 2.

Skill1.Name: Penetrating Rune
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/AGI5 or higher] Subtract AT directly from the HP of one random enemy in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'll give you a look at the power hidden within my body!'
FlavorText.Text2: A swordswoman who's mastered enchanting spells. Originally it was an magic form for injecting magic power into the runes etched into weapons, but this swordswoman applies the enchanted seals to her own body, enhancing her physical abilities. However, this usage can't be described as practical, since severe pain accompanies the unleashing of the seals.

Soul.Name: War of Attrition
Soul.Comment: All units get RNG=1. All units in [area:1-2-3] get DF+10 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Fierce Instinct
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Gowen LV1 or higher] This unit gets DF=5 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Pact Between Tribes
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/one or more friendly [subtype: Barbarians] that are not mono-Falkow are on the field.] This unit gets AT+5 and is healed 15 HP.

Skill2.Name: Lancer
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to a column of enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Knights from the south don't know about reason, because there's no reason down south to begin with.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the Barbarians, a confederation of tribes from the south made up of races of half men, half beasts. The term that best describes this one is 'crocodile man'. He's called a 'knight of the south.' His tough scales and jaws, enormous tail, and skillful use of spear and shield give him a fighting strength not far removed from that of a fully armed knight.

Skill0.Name: Compass of Deception
Skill0.Comment: Move all enemy units to random open areas and engage them.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Just like making a sword out a pen, it's a simple thing for a skilled mage to mislead people with a compass.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the spells used by Regus mages. It makes its targets move in the wrong direction. As the name literally suggests, this magic uses an enchanted compass. Hardly limited to this spell, there are many magic spells that use special devices, and mages store a range of implements inside their clothes.

Soul.Name: Extingishing Flood
Soul.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit. Reduce Rival Iczer's Gowen LV by 2.

Skill0.Name: Everyone, let's go!
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+ AGI X5] to two random enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Not a single child in the Wizard Kingdom is bored. Because once you go outside, there are plenty of friends flying around in the sky.'
FlavorText.Text2: A variety of Wizard Kingdom beast master. She can control birds. There are many falconers who call their birds by name once they've worked together long enough to develop mutual trust. For some reason the most common name is 'Ibert,' who's one of the paladins. The reasons given for this are 'Because it's cool.' and 'It's easy to call out.'

Soul.Name: Mana Pulse
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: number of Grimoires used X5] to one enemy column.

Skill0.Name: Reconnaissance
Skill0.Comment: You get SP+1 at the beginning of next turn. This skill counts as a Grimoire activation.

Skill1.Name: Decoy
Skill1.Comment: Target unit gets LV+2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The mechanical bat is the first mech soldier manufactured in Regus. Subsequent work was based on the bat's mechanisms.'
FlavorText.Text2: A mech soldier developed specifically by the Wizard Kingdom. The mech soldiers excavated since the final days of the War of the Sun and Moon brought about a technological revolution in Regus, and after twenty years of research, the Kingdom finally succeeded in developing its own. This is the first of them developed, but its functionality is high.

Soul.Name: Air Bind
Soul.Comment: Engage one disengaged enemy unit. Increase your Falkow LV by 1.

Skill0.Name: Sylph's Blessing
Skill0.Comment: Choose one unit. And then, swap that unit's AGI with the AGI of target unit for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Wind Infusion
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one enemy unit in range and give it AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'For me, the wind is near and dear to my heart.'
FlavorText.Text2: A spirit summoner of the Wizard Kingdom. To summon sylphs, the contract holder creates a special magic symbol. Those with limited experience can only summon using pre-prepared symbols on the floor, but with ample experience, it becomes possible for a caster to draw the symbol in midair quickly enough to summon during combat.

Skill0.Name: Magician's Utopia
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow LV3 or higher] Rival Iczer gets SP+current SP at the beginning of next turn. Rival Iczer gets SP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Magician's Utopia, huh?' murmured her partner, watching nearby. 'You could say it makes everything more favorable.'
FlavorText.Text2: A type of spell used by mages. It brings forth a magic fog that supports them while chanting incantations. Its name comes from a legend of an ancient Lavato empire where magic fog constantly hung in the air, and where the magic arts were developed.

Soul.Name: Fire from Below
Soul.Comment: Subtract 30 from the HP of one disengaged enemy unit. If that unit is HP0 or lower, one random enemy unit of HP1 or higher gets HP=0.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 5 or higher, this unit gets HP +10, AT +10.

Skill0.Name: Dispelling Flame
Skill0.Comment: Two enemy units get HP-10, begin Burning, and have their AT, DF and AGI returned to base values.

Skill1.Name: Flame of Torture
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage: this unit's MAX HP] to two random enemy units of AT 60 or higher.

Skill2.Name: Flame of Truth
Skill2.Comment: This unit gets AT+10. Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy in range. Do [damage: 1->100] to that unit. If it is Burning, do [damage: 1->100] to that unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I'm the incarnation of savage flame! And I'm the one who should become the god who burns down this entire world!'
FlavorText.Text2: A man called the 'fire storm', who can manipulate flames. Since the War of the Sun and Moon, he'd been after revenge on the mercenary who killed his family. He realized his own cursed fate upon achieving it, and descended into darkness. He made a contract with an evil flame demon, and lost himself to its power. He was last spotted in the Solar Kingdom.

Soul.Name: Mark of Heaven
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 50] to one random disengaged enemy unit. And then, Rival Iczer gets SP-1.

Skill0.Name: Soul Drain Strike
Skill0.Comment: When this unit exectues an Attack Action, do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range, then Rival Iczer gets SP-1.

Skill1.Name: Essense Absorbption
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets AT=50. Do [damage: AT] to a random enemy in range. If that unit is poisoned, Rival Iczer gets SP-1. Poison that unit for 3 turns.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Uhahahaha! I know you all just went to the trouble of returning, but I'm going to send you back to the netherworld!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the four generals of Nabari. Nabari is actually a group that consolidated the Far East archipelago via military might after the War of the Sun and Moon. She was sent to help the Solar Kingdom fight the undead. She's a master of the Far East sword style Aiki, as well as magic based on amulets. She's said to be older than she appears, but the truth is unknown.

Soul.Name: Weaving Nightmares
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 80] to two random units of LV4 or higher.

Skill0.Name: Curse on the Humans
Skill0.Comment: Subtract 30 from the HP of all [subtype: Solar Kingdom, Duchy of Crest, Mercenary Nation, Wizard Kingdom] units.

Skill1.Name: Soul Desecration
Skill1.Comment: Revive one closed enemy unit. Set one enemy unit to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'The moon is lovely this evening. Gyah hahaha, I'm Nephtem of the Seven Lords! Utter screams befitting this moon!'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the high-ranking dead spirits calling themselves the Seven Lords. She swore obedience to True Immortal Durendal, became a commander of the Cursed Legions, and launched an undead invasion of Lavato. Apparently Durendal has informed her of a secret plan, but the particulars are unknown.

Soul.Name: Telekinetic Animation
Soul.Comment: Revive one random unit of level 3 or lower.

Skill0.Name: Personal Prayer
Skill0.Comment: Disengage one friendly unit. And then, engage one enemy unit.

Skill1.Name: True Miracle
Skill1.Comment: All friendly units of AGI3 get AT+10 and AGI+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Heeheeheeâ€¦ Oh heavens, no. Gods outside the True God Church can be nothing other than heresy!'
FlavorText.Text2: A man who calls himself the True God Church's great missionary. He led priests and knights to neighboring nations, proselytizing by force. He constantly looks down upon those of low social status despite his own lack of importance. Nevertheless, he has powers like the Psycho Soldiers, and can read the thoughts of others.

Soul.Name: Suffering Offensive
Soul.Comment: One friendly unit gets HP=0. And then, subtract 40 directly from the HP of all enemy units of that unit's LV.

Skill0.Name: Pyrokinesis
Skill0.Comment: One Burning unit gets HP-30. Repeat until that unit is at HP 0 or below, or after four iterations.

Skill1.Name: Indiscriminate Fire
Skill1.Comment: Subtract [LV X5] directly from the HP of three random units, except [card: Folrart Pyrokinetc]. All units hit begin Burning.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Isn't it like a dream to just say 'Burn', and make everything catch fire?'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the new Psycho Soldiers, who wield Psychokinetics. Like the others, he was produced by the Divine Power Institute. He has the power to manipulate friction, and can set fire to an object at will. The True God Church declares that there's no direct link between Psycho Soldiers and loss of emotion, although many of them seem heartless.

Soul.Name: Magic Infusion
Soul.Comment: All units of LV 2 or lower get MAXHP+10, 10HP, AT+10 and AGI+2.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 3 or higher, this unit gets nothing.

Skill0.Name: Wolf Totem
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Rank up] All friendly [subtype: Barbarians] get AT+10 for this turn and heal 5HP, except this unit. Then, do [damage: 10] to target unit.

Skill1.Name: Laziness
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] This unit gets AT=20 and AGI=2.

Skill2.Name: Hedge Magic
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/all spheres LV2 or higher] Engage two random enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Even mobs have their leaders.'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the Barbarians, a confederation of tribes made up of races of half men, half beasts living in the south. Each tribe of the Barbarians falls within a system of ranking, and the Goblin Tribe is at the very bottom. However, some of the Goblin Tribe can use hedge magic. Their intelligence is high, and they unify the Goblins as leaders of sorts.

Soul.Name: Blue Green Mystery
Soul.Comment: Engage all engaged units until the end of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Aquamarine Light
Skill0.Comment: All units cannot be affected or selected by other cards' effects that include engaging until the end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Luster of the Stone
Skill1.Comment: All friendlies of AGI 4 or higher are healed 20HP.

FlavorText.Text1: 'They're quick, but not only do their gems sell for a lot, so do their pelts.'
FlavorText.Text2: A gem beast with a light blue stone in its forehead. They live in packs, in thickets near swampy areas. Their pelts and gems go for lots of money, so their numbers have fallen remarkably due to over-hunting. But even so, you can still catch sight Aquamarine Carbuncles living near swamplands, away from human habitations.

Soul.Name: Time to Hunt
Soul.Comment: All friendlies get AT+20 and are Focused until the end of this turn.

Skill0.Name: Spit Fire
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to target enemy.

Skill1.Name: Pact Between Tribes
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/one or more friendly [subtype: Barbarians] that are not Falkow or Gowen are on the field.] This unit gets AT+10.

Skill2.Name: Double Attack
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT 50%] to 2 random enemies in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'In the south, there's danger lurking just below the river's surface.'
FlavorText.Text2: One of the Barbarians, a confederation of tribes made up of races of half men, half beasts living in the south. The term that best describes this one is 'fish man'. He lurks in the water, then leaps at his enemies. Also, he attacks by spitting burning saliva from his mouth. In the south, he's known and feared as the 'underwater hunter'.

FlavorText.Text1: Sakura, or cherry blossoms, are the symbol of Spring in the Far East. Collect them to earn prizes!
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect Sakura to win prizes!
1 Set - Spring Guardian and Spring Girl Specter
5 Sets - Holy Mother of Blood Velvet
10 Sets - Spring Cursed Siren Metia
20 Sets - 1 Year of Premium

FlavorText.Text1: Sakura, or cherry blossoms, are the symbol of Spring in the Far East. Collect them to earn prizes!
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect Sakura to win prizes!
1 Set - Spring Guardian and Spring Girl Specter
5 Sets - Holy Mother of Blood Velvet
10 Sets - Spring Cursed Siren Metia
20 Sets - 1 Year of Premium

FlavorText.Text1: Sakura, or cherry blossoms, are the symbol of Spring in the Far East. Okay, so there is no blue sakura in the real world. This is Lavato!
FlavorText.Text2:
Collect Sakura to win prizes!
1 Set - Spring Guardian and Spring Girl Specter
5 Sets - Holy Mother of Blood Velvet
10 Sets - Spring Cursed Siren Metia
20 Sets - 1 Year of Premium

FlavorText.Text1: Sakura, or cherry blossoms, are the symbol of Spring in the Far East. The Golden Sakura is a legendary symbol of good luck.
FlavorText.Text2: If you find 5 or more Golden Sakura, all your Golden Sakuras will become Point Cards at the end of the event, max 20.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: Attack action for all Martial Artists to work with EX: Disda's action skill.

Soul.Name: You Gotta Have Guts
Soul.Comment: All friendly units get MAX HP+10 and fully recover their HP. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Olvaus Double Headlock!!!
Skill0.Comment: One random unit lvl 5 or higher except this unit gets AT-5 and is Called Out until end of next turn. One enemy in range gets AT-5 and is Called Out until end of next turn. This unit is Focused until end of next turn.

Skill1.Name: Olvaus Double Pile Driver!!!
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/Focus] Set two units that have been Called Out to HP=0.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oryaaa! Check out my new technique! Olvaus Diver!'
FlavorText.Text2: Raging Brawler Olvaus often spends the summer training in the Komori mountains, where huge fish and animals are said to live. For ease of training in the water, he sports a summer loincloth and seems to be attracting a lot of attention. 'It's probably because of my new fighting technique!' he thinks.

Soul.Name: Devouring Curse
Soul.Comment: Subtract 40 directly from the HP of one enemy unit. If that unit is at HP -10 or below, Rival Iczer gets 1 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Carrier Infestation
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/Falkow LV 5 or higher] Target unit gets LV-1.

Skill1.Name: Young Cannibal
Skill1.Comment: Remove one Character card in your cemetery from the game. And then, all friendly [subtype: Deep Ones] get MAX HP+10 and HP+10.

Skill2.Name: Corrupt Chi Flow
Skill2.Comment: Remove one Character card in Rival Iczer's cemetery from the game. And then, This unit gets AT+20 and AGI+1 for this turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'I didn't want to meet you like this, big brother. But I've gotten very strong.'
FlavorText.Text2: If any of the final-round fighters in the Wizard Kingdom Magic Martial Arts Tournament are women, they are given the title 'Magician of Flowers.' A young Sorcerer Monk, Ebreenu, was doing well thanks to her life-energy channeling skills. But her last opponent, Urgrant, was able to nullify the technique. Ebreenu's true love is her flower garden. In the summer, she grows sunflowers.

Soul.Name: Shard of Lava
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: your Gowen lvl X 10] to a random, disengaged enemy unit. Subtract [10+ your Lawtia lvl X 5] from the HP of target enemy unit.

Skill0.Name: Polished by Fire
Skill0.Comment: This unit gets AT +[your Gowen level X10] for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Molten Glass Breath
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to three random enemy units in range.

Skill2.Name: Smoking Mirror
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/Lawtia level 5 or higher] Do [damage: your Lawtia level X5] to 3 random enemy units. Decrease your Lawtia level by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'His scales are as sharp as his claws, he'll cut you apart as he burns you alive!'
FlavorText.Text2: A dragon from the lava fields that grew so strong, other dragons consider him a king. His scales are obsidian, with sharp edges and a mirror shine. His breath is a fountain of liquid glass. Tezcatli has been known to appear before great warriors as they travel alone at night and challenge them, but his true purpose is mysterious. <Kickstarter Exclusive>

Soul.Name: Dusk Grab
Soul.Comment: Subtract 40 from the HP of target, disengaged enemy unit. If that unit's HP is below 0, rival iczer gets SP-1.

Skill0.Name: Shadow Hand
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT+20] to a random enemy in range. If that unit is below 0HP, then rival iczer gets SP-1.

Skill1.Name: Dark Cursed Treasure
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/battletime night] Rival Iczer gets SP-1. And then, you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's been a lovely evening, but I'm afraid I must be off.'
FlavorText.Text2: A legendary phantom thief and longtime rival of the Red Mantle, Defau. Like Defau, his goal is to find hidden treasures from before recorded history. Unlike the stealthy Defau, Jacques prefers extravagant heists and waiting until he is completely surrounded before executing a miraculous escape. <Kickstarter Exclusive>

Soul.Name: Thrashed to Shreds
Soul.Comment: Subtract [10-25] from the HP of three random enemy units. This effect occurs twice.

Skill0.Name: Wild Pounce
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/focused] Do [Damage AT+10] to one random enemy unit not in range.

Skill1.Name: Share the Kill
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/a Closed enemy unit is on the field] One friendly [subtype: Monster] is healed HP+20.

Skill2.Name: Claw Gouge
Skill2.Comment: This unit gets AT+10. Do [damage: 50%AT] three times to target enemy unit in range. This unit is Focused until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'It's the beast of Black Mountain! Be afraid!'
FlavorText.Text2: A mysterious hunting cat with an almost demonic face. It recently appeared, hunting prey with unbelievable quickness. Soon after it was first spotted, rumors sprung up among the local woodsmen that the big cat was possessed by spirits. <Kickstarter Exclusive>

Soul.Name: Equilibrium
Soul.Comment: Engage target friendly unit until the end of next turn and then, engage one random enemy unit until the next of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Barrier Seal
Skill0.Comment: This unit cannot be targeted or effected by Open Skills.

Skill1.Name: Miko's Seal
Skill1.Comment: Three random enemy units in range get HP-10. Any engaged units hit get HP=0 and are engaged until the end of next turn.

Skill2.Name: Broken Seal
Skill2.Comment: Disengage one random, engaged enemy unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'What can I do for you... boy?'
FlavorText.Text2: Hirume was one of the servants under the Saint of Water, Actoul. Unlike most former servants, when she was purified on Lavato she easily became accustomed to her new home. Using her powers of mind control, her innate wiles and her magic talismans, she quickly established her own dominion. <Kickstarter Exclusive>

Soul.Name: Smite of Heavens
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 20] to 3 random enemy units. For each unit hit that has 0 HP or lower, target friendly unit is healed for 15HP.

Skill0.Name: Price of Ultimate Evil
Skill0.Comment: No unit card in your Card File may be set next turn.

Skill1.Name: Invincible Warrior of Heaven
Skill1.Comment: You get SP+1. Do [damage: 50%AT] to one random enemy unit. If that unit is HP 0 or below, this unit is healed +15 HP.

Skill2.Name: Nerves of Steel
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: AT x 2] to a random enemy unit within range. Do [damage: 50% of MAX HP] to this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Defenses are meaningless in the face of my power!'
FlavorText.Text2: Helcuras was one of the servants under the Saint of Wood, Beigaras. On his home world he was revered as a legendary warrior, leading his men to victory and bringing an end to several wars. It was said his body was invincible, and that he once defeated a thousand men without the aid of a weapon or armor. He finally died when his best friend betrayed him.

Soul.Name: Cleansing Tonic
Soul.Comment: Two target units get AT+20, DF=0, AGI-1, and are poisoned until the end of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Price of Ultimate Evil
Skill0.Comment: No unit card in your Card File may be set next turn.

Skill1.Name: Sorry, My Dear
Skill1.Comment: Target Poisoned unit of LV 2 or lower gets HP=0.

Skill2.Name: Lady Demon
Skill2.Comment: Choose one disengaged enemy unit. Do [damage: that unit's AT] to target friendly unit. Engage the enemy unit.

Skill3.Name: Virulent Poison
Skill3.Comment: One unit gets AT+20, AGI-1, LV-1, and is also Poisoned until the end of next turn. If the unit selected is friendly, you get SP+1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Oh yes, that expression on your face is perfect.'
FlavorText.Text2: Rosetta was one of the servants under the Saint of Wood, Beigaras. She was the queen of the greatest empire her world had ever seen. She maintained her reign through necromancy, curses, alchemy, and her otherworldly beauty. She was forever young, thanks to the girls she sacrificed to make her elixir of immortality. She eventually poisoned herself with her own elixir.

Soul.Name: The Blade's True Form
Soul.Comment: Do [damage:40] to a random, disengaged, enemy unit with HP 1 or higher. This effect occurs three times.

Skill0.Name: Price of Ultimate Evil
Skill0.Comment: No unit card in your Card File may be set next turn.

Skill1.Name: Cry of Wu
Skill1.Comment: Target enemy unit in range of level 3 or higher gets HP-30.

Skill2.Name: Blade Reflected in a Mirror
Skill2.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to a random enemy unit of HP 1 or higher. This effect occurs three times.

Skill3.Name: Fearful Command
Skill3.Comment: The units on the left and right of this unit get AT+10, DF=0 and AGI+1 for this turn, and also HP-10.

FlavorText.Text1: 'My sword is drawn! If you wish to live, drop to your knees! Beg! Pray for your life!'
FlavorText.Text2: Kanyu was one of the servants under the Saint of Wood, Beigaras. In another world, he ruled an empire that lasted for a thousand years. Generous to his people, he had infinite hostility for his enemies. In countries that tried to resist his invasion, every last person was burned alive. He became an incarnation of fear, such that men would die from terror in his presence. Outside of war, Kanyu had a talent for music and poetry.

Soul.Name: A Creator's Whim
Soul.Comment: Do [damage:30] to target enemy unit. One unit gets MAX HP=10, HP=10, AT+20, AGI+1.

Skill0.Name: Price of Ultimate Evil
Skill0.Comment: No unit card in your Card File may be set next turn.

Skill1.Name: Arbitrary Experiment
Skill1.Comment: Target unit gets MAX HP-10 and AT+10, except this unit.

Skill2.Name: Fruit of Experimentation
Skill2.Comment: Do [# of times 'Arbitrary Experiment' has activated] X 15 to target enemy unit in range.

Skill3.Name: Crowning Solution
Skill3.Comment: One friendly unit gets HP=0. Then, do [damage: [times 'Arbitrary Experiment' activated] x15 to 2 random enemies in range. Return [card: Warped Genius / Albert] from your Cemetery to File.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Unsavory experiments will be required to implement my breakthrough. But what does it matter if it becomes a cornerstone of science?'
FlavorText.Text2: Albert was one of the servants under the Saint of Wood, Beigaras. A madman inventor and genius from another world, he was known for sacrificing his subordinates in order to further his research. It is said his final experiment unleashed a strange disease...

Soul.Name: Silence of the Flock
Soul.Comment: [conditional use/Refess level 2 or higher] Target engaged enemy unit gets MAX HP=0. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Order to Kill
Skill0.Comment: All friendly non-character units of AT 35 or lower and AGI 2 or lower get AT+10 and are healed 20 HP.

Skill1.Name: Sword of Sacrifice
Skill1.Comment: All friendly [subtype: Solar Kingdom] units of HP 0 or lower are healed 30HP, except this unit.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Everyone seems frightened of me... They must be getting in the spirit of All Hallows Eve.'
FlavorText.Text2: When Etoile learned about All Hallows Eve, she decided she should participate. She found a great respect for the power of fear from her time with the True God Church. On this night, Etoile drops her blank expression, puts on a costume and tries to get into character. She's very bad at it, but everyone is on edge, fearing her wrath if they react incorrectly.

Soul.Name: Memoria
Soul.Comment: All enemy units get AT-10. Revive one closed friendly unit and give it MAX HP+10 and HP+10.

Skill0.Name: Noble Sacrifice
Skill0.Comment: All enemy units get AT-10. This unit gets HP=0.

Skill1.Name: Wish
Skill1.Comment: Revive one friendly closed unit of LV3 or higher and give it MAX HP=30, HP=30, AT=30 and AGI=2.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Are you hurt anywhere? Maybe I can help.'
FlavorText.Text2: A young woman in the Solar Kingdom who is studying a new form of healing called 'surgery.' She inherited a sum of money from her noble parents, but spent it all on learning and surgical instruments. She now lives in a poor area of town. This new healing art is still in its infancy, but Nicole is loved by her neighbors for her hard work and straightforward honesty.

Soul.Name: A Day in the Sun
Soul.Comment: One friendly gets AT+10, DF+5 and is healed HP+40. You get SP+1.

Skill0.Name: Potions For Sale
Skill0.Comment: One friendly unit of DF 10 or lower gets AT+10, DF+5 and is healed HP+20, except this unit. And then, you get SP+3.

Skill1.Name: There's No Choice...
Skill1.Comment: This unit gets LV=4 AT=40, AGI=4, and HP+40. Subtract AT directly from the HP of two random enemy units.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Phew... Even someone like me... can dream of a new life.'
FlavorText.Text2: A young girl who rents a spare room in the house where Nicole is staying. She works hard in the nearby shopping district every day, scraping together what money she can. When anyone asks about her past, Nerissa refuses to talk about it. Nicole has also noticed a strange mark on her neck...

Soul.Name: Overload
Soul.Comment: Two target units get AT+20. Do [damage: 50] to all units of AT 60 or higher.

Skill0.Name: Augment Serum
Skill0.Comment: One unit of LV4 or higher gets AT+20 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Die, Failed Experiment!
Skill1.Comment: Set target enemy unit in range of AT 60 or higher to HP=0.

Skill2.Name: Bring Me the Bodies
Skill2.Comment: Send one [subtype: Augmented] card from your Cemetery to the File. Remove all [subtype: Augmented] cards in your Cemetery from the game.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Lost faith in the world? Yes, yes... I understand. We'll just have to make a new world.'
FlavorText.Text2: A mysterious figure who lives deep in the ruins of a well-known stronghold from the war. After the Armies of Chaos were defeated, he re-emerged and repaired the underground lab where he once worked to create the Augments for his mistress. Now he seeks those with the mark on their necks, so he can finish his work.

Soul.Name: To the Laboratory
Soul.Comment: Send one disengaged unit of HP 30 or lower directly to the cemetery. You get 2 less SP at the beginning of next turn.

Skill0.Name: Soul Siphon
Skill0.Comment: Set target friendly unit of [LV 2->4] to HP=0. And then, you get SP+1.

Skill1.Name: Double Attack
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT 50%] to 2 random enemies in range.

Skill2.Name: Blood Pact
Skill2.Comment: One friendly unit gets HP+30.  One enemy unit gets HP-30.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Hehehe... Don't be afraid. Just stay very, very still and you won't get hurt.'
FlavorText.Text2: A member of the original Augment project, Framathu was once a swordswoman in the army of the Duchy of Crest. Recently she was found by Deeka, who finished her transformation with bird wings and snakes growing from her back. Now she is his servant, helping him locate other girls with the mark on their necks.

Soul.Name: Dual Shot
Soul.Comment: [conditional use Gowen LV4 or higher] Do [damage: 30] to 2 random enemy columns.

RankUp.Name: Rank Up
RankUp.Comment: If you have a Gowen level of 6 or higher, this unit gets AT +20, RNG +2.

Skill0.Name: Repeating Crossbow
Skill0.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to one random enemy unit in range. This skill is repeated a total of 3 times.

Skill1.Name: Pinning Shot
Skill1.Comment: [conditional use/rank up] Do [damage:AT] to a random engaged enemy unit, and engage it until the end of next turn.

FlavorText.Text1: 'You wanna worry? Don't worry about me, worry about the monster!'
FlavorText.Text2: A female mercenary who specializes in hunting huge monsters. She has a slim figure and thin arms, but she's able to crank a heavy repeating crossbow that normally takes two grown men to operate. Cristy is normally energetic and talkative, but not when someone asks about her past... or the mark on her neck. She's rumored to be 'of Dragon Blood.'

Soul.Name: Premium Fee
Soul.Comment: Do [damage: 40] to target enemy unit. Send one random character card of LV 2 or lower from your Cemetery to your Card File.

Skill0.Name: Revival
Skill0.Comment: This unit uses 0 [SP] when reviving during [Set Phase: Revive].

Skill1.Name: Summon Rage Spirit
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: number of unit cards in your Card File X5] to a random enemy in range. This unit gets RNG-1.

Skill2.Name: Consumed by Spirits
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/RNG0] Decrease your Gowen LV by 1.

FlavorText.Text1: 'If I become so inclined, your life may be forfeit.'
FlavorText.Text2: An arrogant magician from the Mercenary Nation. He is quick to take inhumane jobs if it means he can charge a premium rate, and has thus become disliked among other mercenaries. His specialty is an obscure form of spirit summoning. Currently, Niro is in the employ of a mysterious stranger, and his job is to hunt down those with a mark on their necks.

Soul.Name: Wings of Flight
Soul.Comment: All units get AGI+1 for this turn.

Skill0.Name: Avian Affinity
Skill0.Comment: [conditional use/AGI 5 or higher] Do [damage: AGI X5] to one random enemy unit in range.

Skill1.Name: Falcon Strike
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT+ AGI x5] to [0->2] random enemy units in range.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Somehow, we'll do it together!'
FlavorText.Text2: Leyte is a student at the Wizard's Academy, in training to be a wizard falconer. She lost both her parents in the war and has been living in an orphanage, where she serves as a surrogate big sister to the younger orphans.

Soul.Name: Lynn's Blessing
Soul.Comment: Revive two friendly [subtype: Wizard Kingdom] units and give them MAX HP+10, HP+10 and AGI+1

Skill0.Name: Kind Teacher
Skill0.Comment: All friendly units in [area:1-2-3] get DF+10 for this turn.

Skill1.Name: Dispersion Strike
Skill1.Comment: Do [damage: AT] to target enemy in range. If that unit is at HP 0 or lower, return one random enemy unit of LV3 or lower to the File.

Skill2.Name: For the Children
Skill2.Comment: [conditional use/a friendly closed unit of LV 2 or lower is on the field] This unit gets AT=60, DF=10, RNG=3, and is healed HP+20.

FlavorText.Text1: 'Understand? If you are not kind to the weak, you'll never grow up to be truly strong.'
FlavorText.Text2: A young woman who works at an orphanage in Regus and teaches children. She is unbelievably patient, kind and calm with the children. She serves as support both for them and the others who work at the orphanage. She has a strange mark on her neck, but won't talk about it -- and there is something about her that makes people afraid to ask.

Attack.Name: Attack
Attack.Comment: [conditional use LV 3 or higher] Attack

Soul.Name: Encased in Stone
